text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Ju ainawai Jisukristu muunji aajakajua nuna daaji agatkamua duka . Nigka David , Abraham aina nu wegantu aajakuí .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Abragka uchijiyai Isaac , Isaaka uchijiyai Jacob , Jacopa uchijiyai Judá nuigtú yachi aidaushkam .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Judá Tamarai akiauwai Faresan , Zarajai . Faresa uchijiyai Esrom , Esroma uchijiyai Aram .

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Arama uchijiyai Aminadab , Aminadapa uchijiyai Naasón , Naasogka uchijiyai Salmón .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Salmón Rahapa juki akiauwai Boozan , Booz Rutan juki akiauwai Obetan , Obeta uchijiyai Isaí .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Isaí uchijiyai apu David , tuja David Uriasa nuwe aajakua nuna jukí Salomogkan akiauwai .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salomogka uchijiyai Roboam , Roboama uchijiyai Abías , Abiasan uchijiyai Asa .

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asa uchijiyai Josafat , Josafata uchijiyai Joram , Jorama uchijiyai Uzías .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Uziasa uchijiyai Jotam , Jotama uchijiyai Acaz , Acaza uchijiyai Ezequías .

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Ezequiasa uchijiyai Manasés , Manasesa uchijiyai Amón , Amogka uchijiyai Josías .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Josiasa uchijiyai Jeconías nuigtú yachi aidaushkam , ditak akiinawajui Babilonianmaya aidau Israel aentsun achig yajuaku aina nunú tsawan jegatsaig .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Tuja Babilonia yajuakam batsamsag Jeconías akiauwai Salatielan , Salatiela uchijiyai Zorobabel .

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zorobabela uchijiyai Abiud , Abiuta uchijiyai Eliaquim , Eliaquima uchijiyai Azor .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azora uchijiyai Sadoc , Sadoca uchijiyai Aquim , Aquima uchijiyai Eliud .

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eliuta uchijiyai Eleazar , Eleazara uchijiyai Matán , Matagka uchijiyai Jacob .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Jacopa uchijiyai José , María aishi aajakua nunú ; tuja Maríayai akiinauwai Jisus , Apajuí awemamu taku Kristu tujakbauwa nu .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Imaan aajakajua nunú Abragkai nagkamsa dekapa Davitai ejemak awai catorce aents , tuja Davitai nagkamsa dekapaja Babilonianmaya aidau Israel aentsun achijá yajuakajua nui ejemash catorce aents awai , aantsag Kristu akiinauwa imanui ejemashkam catorce aents awai .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jisukristu akiinatnai tibauk aatus aajakuí . José anagbauwai Marían Jisukristu dukují atinun , tujash Maríak eke nematsuk pujayatak Wakaní Pegkejin ejapjukui .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Nuniktatman José dekaa , nigka aishmag pegkeg asa : Wakenmataik tikichish dekainatsaig idaisatjai , tiuwai .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Aatus José anentaimas kanittaman , Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya kajanum wantintuk : “ José David wegantu uchijiyah , utujimtsuk Maríak jukita , ame anagmamua duka . Ni ejapjuka nunak Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtukam ejapjuke ” , tiuwai .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: “ Nunú uchi akiinkui adaikata Jisus , ni aentsú tudaujin tsagkujug uwemtikatin asamtai . ”

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Ju aatus ejapjukua duka , duwik Apajuí etsegtin tibauwa nu uminbaunum nunikui , duka tawai :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: “ Ejapjuktinai makichik muntsujut aentsú takashtai , nunik uchigmaktinai uchi aishmagkun , nunú adaikatnaitjume Emanuel ” , ( nunak : “ Apajuik jutiijai awai ” taku tawai ) .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Nu aatsa tima José shintaag , nayaimpinmaya aents tibaunak imatiksag umiak Maríanak niina jeen jukiuwai .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Tujash dutika jukish Josek Maríajaig tsanigchauwai , eke uchi iwaiya nu akiintsaigkik , nuní pujai uchi akiinamtai adaikauwai Jisus .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Herodes Judea nugka apuji wajas pujai , nunú nugkanmag yaakat Belegnum Jisus akiinauwai . Nunik akiinamtai yaakat Jerusalegnum tikich nugkanmaya etsá minitaijin batsamin aidau kaunkajui . Nunú aents aidauk yacha yaya aidaun dekapawag diisag dekau aajakajui .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Iman aidau Jerusalén jegawag iniimaidau : — ¿ Tuwí pujawa judío aidaun apuji atin uchi yamá akiina dusha ? Ii nugken etsá jintain pujusá yaya wainkamji , Apu akiintai wantinkatnai timawa nunú . Nunika wainkaja minaji ni ememattasa , — tuidau .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Nu tibaun aents aidau etsejiagtai , apu Herodes antuk puyatkau , tuja aantsag ashí aents Jerusalegnumia aidaushkam nuna antukag puyatkaju , nunikag : — ¡ Wajukutskaih ! — tusag kuashat pachis chichaidau .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Nuna aatus apu Herodesak antuk , kuashat anentaimu . Nuniak sacerdote apuji aidaun , chicham umiktin agagbaun pachis etsejin aidaujai untsukú , nunik : — ¿ Tuwí Apu Kristush akiinatnaita ? — tiuwai .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Duka yaakat Belén , Judea nugkanum awa nui akiinatnai , juna aatus Apajuí etsegtujakú aidau agaju ainawai :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: ‘ Belén , Judea nugkanum awa juuwai yaakat imá piipichik , tujash nui akiinatnai makichik Apu , tikich apu aidaun nagkaesau Israel aentsu Apuji atina nu ’ tawai , — tuidau .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Nuna dekaa apu Herodes untsukú nunú yacha kaunkajua nuna , tikich aidauk dekainatsaig : — ¿ Yaya wainkagmesh wajupá dukapea yujagme ? — tusa chichastatus .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Dutika shiig aujus dekajua Belén ishimak : — Wetajum , nunikjum shiig dekaatajum tuwig pujawa uchi Apu atinush , nunika wainkajum waketkujum minash ujatkatajum , wisha wenu uchin ememattajai , — tiuwai .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Tusá aaja apu akatjam wegaju , nunikmag wainkaju yayan , ditá nugkeen batsamsá wainkamun . Nunik yaya eketbaun nemajuk we wenakua , jegá uchi pujamunum nuna mamikis yaya eketunum jegawajui .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Nu jegan mamikis yaya eketun wainkag shiig aneasaju .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Nunikag jegawag jegá waikmá uchin dukujijai pujuttaman wainkaju . Dutika uchin tikishmatug emematuidau . Nuninak ditá kajunjin ujakag uchin anentag wají wakejumain aidaun susaju : Oron , ekematai incienso pegkeja kugkuinun , kugkuin mirranashkam .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Juna dutikawag kintamag kajiittaman Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya : “ Herodes pujamunum wakettsuk yajá tikich jintanum wakitkitajum ” , tusa ujakú . Tima nunisag yajá tikich jintanum waketjau .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Nunú aents yayan wainak kaunkaju waketjamtai , Josenashkam nayaimpinmaya aents kajanum wantintuk : “ José nantaktá , nunikam nuwem uchijai jukim Egipto nugkanum waamak wetá . Apu Herodes suntajin ishiaktatui uchin kajegtí tusa . Awi pujamin tsawan uminkamtai , wakitkita tusan ujaktajame ” , tiu .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Tima Joseshkam nantakí nunú kashik uchin dukujijai juki Egipto weuwai .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Nunik nuanuí pujusuí , Herodes jakamtai wakitkitatus . Tuja nuna dita Egipto wegajua duka , Apajuí etsegtin aajakajua nunú agagbaunum : “ Mina uchig Egipto nugkanum pujaun untsuktatjai ” , tawa nunú imanisag uminkauwai .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Nunú aents atushtanmaya yayan wainak kaunkau aidau , yajá waketjamun Herodes dekaa : Tsanujajeapi , tusa senchi kajekú . Nunik ni suntaji aidaun : Ashí uchi Belegnumia , nuigtú Belén tikiju batsataidaushkam , jimag mijan ajamu nagkamsajum yamá akiinau aidaujai kajegtajum , tusa ishiaku . Nunak Herodesak yayan wainak kaunkau aidaun inias , wajupa tsawantak aayi uchi akiinash nuna shiig dekau asa tiuwai .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Juna Herodes dutika uchin kajegkua duka , Apajuí etsegtin Jeremías agagbaunum :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: “ Antukmajai Ramanum senchi buutuidaun , nunak Raquel niina uchijí aidaunum buutak anentaish ichichtumain wajashmae , uchijí aidauk jinawaju asamtai ” , tawa nunú imanisag uminkauwai .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Nunik dukap tsawan asa Herodes jakamtai , Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya José Egipto pujuttaman kajanum wantintuk :

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: “ José nantaktá , nunikam uchi dukujijai jukim Israel nugkanum wakitkita . Yamaik uchin maatatus wakejibia duka jakae ” , tiu .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Nunú tima Joseshkam nuween uchijai juki Israel nugkanum wakitkiuwai .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Nunik niina nugkeen jegakmá José dekau , Herodesa uchijí Arquelao , apají jakamtai ni apu wajas inamak pujau tabaun , nunik ajankauwai Judeanum wetan . Nunittaman kajanum ujakuí : “ Judeanum wetsuk Galilea nugkanum wetá ” , tusa .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Tima yajá tikich jintanum we , ni nugkeen yaakat Nazaret pujustatus jegau . Nunú aatus nagkaemakiuwa duka , Apajuí etsegtin Isaías chichaak : “ Kristuk Nazaretnumia ” tutai atinai , tiuwa nunú imanisag uminkauwai .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Jisus eke Nazaret pujai , Juan Yamijatin chichagkagtú wekagu Judea nugka uwejush wegakunum .

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Nunik chichagkagtak : “ Tudau takatak idaikujum Apajuí nemagkatajum , ni aentsnum inamjatnuk tsawantak ashí jegae ” , tau .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Juan chichagkagtamuk yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin Isaías agak : “ Makichik aents eemak taa uwegshunum wekagas senchi jiiká chichagkagtak : ‘ Apu wekaesatnun jintan shiig iwajug esegak tutupit dakuegajama numamtuk , atumi anentaimish shiig iwajajum umiktajum Apu minitin asamtai ’ , titinai ” tiuwa nunú imanisag uminkauwai .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Juagkak camello uje najanamun nugkujakuí , akachumtaijish duwap aajakuí , manchin dapá yumijijai yuujakuí .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Juan aatus uwegshunum chichagkagtak wekagai Jerusalegnumia aents aidau , ashí Judea nugkanum batsamin aidaushkam , namak Jordán uwet batsataidaushkam ni chichagkagtamun antukagtatus kautkajui .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Nunú chicham etsegbaun antukag ditashkam ashí tudau takataiji aidaun : “ Apawah tsagkugtugta ” , tusa etsegtumaidau . Nunikmatai nunú aents aidaun Juagshakam Jordagnum yamiau .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Aatus yamijatak pujai saduceo aidau , fariseo aidaushkam kautkaju , Juan yamigmagti tusag . Nunú imanik kaunkagmatai wainak , Juan chichajak : “ ¡ Atumek iwanchi uchijí asajum aents tsanú yujagme ! ¿ Wagka yamimagtasagmesh wakegagme ? ¿ Atumek ayatak yamimamuikis Apajuí suwimak sukagtumaina duka uwemtumainaitai tajumek ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Dekas tudau takatan idaisaush wajuku amainaita , nunú iwainmamkatajum pegkeg aina nu takaakjum .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Atumek : Jutiik Abraham wegantu asaja yupichuch uweemain ainaji , tumamigpa . Dekas tajime : Apajuik jujú kaya aina junakeshkam Abragka uchijí emamainai .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ashí ajak nejechu aidauk , jachai ajaka tsupija apetiama numamtuk , aents tudaunak taká batsatun Apajuí suwimak susatnuk uminas awai .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Wika ayatak yumí yamijatjai tudaujin idayinak etsegtumainakui , tujash mina ukujui dekas minittawai mina nagkaetasu . Nunú yamigmagtatjume Wakaní Pegkejiya nujai , nuigtushkam nigki jiiyai suwimkan sukagtustinuk . Wika niina sapatjinakesh ukuitmaitsujai , nigka mina nagkaetasu senchigtin asamtai .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Nigki ashí aents aina nuwiyan akanjattawai , aents trigon ajakbau aidau juuká ijumag , awagti wampujin utsaak nejeen trigo ijumtainum yajumama numamtuk , Apajuí umigkau aidaunak jii ajumaish kajinkashtina nui suwimkan suwak , niina umigkau aidaunak ni pujutaijin yajuaktinai ” , tiuwai .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus Galileanmaya jiinki namak Jordagnum weuwai , Juan yamiijati tusa .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Nunik jegaamtai Juan yamimainchau dekapeak : — Wiitag jamah amina yamiijata tumainnuk , ¿ nuniaig ame minai yamimagtasam minam ? — tiu

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Tama : — Ehé , amina yamiijati tusan minitjame , mina awetiu ashí pegkejan dutikati timawa nuna imatiksanuk umikta tau asan . Tutai Juagshakam yamijú .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Dutika yamijam Jisus yuminmaya jiinki nayaim ujanmatai , Wakaní Pegkeji pauma nunin akaiki niiní jegattaman wainkauwai .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Nunú nuniaig antuekau nayaimpinmaya chicham : “ Juuwai dekas mina Uchig anetaijuk , niiní shiig aneajai ” , tabau .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Jisus Jordán yamimagmatai Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtujui , dutika juki uwegshunum emauwai , iwanch Jisusan dekapsata tau asamtai .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Nunú uwegshunum pujusuí cuarenta tsawai , cuarenta kashi . Imaan tsawantai yujumkan ijagmak pujau asa , Jisuschakam yapajuauwai .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Nunitai iwanch chichajak : — Ame dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek , ju kaya aina jujú pag emakam yuwakia , — tau .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Tusá tama Jisus ayaak : — Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui : ‘ Aentsuk imá yujumkajaigkik pujumaitsui , Apajuí chichamega nujaishkam pujumainai ’ tawai , — tiuwai .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Nuna aatus Jisus timatai nui inagkeaki emauwai yaakat Jerusalegnum . Dutika jega Apajuí ememattai jegamkamunum yakí nagkatkamunum iwaká awajus ,

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: chichajak : — Ame dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek tsekem iyaata , agagbau awai : ‘ Apajuí ni aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidaun ishitkatnai ni Uchijí aidaun kuitamkatnunak ’ tibauwai . Tau asamtai , ame tsekem iyautaish Apajuí ishiakbau igkumpak achigmaktinme , iyaakum kaya aina au tukumkaim , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Dushakam agagbau awai : ‘ Amina Apujum Apajuiya nu pegkegchaunum dekapsatasamek wakeyipa ’ , tawai — tiuwai .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Tusa timatai nuigtú iwanch Jisusan muja tsakajunum iwakuí . Dutika juú inaktamuik ashí nugkanum yaakat aina nuna , nuigtú ashí pegkeg aidaunashkam iwaintukui .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Dutika ashí inaktus : — Ashí junak amina amastajame , tikishmatjujam emematjita , — tau .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¡ Wetá iwanchih ! agagbau awai : ‘ Imá amina Apujum Apajuiya duke emematta , nuniakum imá nigki umigkata ’ tawai , — tiu .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Tusá timatai iwanchik ukukiuwai . Dutikamtai nayaimpinmaya aents kautuawajui kuitamkagtatus .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Tikich tsawantai Judeanmaya apu , Juagkan aents achiká egketainum egkeau , nunikmatai Jisus nuna antuk Galilea nugkanum wakitkiuwai .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Tujash nigka Nazaretak pujutsuk nagkaemaki , yaakat Capernaum Galilea kuchajin uwetus awa nui weuwai . Nunú nugkanum yaunchuk muun Zabulón , Neftalí aajakajua nuna uchijí wegantu aidau batsatu .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Nuna Jisus nunikua nunak , yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin Isaías agajua nunú imanisag uminkauwai . Nunú agagbaunmag :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: “ Zabulogkan nugke kuchá yantamen awa nui batsatutijum antuktajum , nunisjumek Neftalí nugke etsá akaetainmanini Jordán uwet awa nui batsatutigmeshkam antuktajum , antsagmek atum Galileanum judiuchu aidaujai pachimdaeja batsatutigmeshkam antuktajum .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Nunú nugka nui batsamin aidautijum pegkegchau takaakjum suwea numamtinum batsatutijum , uwemat pachisa etsegbau antukjum tsaaptin waintayama numamtuk wajaktinaitjume ” , tawai .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Jisus Capernaum jegaa , chichagkagtutan nagkabau . Nuniak : “ Tudau takatak idaikujum Apajuí nemagkatajum , ni aentsnum inamjatnuk tsawantak ashí jegae ” , tiuwai .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus Galilea kuchajin wekaekamá Simón , Pedro daagtina nuna , ni yachi Andresjai namakan main asag retan ajuntuinak yujattaman wainkau .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Nunik wainak Jisus chichajak : — Wegajai wi jintintuatjime , namak maatasajum yujagjum anmamtuk , Apajuí chichame etsegkujum aents aidau minai ikautjin atajum tusan , — tau .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tusá tamawaik , ditá retjinak ukuinak niijai wegajui .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Nunik Jisus ditajai ijunag machik kuwaesag wekamá , Zebedeo ni uchijí Jacobo , Juan aatus botenum chimpimas retjin apijuinak chimpimtatman wainak , nunashkam : — Wegajai mina jintintaig atajum , — tiuwai .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Tama ditashkam : — Ayú , — tusa apajinak ashí tikich takataiji aidaujai botenum ukuinak , Jisusjai wegajui .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Nunik Jisus ashí Galilea nugkanum wekagas , jega ijuntai aidaunum wayaa jintinkagtau yamajam chichaman Apajuí nuní inapawai tusa , nuniak ashí aents jau aidaunashkam etsagau .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Nunú dutika Jisus etsaegkagtamun pachis kuashat etsejuk dapampajaju , dutikamun ashí aents Sirianmayashkam antukaju , nunikag kuashat jaun , iwanch egkemtuamun imaanjaun , jata iyashin ipimpin achikam pimpijú wekaemainchaun , ashí tikich jatai jau aidaunashkam ikautkaju , dutikam Jisuschakam etsagaakui .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Jisus imatika aents jau aidau etsagamun antuinak , kuashat aents Galileanmaya , Decapolisnumia , Jerusalegnumia , Judeanmaya nuigtú Jordagkan amain batsataidaushkam shimutuidau , Jisus yamajam chicham etsegbaun antukagtatus .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Imatika tuwajam Jisus wainak wakau nainnum , nunik nui ekeemsamtai ni jintinbau aidau kautuawaju .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus nagkama jintintak tau :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Atum iik nagkamik iina senchijinig pegkeg pujuta duka jumaitsuapi tautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumiin Apajuí inamjatin asamtai .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: “ Atum wake besemag pujakjum , buutú pujautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , Apajuí ichichmamtan amasagtin asamtai .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: “ Atum kakagchauch aidautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumnak Apajuí ashí ni anagtamauwa nunak amastin asamtai .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: “ Atum Apajuinu pegkeg takastasa wakegakjum yapajaku , kitamaku waitmaina imanikjum waitiautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumnak Apajuí yaimpaktatjume nu wakegajum nuna takastí tusa .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: “ Atum tikich waitiaush wait anentin aidautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , nunú dutikautigminak Apajuí atumnashkam wait anenjamjattagme .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: “ Atum tsagkugnagjum pegkeg wajasú aidautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumek Apajuí wainkatin asajum .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: “ Atum tikich aidaujaish pegkegchau awagdaitash dakitin aidautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumnak Apajuí mina uchijui tujabiagtin asamtai .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Atum Apajuinu pegkeg takaagmin tikich nuna dakituinak waitkam pujautigmek , shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumiin Apajuí inamjatin asamtai .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: “ Atum mina dekaskeapi tusajum nemagtuidautigmin pegkegchau chichagtamainak , niimjutpas yujainak , atum chichakchamunash wainak tsanumjutpajag shiig pujuschamin awajtamainakuish , shiig aneasjum pujustajum .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Dakujustajum nuniakjum shiig aneetajum , atumek nayaimpinmaya wají shiig pegkeg umikbau jukitin asajum , yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin aidaunashkam atumin waitkagmaina aikasag waitkasu ainawai .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: “ Atumek ju nugka juwig tuke weega numamtin ainagme . Tujash nunú wee , jea jeatuji megkaekamtaish , ¿ itugsaya ataktush jea jeatush emamainaita ? Ayatak agaa ajapmaina numamtuk , atumshakam Apajuinu pegkeja nunú takatsuk pegkegchau aidau takaakjumek ayatak bakumattagme , nuniakjum Apajuí suwimkega nunú jukittagme .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: “ Atumek ju nugka juwi batsataina nuna tsaaptinjiyaitjume . Yaakat nainnum auk uumkag amaitsui .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Lamparashkam ekemakaik dukuká idaichatiame , dutiktsuk yakí ekentayame jegan tsaaptin emamtai , aents aidaush diisá yujastinme tusa .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Atumshakam numamtuk , ashí pegkeg aidauk takaakjum iwainaktajum , tikich aents aidaush wainainak ditashkam Apajuí nayaimpinum pujuuwa nuna ememattinme tusajum .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: “ Wika jujú nugka juwig Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nuna esakagtasanuk taachuitjai , tuja Apajuí etsegtin aidau agajajua nunakeshkam idaisatajum titasankesh taachuitjai . Wika Moisés , tikich Apajuí etsegtin aidau mina pachitus agaju aina nuna umiktasan tauwaitjai .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Nuna tajim nunak dekas tajime : Nugka , nayaim aina nunú megkagainatsaigkik chicham umiktinun Moisés agajua duka , makichkish yapajinashtinai , ashí betek imanisag uminkatnai .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Tuja jujú chicham umiktin aina juwiyan imanchau diinak , tikichnash dutiksag jintintuk , Apajuí eme anentsá inam achagtinai . Untsu nunú chicham umiktajum tibauwa nuna betek umiak tikichnashkam dutiksag jintintuau aidauk , Apajuí eme anentsá inam agtinai .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Tujash atum fariseo aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai Apajuin umijuina nuna nagkaesau umigchakjumek , Apajuí inamak achatin ainagme .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: “ Moisés chicham umiktin agagbauwa nuanuig : ‘ Magkagtuawaipa , ame tikich maakmek suwimak suwam atatme ’ tawai .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Tujash dekas wi tajime : Makichik aentskesh ni yachin tuke aneas kajejauk , suwimak suwam amainai . Nunisag yachin anentainkachu chichajú wekagushkam , apu chichaman epegkin aidau dekajam amainai , tuja yachin kajejak tikima pegkegchaun chichajushkam jii ajumaish kajinkashtina nui pujus waittsatnai .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: “ Ame tikich aentsjai kajegdaikamu ajutjamaig , Apajuí anentag susata tibaugmea nu jukim jega Apajuí ememattainum wetsuk ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: dekatkauk amijai kajegdaikamua nunuwá wejim : Yamaik tsagkugdaijami , tusam epegtuniata . Nunikam agkan wajasam Apajuí ememattasam wegakmesh ni anentag susata tibaush jukim wetá .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: “ Makichik aentskesh : Pegkegchau takagtusume tusa apunum chichaman egketjamamtai , niijai apu chichama epegnunum wegakmek , jintaag shiig chichasam epegtuniata , nunikchaminig apu chichaman epegnunum jegaa amin dekagtama , ni jujamki achijatin aidaunum sujupakmatai , achijatin jujamki aents katsek aidau achiká chimpitainum egkepawai .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Junak dekas tajime : Amina apu achigmak egkepamtaig kakajus jiinmaitsume , ayatak amina kuichkijum ashí akikmakam , shiig ashimkam jiinmainaitme .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: “ Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nuanuig : ‘ Tsanijinawaigpa ’ tawai .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Tujash wi dekas tajime : Aents nuwan dutikachainjash tusa wakegas diyaushkam , anentainig tsanijimui .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: “ Nuniau asamtai amina jiim pegkegchau anentaimtuja diitnum niimtijamkuig , jiim untsugmia nu ukuinkam ajapmainaitam numamtuk wajaktá tudau takat idaikum , dekas pegkejai tudau idaisau asá Apajuí inamtaijin makichik jiiyaik niimsá waimaina numamtuk wajamuk , nu dutikachmek ashí amina iyashmijai jii ajumaish kajinchaunum pujusam tuke waitú pujumain asamtai .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Tuja uwegmishkam pegkegchau takamtijamkuig , uwejum untsugmia nu tsupikam ajapmaina numamtuk tudau takat idaisatajum , dekas pegkejai tudau idaisau asá , pujut tuke atina nui makichik uwegtin waimaina numamtuk wajamuk , nunú dutikachaminig ashí iyashim jii ajumaish kajinchaunum pujus waitmain asamtai .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: “ Junashkam Jisus jintinkagtak tiuwai : Nuwa idaitan pachis Moisés agajua duka : ‘ Aishmag nuwen idaikug papiin agag , yamaik idaijai , tusa nuaduí idaimainai ’ , tawai .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Tujash wi tajime : Aishmag nuwen ekagmakchau aig idaikug , aentsjai tsanijinata tusa awemak itugmaina numamtuk awagmawai . Nuwa idaisamujai nuwenushkam aantsag mai ekagmawai .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: “ Nuigtushkam Moisés aents aidau yaunchuk agatjamunum tawa nu dekagme , duka : ‘ Ame Apajuí pachisam dutikatjai tibauk umitskek idaisaipa ’ , tawai .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Tujash wi tajime : Apajuí daajiya nu adaikajum , Apajuish dekas waitui wi taja nunú umiktinak , tusagmek tiigpajum . Tuja nayaimpia aushkam Apajuí pujutai asamtai , au pachisjumshakam tigpajum .

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: Jujú nugka jushakam pachisjumek tiigpajum , Apajuí najamsa eketbau asamtai ; Jerusalegshakam pachisam wainkam chichakaigpa , jujú yaaktanmag Apu ju nugkanmaya aina nuna nagkaesau pujusá inamjatin asamtai .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Atumi pujutjum pachisjumesh tiigpajum , atumek intashim puju atí takugmesh , tuja bukusea atí takugmeshkam dutikmainchau asajum .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Dekas nunú wainkam tu wekaetsuk , ayatak tutupnik ame dutikmainaitkumek ‘ ehé ’ titá , tuja ame dutikmainchawaitkumshakam ‘ atsá ’ titá , aaja tutsuk wainka tu wekaebauk pegkegchau asamtai .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: “ Atumek Moisés yaunchuk agagbauwa duka dekagme , nuanuig : ‘ Aents jiimin emestugmakuig , ameshkam dutiksamek emestugta , tuja daimin akagtamkuishkam , ameshkam dutiksamek niina nai akagkata ’ , tawai .

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Tujash wi tajime : Duka dutikmaitsui . Amina pegkegchau takagtamkuishkam iikatasam wakeyipa . Makichik aentskesh yapim untsugmia atú awatamkuishkam , atumesh iikajum awattsuk , juinia yapijuish awatita tusajum ayampatuatajum .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Makichik aentskesh nugkutaigmin atanjamkitatus utugchatan aputugmakuig , awantak pataká nugkutaigmesh susata .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Aents kijinun amaak : ‘ Jujú jukim makichik kilómetro kuwagtukta ’ , tujamkuishkam jimag kilometronum ejentuntajum .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Atsumamun segapainakuishkam sujittsuk susatajum , tuja atumiin wajiigmin tsagkatjukta tujamkuishkam , atsá tusa sujittsuk tsagkatkatajum .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: “ Dushakam yaunchuk agagbau chichaak : ‘ Amejai ijutkamu aneakum , shiwajum aidauk ausaigpajum ’ timawa duka shiig dekagme .

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Tujash wi tajime : Atumi shiwajum aidaush aneetajum , nuniakjum atumin pegkegchaun chichagtamaidaush pegkegnum chichagkatajum . Dutiksagmek kajegtamaidaush pegkegnum yaigtajum , waitkagmainakuish , dita pachisjum Apajuí aujtustajum , ni esegati tusajum .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Nunú aajam dutikakmek , ii Apají nayaimpinum puja nuna uchijí atatme . Apajuik ashí aents pegkeg , pegkegchau aina nudaujai etsanak etsanmitkawai , aikasag yuminashkam pegkejan takaidau , pegkegchau takaidaujai yutumtikui .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Tujash atum aents anempaina nujaig aneniakjumesh ¿ wají imana juwagme ? Aents pegkegchau aidaushkam ni aneeniamujaig aneeninawai . Nunitsuk atumin kajegtamaidaushkam atumek aneemainaitjume .

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Tuja atum imá atumin pataim aidaujaig shiig anendaisa chichasá pujakjumesh ¿ wají imana iwainame ? Nunak Apajuin umigchau aidau nunin ainawai .

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Dekas atumek pegkegchau atsugbau atajum , iina Apají nayaimpinum pujú pegkegchau atsugna ibau .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Atum pegkeg takaajum nunú aentsnum iwainmamkata tabaunum dutikawaigpa , kuitamamkatajum . Atum ayatak aentsnumak iwainmamkatasa nuniagtaik , iina Apají Apajuí nayaimpinum pujuwa duka wají shiig pegkeja nunak amaschagtinai .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Nuniau asamtai atum aents atsumau yayakjumek , tikich aidaush wi dutika takaamun dekaatnume tusagmek jega ijuntainmagkesh , jinta nagkaematainmagkesh etsejú yujaigpajum ; nunak aentsú tsanú aidau aents eme anenjus diigsatnume tusag nuní yujau ainawai . Dekas tajime : Nuna nunidauk aents eme anentam aidau asag Apajuí akiamak achagtinai .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Jujú aatus asamtai , atum aents atsumak waitiau yayakjumesh , wi aajan yaimjai tusagmek ame shiig chichataigmikesh ujakaigpajum .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Dekas pachitsuk idaisatajum etsejú yujatsuk , nunak ii Apají Apajuiya nu ii takaamunak wainui , nuaduí atak nayaimpinum akigmak wají shiig pegkeg aidaun sujamsatnai .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Atum Apajuí aujkugmeshkam , aentsú tsanú aidau , aents waitkatnume tusag jega ijuntainum tuwakbaunum wajaidiag , nuninachkush jintá ashí aents wainainamunum wajantag , senchi chichaká Apajuin aujú yujau aina nunikaigpajum . Dekas tajime , nuna nunidauk aents eme anentam aidau asag , Apajuí akiamak achagtinai .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Tujash atum Apajuí aujkugmek , ame kanutaigmin wayaam waiti epenim pujusam , tikichish dekainachbaunum amina Apa Apajuiya nu ausata . Aaja tikich dekachbaunum segamash , Apajuik ashí wainainamunum wají shiig pegkeja nuna amastinai .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: “ Atum Apajuí aujkugmesh chicham imanchauk awá awagkijum segaigpajum , Apajuin dekaskenum nemagchau aidau imatjamas imá shiig antugtukainta tusag nunak imatin ainawai .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Atumesh nujai betekak aigpajum , Apajuik dekawai atum atsumamunak eke segatsjuminig .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Nuniau asamtai atum Apajuí augkugmek aatsajum titajum : ‘ Apawah , amek nayaimpinum pujuwaitme . Pegkegmaitam ibau asamin , ashí tikich aidaush imá aminak emematjabiagtinme .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Amek jutiishkam inajatjata . Amina aentsjum nayaimpinmaya ame wakegamun umigtamin aina dutiksag nugkanmayashkam umigtukti tusam .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Dutiksamek ii yuwatnushkam kashí kashinig sukagtita .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ii tudaujishkam tsagkugkagtugta , jutii tikich pegkegchau takagtamaidaush tsagkugnaitag aikasmek .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Iwanch pegkegchaun takamtiksati tusamek idaikagtutsuk , ayatak yaijatkam agkanmitkagtuata ’ , tiuwai .

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: “ Atumin tikich pegkegchau takagtamsau tsagkujakjumek , atumshakam iina Apají Apajuí nayaimpinum puja dusha tsagkujam atatjume .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Untsu tikich pegkegchaun takagtamsau tsagkugchataik , Apajuishkam atumi tudaugminash tsagkugtamjashtatui .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Atum yujumak ijagmaka pujusjum Apajuí aujkugmesh , aentsú tsanú aidau : Wi ijagmá Apajuí aujbaunash tikich aidaush waitkatnume , tusag wake besekag ayatak anentaimas yujau aina atumek nunikaigpajum . Dekas tajime : Nuna nunidauk aentsnum iwainmamá yujaidau asag , Apajuí wají shiig pegkeg suwamak achagtinai .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Nuaduí ame yujumak ijagmaka pujusam Apajuí aujkumek wake besekam wekaetsuk , yapim nijaim , shiig temashmajam , shiig dakunkut wekaesata ,

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: tikich aents aidaush ame yujumak ijagmaka wekaesá Apajuí aujbaugmin dekagmawainum . Ame ijagmaka wekaebaunak Apajuí waipau asa , ame atsumamu segamashkam nigki amastatui .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: “ Jujú nugka juwi wajiin kabau emesmain , nuniachkush kawanchjumain , kasashkam wayaa kasamain aina juninum wiyakchameatasagmek wakeyigpajum .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Dekas nayaimpinum kabaush wajiin emeskamtai megkaemainchau , nuniachkush kawanchjumainchau , kasashkam wayaa kasamainchauwa nui wiyakchameatajum .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Nunú wiyakchameatin ajutjamaina nuanuig anentaimsajum pujustajum .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: “ Atumi jiimek lámpara ekemakam tsaaptin emaama numamtuk atumi iyashminak awagmawai . Jiim pegkeg asamtai shiig wainmamainaitam imatiksam , ashí pegkeg aina duke anentaimtaik , anentaiminish tsaaptin ajutjamainai .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Untsu jiim pegkegchauwaitkui wainmamainchauwaitam nunisjumek ayatak pegkegchauk anentaimkugmek suwenum pujagme . Aminí tsaaptin awa nu suwe wetaik , nuní nagkaemas pujutjum pegkegchau wemainai .

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Inakak jimag apugtinuk amaitsui . Tikich apujin imá senchi aneak , tikichin dakitmainai . Nuniachkush makichik apujin wakejus umijak , tikichnak dakitau asa umigmaitsui . Numamtuk atumshakam Apajuí umigkata tu , wiyakchameatasa anentaimtu wajamaitsugme .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: “ Junashkam tajime , atumek : ¿ Wajina yuwanuk , wajina uwagnuk , wajina nugkugnuk pujustaja ? tusagmek uyumá pujuigpajum . Yutái nagkaesauwa duka dekas atumi pujutjumia nuuwai , tuja jaanchin nagkaesauwa duka , atumi iyashmia nuuwai .

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Atumesh pishak agkajunum nanamaina nunú anentaimsajum diistajum . Ditak ajakmakagkesh juwinatsui , jeganakesh jegamkag yutaijinak ijumainatsui , nuniaunak Apajuí suwawai dita yuwatnunak , dutikam nuna yusag batsatainawai . Tujash atumetjume dekas pishak nagkaesau aidautigmek , iman ainagminish ¿ wagkag Apajuish atum atsumamunash amaschagtinme ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: ¿ Atumesh wajupatigmea , tikich esajam aina ibau wisha atajai tusajum senchi anentaimtú pujakjumesh esaumainaitjume ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: “ ¿ Wagka jaanchish imá puyatjagme ? Atumesh yagkug yagkujuina nunú anentaimsajum diistajum . Yagkug aidauk takainatsui , ujuchnash kutamainatsui .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Salomón nugkutai pegkejan tikich aents aidau waitus najanamun sumak nugkujá , tikichin nagkaesau iwagmamajakua nuna nagkaesau pegkeg iwajamun yagkujuinawai , Apajuí yagkugmitkamu asag .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Yagkug ikamia aidau yamaikik pegkejan yagkujuk , ajuma duwi etsa sukuam kagagtin aidaunakesh , Apajuí imatikas iwaja ibaush , ¿ wagka atumesh minash nigkiap imatikas iwagtumainaita tatsugme , Apajuiyai imatikas kajinas anentaimchau aidauwa ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Nuaduí atumek : ‘ ¿ Wajinak yuwatja , wajinak uwagtaja , wajinak nugkugtaja ? ’ tusajum uyumá pujuigpajum .

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Nunak aents Apajuí nemagchau aidau , nunin aidaun uyumas anentaimtuinak waitú yujau ainawai , tujash atum atsumamunak atumin Apa nayaimpinmayaya nu shiig dekagtamui .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Nuaduí dekatkauk Apajuí pegkegnum inapa nunuwá umigkatajum . Nuniakjumek ashí nunú aina dushakam aan kuashat jukitnaitjume .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Atumek tikich tsawantin atinuk , wajuk pujustajaki tusajum emtikajum puyatjú pujuigpajum , imá makichik tsawan tsawamunmayag puyatjusjum anentaimtitajum , Apajuí atum utugchatnum jegataish yaimpaktin asagmatai .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: “ Tikichi pujutjig augmatú yujaigpajum , atumnash Apajuí aikasag tujaminum .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Tuja atum tikich aidau pegkegchaujish augmatú yujataik , Apajuí atumnash nunú aents tajum dutiksag tujamtatjume . Atum tikich itujagme dutiksag Apajuí atumnash dutijamattagme .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Wagka yatsum imanchau takaish , atum imá pegkegchau takayatkugmesh , auk pegkegchau takaawai tusagmesh augmatú yujagme ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Itugsamek ame imá pegkegchau takaayatkumesh , yatsum imanchau takau diigsamesh nunikaipa titagme ? Nunú nuniakjumek amina jiimin tsetse muun egketukesh wainkam jiikí ajaptsuk , yatsumi jiin tsetse piipich egketu wainkam : Jasta jiigkitjame , tumaina numamtuk wajajume .

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: ¡ Aentsú tsanú aidauwah ! Dekas dekatkauk ame imá pegkegchau takaam nunuwá idaisata , nunikam yatsum imanchau takaidaushkam , idaisata titajum .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: “ Tuja Apajuí chichame pegkegma nu ujamaitak antutan dakituinakuig , waitkatsuk idaisatajum , ditak yawá kajen aidau yutai pegkeg suwamaitak iiki esajatta tuwama numamtuk wajaidau asagmatai . Tuja makichik wají pegkeg akik aidauk kuchí batsamtainig ukubaitsugme , kuchi dajag emesjainum tusam . Numamtuk wajainawai aents pegkegchau aidauk chicham pegkeg antutan dakituinak .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: “ Apajuishkam segatajum , imatjamak amastatjume ; egatash egaktajum , egakjumek , igkugtatjume ; untsuktajum , imatjamak waitin ujatjamtatjume .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Ashí aents sumauk suwam auwai , egauk igkuinai ni egamujinak , waitinum wajas untsumushkam waiti ujatam auwai .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: ¿ Atumesh uchijum yujumkan segapaig , kaya sumainkaitjum ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: ¿ Dutikachkugmesh uchijum namakan segapaig , dapi sumainkaitjum ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Atum pegkegchau ainayatkugmesh , uchigmik pegkeg suu ainagme . Atumkesh nuniagminish , Apajuí nayaimpinum puja dusha ¿ wagka atum pegkeg sumamunash amaschagti ?

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: “ ‘ Atum tikich aidau shiig awajtuktinme tusajum wakejin ainajum , nunisjumek tikichish shiig awajkatajum . ’ Aatus Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nuwish tawai , tuja aantsag Apajuí etsegtin aidau agaju aina nuwishkam tawai .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: “ Waiti menakua nuní wayatajum . Kuashat aents aidau jinta untsujin , waiti wegkajam megkaetanum ekagta nuní imá weenawai .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Tuja machikiuchi aents jinta tsejegkuch , waiti menaku pujut nagkanchaunum ekagta nuní waidauk .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: “ Atum aidautigmek kuitamamkatajum : ‘ Apajuí chichame etsejin ainaji ’ tusag , waitan jintinkagtuina nu tsanugmajainum . Ditak aents kasa ishamain ainayatak , aentsun shiig kumpamá ajuma duwi kasajama numamtuk wajainawai .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Nuaduí atumek aents aidauk wainmainaitjume ditá takatji diigsajum . Untukjak munchiinak nejetsame , aantsag uvashkam jagkinmayag juushtayame . Numamtuk aents pegkejak pegkegnak takaawai , tuja aents pegkegchaushkam pegkegchaunak takaawai .

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Numamtuk ajakshakam pegkejan nejenuk nunisag pegkegnak nejegame . Tuja ajak pegkegchaun nejenchakam nunisag pegkegchaunak nejegame .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Nuniau asamtai ajak pegkejan nejena duka , pegkegchaunak nejemaitsui , aantsag pegkegchaun nejenchakam , pegkegnak nejemaitsui .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ashí numi pegkegchau nejen aidauk tsupija apea ajaptayame .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Nuaduí atumek aents aidauk wainmainaitjume ditá takatji diigsajum .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Ashí aents mina dekaskenum umigtuinachiatak : ‘ Apujuh , Apujuh ’ , tujutuina duka Apajuí inamak achagtinai . Mina Apag nayaimpinum puja nunú wakegamun umiina nuuwai Apajuí inam agtinuk .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Tuja wi tsawan jegaakui nayaimpinmayan minitai , kuashat aents : ‘ ¡ Apujuh , Apujuh ! Iishkam kuashat takasuitji amina chichamjum etsegku , nuniaku ame daagmin wakan pegkegchau aidau aentsun egkemtuaush jiijá utsantujakuitji , tuja aents dutikmainchau aidaush kuashat takasuitji ’ , tujutiagtinai .

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Tusag imatjutuinakuish wi chichagkun : ‘ ¡ Tuwiyants ainajum ! wainchauwaitjime . ¡ Pegkegchau takau aidauwah , wetajum ! ’ titinaitjai .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: “ Aents mina chichamjun antugtukag , wi tabaun imatiksag umigtuidauk , aents jega jegamtan dekau nugkan initak tai kayanum dekanmitkak ajia jegamama numamtinai .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Nunú imatika jegamkamunak yumi yutug dujajakush , dase senchi umpuakush yumputsame , kayanum dekanmitkaka ajia shiig jegamkamu asamtai .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Untsu mina chichamjun antuinayatak umigtachuk , aents jega jegamtan dekachu kaamatkanum tauk ajigká jegama numamtuke .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Nunú nuninnum jegamkamunak yumi yutug dujajua piyujak , dase senchi umpuak yumpuag ajapama numamtinai . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Juna aatus Jisus jintinkagtua ashimkamtai , aents aidauk puyatjusag antugkajui ,

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: wagki aents chichame antugtai aidaun , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaunash nagkaesau nigka jintinkagtuau asamtai .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Nuna ashí jintinkagtua ashimak , ni jintintaiji aidaujai nainnumia akaiki wetai , kuashat aents saetus ashinaidau .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Nuniai aents jata lepra tutai achikam jaak pujau , Jisusan wainak nugká tikishmag pujus segaak : — Apuh , wakegakmek etsaentumainaitme , — tau .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam uwejen antiak : — Wakegajai , yamaik tsagagta , — tiuwai . Tamawaik leprak megkaekauwai .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus chichajak : — Wetá , tujash makichik aentskesh ujakaipa , tutupit sacerdote pujamunum jegaata , nuniakum Apajuinu atin jukim , Moisés tibauwa dutiksamek ejegata , ditashkam waipakag dekaskeap tsagaje tujamtinme , — tiu .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak nui jiinki , Jisus Capernaum jegattaman capitán tajuntun :

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: — Apujuh , mina inakeg senchi jamae chichigká , nantamaichame , ashí iyashí aidaun najaimak senchi waitmae , nuniak pegajinig tepeme , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam : — Ayú , wi tajuan etsagagtajai , — tiuwai .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Tusa tutai capitán chichaak : — Apuh , wika amea ibaunak , mina jegajuig wayaata tumain dekapeatsjai , nuigtushkam judiuchu asan . Nuniau asamtai ayatak juajuig pujusmekesh inakjuk tsagagti tujutta , tusa ame tamak tsagagtatui .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Tuja wi apu umigbau ajutui , aantsag suntag mina umigtuidau ajutuinawai , nunú aidaun wi : ‘ Jiinjajum shiyaktajum ’ , tamak jiinag shimumainai , tuja : ‘ Waketjatajum ’ , tamashkam waketug kaunmainai , nunisag mina inakeg aidaushkam : ‘ Ju dutikata ’ , tamak betek umigtuinawai . Aantsag ame juwi pujusmek : ‘ Tsagagti ’ , tamak tsagagtatuapita tajai , — tau .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Nuna aatus tutai Jisus anentai jegagchau , nunik nui aents minidaun : — Dekas tajime , Israel aina juwiyagkesh imatikas minai kajinas anentaimunak wainchaujai .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Nunin asamtai tajime : Ashí nugkanmaya aents aidau kaunkag , Apajuí inamtaijin Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aina nujai pekaamsag yuwawagtin ainawai .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Nuniai Israel aidau Apajuí inamtain waimain ainayatak , minai kajinas anentaimainachu asag , Apajuí inamtainig wayashtin ainawai , ayatak waitut ajumaish nagkankashtin suwea nui utsagkam Apajuiyai kanakag batsamas senchi waituinak nain takegtuinak buutú batsamiagtinai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Nuna tusa Jisus capitanin chichajak : — Jeemin wakitkita , ame dekas etsaentujattawapi tiu asamin ame inakjumshakam tsagaje , — tiuwai .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak Jisus Pedro jeen weuwai , nui jegakmá Pedro tsatsají senchi tsuweak pegajin tepettaman wainkau .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Nunik Jisus uwegnum antigkui , dutikam tsuweamunak bichatug pegkeg wajas nantakí yujumkan inajuk , Jisusan ashí ni ijunja yujainamujijai ayugkauwai .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Nunú tsawantaik kintamai , kashi ikautkaju kuashat aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aidaun . Imatika ikautkam Jisuschakam ayatak chichamenig wakan pegkegchau aidaunak jiijá ishiakui . Tuja jau aidaunashkam ashí etsagakui .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Nuna Jisus dutikauwa duka yaunchuk Apajuin etsegtin Isaías juna agajua nunú uminkauwai : “ Ni emegkaktinai ashí ii najaimatai aidaunak , dutikak ashí jau aidaunashkam etsagagtinai ” , tawai .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Jisus kuashat aents tuwajuinam wainak , ni jintintaiji aidaun : — Umintsatajum amain wegagmi , — tiuwai .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Tusá tiajam eke uminainai , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin jegaantun Jisusan : — Jintinkagtinuh , wisha ame tuwig wekaetam nuniakminish tuke aminak nemagkiní wajatin atajai tusan wakegajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Kujancham aidauk kanutaijig ajuinawai , aantsag pishak aidaushkam pasugkeg ajuinawai , tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinaunuk jeenchau , tepesá ayamainkesh atsugtaig wainkan wekaejai , — tiu .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Nuna tutai makichik niina jintintaiji aina nuwiya : — Apuh , dekatkauk mina jegajuí wenu , apag jakamtai ukusan ukuakun nemagkatjame , — tau .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Amek nemagtukta , idaisata aents wakanin jakaujai betekak batsata nu , apa jakamtaish ukustin atinme , — tiuwai .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai botenum chimpimjajui kuchá amain katigkagtatus .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Nunik weenai Jisusak kanag egkemsau . Nunika ai nagkamnauwai dase dasentut , nunik dasentai botenum yumik senchi yajanu . Imaniak ishamain wajatai ,

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: niina jintintaiji aidau jegantag ishintainak : — ¡ Apuh , uwemtikagtugta jakektatji ! — tuidau .

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Tama : — ¿ Wagka imanikjumesh ishamagme , aents imanis Apajuiyai kajinas anentaimchau aidauwah ? Tusa nantakí dase imanik dasentatman imijiaku , dutikam kuchashkam miyasuch yaunchuk aajakbauk nunisag we patamsauwai .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Nunikmatai nui aents chimpijaidauk puyatjukag ditak pempeentunikiag : — ¿ Jusha wají aents asamtaiya dasesh , kuchash ni chichamenash antujuinawa ? — tudayinau .

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Nunik dase megkaekamtai we weenakua , kuchá amain Gadaranmaya batsamtai nugkeen anumkajui . Nunik jinkamá jimag aents ukumatainum pujuidau ditan wainak adijkagtatus minituidaun wainkajui . Duka aentsuk wakan pegkegchau chimpimtugbau asag senchigtin kajen aidau . Iman asamtai makichik aentskesh nunú jintanmag wechatai aajakuí .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Nuniau asag Jisus anumak minittaman wainak , senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Jisusah , Apajuí Uchijiyah ! ¿ tsawan jegatsaigkik suwimak sukagtustasam juwish minam ? — tuidau .

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Nunikag kuchishkam ikaa yuwak batsatu asamtai :

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: — Ju aentsnumia jiijatkumek idaikagtusta au kuchi ijunaina awi utsanawagmi , — tusag segaidau .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Tusá tama Jisuschakam : — Ayú wetajum , — tiuwai . Tima wakan pegkegchau aidauk aentsnak ukuinak kuchinum utsanawajui . Dutikam kuchishkam pisajag betsag tajaekaunum utsankamá kuchanum iyagkag jinawajui .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Nunikagmatai kuchí kuitamin aidaushkam pisajag yaakat jegawajui . Nunikag : “ Kuchi nuní jiname , tuja aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aidaushkam nunikagmae ” , tusag etsejuidau .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Nunú kuchi jinae tusa etsegbaun antukag , ashí yaaktanmaya aidauk Jisusan wainkagtatus wejiajui . Nunik jegajiag : Wait aneasam ju ii nugkega juwig pujutsuk yajá weta , tiajui .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Tusá tima Jisuschakam botenum egkemag ataktú niina yaaktajin katigkuí .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Nunik katig pujai , aents wekaechau ayatak tepenun pegaknum pataidiag ejetiaju . Dutika itantagmatai Jisus niiní kajinas anentaimaidaun wainu asa , wekaechaun chichajak : — Uchijuh , amina tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje , — tau .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Nuna tutai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidauk ditak tudayinak : “ Juka Apajuin pegkegchaun chichajak tu wekaewai ” tuidau .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Tu anentaimaidaun Jisus dekau asa : — ¿ Wagka pegkegchaush anentaimjume ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Tuwaita imá yupichuch tumainush , tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje taja dukaih , atsa nantakim wetá tumainaitag dukaih ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinau asan , ju nugka juwish tudau aidaunash tsagkugkagtumainaitag nu dekaatajum , — tusa wekaechaun chichajak : — Nantakim ainká tepetaijum jukim jeemin wakitkita , — tiuwai .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Tama nantakug jeen wakitkiuwai .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Nu jau tsagagmatai tikich aidaushkam wainkag puyatjukajui . Nunikag Apajuin emematuidau : — Dekas nigka senchigtinapita , iman asampap jujú aentsnash niina senchijinig etsagaje , — tuidau asag .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Nuna dutika Jisus wekamá Mateon wainkauwai , kuichik apunu atinun akikmagtai yajumak ekeemtatman , nunik : — Mateo , wegajai mina jintintaig aminum . Tama niishkam : — Ayú , — tusa wajakug Jisusjai weuwai .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Nunik nunú tsawantaik , Jisus niina jintintaiji aidaujai Mateo jeen jegaawag mesanum jegantag pekamsagmatai , tikich apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin kuashat kaunawajushkam ditajai pekamsajui .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Nunik yujumkan yuwagtai , fariseo aidau Jisusa jintintaiji aidaun chichajuinak : — ¿ Wagka atumi jintinjamnush apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin nuigtú aents pegkegchau aina ibaujaish ijuntujash yuwawa ? — tuidau .

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Nu tabaun Jisus antuk ayaak : — Aents jamamtuchu aidauk ampijatnunak atsumtsame , aents jau aidau ampijatnunak atsumame .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Dekas imá pegkeg wetajum , nunikjum Apajuí chichamega nui : ‘ Aents wait anentin atajum tusan wakegajai , anentag kuntin itaajum tsagkugnagtasa maa apeajum nunak dakitajai ’ , tawa dusha wajina takua tawa nu shiig aujsa dekaatajum . Wika aents tudaugtuchu aidaunak minitchauwaitjai , wika aents tudaugtin aidau tudaujin idayinak mina nemagtuktinme tusan tauwaitjai .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Nuna aatus Jisus tutai , Juagká jintintaiji aidau jegantaju Jisusan , nunik iniidau : — ¿ Wagka jutiik , fariseo aidaujaig kuashtá yujumak ijagmau agmag nuniajinish , amina jintintaijum aidaush ijagmainatsua ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Nuwena nunú aents ipaamu aidaush wake besemag pekaamainkaih nu , nuwenu ditajai pujaigkish ? Anmamtuk mina jintintaig aidaush wi ditajai pujaigkik , yujumkanak ijagmamain ainatsui . Tujash tsawan jegattawai nuwena nunú juwam atata nu , nunikmatai ipaamu aidaush wake besemag dekapenak yujumkanak ijagmakagtatui , — tiuwai .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Tusa junashkam tiuwai : “ Makichik aentskesh jaanch yamagman tsupikag jaanch mamujunmag adujtuchu ainawai , yamajam asa jaanch mamujun nuní nagkaemas ichiimain asamtai .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Antsag vino yajatai duwap apagbau ajutnumag uva yumiji yamá ijugbaunak yajachu ainawai , dutikamak vino kajiak pushutak ipatmain asamtai , nunik vinok ukagag , duwapshakam ichiinak ajapnamainai . Tujash duwap yamagmanmag nunimaitsui , vino yamajam asa pushututaish ayatak egkenag wetai nunisag pegkejak amainai . ”

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Aatus Jisus chichagkagtak pujai , tajiuwai makichik judío aidau apuji , nunik Jisusan tikishmatug chichajak : — Mina nawantug yamá jakaun ukukjai , tujash apuh ame minim uwegmin antinjukta , dutikamak nawanjuk aneantatui , — tau .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam ni jintintaiji aidaujai wegajui .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Nunik wegamunum nuwa doce mijadai numpan senchi puwak jaa pujú , Jisusan wainak ukunum juwatki adijkauwai . Nunik Jisus jaanch pataká nugkuagbaujin antigkui ,

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: nigka : “ Jisusa jaanchjinakesh , antignuk dekas pegkejap wetatja ” , tu anentaimu asa .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Dutika antigkam Jisuschakam ayampá diikmá nuwan wainkau , nunik : — Nawantah , ame kajintsá anentaimam duwi tsagaju asam shiig aneasta , — tiuwai . Tima nunú tsawanta nuaduik nuwashkam tsagag pegkeg wajasuí .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Nuna dutika ukukí jegauwai apú nawanji jajukbauwa nuna jeen . Nunikmá wainkau nunú nuwauch jakaun ukusagtatus ditá nunitaiji asamtai , pigkuí aidaun umpuinak pampantú batsataidaun .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Nuniagtatman Jisus chichajak : — Atumek jinjatajum , nuwauchik jakache ayatak kanaje , — tiu . Tutai dushikidau .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Tusa aentsun ishiak idayak wayaa , nuwauchin uwegnum achiká inantam , nuwauchishkam nantakiuwai .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Nu Jisus dutikamun ashí yaaktanum etsejug dapampajajui .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Nuna dutika Jisus jiinki wetatman , jimag aents wainmachu pataetukag , senchi untsumkag : — ¡ David wegantu uchijiyah , jutiish wait anenkagtugta ! — wajaidau .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Nunikag Jisus jegá wayamtai , wainmachu aidaushkam utsantuawaju . Nunikagmatai Jisus ditan iniak : — ¿ Atumesh minash niimtijumainapi tujutjumek ? — tau . Tama ditashkam : — Ehé Apujuh , — tuidau .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditá jiin antintak : — Atum kajintsá anentaimjum nunisag uminkati , — tiuwai .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Tamawaik niimiajui . Nunikmatai Jisus ditan chichajak : — Makichik aentskesh ujakaigpa , — tiu .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Tibau ainayatak jiinjag weenak , ashí aents nuwiya aidaunak ujá ujakua wegajui .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
