text2: Nunú wainmachu etsagagbau jinki weenaig , aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu asa chichachun , Jisusan itajuawajui .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Dutikawagmatai wakan pegkegchaun jigkiuwai , dutikam aents chichachushkam shiig chichakuí . Nunikmatai aents aidauk senchi puyatjukag : — ¡ Israel aents aidautik makichkish aika etsagamuk wainchataiyai ! — tuidau .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Tujash fariseo aidauk : — Juka wakan pegkegchau aidau apujiya nuna senchijin wakan pegkegchaunak jiyaawai , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Nui juwaki Jisus yaakat aidaunum , nuigtú yaakat yaijuch aidaunmashkam , makí makichik jega ijuntai jegamkamunum , yamajam chichaman Apajuí nuní inapawai tusa jintí jintinkagtakua wegau . Nuniak etsagau ashí jatai jau aidaun , najaibau aidaunashkam .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Imatika Jisus etsagautai , tikich aents aidaushkam kuashat minituidau minash etsaentugti tusag . Aents aidau imaniagtai Jisus wait anenmain diyau , uwig kuitamain atsugbau wajukmaina numamtuk wajaidau asagmatai .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Nuniak Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun : — Dekas tajime : Shiig kuashat aents aidau Apajuí minaish inamjati tusa atsumainawai , tujash ujumchikiuchi yamajam chichama juna etsejuidauk ,

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: nuaduí Apajuí segatajum tikich ni chichame etsegmain aidaun ishiakti tusajum , — tiuwai .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Jisus niina jintintaiji doce aina nuna untsuká ijumag , aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aidau , jau aidau , najaibau aidaushkam etsagagtajum tusa senchimtika ishiakui .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Jisus ni chichame etsegtugkatajum tusa ishiaktinji doce aajakajuk ju ainawai : Simón tikich daaji Pedro , Andrés Simogka yachi , tikich Jacobo , yachi Juagjai mai Zebedeo uchijig ;

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Felipe , Bartolomé , Tomás , Mateo apú kuichkiji atinun ijumjujakua nu , Jacobo Alfeo uchijí , Lebeo Tadeo tuuta awagmatai ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Simón niina nugken agkanmitkatatus kuashat aents aidaujai chichajakua nu , Judas Iscariote Jisusan sujukua nunú .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Jisus niina jintintaiji doce aina nuna ishimak tiuwai : “ Judiuchu aidau batsatbaunmag wepajum , Samarianmaya aents aidau yaaktajinish wayawaigpajum .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Nunitsuk dekas Israel aents aidau uwig megkaejauwa numamtin aidau batsata nui wetajum .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Nunikjum chichagkagtuktajum , Apajuí ju nugkanum inamjatnuk ashí jegae tusajum .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Nuniakjum etsagagtajum aents leprayai jau aidau , tikich jatai jaidaushkam aikasjumek etsagakjum , jakau aidaushkam inantajum , dutikakjum wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamush jiijajum etsagaitajum . Nunú dutikakjumesh atumek akigkatajum tiigpajum ; atumnak wi mina senchijun amajime , dutikamu asajum wainkajum etsagaitajum .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: “ Wegakjumesh kuichkikesh , orokesh , cobrekesh ,

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: wají egkesá jutaigkesh , ushujutaigkesh , sapatkesh , nugkutaish yachiagmek jukigpajum . Wagki aents taká duka yuwatnujig suwam auwai .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: “ Tuja yaaktanum jegaakjumesh nuniachkugmesh aents yaaktan ukukí batsatbaunum jegakjumshakam , egaktajum yaita aents kajintsá diimainush , nunikjum nuwig pujusjum wegakjum ukuktajum .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Tuja jegá wayakjumesh shiig augmamsajum wayatajum .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Nuniakjum : Apajuí atumnash yaimpakti titajum . Tajumin dita shiig aneas jujabiagtaik , Apajuí ditanash yaigtatui . Tuja dita atumin dakitjabiagtaik , Apajuishkam ditanak yaigchagtatui .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: “ Untsu atumin makichik aentskesh jeen awaintamtan dakitjamainak , chicham etsegbau antutnash dakituinakuig , nunú jegak ukuakjum , nuniachkugmesh yaakat jiinkugmekesh daweminia tsetse pegatjam akaketkam ukuktajum .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Dekas tajime : Suwimak sukagtamu tsawan jegatna duwik , nunú yaaktanmaya aents nunina nunak , Apajuí duwik yaakat Sodomanmaya Gomorranmaya aidaun suwimkan susauwa nuní nagkaemas suwimkan jukiagtinai .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: “ Wi atumnak uwig ikamyawa batsatbaunum ishimaina numamtuk aents pegkegchau batsatbaunum ishimjime . Nuaduí atumek shiig kuitamamkajum shiig anentaimsajum yujastajum . Nuniau asajum tikichish pegkegchau awajkaigpajum .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Nuniakjum nu aents aina nujaig kuitamamkatajum , atumnak achigmakag jega ijuntainum apu chichaman dekaawagtatus ijunjamunum ejetamawagtinai . Dutijamawagmatai jega ditá ijuntaiji aidaunum awaintamawag suwimjamawagtinai .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Dutijamainak tikich apu aidaunmash ejetamawag nui jujamkiag , dekas apu nugkanum inamin aidaunmash ejetamawagtinai mina nemagtuidau asagmin . Dutijamawagmatai ditá emtin mina pachittsajum chichaakjum , judiuchu aidau emtinish etsegtugkatin ainagme .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Tuja atumin ejetamawagmataish , wajuk chichaktajaki tusagmek uyumaktin aigpajum . Nuna tujamainakui chichaktinnak Apajuí tujamtinai .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Duka atumek Wakaní Pegkeji ichachtabauwa nu chichaktatjume .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Nunú nuniamunum ditá yachiuchijinash maatnume tusag sujiagtinai , aantsag uchigtin aidaushkam uchijinak sujiagtinai , nunisag uchi aidaush apajin maatnume tusag inamiagtinai .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Atum mina nemagtin aidautigminak ashí aents aidau kajegtabiagtinai , tujash ni mina nemagtukbautak pujusá nagkanbaunum jegaa nu uwemjatnai .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Tuja makichik yaaktanum pujagmin aintamainakuish , tikich yaaktanum tupikaktajum . Dekas tajime : Israelnumia yaakat aina nui mina chichameg pachisjum ashí etsegtsugminig , wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak taatnaitjai .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: “ Jintinbauwa duka jintinkagtinun nagkaesauk amaitsui , tuja inakak apujin nagkaesauchui .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Jintinbauwa duka jintinkagtina nuninuk amainai . Aantsag inaka dushakam apujijai betek amainai . Mina Beelzebú senchijin takaawai tusag augmatjuina nunisag , atumnaku pegké tujamtin ainawai .

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: “ Nuna tujamainakuish , makichik aentskesh ishamkatin aigpajum , wagki ashí uukbau aidaush wantinkagtinai , aantsag ashí dekaachbau aidaushkam dekaamu agtinai .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Nuaduí atumek tikichish antachbaunum wi imá atumnak jintinbau antukujum nunú , ashí aents antuinamunum etsejatajum dekaatnume .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Mantamainakuish ishamkaigpajum , wakanminak maumainchau ainawai . Dekas Apajuí ishamkatajum , iyashmijaí , wakanmijaí suwimkan sujamak jii ajumaish kajinchaunum egkepamaina nunú .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: “ ¿ Atumek makichik kuichik iman akikchaush juwakjum jimag pishak sujuchuk agmaujum ? Nunú aina duka , Apajuí jakati tachamak makichkish jamaitsui .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Apajuik atumi intashim wajupa awa nunash shiig dekawai ,

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: nunin asamtai atumek ishamkaigpajum . Atumek pishak aina nuna nagkaesau ainagme .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Nuniau asamtai atum tikich ujaakjum : Wika Kristu nemagnaitjai , tiu aidautigminak , wishakam dutiksanuk mina Apag nayaimpinum puja nunashkam : Ditak mina nemagtin ainawai titinaitjai .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Atum mina nemagtin ainayatkujum tikich aidau emtin : Wika Kristunak nemagchauwaitjai , tujutiu aidautigminak , wishakam aikasnuk mina Apag nayaimpinum puja nunashkam : Ditak minak nemagtuchu ainawai , titinaitjime .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: “ Atumek minak : Shiig agkan anentaimas batsamsatnume tusas ju nugka juwig tauwaitai , tusagmek anentaimjuttsaigpajum . Wika atum shiig agkan anentaimas batsamsatnume tusanuk taachuitjai , wika atum mina nemagtuidau asagmin , tikich mina dakitjuidau utugchatan aputugmasag kajegtamá batsamtin asamtai tauwaitjai .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Aatus nuniamunum uchi apajin pempeentuki kajegtinai , nuwashkam ni dukujin kajegtinai , nuwa nemakushkam tsatsajin shiwagmatnai .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Aatus shiwagmagamu asamtai atumi pataim aidaujaig pempeentunikjum shiwagmagatnaitjume .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: “ Aantsag mina anenmaina nuní nagkaemas apajin , nuniachkush dukujin imá senchi aneauk , midau amain ainatsui , nunisag mina anenmaina nuní nagkaemas uchijin , nuniachkush nawanjin imá senchi aneaushkam midauk amaitsui .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Mina nemagtuk waittan dakitaushkam midau amain ainatsui .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Tuja ju nugka juwi pujutan imá senchi wakegauk , megkaekatin ainawai , untsu mina nemagtau asa pujutjin uyumatsuk jauk , uwemjatin ainawai .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: “ Atumin jujamaina duka mina jujuinawai , tuja mina jujuina dushakam mina awetiuwa nuna juwinawai .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Apajuí etsegtin minaun niina jeen juwaushkam , nu Apajuí etsegtin wají shiig pegkejan jukitna dutiksag niishkam jukitnai . Aantsag aents pegkejan takau minaun juwaushkam , nu aents pegkeg juwamunak wají shiig pegkejan jukitnai .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Makichik aentskesh mina nemagtin imanchauch aina juna , yumin shikisá suwauk , dekaskenum niishkam wají shiig pegkeg suwam atinai . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji doce aina nuna ashí jintintua inagnak , nuwiya jiinki yaakat ayamunum chichagkagtuktatus weuwai .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Nuwi Jisus chichagkagtak wekaebaun Juagshakam aents achiká egketainum egkemas antuku . Nunik ni jintintaiji aidaun jimajan awemauwai ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Jisusan : — ¿ Amekaitam Apajuí uwemtikagtinun awematnaitjai tibauwa nunú ? ¿ Amechuitkuminig tikichnak dakastatag ? tusajum iniastajum , — tusa .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Nunú tusá iniam Jisus ditan ayaak : “ Wetajum , nunikjum atum ashí wainkamu , antukbauwa nu Juan ujaktajum :

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Wainmachush wainmainawai , shutushkam wekagainawai , lepragtin aidaush tsagainawai , empekush antuinawai , jakaush nantainawai , tuja ujunauch aidaunash yamajam chichaman jintinmae tusajum .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Nuaduí wi takaamujua nuna wainainak dekaskeapi tujutuidauk , shiig aneasagtinai timae tusam ujaktá ” , tiu .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Nunik waketjamtai , Juagkan pachis aents nui batsatun iniak : “ ¿ Wají wainkatasagmea uwegshunmash wegabiugme ? ¿ Tagkanan dase umpuau wainkatasagmek wegabiujum ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Nuniachkugmesh ¿ Wají wainkatasagmea wegabiugme ? ¿ Aents shiig iwajamun nugkujá pujau wainkatasagmek wegabiujum ? Atumek dekagme nugkutai iman iwajamun nugkujá iwagmamaidauk apú jeen pujuinawai .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Tujash ¿ wají wainkatasagmea wegabiugme ? ¿ Apajuí etsegtinuk wainkatasajum wegabiujum ? Dekas tajime : Duka Apajuí etsegtin aajakajua nuna nagkaesauwai .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Apajuí etsegtin niina pachis agajua duka : ‘ Wi mina chichamjun etsegnun amina emtimin awemajai , ni jintanak umigtamkattawai ’ , tawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: “ Dekas tajime : Ju nugka juwi akiinaidauk Juan Yamijatna nuna nagkaesauk atsawai , tujash Apajuí inamtainig aents dekas imanchauchia nuuwai Juagkan nagkaesauk .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: “ Juan Yamijatin Apajuí inamjatnun pachis jintinkagtutai kajejujakú aina nunisag , yamaishkam chichamnak shiig dakituinawai . Nunidau asag tikich aidau Apajuí inamtaijin wayawainum tusag dakituinawai .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Ashí Apajuí etsegtin agajaju aina nunú chicham umiktin aina dushakam Juan tauwa imanuiya atin etsegkamui .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Niiyai Elías taatnui tibau aajakua duka , nunin asamtai atumek antugkatajum .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Dita antutaiji ajamuk antuktinme ” , tiuwai .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: “ Nuigtush atumnash ¿ wajina pachisan takunua antumtikmainaitjime ?

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Atumek uchi aidau kuashat aents ayamunum pekaamsag wasugkamainak : ‘ Wi nantsematnume tusan flauta tutaya nuna umpuakuish nantsemashmaugme , wake besemjan kantamtai buuttinme tamash buutchamugme ’ tusa pempeentuniki untsuniyajama numamtuk wajagme .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Juan Yamijatna nunú yutai aidaunash yuwachu , vinunash umachu asamtai chichagkujum : Wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu asa aniawai , tajume .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Tuja wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinaun yutainash yuwakun , umutain umakuish : Ju aentsua juka ayatak wekagas yu wekaewai , umutnash umú wekaewai , nuniau asa apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin , nuigtú tudaugtin aina nuna kumpajiyai , tujutjume . Tujash Apajuí umijuidau wajuk pujuinawa nuna wainainak , Apajuí yachajiya nunak dekamain ainawai . ”

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Nuna ti idayak , nunú yaaktanum kuashat iwainataish dekaskeapi tusag tudaujin idayinak Apajuin nemagkachaju asagmatai , najamnun chichajak :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ ¡ Corazignumia aidaunak , aikasnuk Betsaidanmayanash wait anentuinajai ! , ditak mina chichamjun dekaskeapi tujutchaju asagmatai . Yaakat Sidognum , Tironmash aents batsataina duka , wi atumin wainchatain iwaintajim imatika ditash iwaintam wainkujag , dita wake besemag pujaku iwainmamtain jaanchin nugkujag , buukenish yukuun batsakag , ditá tudaujin wake besemag batsatbaunash , Apajuin iwaintumain aajakajui .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Nuaduí Apajuí suwimak sukagtamu tsawan jegatna duwik , yaakat Tironmaya aents aidau , Sidognumia aidaujai suwimkan jukiagtin aina nuní nagkaemasjum atumek suwimkak jukiagtin ainagme .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Yaakat Capernaum batsamin aidauwah , atum anentaimsagmek : Jutiik jainakuish nayaimpinum juwam agtinaitji , tajume . Tujash dutikamak agchatnaitjume , atumek tikich aents pegkegchau aidau jinawaju waitú batsata nui batsamsatnaitjume . Yaakat Sodomanum batsamajakajua dusha , atum wainchatai iwaintajim imatika iwainamun wainainakug , tudau takatan idaisag yamaya juwish batsaamain ainawai .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Tujash atumek Apajuí aents suwimak suwamu jegatna nunú tsawantinig , Sodomanmaya aents aidau nagkaesajum suwimkak jukiagtinaitjume ” , tiuwai .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Nuna tusa idayak Jisus ni Apají Apajuin emematak : “ Apawah , amek ashí nayaimpinum batsamin aidaun , nugkaya aidaunashkam Apuji asamin emematjame . Iman asam aents yacha aidauk iwaintutsuk , aents imanchauch aidau etegjamujum tikima uchi itugmaina imatiksam iwaintukum nuaduí .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Dekaske Apawah , amek aajam wakegame . ”

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Nuna ti idayak ni jintintaiji aidaun pempeentuki : “ Mina Apag ashí nugkanmayag ame diistá tusa idaitugsauwai , nunin aig wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitag nunak makichkish dekajuinatsui , imá mina Apajuk shiig dekajui , aikasag mina Apagnash wainainatsui imá wiki shiig wainjai , tuja wi iwaintamu aidau Apagnak wainmain ainawai .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Atum tudaujum idaisatasajum kakanmamkujum , takaaku pimpitia imanikjum pimpikjum pujautigmek minai minitajum , wi ayamtijatjime .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Atum wi jintinjim jujú unuimagjum imatiksagmek umiakjumek , dekattagme wi kakagchau , utugchatnash emamkesan depetnaitag nunú , nuniakum wakanmish ayamtiksattagme .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Tuja wi atum chicham umiktinun amajim juka , utugchatak atsawai yupichuch umimainaitjume . ”

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Tsawan ayamtai tsawaju ai , Jisus jintintaijin saasá aja trigo ajakbaunum utujá wegau , jinta nunú nagkaemaku asamtai . Nuniamunum Jisusa jintintaiji aidau yapajuinak trigon kupik jukiag nejen yuwi yuwinakua ashinaidau .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Nuniagtatman fariseo aidau wainkag : — ¿ Wagka amina jintintaijum aidaush tsawan ayamtai tsawagmataig takantsashti tibauwa nunin aish aikainawa ? — tuidau .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Tusa tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Atumek agagbauk ausachuk ainajum , David tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aig niijai yujaamujai yapajuinak ,

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa , pag imá sacerdotek yuwati tibau aajakua nuna juki yuwak , aents niijai yujaunash ayugkauwa duka ?

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: ¿ Nuigtush atumek ausachuk ainajum Moisés agagbauwa nuanuí : Sacerdote jega Apajuí ememattainum takau aidauk , tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aigkish ayamainatsui ; tujash duka pegkegchauk wegatsui tawa duka ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Nuniau asamtai tajime , juajuí pujawai makichik aents atum umigmain jega Apajuí ememattaya nuna nagkaesau .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Apajuí duwik tibau agagbauwa nuanuí tawai : ‘ Apajuí tsagkugtugti tusajum kuntin maajum apeajum nunak dakitajai , dekas tikich aidaunash wait anenjatnume tusan wakegajai ’ tawa nunú shiig dekakjumek , tikich aidaush pegkegchaun takaachukek wainkagmek augmatmaitsugme .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinau asan , tsawan ayamtai tsawagmataish wajukmainaita nunak wikitjai tumainnuk , — tiuwai .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Jisus nuna tusa ukukmatai nui juwakiag fariseo aidaujai ijunjag jega ditá ijuntaijin wayawaju .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Nunú jeganum pujau aents uwejen chuwijú . Nuniau asamtai fariseo aidaushkam Jisusan kajejuidau asag , wajintig timatai etsegtuka bakumí tusag : — ¿ Tsawan ayamtai tsawaja aish jaush etsagaumainkaih ? — tusa iniasaju .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Tutai Jisus : — ¿ Atum aidautigmesh tsawan ayamtai tsawaja aig , uwigjum waanum egkemá jinkitakamá waitú pujakuish itugmainaitjupa , wejum jimainchaukaitjum ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Tujash aentsui dekas uwijá nagkaesauk , nuaduí tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aigkishkam pegkeg aina duka dutikmainai , — tiu .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Tusa aents uwejé chuwijun : — Uwejum dakuekta , — tiuwai . Tamawaik uwejen dakuek , tikich kuntujijai betek pegkeg wajasuí .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Jisus nuna dutikamtai fariseo aidau agaa jinjag , Jisusan maatasag chichaman umiidau .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Tusa chichainamun Jisus dekaa ijunjamunum pujau jinki wetai , kuashat aents aidau saetukajui , imatikam Jisuschakam jau aidaun etsagau .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Dutikakush tikich aidauk nunú etsaentugmae tusagmek ujakaigpa , tau .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Junak tiuwai yaunchuk Apajuin etsegtin Isaías agagbauwa nuna umiau asa . Nunú Apajuí tibauk tawai :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: “ Jujuwai dekas mina chichamjun etsegtugkatnun mina aneetaijun wi etegkauwaitag duka , nuniau asamtai niiní shiig anentaibau ajutui . Niina susatnaitjai mina wakanjun , dutikam ni etsegkatnai chicham pegkeja nuna ashí aents aidaunum .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Nigka wainak chicham aidaunak jiyanituk wekaechatnai , jintá wajantagkesh antugtuktajum tusag chichagkagtuk wekaechatnai .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Niig aents tudaugtinnash tsagkugtsukek idaisashtinai , ayatak tsagkujug pegkemtiktinai , aikasag aents niina imatikas anentaimtuinachunash nigki dekaskeapi tumamtiktinai . Aatus ashí pegkegchau aidaunak ni pegkejan takaak depetkatnai , ashí aents aidaun Apuji atinai .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Aents judiuchu aidaushkam nuna wainainak dekas niimpap iinash uwemtijamjattawa tiagtinai . ”

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Wajumak aents aidau aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtugbau , wainmachu , chichatnash chichachun Jisusan itajuawajui , dutikawagmatai niishkam etsagajui . Dutika etsagajam wainmachushkam wainmaku , nuniak chichatnash chichau .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Nuna etsagagmatai aents aidau wainkag puyatkaju , nunikag : “ ¿ Juchaukaih Apajuí makichik Apu Uwemtikagtinun David wegantun awematnaitjai tibauwa nu ? ” tuidau .

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Tiagtai fariseo aidau antukag : “ Ju aentsuk wakan pegkegchau aidau apuji Beelzebú daagtina nuna senchijin wakan pegkegchau aidaunak jiyaawai ” , tuidau .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Nunú aatsa anentaibaujin Jisus dekau asa : “ Makichik nugkanmag batsatiatak pempeentuniki maaní batsatkujag megkaemain ainawai . Tuja makichik yaaktanum batsatu pempentunisag maaní batsatkushkam megkaemain ainawai . Aantsag makichik jeganum ijunag batsatiatak pempeentuniki maaní batsatkush ditak megkaemain ainawai .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Nunisagke iwanchakam , ni senchijin mina sujus aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aidaun jiijati tujutkug , nigki ditanbaujaig shiwagmaemainai , nuniak niina senchijinash megkaemain ainawai .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Atumek minak : Beelzebú senchijin wakan pegkegchau aentsun egkemtuaunak jiyaawai , tujutjume . Mina iwanch ni senchijin sujaish atumi jintintaijum aidaunash , ¿ ya senchinash suwawa wakan pegkegchau aidaun jiiktinme tusash ? Ditak Apajuí senchijin jiyaawai tujutkugmek , atum wainka dewakjum tu yujagme .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Wishakam Wakaní Pegkejijai wakan pegkegchau aidau aentsun egkemtuaun jiyaag nunak , yamaik atumiin Apajuí inamu asamtai jutikajai .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Aents senchigtina nuna jeen wayaa wajiijin yajutkata takug , nuna aentsun jigkajá nuaduí yajutmainai ashí wajiijinak .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: “ Aents wi takaag nujai shiig aneas juwainachuk mina shiwagmatuinawai , nunisag aents Apajuí chichamen etsegbaunash yainchagtaik kuashat aents uweemainun megkagainawai .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: “ Dekas tajime : Apajuik ashí aentsun tudaujinak tsagkugmainai , niina pachis pegkegchau chichagkau aidaunashkam , tujash Wakaní Pegkejiya nuna pachis pegkegchau chichagkau aidauk tsagkugnagchagtinai .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Makichik aentskesh wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag junakesh pegkegchau chichagtuku ainakjash tsagkugnamain ainawai . Tujash Wakaní Pegkejin pegkegchau chichagkau aidauk , yamaya juwish ajumaish tuke tsagkujam achagtinai .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: “ Ajak pegkejak nejeakush pegkegnak nejeawai , tuja ajak pegkegchauwa dushakam pegkegchaunak nejeawai . Nuaduí numi aidauk ni nejenig dekanui .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: ¡ Iwanchi uchijí aidauwah ! ¿ Itugsagmea pegkejash chichamainaitjume ibau pegkegchau aidautigmesh ? Aentsuk ni wajukuna anentaimua , nunak chichaak iwainawai .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Aents pegkejak pegkegnumag anentaimu asa , chichaakush pegkegnak chichauwai . Nunisag aents pegkegchau anentaimushkam pegkegchaunak chichawai .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Nunin asamtai Apajuí suwimak sukagtamu tsawan jegataik , makí makichkiti ii pegkegchau chichakbaujinak imatiksag iwaintugmaktinai .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Pegkeg chichajakutinak suwimkanak amaschatnai , untsu aents pegkegchau chichajakú aidaun suwimkan susatnai . ”

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Juna aatus Jisus timatai wajumak fariseo , tikich chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai : — Jintinkagtinuh , ame makichik wainchatai iwainamu wainkatasa wakegaji , — tiajui .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Nuna tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Jujú aents pegkegchau aidau Apajuí chichamenash umigchau aina nu , dekas Apajuí Uchijimpashit tusag dekapjustatus wainchatai iwainakta tujutuinawai . Tujash dita tuina nunak iwaintukchattajai , ayatak Apajuí etsegtin Jonás wajukauwa nunisnuk ditanak iwaintuktatjai .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Jonasan nayantsanmaya namak muun kujajui , dutikam nuna ampujin kampatum tsawan kampatum kashi pujusuí . Wishakam antsanuk Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan ju nugka juwi Akiinauwaitag nunak , mantuawag ukugsagmatai nugká initken kampatum tsawan nuigtú kampatum kashia imaan tepesan nantaktinaitjai .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ninivenmaya aents aidauk , Jonás Apajuí chichame ujakam , dekaskeapi tusag tudaujin idayinak Apajuin nemagkajui , tujash atumek , wi Apajuí Uchijin dekas Jonasa nagkaesaun juwi pujusá chichagmash antukjum , tudau takat idaikujum Apajuí nemajuinachu asagmin , atak suwimak atina duwik , dita atumnak bakugmagtinai .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Aantsag nuwa Sabá nugkanmaya aentsun apuji surnumia Salomogkan tajiuwai , Apajuí yachamtikamun antujuk dekajuatatus , nunú atumnak bakugmagtinai atak suwimak atina duwik , wi Salomogkan nagkaesaun imatika chichagmash antukchau asagmin .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: “ Wakan pegkegchau jiikí ajapamak wegawai aents atsamunum ni pujumainun egaak ; nunik wekagas egá egakua ni pujumainun wainkachag :

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: ‘ Dekas wakitkitjai wi pujujakbaunum ’ , tusa wakitki tajua diikmá , nunú aentsuk jega japimká shiig iwajamu ukumkimua nunik atatman wainak ,

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: wakitki siete wakan niina nagkaesau pegkegchau aidaun yajuak egkemtawai . Dutikam aentsuk duwik pegkegchau aajakbaunak , nuní nagkaemas shiig pegkegchau wegawai . Atumshakam jujú aents imatika wakan chimpimtuamu wajukea numamtuk wajaktatjume . ”

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Jisus aatus jintinkagtak pujai niina yachi aidau , dukujijai Jisusan ausatatus kautuawag agaag ijunaidau .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Nuní ijunai tikich aents aidau Jisusan : — Amina duku , yatsum aidaujai aujsatjai tusa kaunawag agaa ijunui , — tusag ujaidau .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Tusá ujaam Jisus chichaak : — ¿ Yaita mina dukug , mina yatsug aidaush ?

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Nuna takug ni jintinbau aidaun inakmas : — Jujú ainawai mina yatsug , mina dukug aidauk , — tiuwai .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Nuigtush juna tusa idayak : — Ashí aents Apajuí chichamen antukag umijuidaushkam mina yatsug , mina ubag , mina dukug ainawai , — tau .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Nunú tsawantaik Jisus jegá pujau jiinki kuchanum jegaa uwetus ekeemsamtai ,

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: aents aidaushkam tuwagkaju . Imanikagmatai Jisuschakam botenum egkemá nanamas , aents aidauk kaamatak ijuntsamtai jintintu .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Dutikak ajakan ajakbaun pachis augmatak : “ Ajakan ajakbau , ajakan ajakmatatus weuwai .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Nunik jegantá ajajin jigkai nagkimam jintá kakekaunak pishak kaketuk amukuí .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Tikich jigkai kayagnunum nugka imanik atsamunum kakekauwai , nu nunikuk wamkes tsapaidiajui ,

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: nuniktatman etsa jiinak kagkapé initak akaejachu asamtai apeká ijinauwai .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Tuja tikich jigkai kakekajui jagki ayaunum , nunik dushakam tsapaittaman jagki yutuauwai . Dutikamu asa jinauwai .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Tujash tikich jigkai nugka dekas pegkegnum kakekauwai , nunikajuk makí makichik ajak aidau cien , tikich sesenta , tikitchakam treinta aatus nejekajui ” , tiuwai .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Juna ashí jintinkagtua ashimak : “ Dita antutaiji ajamuk antuktinme ” , tiuwai .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Nuna aatus jintinkagtua ashimkamtai ni jintintaiji aidau jegaantag : — Apuh , ¿ wagka augmatbau pachismesh shiig antukchamnush jintinkagtuaume ? — tusa iniidau .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Tama Jisus ditan ayaak : “ Atumnak Apajuí ni aentsnum inamjatnuji dekajakchamun wi pachisan etsejag junash dekamtijamatatus wakejutpagme ; tujash tikich aidauk dekamain ainatsui nunap taku tawa tusajag .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Nuniau asamtai ni mina chichamjun dekaskeapi tusa shiig puyatjus antaunak aan nagkaemasan jintintuattajai , tuja ni mina chichamjun puyatjus antachuk machik antamujish kajimitkam atinai .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Nuaduí ditanak ayatak augmatbaun pachisan jintinjai , wagki ditak wi wají pegkeg takaamun wainainakushkam wainmachu wajukmaina nuninak , antuinakush nunap tawa tusag dekainatsui wainak antuinawai . Nuaduí ayatak , junak taku tawai tutsuk jintinkagtajai .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Juka ditai uminui yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin Isaías timawa nu , duka aatus tiuwai : ‘ Chicham etsegbaun kuashat antiagtinai tujash dekaachagtinai , kuashat pegkeg takaamunashkam wainiagtinai nuninakjash dekaskeapi tichagtinai .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Juka aentsuk anentainish dekaskeapi tichamin utugchatan anentaimaidau asag , antuinakushkam wainak antuinawai . Jiinchakam epetkamua numamtin ainawai . Nuninchau ainakug mina chichamjun antukag pujutjin yapajinakuig , wi ditanak uwemtikmainaitjai . ’

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: “ Tujash atumek shiig aneastajum , waintash wainu , antutash antajum nuaduí .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Dekas tajime : Kuashat Apajuí etsegtujakajua duka , nuigtú kuashat aents pegkejan takajakú aina dushakam yamai atum wainjum juna wainkagtatus wakegajakú ainawai . Tujash wainkachu ainawai , antutnash yamai atum antajum juna antukagtatus wakegajakú ainawai , nuninakush ditak antukchajui ju chichamnak .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: “ Wi ajakan ajakbaun augmattsan timajim nunú shiig antuktajum .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Jintá jigkai kakekaun pishak amukú , timag nunak : Apajuí inama nunú pachisa chicham etsegbaun antakush dekaskeapi tachau asamtai , iwanch chicham antukbaujin kajimitka nuna takun timajai .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Ajakan jigkayí kayagnunum kakekaju aidau , timag nunak : Aents Apajuí chichame etsegbaun yamaikik shiig aneas antuku ainayatak ,

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: waitiak , utugchatan igkuak pachitsuk idayidauk , ajakan kagkapé initak akaejachu asa , etsa sukuam waamak jinuwama numamtuk wajaina nuna takun timajai .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Jigkai jagki ayaunum iyaaju , timag nunashkam : Aents Apajuí chichamen antuinayatak , ju nugkaya wají aina nunak imá senchi uyumainak , wiyakchameatasag imá senchi wakejuina nuna takun timajai . Ashí ju nugkanmaya wají aina nunú , chicham pegkeg antukbaunak imanchau emawai .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Untsu jigkai nugka pegkegnum kakekajuk , jinutsuk ashí imanisag shiig tsapaidiaju asag nejetnash imanik nejeawajui , timag nunak : Aents Apajuí chichamen shiig antukag , dekaskeapi tusag , emamkesag utugchat ajuinamash depetuk pujuina nuna takun timajai . Nunú aents aidauk makichik ajak , cien , sesenta , treinta nejeawajua numamtin ainawai . ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Junashkam Jisus jintinkagtak augmatus : “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka aents niina ajajin ajak pegkejan ajakmakua nujai betekmamtinai .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Dutika ajakmak idayinak kajiak batsatai , ditá shiwaji wayaa dupa pegkegchau aidaun ajatuk ukuak weuwai .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Dutikamu trigoshkam tsapakag nejenai , dupa pegkegchau ajaamushkam paan wantinkajui .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Nunik dupa pegkegchau tsapakun wainkag , takau aidau wegajui apujin ujaktatus . Nunik jegajiag : ‘ Apuh , ame ajak pegkeg ajakbauwaitkush , ¿ utugsaya dupa pegkegchaush tsapaidiaje ? ’

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Tiagtai : ‘ Aunak shiwag aikae ’ , tama inak aidau : ‘ ¿ Tujash amesh wajinpa dupa pegkegchau aidauk uwegtatjik ? ’

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Tiagtai : ‘ Atsa dekas idaisatajum , dupa tegakmajum trigoshkam tegainijum .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Nunimain asamtai aantsag trigojai betekak tsakagtí , nunik trigo tsamak uminkamtai ishiaktajai tikich takau aidaun , dutikam dita dupa pegkegchau aidaunak etegkeg uwejag ijumag jigkaktinme apeatnun , tuja dutika trigonak juukag nunú ijumtainum ijumjatnume ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Junashkam Jisus tikich augmatbaun pachis jintinkagtak : “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , aents mostaza jigkayin niina ajajin ajauwa numamtinai .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Mostaza jigkayiya duka tikich jigkai aina nuní piipichi , nuninchitak ajaam tsapaig muuntan tsakaawai , nunik tikich ajak aidau nagkaesau kadaukdaugkin wegawai . Iman wematai nuaduí yakiya pishak aidaushkam nuna kanawen pasugmak petsaama numamtuk , Apajuishkam aents wajumkea nui inabaujin nagkama kuashat emawai ” , tiuwai .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Junashkam Jisus augmatbaun pachis jintinkagtak : “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka nuwa pagkan najanatatus kuashat harinan juki namuká , nuwi levadura piipich ajuntuamuitak ashí jegajug kajiak wampushmitkama numamtinai ” , tiuwai .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Jisusak aents aidaun jintinkug tuke augmatbaun pachis jintintujakuí . Augmatbaun pachis tutsukek jintinkagtujakchauwai .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Nunú Jisus aatsa jintinkagtuamua duka , yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin aidau againak : “ Apajuí nugkan najanaigkish dekaachbaun jintinkagtakug , tuke augmatbaun pachis jintinkagtitnai ” , tibauwa nu uminkauwai .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Nuna Jisus aatus jintinkagtua aents aidaun ukukí jegá wayamtai , ni jintintai aidaushkam jegajuawag : — Jintinkagtinuh , ame augmatkum dupa pegkegchau ajak ajakmamunum tsapakuí timaum dusha , ¿ wají takumea timaume ? nunú shiig ujajatkata iish dekami , — tuidau .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Tama Jisuschakam ditan ujaak : “ Jigkai pegkejan ajakbau timag nunak , wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna wiki tumamkun timajai .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Untsu ajan pachisan timag nunak , ashí nugkanmaya aents aidaun takun timajai . Ajakan jigkayí pegkeg timag nunashkam Apajuí uchijí aidaun takun timajai ; untsu dupa pegkegchau timag nunak iwanchdau aina nuna takun timajai .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Shiwag dupa pegkegchaun ajau timag nunak , iwanchin takun timajai . Ajak juwaamu timag dushakam atak dekas nugka nagkanbaunum aents pegkeg , pegkegchaujai etegnagtina nuna takun timajai . Untsu ajakan juwidau timag nunak , nayaimpinmaya aents aina nuna takun timajai .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Nugka nagkantina duwik aents pegkegchau aidauk , dupa tegajá apetiama numamtuk awajam agtinai .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , mina aentsug nayaimpinmaya aidaun ishiaktinaitjai , pegkegchau takau aidaun , tikichin pegkegchaun takamtikin aina nujai Apajuí emtin akanjati tusan .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Dutika etegkeg pegkegchau takau aidaunak jii tuke kajinchauwa nui chimpiawagtinai , dutikam nui batsamsag senchi waitiak nain takegtuinak buutú batsamtin ainawai .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tujash Apajuí wakegamujinak takagsaju aidauk , Apajuí inamtaijin wakag tuke etsajai betek etsantiagtinai . Wi taja nuna , dita antutaiji ajamuk antuktinme .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka oro kajunnum aimkamu nugkanum yutua uukbauwa nujai betekmamtinai . Aents nunú uukbaun wainak nuwig yutua ukuak , shiig aneas wakitki ashí niina wají ajamunak sujuk sumakua numamtinai .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , aents wají sujin nayantsanmaya tsuntsu kayají perla tutai , dekas pegkeg iwajamu akiktanash akikan wainkatatus egá wekaetukmá ,

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: wainak ukuak , jeen jegaa ashí niina wajiiji aidaunak sujug ashimak , nu iman akikan sumakua nujai betekmamtinai .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: “ Aantsag Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , aents retan ajuntin aidau nayants ajuntuk , ashí tikich namak wainchatai aidaujai ijumag yajuma nujai betekmamtinai .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Namak retnum ashí chimpimkamtai japí japinakua kukag ajuidiag , nui ijuntujag namak yutai aidaun yajumainak , namak wainchatai yutash yuchatai aidaunak ayatak utsauwajame .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Numamtuk tsawan nugka nagkanbau jegataik , Apajuí nayaimpinmaya aents aidaun ishiaktinai , aents pegkeg pegkegchau aidaujai etejatnume tusa .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Dutikawajam etegkeg pegkegchau aidaunak jii tuke kajinchau awa nui utsawagtinai . Dutikam nui batsamsag senchi waituinak nain takegtuinak buutú batsamtin ainawai ” , tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Nuna pachis ashí jintintua inagnak : — ¿ Atumesh wi juna taja dusha shiijak antukujum ? Tusa iniinam dita aimainak : — Ehé Apujuh , shiig antukji , — tiaju .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Tiagtai ni chichajak : — Moisés chicham umiktajum tibauwa nuna jintinkagtin aidau , mina nemagtukag wi Apajuí aentsnum inamjatnun inabaujin etsejag juna shiig unuimaidauk , aents jeentin yaunchuk wají ukukbaujin , tikich yamá ikaunmakbaujai ijumjamun jiiyama numamtuk wajainawai , — tiu .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Jisus nu augmatbaun ashimak aents aidaunak ukuak ,

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: niina nugkeen Nazaret weuwai . Nunik nui jegaa jega ijuntainum wayaa chicham pegkeg , ditash dekaachbaun jintinkagtau . Imanitai aents aidau puyatjuk diinak : — ¿ Jusha tuwí imanikash unuimajuita imatika wainchatain iwaina nunash ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: ¿ Jujú carpintero uchijiya duchaukaih , dukujish Maríayajama ? ¿ Yachi aidaushkam Jacobo , José , Simón , Judas ainajama ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Ni umayí aidaushkam jutiijai ijutkau batsata aniaish , ¿ wajuka imatikash dekawa ? — tuidau .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Tusa pampantuinam Jisus chichaak : — Apajuin etsegtin ni nugken pujus etsegtaik , eme anentsag antugchau ainawai , tujash tikich nugkanum wekagas etsegtaik shiig aneas antujin ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Nuna tusa , nuanuig kuashat wainchatai aidau iwainajag takaschauwai , dekaskeapi tuinachbau asa .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Nunú tsawantai Herodes Galileanmaya apua nu Jisus pachisa chichainamun antuku ,

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: nunik ni inake aidaun chichajak : “ Duka Juan Yamijatin maamua nu nantakiu asa senchigtin wajas imaniawai ” , tau .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Nunak Herodes Juagkan achiká aents achiká chimpitainum egkeau asa tiuwai . Nunak Herodesak ni yachi Felipe nuwen Herodiasan nuwatuk pujau asa dutikauwai .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Wagki Juan chichajak : “ Herodesah , amek amina yatsumi nuweg nuwatkamek pujumaitsume ” , tibau asa ,

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herodes kajejuk maatatus wakejayatak , aents aidau Juagkak dekas Apajuinun etsegtawai tuidau asagmatai , ditá ishamak idaisauwai .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Dutika Herodes ni akiinamu tsawagmatai ipaamu aidaushkam tuwakuí , imanikbaunum Herodiasa nawanji ejapeen wajantá nantsemak Herodesan shiig awajkauwai .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Nunik : — Ashí ame wakegamu segatbaunak utujitsuk amastajame , — tusa anagkuauwai .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Tima nuwauchishkam dukujin jegantú , nunikmatai ni dukují akatjau , dutikam Herodesan jegantun : — Jujú platunum Juan Yamijatnun buuké sujustá , — tusa segauwai .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Nunú tama Herodes wake besekuí , nuniayatak ditajai pekajuidaush antuinamunum : “ Dekas amastatjame ” , tiu asa yapajimainchau dekapjauwai . Nunik :

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: — Wejum aents achiká chimpitainum Juan egketa nuna buuké tsupika susatajum , — tiuwai .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Timatai Juagkan buuken platunum egkejag itaantajui , dutika nuwauchin susajui . Ni juki dukujin susauwai .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Dutikawagmatai Juagkan jintintaiji aidau kautuk iyashin jukiag ukusag ukuinak , Jisusan wejiag ujakajui .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Jisus Herodes tabaun dekaa , botenum egkemag nugka agkantunum nigki pujustatus weuwai . Nunittaman aents aidaushkam dekaawag , yaaktan ukuinak kukag shiyakajui .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Jisus botenmaya jinkamá shiig kuashat aents tuwaká ijunun wainkau , dutika wait anenjajui , nunik jau ikaunmamunash etsagaaku .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Nuniamunum etsa akagu asamtai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidau jegaantag : — Juwig jutiik aents atsamunum batsatji , etsash akaewai , aentsuk ishiakta , yaaktanum jegattak aents batsata nui wegag dita yuwatnun sumaktinme , — tuidau .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Ditak wemain ainatsui , atum dita yuwatnuk susatajum , — tiuwai .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : — Imaanik atsugtamui ayatak cinco pag , nuigtú jimagchik namak ajutjamui .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus : — Nunú mina sujustajum , — tusa segauwai .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Nuna ti : Aents aidau yajuakjum chijichi aina nui batsamsatajum titajum , tusa cinco pagkan , nuigtú jimagchik namaka nuna juki , nayaimpinum pagkai see tusa , pagkan puujá ni jintintaiji aidaun tinabiu . Dutikam dita aents aidaun tinabiajui .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Dutikawajam ashí shiig yuwawag ejemakajui , nunikagmatai ampinkaunak yajuakag doce chagkinnum aimjajui .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Nui yuwawajuk cinco mil aishmag tumain aajakuí , nuwash uchi aidaush dekapatsuk .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Nuna yuwawag nagkanaig niina jintintaiji aidaunak : — Atumek botenum chimpimjajum emka kuchá amain katigtajum , — tusa ishimak , Jisusak aents aidaun aujus ishiaktatus juwakui .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Aents aidaun ashí aujus ukuak , Jisus mujanum wakauwai kanakí Apajin ausatatus . Nunik kiyagmataishkam nigki pujau .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Atushat nugkan ukukí boteshkam kuchanum ejapean wegai , dase igku umpuamu asa yumi tajeamunum pachiinak botek ukaetatak wajau .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Imaniai kashikmas tsawau taig , Jisus yumí awanken wekagas minau .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Nunik wekagas minittaman niina jintintaiji aidau wainkag senchi ishamkag untsumainak : — ¡ Pasun minawai ! — tiaju .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Imatiagtai Jisus chichaak : — ¡ Witjai ishamjukaigpajum ! — tiuwai .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Apuh , dekas ametkumek , minash yumí awanken wekaesá juwi tantata tujutia , — tau .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Tutai Jisus : — Takumek minitá , — tiuwai . Tama Pedroshkam botenmaya jiinki , namaká najama yumí awanken wekagas Jisus wajamunum jegantatus wegau .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Nunik dase senchi dasentai ishamkau , nunikmá yuminum akagak : — ¡ Apuh achigkata ! — tau .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Nuna taig Jisus uwegnum achiká chichajak : — ¿ Wagka minaig kajintsá anentaimtsukesh utujimsamesh anentaimtugme ? — tiuwai .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Jisus Pedrojai botenum egkemjagmatai daseg mijakui .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Nunikmatai ni jintintaiji aidau nui botenum chimpijuk Jisusan jegaantag tikishmatug : — ¡ Amek dekas Apajuin Uchijiyaitme ! — tusa emematuidau .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Imaa imaaninakua katigkag Genesaret nugkanum jegawajui .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Nunikmatai Jisusa wainkag ashí nu nugkanmag etsejajui , dutikawagmatai ashí jau aidaun ni pujamunum ikautkaju .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Dutikawajam : — Idaikagtusta ame pataká nugkuajam nuna nagkattsamujigkesh antigkagmi , — tusag segaidau . Tuja ashí aents niina jaanchjin antigkuk pegkeg waigkaju ainawai .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Jerusalegnumia fariseo aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai kaunkaju Jisusan jegantajui , nunikag :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: — ¿ Wagka amina jintintaijum aidaush iina muunji umiktajum tibauwa nuna umitskesh ikigmatskesh yuwinawa ? — tuidau .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wagka atumesh atumi muunjum chicham umiktajum timawa nu umiakjumesh , Apajuí chicham umiktajum timawa nu umitskesh idaijume ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Apajuí chichaak : ‘ Atumin apa , dukujai eme anentsam diitajum , dutikakjum yaigtajum ; ni apajin , dukujinakesh pegkegchaun chichajuk tsagkugtsuk maatajum ’ tiuwai .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Tujash atumek : Ni apajin , dukujinakesh : ‘ Ashí midau ajuta junak Apajuin anentag anagkuamjai , nuniku asan yaimaitsugme ’ tusa

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: tauk , ni apajinak dukujinakesh yaimaitsui tajume . Nunú aaja tau asajum , Apajuí chichame umiktajum tujamawa duka imanchauch emajum , atumi muunjumi chichamega duke wejuinagme .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: ¡ Aentsú tsanú aidauwah ! Apajuí etsegtin Isaías atumin pachipasag shiig tiuwai :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: ‘ Ju aents aina juka minak dekas ditá anentain eme anenjuinak adaituinatsui , ayatak wenin adaituinawai .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Nuniau asag minak umigtuinatsui , aents umiktajum tibauwa nuna jintinkagtuinak Apajuinu jintinkagtaji ’ tuinawai , — tiuwai .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Juna ti aents aidaun untsuká chichaak : — Antuktajum , nuniakjum shiig dekaatajum .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Wenunum wayá duka aentsnak pegkegchauk ematsui . Untsu aentsun weninia jiina nunú aentsnak pegkegchau emawai .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Timatai ni jintintaiji aidau Jisusan jegaantag : — ¿ Amesh wainkamkum fariseo aidau ame tame nuna antukag kajekagma dusha ? — tuidau .

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Tama Jisus : — Ditak mina Apag nayaimpinum puja nudauchu asag , ajak tegai ajaptayama numamtuk awajam agtinai .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Idaisatajum , ditak wainmainatsui , nuninaitak tikich wainmachu aidaun jintan inaktustatus wakejumaina numamtuk wajainawai . Wainmachua nunú tikich wainmachun jintan inaktustatus wegakug , waanum mai nuwig iyaumainai .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Tutai Pedro Jisusan : — Shiig ujajatkata nunú augmatbau pachisam tame dusha wají takumea tame , — tiu .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Tutai Jisus : — ¿ Atumesh nunú dekamainchauk dekapeajum ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: ¿ Dekatsjumek ashí wenunum wayauk ampugnum nagkaemaki , atsumamunum wegam letrinanum ajapna duka ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Tujash wenunum jiina duka anentainmaya jiinui . Nuniau asa aentsnash pegkegchau emawai .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Anentainmaya jiinui pegkegchau anentaimta dushakam , magkagtuta nu , tsanijinat , kasamat , tikich dekaskechu aig tsanumjut , pegkegchau chichagkagtut ,

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: ju aina juuwai aentsun pegkegchau emauk , tujash ikigmagjum yuwatajum timawa nunú , ikigmatsuk yuwamuk aentsnak pegkegchauk ematsui .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Jisusjai nuwiya jiinjag Tiro nugkanum , Sidón nugkanmashkam wegajui .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Nui jegai Canaagnumia nuwa Jisusan untsukmaikia minis : — ¡ Apu David wegantu uchijiyah ! ¡ Wait anenjujia minash ! ¡ Mina nawanjun wakan pegkegchau egkemtug , senchi waitkagta nu ! , — tau .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Tamash Jisusak machikish aikchauwai . Nunitai ni jintintaiji aidau jegaantag : — Iina ukujin minis untsú untsumkawa minajama , wakitkita tita , — tuidau .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Tama Jisus : — Apajuik minak Israel aents megkaejau aina nuwig awetiuwai .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Nuna taig nuwashkam amainag tikishmatug pujus : — Apuh yainkata , — tau .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Uchi pagkan yuwau atankí yawá suwamuk pegkegchauwai , — tau .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Tutai nuwa ayaak : — Duka apu dekaske . Tujash yawashkam mesa wapken pujusá tsaisá akakeamun yuwamajama , — tau .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Nawantah , shiig senchi minaig kajintsá anentaimam duwi , ame wakejam duka imanisag uminkattawai , — tiu . Nuna taig wamkes nunú nuwan nawanjishkam pegkeg wajasuí .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Jisus nuwiya juwaki Galilea kuchajin jegauwai ; nunik nainnum waka nui ekeemsauwai .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Nunikmatai kuashat aents aidau tuwagkaju ; nuninak shutú , uwejé chuwijú , wainmachu , chichachu aidaun , nuigtú kuashat jau aidaunashkam ni eketbaunum ikautuidau . Nunikmatai Jisuschakam etsagaakui .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Dutikawajam aents chichachu aidaush chichaidau , uwejé tsujinkau aidaush pegkeg wegajui , shutú aidaushkam wekagaidau , wainmachu aidaushkam wainmaidau . Nunidaun aents aidauk puyatjukag ijunas dii ijuntuidau . Nunikag : “ Israel aentsun Apajuiji dekas imá senchigtinai ” , tusag emematuidau .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun untsuká ijumag : — Jujú aents aina juna wait anentuinajai . Kampatum tsawan wijai batsatainawai , tujash yumainji atsujuinawai . Yujumkan ayugtsukek ditá jeenig ishimaitsujai , jeen jegatakamag pimpikiag jaka iyaantainum tau asan .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Tutai niina jintintaiji aidau : — Tujash ¿ tuwiyag yutaish jumainaita imajú kuashat aents ayugmainush aents atsamunum pujag juniautish ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus niina jintintaiji aidaun : — ¿ Wajupa pagka ajutjamainawa ? — tusa iniau . Tama dita ujainak : — Siete pag , nuigtú wajumchik namak ajutjamui , — tiaju .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Tiagmatai : — Aents aidau akanjajum shiig nugká batsagtajum , — tusa idayak

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: pagkan namakjai juki wajan Apajin see ti , nuna puug ni jintintaiji aidaun tinabiu , dutikamtai dita aents aidaun tinamkajui .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Dutikawajam ashí shiig yuwawag shiig ejemakaju , nuigtushkam ampinjau aidaun siete chagkinnum aimjajui .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Nui yuwawajuk cuatro mil aents aajakuí , nuwash , uchi aidaush dekapatsuk imá aishmag muun aidauk dekapam .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Juna dutika Jisus aents aidaun aujus ukuak , botenum egkemag Magdala nugkanum weuwai .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Fariseo aidau , saduceo aidaujai Jisusan Apajuí Uchijimpashit tusag dekapsagtatus jegajuawag : — Nayaimpinmaya wainchatai iwainkagtukia , — tusag segaidau .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : “ Atumek agkutai nayaim kapantu wajasmatai : ‘ Pegkeg tsawan atatui , nayaim kapantu wajasé ’ tinu ainagme ,

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: untsu kashikmasjum : ‘ Yamai tsawan pegkegchau atatui , ikiyamag suwe wajasé ’ , tajume . ¡ Tsanumin aidauwah ! Nayaimpi niimé diisjum tsawan wajuku atatua nunú dekauwaitkugmesh , ¿ wagka wi wainchatain iwainakan takaag jusha , Apajuí tibauwa nunap jutikawa tusagmesh dekamainchaush dekapeagme ?

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Jujú aents pegkegchau aidau Apajuí chichamenash umigchau aina nu , dekas Apajuí Uchijimpashit tusag dekapjustatus wainchatai iwainakta tujutuinawai . Tujash dita tuina nunak iwaintukchattajai , ayatak Jonás wajukauwa nunisnuk ditanak iwaintuktatjai ” , tusa ukuak weuwai .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Jisusa jintintaiji aidauk kuchá amain weenak pagkan kajimatki jutsuk katigkajui .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus : — Nijah , fariseo aidau , nuigtú saduceo levaduraji aina nujai kuitamamkatajum , — tau .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Tutai niina jintintaiji aidauk pempeentunikiag : — Junak ii pag takukchag duwi tujamji ,

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: tusa tabaun Jisus antuk : — ¿ Aents imanis kajinas anentaimchau aidauwah , wagka pag pachisjumesh atumek pempeentunikjumesh jiyaniagme ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Eke dekamainchauk dekapeajum aneetash aneaktsugmek , wi cinco pagkai cinco mil aents ayugkam nuigtú ampinkamtaish , wajupa chagkina aimjabiugme duka ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Nuigtush aneaktsugmek , wi siete pagkai cuatro mil aents ayugkam ampinkamtaish , wajupa chagkina aimjabiugme duka ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: ¿ Wagka antumainchaush dekapeagme ? Wika ditá levaduraji pag pachimtaiya nuna takun tichamjime : ‘ Kuitamamkatajum fariseo , saduceo levadurajiya nujai ’ , timajim nunak .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Nuna Jisus timatai dekawajui levadura pag najanatasa pachimtaiya nuna tatsuapita ; fariseo , saduceo jintinkagtutaiji aidaunap tawa tusag .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Jisus yaakat Cesarea , Filipo tutaya nuanuí jegaatatus wesa , ni jintintaiji aidaun : — ¿ Aents aidaush wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunash yaayai tujutuinawa ? — tusa iniidau .

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Wajumak aents aidau : ‘ Juan Yamijatin maamua nunuwai ’ , tujamainawai , tikich chichaidau : ‘ Auk Eliasai ’ , tujamainai , tikich tuidau : ‘ Jeremiastsukaitai , nuniachkush : Apajuí etsegtin aajakú aina dutsukaitai ’ tujamainawai , — tuidau .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Tiagtai ditan pempentusag : — ¿ Tujash atumesh minash yaayai tujutjume ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Tutai Simón Pedro tutaya nu ayaak : — Amek Kristuitme , Apajuí tuke pujuwa nuna Uchijiyaitme , — tiu .
