text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Simón , Jonasa uchijiyah amek shiig aneasta , aents tibaukesh tatsume , aminak mina Apag nayaimpinum puja nunú dekamtijamae .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Wishakam amina tajame , yamaik amek Pedro atatme . Jujú kaya muunta juwi ekenin kaya ekenjá jegamtaya numamtuk mina aentsug aidaunak awajkattajai , nunak jatakesh depetmainchau atinai .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Tuja amina idaitustajame Apajuí juwi inabaujiya nu yawí waiti ujamaina numamtuk awajkatin atá tusan . Dutikamu asam ame ju nugka juwi chicham etsegbaun dekaskeapi tachauk nayaimpinmag tsagkugnagchatnai . Untsu ame chicham etsegbaun dekaskeapi tusa umiauk aantsag nayaimpinmashkam tsagkugnagtinai , — tiuwai .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Nuna tusa ni jintintaiji aidaun , mina pachittsagmek , juka Kristu uwemtikagtin awemamu taatnai tibauwa nuuwai tusagmek makichik aentskesh ujakaigpajum , tiu .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Nuna tusa akatek : — Jerusalén wegagmi , awi jegaa ai minak apu aidau , sacerdote apuji aidaushkam , ashí chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai senchi waitkagsag mantuawagtatui . Nuna dutijuawagmataish , wika kampatum tsawanta juwi nantaktatjai , — tau .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Tutai Pedro akanak juki kakaakan chichajak : — Apujuh , ame waitmainaitam duka nagkaetukchati tumamia . Apajuishkam aminak dutikam atí tusag tsagkamjamaitsujamah , — tau .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Nu tama Pedron ayampatua chichajak : — ¡ Wetá iwanchih , minai tantá wajatsuk ! Amek dekatsme Apajuí dutikatjai tabaujiya duka , nuaduí nuna umikai tusam tujutme , aentsú anentaimtaig anentaimam duwi , — tiuwai .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Nuna ti Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun : — Mina nemagtuktasajum wakegautigmek atum wakegamuk idaikujum nemagtuktajum , nuniakjum senchi waitiakjumesh atsanjatajum .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Ashí aents ju nugka juwi pujutan imá senchi wakegak , mina nemagtuk waittan dakitauk uwemjashtin ainawai . Untsu ashí aents mina nemagtuk pujus nunisag jaa nu uwemjatin ainawai .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Aents ju nugka juwiya wají aidaun , ashí niinu emakush jaakug niina wakaninak tuké uwemtikmaitsui . Aentsuk ni wakaní uwemtijatasa akikmatmainjig atsawai .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Apajuí Uchijiyaitak Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nunú , ni Apají imanjiya nujai imanisag ni aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidaujai nugkanum taak , makí makichik aentsnak dita takasbaujiya dutiksag akiktinai .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Atum juwi ijunjum juwiyatijum wajumak aidautijum eke jatsuk , Apajuí Uchijiyaitak Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nu inabauji wainkatnutigmesh ajume , — tiuwai .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Seis tsawan asa Jisus , Pedron , Jacobon niina yachi Juagkan aatus juki muja yakí tsakajunum wegajui .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Nuwi ditash wainainaig Jisusa niimé yapajinauwai . Ni yapig etsajai betek wajasuí , niina jaanchjishkam shiig puju wajasuí .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Nuniaig Elías , Moisesjai Jisusan aujuinak ijuntatman wainkajui .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Nunik Pedro Jisusan chichajak : — Apujuh , jutiish maigkis juwig batsatagtai , amesh wakegakminig kampatum aak umikagmi , makichik aminu , tikich Moisesdau , nuigtú Eliasdau , — tau .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Nuna aatus Pedro chichai , yujagkim winchamtin ashí ditajai ijumag ijikuí . Nuniaig yujagminmaya chichaak : “ Juuwai dekas mina uchig anetaijuk , juwi shiig aneamug ajutui , nigki antugkujum umigkatajum ” , tabaun antukajui .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Nu tabaun antukag , niina jintintaiji aidau senchi ishamkag tikishmajag tsuntsumawaju .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus ditan tajuntun antiak : — Ishamkaigpajum wajaitajum , — tau .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Tama diistakamá imá Jisusak wajattaman wainkajui .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Nuna nunik Jisus mujanmaya minisá niina jintintaiji aidaun : — Atum wainkaujum nu pachisjumek makichik aentskesh ujakaigpajum , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna mantuawagmatai nantatsaigkik , — tiu .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Nuna timatai , ni jintintaiji aidau iniidau : — ¿ Wagka chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaush , dekatkauk Eliasá taatnai tuinawa ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Tusa iniam Jisus ayaak : — Elías niiyá eemak taa tikich takastinun umiktinai tibauwa duka dekaske .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Tujash wi tajime : Eliasak taabi , nunikunak dekaachaju asag , dita pegkegchau takaamujinak dutiksag inagkeatkiagmayi . Nunisag Apajuí Uchijiyaitak Aentsmaga Akiinauwa dushakam dita waitkam atatui , — tiuwai .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Nuna tutai ni jintintaiji aidaushkam dekaawajui , Jisusak Juan Yamijatnunap pachis tawa tusag .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Nunikag aents tuwakbaunum jegainai , makichik aents tajuntun niina tikishmatug chichajak :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: — Apuh , mina uchijush wait anenjutjata , senchi jaakug imaanata wajauwe , nuniau asa kuashtá jinumash patamnuwe nuniak namakash iyainuwe .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Imaniau asamtai amina jintintaijum aidaun itaantamjai etsaentujati tusan , tujash etsagagchagmae , — tau .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Tusa tama Jisus ni jintintaijin chichajak : — ¡ Aents pegkegchau minai kajinas anentaimchau aidauwah ! ¿ Wajupá dukapea atumjai ijunjanush pujumainaitja ? ¿ Wajupá dukapek dakastajime minak dekaskeapi tujuttinme tusanush ? — Nuna ti idayak : — Juwi itantá , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Tima uchí juki itanmatai Jisus wakan pegkegchaun jiyaká jiikiuwai , dutikam nu tsawanta duwik uchishkam pegkeg wajasuí .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Jisus nuna dutikamtai niina jintintaiji aidau agkan niinak iniinak : — ¿ Wagka jutiish jiiktakamaish tujinkamji ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Atum imaanisa Apajuiyai kajintsá anentaimaujum atsugtamainawai . Dekas tajime : Kajintsá anentaimaujum mostaza jigkayiya nuninchikesh ajutjamainakuig , ju muja jujú chichagkujum : ‘ Juig atsuk tikich yantamnum wetá ’ , tamak nunisag nagkaemamainai . Makichkish tujinmainuk atsugtamainaitjume .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Tujash ju wakania juka , Apajuí aujku yujumak ijagmaka pujachkuik kakajus jiimaitsui .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Jisus Galilea wesa ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Apajuí Uchijiyaitak Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nunak , tikich aents aidaunum sujukag idaisagtatui ,

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: dutikawagmatai maawagtatui . Tujash kampatum tsawanta juwi nantaktatui , — tau . Tutai ditashkam senchi wake besekajui .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Nui juwakiag Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai yaakat Capernaum jegawajui . Nui jegawagmatai , jega Apajuí ememattainum kuichik itaamun yajumin aidau Pedron jegaantag : — ¿ Amina jintinjamnuk akikmakchattawak jega Apajuí ememattainum kuichik itaata tibauwa nunak ? — tuidau .

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Ehé akikmaktatui , — tusa ukuak jegá wayaamtai , Jisus niina iniak : — ¿ Simogka amesh wajuk anentaimtame ? ¿ Ju nugka juwiya apu aidaush yaá aents aidauna kuichkinash jujuinawa ? ¿ Ditá uchijish akikmainawak atsa tikich aents aidaunak akikmakta tuina ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Tutai Pedro : — Ikaya aina nuna akikmakta tuinawai , — tau . Tutai : — Dekaske ditá uchijig akikmainatsui ;

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: tujash nunin aig dita shiig juwakchainum tau asá kuchanum weme agsea ajugtá , dutikam dekatkau namak ajuittam nuna weni iwanjam diistá . Nui kuichik egkemtatui . Nunú kuichik jukim jega Apajuí ememattainum weme midau , aminujai akikmakta , — tiuwai .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Nunú tsawantinig ni jintintaiji aidau Jisusa jegaantag : — ¿ Yaki Apajuí inamtainish imá wagaakush atinaita ? — tusag iniidau .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Tiagtai Jisus makichik uchin untsuká itan ditá ejapeen awajus ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: chichaak : — Dekas tajime : Atum pujutjum yapajiajum uchi aina jumamtin wegachkugmek , Apajuí inamak amain ainatsjume .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Aents Apajuí inamu dekas wagaaku atinuk , aents pujutjin yapajiau , jujú uchi anentaimaina jumamtuk weena nu imanuk agtinai .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Makichik aentskesh mina nemagtuidau asag , ju uchia jumamtin aidaun mina daajui juidauk , mina dutijuinawai .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: “ Wajumak mina dekaskeapi tusag nemagtuidau ju uchi piipichia jumamtin aidaun pegkegchaun takamtikaidauk , dekas kaya muun dekeetai aina iman jukí kuntugnum detuais nayantsa kunajin ajugká ajapmain ainatai .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: ¡ Wait anentuinajai aents aidaunak , pegkegchau takamtikagtin midiagtin asagmatai ! Duka tuké nuniktinai . Tujash wait anentajai ya pegkegchaun aentsú takamtiktinaita nunak .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: “ Tuja nuniktin asamtai amina uwejum , nuniachkush dawemkesh tudaun takamtijamkuig , tsupika atushat ajapmaina numamtuk wajaktá , tudau takata nunú idaikum . Dekas pegkejai tudau takat idaisau asá , pujut tuke atina nui uwegtuchu , nuniachkuish shutusá waimaina numamtuk wajamuk , mai uwegtin mai nawentin asá , jii ajumaish kajinchauwa nui ajapeam amaina nu .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Amina jiim tudaun takamtijamkuish , makichik jime ukuinkam atushat ajapmaina numamtuk wajaktá , tudau takata nunú idaikum . Dekas pegkejai tudau takat idaisau asam pujut tuke atina nui makichik jiiyaik niimsá waimainaitam numamtuk wajamuk , jimag jiintin asam jii ajumaish kajinchaunum ajapam waitiaku pujumainaitam nu .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Mina nemagtuidau ju uchia jumamtin aina nu , wainkajum imanchau anentaimtipajum , Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinum batsataina duka ditanash kuitamaidau asamtai .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , aents wakanin megkaejau aidaun uwemtikatasan tauwaitjai .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: “ ¿ Wajuk anentaimjume ? aents cien uwig ajamu makichik megkaetukam , noventa y nueve uwija nunak batsaak ¿ megkaekauwa nuna egaak muja aidaunum wemainchaukaih ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Dekas tajime : Nunikmá igkugkag nuna imá shiig anenmainai , noventa y nueve batsata nuna nagkagas .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Nunisag iina Apají nayaimpinum puja dushakam , wakejutpatsui jujú piipich aina juwiya makichkish megkaekatnume tusag .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: “ Amina yatsum pegkegchaun takagtamkuish , imá nigki akankim ausata , dutikakum ni pegkegchau takasbauji pachittsam ujaktá . Ame tama antugtamkuig , duka pegkegchau takaamuji idaitanum ame yatsum yaigkume .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Untsu amina antugtamchakuig , makichik aentskesh dutikachkumesh jimagkesh ipaam ditajai ausatajum , ni pegkegchau takasbauji pachittsajum .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Ditanash antugchakuig , ashí aents Jisusa nemajin aidau ujaktá . Nunashkam antugchakuig , aents Apajuí anentaimtuchu aina nujai idaisatajum .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Dekas tajime : Atum ju nugka juwi aaja yayashmak nayaimpinmashkam tsagkugnagchatnai . Untsu atum ju nugka juwi tsagkujamuk , nayaimpinmashkam aantsag tsagkugnagtinai .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Junashkam tajime : Atum jimagtigmekesh atuekajum atum anentaimtamujum Apajuí segamak , mina Apag nayaimpinum puja dushakam amastatjume .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Jimagchikish nuniachkush kampatumchikish mina pachitus ijunainakuig , wishakam nuwig ditajaig ijutkau pujuttajai . ”

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Nuna tutai Pedro Jisusan jegantun iniak : — Apuh , amina nemagtamin mina yatsug mina ubag aina nu pegkegchau takagtakuish , ¿ wajupá tsagkugmainaitja ? ¿ Sieteya imania tsagkugmainkaitag ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Tama Jisus chichaak : — Duke tsagkujata tusanuk tatsujame , tuke tsagkugsamké ata tajame , — tiuwai .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , apu niina inake diwibau asa akigkata tusa segauwa nujai betekmamtinai .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Dutika nagkamak , aents diez mil kuichkin diwimkagtaun juki awayawajui .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Tuja nunú akikmamainji atsuju asamtai apu chichaak : ‘ Dekas juka , niina nuwe , uchijí nuigtú ashí wajiiji aina nujai sujuktajum , dutikam nuní diwik uminkati ’ , tiuwai .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Tusa tama aents diwimkagtaushkam , apun tikishmatug : ‘ Wait aneasam machik dakagsata , wi amina diwimjam nunak ashí imatiksanuk akiktatjame ’ , tusa segauwai .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Tama apushkam wait anentug , diwibaunak akigkata tutsuk agkan idaisauwai .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Dutikam nunú inak jiinki wekamá , niina aents cien kuichkin diwimun igkugku , nunik suwenum achik emetua awajus : ‘ Waamak ame mina diwimjam nunú akigkata ’ , tusa segau .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Imatikam diwimkagtaushkam tikishmatug pujus : ‘ Wait aneasam machik dakagsata , wi ashí amina diwimjam nunak imatiksanuk akiktatjame ’ , tusa segauwai .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Imatjamaitak wait anentsuk achiká juki , aents achiká egketainum egkea ukukiuwai , juwi pujus diwijin akikmakti tusa .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Dutikamun tikich apú inake aidaushkam wainkag wake besemag diisaju , nunikag apujin jegajiag ashí dita wainkamunak imatiksag ujakajui .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Dutikam apushkam aentsun ishitkam juki itantagmatai chichajak : ‘ Inak pegkegchauwa , wika ame segatkuminig wait anenjan ashí ame mina diwimjamugminak akigkaipa tusan idaitusmajame .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Wi dutika idaitusbau asam , ameshkam dutiksamek amina diwimjamush wait anenjam idaitumain wajakume . ’

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Tusa apu kajeká achijatin aidaun : ‘ Jusha achikjum jukijum egkea ukutajum , niishkam awi pujus ashí mina diwimja nunak akikmakti ’ , tusa inamjauwai . ”

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Jisus nuna pachis chichá chichakua inagnak : — Mina Apag nayaimpinum puja dushakam nunisag atum yatsum tsagkugchataik dutijamawagtinai , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Jisus jintinkagtamujin ashimak Galilea pujamunak ukuak , Judea nugkanum jegaa Jordagka amain katigkú .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Nunikmatai kuashat aents aidau pataetukaju , dutikam jau aidaunashkam nui kuashat etsagakui .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Nuniai fariseo aidaushkam Jisusan pegkegchaunum dekapsatasag jegaantag iniinak : — ¿ Nuwennush wainkash nuwenash idaimainkaih ? — tuidau .

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — ¿ Atumek ausachukaitjum Apajuí yama nagkamchakug aishmagkun nuwajai najanauwai ,

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: dutika chichajak : ‘ Aishmag nuwenkug apajin , dukujin ukuak niina nuwejaig pujumainai , nuniau asa nuwejai makichik iyash wegawai ’ tiuwa duka ?

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Nunin asag nuwenawajuk jimaja nuninchauwai , makichik iyashia nunin wegawai . Aatus Apajuí tibau asamtai , aents nuwenawaju aina nunak , makichik aentskesh idaimitkamainchau ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Tutai dita iniinak : — ¿ Wagka tujash Moisesash papí idaidaiku najantain umiká nuwanak idaimainai tiuwaita ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Nunak atum chicham umitnumash katsujam asagmin , Moisesak nuwemik idaimainaitjume tujabiuwai , tujash nagkamtinig Apajuik nunak tichauwai .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Wi dekas tajime : Aishmag nuwe ekagmachunak idayas , tikich nuwajai nuwenkug ekagmawai , nunisag nuwa idaisamujai nuwenushkam ekagmawai , — tiuwai .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Nuna Jisus aatus timatai ni jintintaiji aidau : — Dekas nu aatsayaitkuig , nuwentash nuwenmaitsujama , — tuidau .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Tusa tiagtai ni ayaak : — Junak ashí aentsuk betekak nunin amain ainatsui , Apajuí nunikti tibau nunimain ainawai .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Aents nuwenmainchau akiinaush ainawai . Tikitchakam tikich aents kagamtikamu asag nuwenmainchaush ainawai . Untsu tikich aents : ‘ Wika Apajuí takatjin takagkun nuwentsuk wekaesatjai ’ , tauk nuwenmaitsui . Dita nuna antumainuk antuktinme , — tiuwai .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Jisus juna tusa ashimkamtai uchi aidaun ikautkajui achiká Apajuin aujtusti tusag . Imatikiagtai ni jintintaiji aidau nuna jiyaidau .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — ¡ Tutsuk idaisatajum , uchi aidauk minai kauntatnume , utugkajum awagkigpajum ! Jujú uchi anentaimaina jumamtin aidaunum Apajuik inamjata tawai .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Nuna tusa ti , shiig anentus uchin maki makichik achik ukukmatai tikichnum wegajui .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Makichik aents Jisusan tajuntun chichajak : — Jintinkagtin pegkejah , ¿ wají pegkegna takamainaitja pujut nagkanchaun jukitasanush ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wagka Pegkejá tujutme ? Makichkish pegkejak atsawai , pegkeja duka makichkiuchi , imá Apajuiya duke . Ame tuke pujutnum wayatasam wakegakmek , Apajuí chichame umiktina nu imatiksamek umiktá .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Tama ni iniak : — ¿ Tu ainawa dusha ? Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Magkagtuawaipa , tsanijinawaipa , kasamkaipa , wainkamek tsanumkagtujaipa ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: amina apa dukujai eme anentsam diiyaakum yaigtá , tuja amijai ijutkamushkam amek anenmamsam aneeta , — tiu .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Tama datsauch chichaak : — Wika nunak datsauch asanuk ashí umikuitjai . ¿ Wajina nuigtush umimainaitja ? — tau .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Ame pegkeg atasam wakegakmek , weme ashí amina ajutjamaina duka sujukam , ujunauch aina nu susata . Nu dutikawamin nayaimpinum wajigmik ajutjamtinai . Nu dutika ukuakum mina nemagtukta , — tiuwai .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Nu aaja tama wake beseká weuwai , shiig wiyakuch asa .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Dekas tajime : Wiyakuch aidauk kakajus Apajuí minash inatjati tusag idaimamainchau ainawai .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Awentsanuk tajime : Camellok aujá jiinish waigkag nagkaemamainai , tujash wiyakuch aidauk Apajuí minai inamjati tusag kakajus idaimamainchau ainawai .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Nu tabaun ni jintintaiji aidau antukag senchi puyatkaju nunikag : — ¿ Yaki tujash uwemjaush amainaita ? — tudayinau .

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan diis chichajak : — Aents diismak juka utugchatai , tujash Apajuik ashí dutikmainai , — tiuwai .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Jutii ashí iina ajutjamaidauk ukuinaku ame nemagkamiajim nuutish , ¿ wajig ajutjamtinaita ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Ashí najankamu ataktú yamagmitkamu jegatna nunú tsawantin , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna mina senchigjai inamkun ekeemsamtai , atum mina nemagtuku aidautigmeshkam doce ekeemtai awa nui ekeemsajum , Israelan uchijí aidau doce aajakaju aina nunú wegantu inagtin ainagme .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ashí aents mina nemagtuinak jee aidaun , yachi aidaun , umayí aidaun , apajin , dukujin , nuwen , uchijí aidaun , nugke aidaun ukukiaju aidauk , dita ukukbaujin nagkaesau ciegka imaania jukiagtin ainawai , nuigtushkam pujut tuke atina nui pujusagtin ainawai .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Tujash kuashat aents dekatkau atatus wakegaina nu ukunum juwakagtinai . Untsu iman atan anentaimtumachu aina nu dekatkauk agtinai .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: “ Apajuí inama duka , aents uva ajagtin asa , kashikmas aents takastin aidaun egaak jiinkiuwa nujai betekmamtinai .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Nunik ni ajajin takamain aidaun igkug : ‘ Makichik tsawan takagtustajum akiktajime ’ , tusa ajají uva ajakbaunum awemauwai .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Nuna ishiak etsa dukap takuni ai , yaakat wekaekamá tikich aents aidaushkam takatsuk wainak batsatun wainkau ,

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: nunik : ‘ Atumesh wetajum mina ajajuí uva ajakbauwa nui takaakjum , nuniakjumin betek atum takattajum dutiksanuk akiktajime ’ , tama ditashkam wegajui .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Dutika ishiak , ataktú jinkiuwai etsa tajiaja ai , nunik takamainun yajuak ishiakui . Ataktushkam dukap etsa tegau ai nunisag we , tikich aents takamainun yajuak nunashkam ishiakui .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Dutika ataktú etsa shiig akagai yaaktanum weuwai , nunikmá aents wainak takatsuk batsamtatman wainak : ‘ ¿ Wagka atumesh takatskesh etsash akapagme ? ’ tusa iniau .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Tusa iniinam : ‘ Iinak makichik aentskesh , nu takagtusta tusagkesh egapainatsui . ’ Tiagtai : ‘ Atumshakam dekas mina ajajuí takastajum , nuniakjumin atum takastatjum dutiksanuk akiktajime ’ , tusa ishiaku .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Nunik kiyagmatai , ni inake takatá diinun chichajak : ‘ Weme ashí takau aidau untsukam ijumjam , takat nagkantanak wajai wayau aidaunum nagkamsam , akia akiakuam yama nagkamchak wayaunum inagnakta ’ , tiuwai .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Tusa tima takau aidaun untsuká kaunkamtai , inagnak wayau aidaun makichik tsawan takasbauwa dutiksag akikaju .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Dutikamtai yama nagkamchak wayau aidauk , jutiik aan dukapeap jukittaji tusag anentaimaidau , tujash ditanashkam makichik tsawan takasbaunak dutiksag akikajui .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Dutikawajam , kashikmas nagkamas takasú aidauk ajagtinun senchi kajegkajui .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Nunikag : ‘ Jujú inagnamunum kaunawag makichik hora takasagma nuninush , ¿ wagka jutii dekas kashikmasa nagkamsa tuke takai takainakua etsa akapag jujai betekash akikume ? ’ tuidau .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Imatjuinam ajagtin ayaak : ‘ Kumpag aidauh , wika tunatukesh akiatsjime . ¿ Wi yama nagkamchakun makichik tsawan takagtustajum dutikawagmin akiktajime , tama ayú tichamkujum ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Juuwai atum takasbaugmin jumainaitjum duka . Pai , ju jukijum wetajum . Juna atumin amaag jutiksanuk inagnamunum takasaju aidaunashkam susatasan wakegajai .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: ¿ Wi mina kuichkig asamtai , wi wakegamun akikmamainchaukaitag ? Wi pegkeg asan wait anenkagtakun ashí betekak akikmakui , kajeakjum tu yujagme ’ , tiuwai .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: “ Anmamtuk aents dekatkau atatus wakegaina nu ukunum juwakagtinai ; untsu iman atan anentaimtumachu aina nu dekatkau agtinai . Kuashat aents untsukbau ainawai , tujash wajumchikeuchi etejamu aidauk . ”

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Jisus niina jintintaiji doce aina nuna Jerusalén wegamunum jintaa ditanak chichajak :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: — Yamai Jerusalén jegattag duwi , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nunak achigkag sacerdote apuji , nuigtú chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaunum ejetiagtatui maatnume tusag .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Dutijuawagmatai dita jujukiag judiuchu aidaunum sujutkagtatui , pegkegchaun chichajuinak , dushí dushikinakua , asuttan asut awa awajtuinakua , achijag maatnume tusag , tujash dutijuawagmataish kampatum tsawanta juwi ataktú nantaktatjai , — tiu .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Jisus nuna tusa wetatman Zebedeo nuwe , uchijí aidaujai jegantun tikishmatjau segatatus .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Dutikam Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wají atsumame ? — tau . Tama : — Ame Apu wajasam inamjatnaitam duwi mina uchig jimaja ju , makichik amina untsugmia nuní eketjakum , tikichia au menagmia nuní eketjustin atá tajame , — tau .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Amek mina segatam duka dekatsme . Tusa nuwan idayak , nuna uchijin pempentusag : — ¿ Atumesh mina waitkajus mantuawagtata dusha imanisjumkek waitmainaitjum ? — tuinam dita chichainak : — Ehé , iishkam duka waitmainaitji , — tuidau .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan chichajak : — Dekas tajime : Wi waittsan jakattag imanisjumek waittsatin ainagme ; tujash mina untsujuí , tikich mina menajuí ekeemsatin atajum tusanuk tumaitsujime . Nunak mina Apag ya aidau ekeemsatnujinak umigkauwaita nuna ekentsagtinai , — tiuwai .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Nunú tabaun diez aina nu antukag , jimaja nuna yachijaí senchi kajegkajui .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Nuniagtai Jisus ditan untsuká : — Atumek shiig dekagme , tikich nugka aina nuna apuji aidau judiuchu aina duka , aentsnak ditanua nunin emak inainawai . Untsu nunú apu aina nuna aentsji aidau , aents aina nuna dita wakegamun inau ainawai .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Tujash atumek aajagmek dutikdaimain ainatsjume . Nunitsuk atum ainajum anuiyatijum eme anentai atasajum wakegautigmek , tikich aina nu takajin amainaitjume .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Atum ainajum anuiya eme anentai atatus wakegauk , ashí tikich aidaun takajin amainai .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Wi dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , atum aidautijum mina takagtustinme tusanuk taachuitjai . Wi dekas atumin takagkun mantamnan kuashat aents aidau pujutin uwemtijata tusan taamjai .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Jericonmaya jiinki wegagtai , aents aidau shiig kuashat Jisusan saetukajui .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Nuniamunum jimag aents wainmachu jintá yantamchijin eketu , Jisus nagkaemawai tuinamun antukag senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Apu David wegantu uchijiyah , jutiish wait anenkagtugta ! — wajaidau .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Imatiagtai nui aents ijunaidau jiyaidau , itatkatnume tusag . Tujash ditak nuní senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Apu David wegantu uchijiyah , jutiish wait anenkagtugta ! — wajaidau .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Imatjam Jisus nui wajan untsuk ikaunman iniak : — ¿ Utugtukti tusagmea wakegagme ? — tau .

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Tusá iniam dita aiinak : — Apuh , iik wainmaktasa wakegaji , — tuidau .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Tiagtai Jisuschakam wait anentug ditá jiin antinkaju , dutikamuik wainmakag , ditashkam Jisusan nemagkaju .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai yaakat Betfagé tutainum jegawaju Olivosan mujají najatamunum , Jerusalén tikiju awa nui , nunik ni jintintaijin jimajan awemauwai ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: dutikak : — Wetajum au yaakat jegattak aents batsata awi , awi jegakmajum wainkattagme makichik burra jigkam uchijijai wajau . Nunú atia jukim itagtuatajum .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Nu juwagmin , makichik aentskesh : ¿ Wagka aikagme ? tujamkujaish : ‘ Apu atsubau asamtai juwajai , ajum awagtugmaktatui ’ , tusa ukuktajum , — tiu .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jujú junikua duka Apajuí etsegtin agak :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: “ Yaakat Siognum batsamin aidauwah , ‘ diistajum atumin apujum imanchauch wajasá burro tsakatnum entsamas minitjamui ’ , ” timawa nunú uminkauwai .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Tiajam ni jintintaiji aidaushkam wegag Jisus tibaunak imatiksag umikaju .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Dutikawag burran uchijijai jukiag itaantaju , dutikawag awantak nugkuagbaujin jukiag mai tuntupen aitkagmatai Jisus ekeebiu .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Nunikmatai kuashat aents asag , Jisus wegamunmanini dita awantak nugkuagbaujin aitug emaidau , tikich aents aidau dukan tsupig jintanmag aitug emaidaush aidau .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Imatikainak aents eemak weedau , ukunum minidaushkam senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Apu David wegantunum akiinau , Apajuí awemam mina jujú emematiagmi , jujuwai iina agkanmitkagmatnuk ! ¡ Nayaimpinmayanash nigki agkanmitkattawai ! — wajaidau .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Jisus Jerusalegnum wayamtai ashí aents aidauk pampaidau , nuninak : — ¿ Jusha ya aentsuita ? — tuidau .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Tiagtai : — Juka Jisusai , Apajuí etsegtin Galileanmaya , Nazaret pujuwe nuuwai , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa , nui sujak batsatun sumau aidaujaí ashí agaa jiijú , dutikak aents kuichki yapajiin aidau mesajinashkam shitaki akaketuk , paumá sujin aidau ekeemtaiji aidaunash dutiksag akaketkau ,

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: dutika chichaak : — Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui : ‘ Mina jegajuk Apajuí aujku ijuntaiyai tama atinai ’ tawa nuniaig atum kasá batsamtai emaugme , — tiu .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Nuna tusa ishiak wajai wainmachu , shutú aidaujai jega Apajuí ememattainum utsanawagmatai Jisuschakam etsagakui .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Tujash sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai Jisus etsaegkagtamun wainkag , nuigtú uchi aidau jega Apajuí ememattainum batsamas untsumainak : “ ¡ Apu David wegantunum akiinauwa nunú uwemtikagtugtatus yamai mina jujú emematiagmi ! ” , awajuinamun antukag kajekag ,

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Jisusan chichajuinak : — ¿ Antamek jujú imataina dusha ? Tama Jisus ayaak : — Ehé , antajai . ¿ Atumek ausachukaitjum : ‘ Uchi tsakat aidau , muntsuaku aidaujai emematjutpainak kantamjutpawagtatui ’ tawa duka ?

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak yaakat Betanianum we nui kanajui .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Nunik tsawaag kashikmas yaaktanum waketak Jisus yapajau .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Nunikmá higuera jintá yantamchijin wajattaman wainak jegantau , tujash nejeg atsau ayatak dukak wajas atai , chichajak : — ¡ Amek ajumaish tuke nejekchatnaitme ! — tamawaik kukajá wajasú .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Nunikmatai niina jintintaiji aidauk puyatkag Jisusan iniinak : — ¿ Wajukaya higuerash tabauwaikish kukajé ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Atum Apajuiyai kajintsá anentaimsajum utujimtash utujimtsuk nuniktatuapi takugmek , imá ju higueraya juke jutikmaitsugme , ju muja awa jushakam : ¡ Juwi atsuk nayantsanum wajaata ! tamak nunimainai .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Tuja atum Apajuí aukujum dekas sujustatuapita tusa segakjumek jukittagme , — tiuwai .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa jintinkagtak wajai , sacerdote apuji tikich apu aidaujai tajuntag iniinak : — ¿ Aminash ya jintinkagtuata tusash awetamae ? ¿ Yana chichamenia jusha juniame ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wishakam iniastajime , atum nu aigkagminig ujaktajime yana chichamenia jutikaja nuna .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: ¿ Ya awemauwaita Juagnash yamijatjati tusash , Apajuik awemauwait atsa aents aidauk awemauwait ? — tau . Tama ditak pempeentunikiag chichainak : “ Juagnak Apajuí awemauwai tajinish , ‘ ¿ Tujash wagka dekaskeapi tichau ainagme tujamtata jama ? ’

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Tuja aents aidau awemauwai tita takuishkam , aents aina nu ishamaji , Juagkak Apajuí etsegtinai tuidau asagmatai . ”

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Nuna tusag utujimag Jisusan chichajuinak : — Dekatsji , — tuidau . Tiagtai ni ayaak : — Wisha tichattajime yana chichamenia jutikaja nunak , — tiu .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Jisus ditan iniak : — ¿ Jusha atumesh wajuk anentaimtagme ? Aents uchijí jimag ajujakuí , nunin makichik uchijiya nuna chichajak : ‘ Uchuchih , uva ajakbauwa nui weme takastá ’ , tiuwai .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Tama nu uchi chichaak : ‘ Wika apawah wemaitsujai ’ tiu ayatak awake anentaimag weuwai .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Tuja tikich uchijiya nunashkam dutiksag tiuwai . Tama nu ayaak : ‘ Ayú apawah , wetajai ’ , tusa tiu ayatak wechauwai .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Ju jimag uchi pachisa taji nuanuish , ¿ tuuwa apají wakegamunash umigkauwaita ? Tuinam dita aimainak : — Dekatkauwa nuuwai , — tiaju . Tiagtai Jisus ditan chichajak : — Dekas tajime : Aents apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin aidau , nuigtú nuwa akiká takatai aina dushakam pujutjin yapajiawag , Apajuí inatjati tusag atumin nagkaetamsau imaninawai .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Atumek Juan dekaskea nuna jintinjamainaigkish dekaskeapi tichaugme ; tujash apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin aidau , nuwa akiká takatai aina dushakam dekaskeapi tusag tudaujinak idaisaje . Atumek nunidau wainiatkugmesh , pujutjum yapajiajum dekaskeapi tichaugme .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: “ Antuktajum ju augmatbaushkam : Aents ajajin uva ajakuí , dutika tanishig , uva yumiji ijugtinnash umik , wajasá diistinnash torre tutain yakí jiikuí . Dutika wajumak aentsun : ‘ Atum ju takastajum , dutikakjum minash sujustajum ’ , tusa susa ukuak , nigka tikich nugkanum atushat weuwai .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Dutikau asa uva tsamat uminkau asamtai niina inake aidaun ishiakui , aents nui takaak batsata nui jegawagmatai , uva neje susam jukiag itagtuatnume tusa .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Dutikam inak jegawagmatai ajanum takaina nunú , achikag makichik ayatak suwimawajui , tikichnak maawajui , tikichnashkam aikasag kayai tukuí tukuinakua maawajui .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Dutikawagmatai ataktushkam nuní kuashat ni inake aidaun ishitkauwai . Dutikamtai nunashkam dutiksajag maawajui .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Dutikawagmatai inagnamun niina uchuchijin : ‘ Mina uchignak ajantusampap diimain ainawa ’ , tusa awemauwai .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Tujash ajanum takaina nu uchi minittaman wainkag ditak pempeentunikiag : ‘ Auwai ju aja juna jukitnuk , dekas maa ajapami , dutikaku juka iinu emami ’ , tuidau .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Tusag achiká jukiag ajá ukumtikiag maawajui .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: “ Atumesh wajuk anentaimjume , dekas ajagtina nunú minakush , ¿ itugmainaita ajanum takaina nunash ? ”

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Aents pegkegchau aina nunak wait anentsuk kajeg utsaumainai , dutika tikich takau aidaun idaitumainai ajak uminkamtai juwiinakush , midau amaina nunak dutiksag sujin atinme tusa .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan iniak : — ¿ Atumek ausachukaitjum Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui : ‘ Aents jegá jegamin aidau kayá ajapawajua nunú , kaya dekas jegá ichichkatin apututia iman wajasé . Nunak Apajuí dutikau asamtai jutii anentaig ejetumaitsui ’ tawa duka ?

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: “ Nuaduí tajime : Apajuí atumin inapa nunak idayak tikich aentsun inagtinai , midau atin aidaunak dutiksag itagtuatnume tau asa .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Aents nu kaya nui iyauk tsainkatnai , untsu kaya aentsnum iyaakug aentsnak tuke yuku ematnai . ”

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Nuna tusa augmattai antukag sacerdote apuji aidau , fariseo aidaujai : “ Nunak jutiin tujamji ” , tuidau .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Nuniau asag achikta tuidau ; tujash aents aidaun ishamaidau : Jisusak Apajuí etsegtinai , tuidau asagmatai .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Jisus ataktú tikich augmatbaun pachis augmatak tau :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: “ Apajuí jutii inapa duka apu ni uchijí nuwentai jistamjak yutain umikua nujai betekmamtinai .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Ishiakui ni inake aidaun aents ipaamu aidau untsuktajum tusa , tujash ipak aidauk nuwenbaunum minitnak dakitjajui .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Nu nunikagmatai ataktú tikich inake aidaun awemak : ‘ Ujaktajum ipak aidau dita yumainnak ashí umikjai , mina bakag aidaun , kuntin uduekbau aidaunashkam maatajum tijai . Ashí uminkae , ipak aidaushkam nuwenbaunum kaunkatnume , tusajum titajum . ’

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Timatai timae tusa ujainamash ipaamu aidauk antugtsuk ukuinak , makichik ajajin wegai , tikich wajiijin sujak wegajui ,

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: nuniai tikich aidauk , apú inake aidaun achikag suwi suwimainakua maawajui .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Dutikamun apu antuk kajeká suntaji aidaun ishitkauwai , dutikam wejiag aents magkagtuau aina nunak kajegká , ashí yaaktajinash apejuk ukugkiajui .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Nuna dutikawagmatai tikich inake aidaun : ‘ Nuwenbaunum yuwatnuk ashí uminkae , tujash wi duwik ipaamu aidauk taachagtatui .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Nunin asamtai , yaaktanum jinta dekas nagkaematai aina nui wejum , ashí aents atum wainbauk ipaatajum , nuwenbaunum kaunatnume ’ , tiuwai .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Tiajam inak aidaushkam shiyakag , ashí aents dita wainbaunak ipaawajui , aents pegkeg , pegkegchau aidaujai . Imatikamu asa jeganmag shiig piyakajui .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: “ Imanikmatai apushkam wayau , ipak aidaun diistatus . Nunikmá wainkau makichik aents nuwenbaunum wegaku nugkutainak nugkutsuk wayaa eketun ,

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: nunik : ‘ Kumpajuh , ¿ wajuk amesh juwish wayaume jaanch nuwenbaunum nugkutai nugkutskesh ? ’ Tama duka aentsuk aimtsuk eketu .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Nunittaman apu ni inake yujumkan mesanum pekaidaun chichajak : ‘ Juka dawenum , ashí uwejijai jigkagjum jukijum agaa suwea awi ajuitajum , nui pujus senchi waitiak , buutak daik takegtú pujutí ’ , tiuwai .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Kuashat aents untsukbau ainawai , tujash ujumchikiuchi etejamu aidauk . ”

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Nuna Jisus timatai fariseo aidaushkam jiinjag ijunjaju , makichik aents Jisusan iniasti , tamash wajintig timatai tsanumjugmi tusag chichainak .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Nunikag nui chichaman umikag ditá aentsji aidaun , Herodesan aentsji aidaujai ishiakajui . Dutikawajam ditashkam Jisusan jegajiag : — Jintinkagtinuh , jutiik dekainaji ame dekaskea duke chichau asam , Apajuí jinti dekaskea duke jintinkagtam duka . Amek aentsú niimé diigsam shiig awajkatasamkesh chichatsme .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Nuniau asaamin tajame , ¿ amesh wajuk anentaime , Roma apujiya nuna kuichkiji atinush sumainashit , atsa sumaitsuak ? — tuidau .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisusak dita pegkegchau anentaibaujinak shiig dekaju asa : — ¿ Tsanujatin aidauwah , wagka tsanujá dekapjustasagmesh wakejutagme ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Iwaintugkakjua kuichik wajukuwa apush suwagme , — tama makichik kuichkin ejentuntaju .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Dutikam nuna wainak : — ¿ Yana niimé dakumkaya daajish agagbauwaita ? — tusa iniidau .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Tama dita ainak : — Anka Roma apuji dakumkamui . Tiagtai : — Roma apujinua duka nigki susatajum , Apajuinua dushakam Apajuik susatajum , — tiuwai .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Aaja tiajam anentai jegagchaju , nunikag waketuinak ukukiaju .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Nunú tsawantaik saduceo aidaushkam Jisusan wejiaju , ditak aents jakau aina duka nantagchatnai tinu asag Jisusan iniinak :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Jintinkagtinuh , Moisés chichaak : ‘ Aents nuwan juki uchin akiitsuk jakamtaig , ni yachintin nuwan juki uchin akiimainai , dutika yachí uchijiya nunin emamainai ’ , tiuwai .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Tuja nuniamunum , iina patayí siete yachigbau aayi . Nuanuiya nagkamchak iwai nuwenauwai , nunik dukap pujutsuk uchinash akiitsuk jaak nuwanak yachin ukugkiuwai .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Nunikmatai tikich yachi jukishkam uchinak akiitsuk jakauwai , tuja kampatuma nu jukish nunisag jakauwai , nuni nuninakua siete aajakajua duka ashí jinawajui .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nu ashí jinawagmatai pujus nuwashkam jakauwai .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Siete aajakajua duka ashí nunak nuwatjaju aina duwish ¿ yana nuweg atinaita atak jakau nantainamunmash ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Atumek Apajuí chichamen tawa dusha dekachu , niina senchijiya dushakam wainkachu ainajum nuaduí dewakugme .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Atak nantajagtin aina duwik makichkish nuwenachagtinai . Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya aina nuninuk agtinai .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Tujash jakau nantajagtinun pachis Apajuí tibau ni chichamen agagbaunum :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: “ ‘ ¿ Witjai Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aina nuna Apajuijinuk ’ tawa duka ausachukaitjum ? ¡ Apajuik jakau aidaun Apajuijinchui , iwaaku aina nuna Apajuijiyai ! ”

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Nuna aatus Jisus jintinkagtua ashimkamtai , aents aidauk anentai jegagchaju .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Jisus saduceo aidaun itatmitkakbaun antukag , fariseo aidaushkam ijunjaju .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Nunikbaunum nuwiya makichik , chicham umiktajum tibauwa nuna jintinkagtin , wi Jisusan iniastajai wajintig , tusa jegantun :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: — Jintinkagtinuh ¿ chicham umiktin aina nuwiya dekas puyatjusa umimainush tuwaita ? — tau .

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ‘ Amina Apujum Apajuiya nu imá senchi aneeta , nuniakum Apajuinu pegkeg aina duke dekaata , imá niinig anentaimsam pujustá ’ tawai .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Juuwai dekatkau umimainuk , juuwai chicham umiktina nuwiyan nagkaesauk .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Untsu tikich jujai betekmamtina duka : ‘ Amijai ijutkau aidaushkam amek anenmamsam aneeta ’ , tawai .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Ju jimag chicham umiktajum timawa juuwai Moisés nuigtú Apajuí etsegtin aidau jintinkagtujakú aina duka , — tiuwai .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Fariseo aidau ijunjamutak batsataig Jisus iniasu :

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: — ¿ Atumesh wajuk anentaimjume , Kristush ya wegantuita ? Tuinam dita aiinak : — Kristuk David wegantui , — tuidau .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Tiagtai : — Nuniaish ¿ wajuk asamtaiya Davitash Wakaní Pegkeji chichamtikmash Kristunash Apú tawa ?

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Tau asa : ‘ Apu mina Apujun chichajak : Ekeemsata mina untsujuí , nunikamin wi amina shiwajum aidaunak aminí ikaunmakmatai duwi ame diisminum ’ , — tiuwai .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: — David , Kristun Apug tujakua nuniaish , ¿ wajuk asaya David wegantush amainaita ? — tau .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Nuna tutai aimainchau dekapedau asag , makichik aentskesh iniaschajui . Nui nagkamsag ataktuk iniaschaju .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus aents aidaun , niina jintintaiji aidaujai

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: chichajak : “ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidauk , fariseo aidaujaig Moisés chicham umiktinun jintinkagtujakua nuna jintinkagtuinawai .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Nuniau asamtai , ashí dita dutikatajum tujamaina duka imatiksagmek umiktajum , tujash ju umimainai tuinayatak pegkegchau takaina duka atumek takasaigpajum .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Ditak chicham umiktin kakajus umimainchauwa ibaunak tikich aents aidaunak , jujú umiktajum awajuinawai , tujash ditakesh umiinatsui . Ditak , iik kijin jumainchauwaitku tikich ayanka , machikish yaitsuk idaimaina numamtuk wajainawai .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Dita takaina nunak , ashí tikich aents aidaush , minak eme anenjus diigtinme tusag aaninawai , nuninak nijayinish sentan wegkagman jukiag , chicham umiktajum tibau aidaun agak , kuntujinish dutiksag jigkamá yujainawai . Aantsag nugkuagbauji weniya nuwish sasamjuk detujag nugkujag yujainawai .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Jistatin yuwinamunmash , dekas apú ekeemtai shiig iwajamu aina imanun etegkawag ekeemsagtatus wakegainawai . Jega ijuntainum wainakush ekeemtai pegkegnum ekeemsagtatus wakegainawai .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Nunidau asag , aents kuashat ayamunum igkuntuinakush puyatjutus kumpamjuinak : ‘ Jintinkagtinú ’ tujuttinme tusag wakegainawai .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: “ Tujash atumek : ‘ Jintinkagtinú ’ tujuttinme tusagmek wakeemaitsugme , ashí atum aidautigmek yatsut asajum , ‘ yatsujú ’ tudaimain ainagme , imá makichki atumí jintinjamnuk .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Atum aidautigmek ju nugka juwiyag : ‘ Apawá ’ tumainuk atsawai , imá makichik : Apawá tumainuk Apajuí nayaimpinum puja nunuwai .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: ‘ Jintinkagtinú ’ tama atasagmekesh wakejigpajum , Kristua auke : Jintinkagtinú tama amainuk .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Atum ainajum anuiya dekas iman atatus wakegauk tikichin umigmainai .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ni nigki eme anenmamuk wainak juwaktinai ; untsu aents eme anenmamchauwa nunú dekas wagaakuk atinai .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , waitjuidau asagmin ! Atumek aents Apajuí nemagkata tuinaig shiig jintinchau asajum , waiti epetmaina numamtuk awagmajum duwi . Tujash atumkesh uwemainnum pujatsjume , nuniau asajum tikich aidau uwemjati tusagmesh idaitsugme .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ¡ Atum chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , waitjuidau asagmin ! Atumek nuwa wajé jee atankijum , aents aidau : Pegkegnap takainawa , tujuttinme tusajum Apajuí au aujuinakuajum ukú yujau ainagme , nunin asajum imá senchi suwimak jukitin ainagme .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , tsanumin asagmin ! Atumek aents aidau atumi nunitaijum jintintuajum atumea nuninuk ematasajum , kukag yujasjum , nayantsanum wejigmesh egaa yujau ainagme , dutika unuinagjum atumi nagkaetamas jii ajumaish kajinkashtinnum suwimkan juwak waitmain emá idayin ainagme .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: “ ¡ Atumek aents wainmachuitak jintan inakmastatus wajukmaina numamtuk wajau asagmin wait anentajime ! ‘ Jega Apajuí ememattaiya nuna adayas aents ni dutikatnujin umiktatjai tauk wainkayai ’ tajume ; ‘ tujash aents ni dutikatnujin pachis , jega Apajuí emematainum oro awa nuna adayas tauk dekas imatiksag umimainai ’ , tinu asagmin .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Anentainkachu , wainmachu aidauwah ! ¿ Dekas imanush tuwaita orokaih , nuniachkush jega Apajuí ememattai oron pegkeemtika duchaukaih ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Atumek : ‘ Altaran adayas ni dutikatnujin umiktatjai tauk , wainkayai ’ tajume ; ‘ untsu Apajuí anentag suwamu altarnum patatun adayas tauk , dekas imatiksag umimainai ’ tinu ainagme .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Anentainkachu , wainmachu aidauwah ! ¿ Tuwiya dekas imanush , Apajuinu atin kuntin anentag itaamua dukaih , atsa altar nunú itaamun pegkeemtika duchaukaih ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Aents ni dutikatnujin pachis altaran adayas tauk , ashí altarnum patatujaí taku tawai .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Tuja jega Apajuí ememattaiya nuna pachis taushkam imá jeganak takug tatsui , Apajuí nui puja nujaí taku tawai .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Aantsag aents nayaimpin pachis taushkam imá nayaimpinakek tutsuk , ashí Apajuí pujamujiya nunash taku tawai .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , waitjuidau asagmin ! Atumek ajak menta , anís , comino aatsajum puyatjusjum diezmó wajagme . Ju dutikayatkujum chicham umiktina nuwiya pegkeg takata nuna , wait anenkagtutan , Apajuí umigtan jintinkagta duka umiatsjume . Tujash ju aina jujú umiakjumesh , nuigtú tikich umiktin aina dushakam umitskek idaimain ainatsjume .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: ¡ Atumek aents wainmachuitak jintan inakmastatus wajukmaina numamtuk wajagme tikich jintinkujum ; atumek uwagtinjumin wiyunch egkemamtai kujajaig tusa jiikí ajapeayatkujum , dekas wenunmash camello waimainchauwa imanun kujamaina numamtuk wajagme !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , tsanumin asagmin ! Atumek shikiká umutai , nuigtú plato aina nuna awanke nijamaina numamtuk wajagme . Tujash atumi anentaiminig kasamtaijum , pegkegchau takamtaijum aidau piyak ajutjamainawai .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: ¡ Fariseo wainmachu aidauwah ! Dekatkauk shikiká umutai , nuigtú plato aina nuna initkega nuuwá dijagta , dutikam awankeshkam tsuwatchau atatui .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , waitjuidau asagmin ! Aents ukusbau awanke pujuí ukatkamu asa pegkeg wajas au , ujaká diyaam kaujú niina ukunchí aidaujai tsuumain wajas aama imanaitjume .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Atumshakam dekaskenmag nunisjumek aents aidau emtinig pegkeja iman iwainmamjume ; tujash initkagminig tsanumtaijum , pegkegchaujum aidau piyak ajutjamainawai .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: “ ¡ Chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidautigminak , fariseo aidautigmijai wait anentajime , waitjuidau asagmin ! Atumek Apajuí etsegtin aajakú aidau ukusbauji aina nunú iwagjume , dutikakjum aents pegkeg aidau kajegbauwa nunú dakumká najanajum shiig iwajajum ekenjume ,

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: dutika chichaakjum : Ii muunji batsamajakua nunú tsawantin jutiish pujujakuitkuik , Apajuí etsegtin aajakú aidauk maawaigpajum tusais ayamjumain ajabiagtai , tajume .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Ju tau asajum , Apajuí etsegtin aajakú aidaun kajegkú aina nuninuk atumesh iwainmamjume .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Atumin muunjum nagkamamua duka atumshakam dutiksagmek emajume !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: “ ¡ Atumek iwanchi uchijí asajum aents tsanú yujagjum ibautigmesh ! ¿ wajuk uwemtugta tajume , Apajuí suwimkan sujamak jii ajumaish kajinkashtina nui chimpipatta duwish ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: “ Nunin asamtai wi awetittajime Apajuí etsegtuktin aidaun , aents yacha aidaunash , jintinkagtuatin aidaunashkam . Tujash atum nunú aina nuwiya achigjum maattagme , dutikakjum tikich aina duka jega atumi ijuntaijum aina nui awayajum asutiattagme , dutikakjum yaaktanum wekaetusjum waitká yujagtin ainagme .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Aaja nuniau asagmin , aents pegkeg aidau ju nugka juwi kajegkú ainajum duwi , Abel maamua nui nagkamas , Apajuí etsegtin Zacarías Berequiasa uchijí , jega Apajuí ememattainum pujau , altara ejapeen mau ainajum duwi suwimkak suwam atatjume .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Dekas tajime : Nunú suwimkak ashí atum ainajum anutijum jukitnaitjume .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ ¡ Jerusalegnumia aidauwah , atumek Apajuí etsegtin aidaush main ainagme , nuigtushkam Apajuí chichagkagtukti tusa awetugmagmataish , kayai tukuí tukuinakuajum main ainagme ! ¡ Wika shiig kuashat wakeesan , atash uchuchiji aidaun nanapen awayag ijumag kuitamama numamtuk , atumnash ijumjan kuitamkata tamash atumek dakitjamugme !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Nuniku asagmin jujú atum batsatjum juka ukumkimu , aents pujugsachbau agkan agtatui .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Nunin asamtai tajime : Yamai nagkamsagmek ataktuk waitkashtatjume , nuniautijum wi minakui : ‘ ¡ Apajuí awemam mina ju emematiagmi ! ’ tujuttinaitjum duwi waitkatin ainagme . ”

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainmaya jiinki wetai , niina jintintaiji aidau amainagkag nu jegamkamun inaktuinak awaantaju .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Dutikam Jisus chichaak : — ¿ Ju ashí imag ekenjá jegamkamua ju wainjumek ? Dekas tajime : Makichik kayakesh ekenjamu aina nuwiyag juwakchatnai , ashí tsaikbau atinai , — tau .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Jisus Olivosa mujajin waka ekeemsamtai , niina jintintaiji aidau jegaantag niinak iniinak : — ¿ Nunash wajutik dutikawagtin ainawa ? ame taattaku wajataish , tuja nugka nagkanbau jegattak wajataish wají wantiniagtinaita , nunú ujajatkata , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan ayaak : — Kuitamamkatajum , makichkish tsanugmajainum .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Wagki kuashat aents aidau mina daajun adaimasag midiagtinai nuninak : ‘ Witjai Kristunuk ’ tusa kuashat aentsun tsanuagtinai .
