text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Maaninawai tuinamu antitnaitjume , nuigtú maaniawagtasa pampandayamushkam , imaniakuish puyatkaigpajum . Duka aatus nagkaemaktinai tujash nu achatnai nagkanbauk .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Nugka muunnum batsamin aidaushkam mai imannumiajaig maadiagtinai , tuja nugka yaignum batsamin aidaushkam , tikich nuninnum batsatujai maadiagtinai . Jata waamak aentsun nagkaematug ijinbaush atinai , yapagtash tepeatnai , ugtanash kuashat nugkanum ugtinai .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Tujash jujú aina juka waitut yamá nagkamnak imanitnai .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Ju nuniamunum atumnashkam achigmakag jujamkiag wai waitkagmainakua mantamawagtinai . Atum mina nemagtin aidautigminak ashí aents aidau kajegtabiagtinai .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Nu tsawantai kuashat aents minai dekaskeapi tusa anentaimaidaush idaisagtinai , nuninak kajegdayagtinai ; imanidau asag pempé pempeentunikiag achinidiagtinai .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Kuashat aents Apajuí chichame etsegji tusa tsanumaidaush wantinjatnai , nuninak kuashat aentsun tsanuagtinai .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Kuashat pegkegchau aitnai , imaniau asamtai kuashat aents Apajuí aneamujinak mijakagtinai .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Tujash ni mina nemagtukbaunak nunisag pujusá nagkanbaunum jegaa nu uwemjatnai , nunik ajumaish pujut nagkanchauwa nui pujustinai .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Apajuí inamjatin yamajam chicham pachisa etsegbauwa juka , ashí nugkanum etsegkamu atinai , ashí aents aidau dekaatnume tabau asamtai . Nunikmatai nagkanbauk atinai .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: “ Apajuí etsegtin Daniel aajakua nu , Apajuí dakitmainun shiig pegkegchau dutikawagtinun pachis agajui , ( nuna aujuk dekaatnume ) : Jega Apajuí ememattai pegkegma nui aents utsanainak , dita apajimtaiji dakumkamun tikima pegkegchaun awayawagtinai tawa nuna dutikaidau wainkugmek ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: atum Judea batsatutigmek mujanum pisagtajum .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Tuja jega jegamká tuntupé paka inagnakbaunum waka pujaushkam akaikig wajiijinak jukiigka .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Aantsag ajanum takaak pujaushkam , pataká nugkugtinun jukitjai tusag waketjukigka ;

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Tujash nunú tsawantin nuwa ejamtin , nuigtú uchí amuntsuaku agtina nunak wait anentuinajai !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Apajuí ausatajum , atum pisamua nu tsetsek tepeamunum , nuniachkush tsawan ayamtai aigkish ajutjaminum .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Apajuí nugká najanauwa nui nagkamas yamaya juwish imanika waitchatain , atakea duwish imanika waittsashtin tikima senchi waitiamu atinai .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Nu imanika waitiamun Apajuí imijtsuk idaitaik , makichik aentskesh uwemainchau ainawai , tujash Apajuí ni aentsji agtinun etegjauwa nuna wait anentau asa , waitut ayatak wegaunak imijkatnai .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: “ Tuja makichik aentskesh : ‘ Juwi Kristu pujawai diistajum ’ , tachakush : ‘ Awi pujume ’ , awajtamainakuish dekaskeapi tiigpajum .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Kuashat aents : ‘ Kristuitjai ’ tusag tsanumiagtinai , aantsag : ‘ Apajuí chichame etsejin ainaji ’ tusag tsanumaidaush agtinai . Nuninak aents dutikmainchau aidaun iwainainak tsanuagtinai , dutikaidau asag Apajuí etegkamu aidaunash dita tsanuamunak tsanujagtinai .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Junak yaunchkesh timajime .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Nu aaja tibau asajum : ‘ Kristuk uwegshunum pujawai diistajum ’ tujamainakuish wejumek diisaigpajum . Nuna tujamchakjash : ‘ Diistajum ju jega tesamua juwi pujawai ’ tujamainakuish dekaskeapi tiigpajum .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna minaknuk , peem etsá minitia nuwiya peeti , etsá akaetaiya atú peemama numamtuk wajaktinaitjai .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Tuwí jakau tepettawa nuna chuwagkak tuwakagtinai .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: “ Nunú waitut nagkaemaig etsag suwe wajastinai , nantushkam etsanjashtinai , nayaimpinmaya yaya punjau aidaushkam nugkanum kakeyagtinai , imanidau asagmatai nayaimpinmaya machikish umushmainchau aidaush buchitjatnai .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Nunú imaniai wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna , nayaimpinmayan ashí mina senchigjai tsawan wajasá minamujun waitkag , ashí aents nugkanmaya aidauk ishamjukag buutiagtinai .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Wi mina aentsug nayaimpinmaya aidaun ishiaktinaitjai , ashí mina aentsug etejamu aidau nugka nagkatkamunum batsatun , umputai trompetan senchi umpuntug ijumjatnume tusan .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: “ Numi higueran pachisan augmattsan titatjim nu anentaimtustajum . Atumek : ‘ Higuera duke betenkakuig wamkeap esat nagkamnattawa ’ , tusajum dekau ainagme .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Nunisjumek atumshakam , ashí wi tajim nunú imanisag uminag wegau wainkugmek , yamaik Apajuí Uchijí Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nu taatnuk ashí jegaegapi titin atajum .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Dekas tajime : Wi Jerusalegkan pachisan ashí tajim duka yamai aents batsataina jusha ashí jinuinatsaig uminkatnai .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nayaimpik nugkajaig megkaejatnai , tujash mina chichamjuk umintsukek juwakchatnai .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: “ Tujash wají tsawantinig , wají horatinig taatnaitja nunak makichkish dekainatsui , nayaimpinmaya aents aidaukesh dekainatsui , imá mina Apajuk dekawai .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: “ Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna minittakun wajataik , Noé pujai wajukejakú aina numamtuk wajagtinai .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Nunú tsawantaik eke nujag ashí nugkan amuatsaig batsamsag , yutai yuwinak , umutnash umuinak , nuwenainak , nawanjin suju wajá batsatai , Noé niina arcajin egkemauwai .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Nunikmataish pachitsuk tuke imaní batsatainai , nujag ashí nugkan amuak ashí aentsnak tajak utsagkui . Numamtuk aents pachiakats pujuinai , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag junak taatnaitjai .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Junashkam tajime : Jimag aents ikam wekaguk makichik juwaku , tikichik ukuam atinai .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Jimag nuwa shaa dekeenak pujuidaushkam makichik juwaku , tikichik ukuam atinai .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: “ Atumek aneaku pujustajum , wají tsawantinig atumí Apugmish minitnaita duka dekachu asajum .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Ju anentaimtusjum diistajum , aents jeentin kasa kasagkatasa utuam atinjin dekakug , kanutsuk iwá pujauk , jeenig utuam amaitsui .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Numamtuk atumshakam aneaku pujustajum . Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak tsawan imatika anentaimtachbau ai minitnaitjai .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: “ ¿ Yaita inak apuji tibaunak imatiksag umin , shiig anentaimkau asamtai , apuji kajitus niina jeen batsatun yutain diyaku susati tibauwa nuninush ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Nunú inak apuji inaja ukukbau ashí ni tibaunak betek umiká pujakug , apuji minitaish shiig aneemainai .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Dekas tajime : Nunú inak imanis umiaunak apujishkam : ‘ Ashí mina ajutuina duka ame kuitamjutin atá ’ , tusa idaitumainai .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Untsu inak pegkegchau asa : ‘ Mina apujuk waamak taashtatui ’ , tusa anentaimas

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: niina apuji inake aidaun senchi suwimak , nigka shiig yuwak , nuigtushkam nampen aidaujai umak wekagai ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: apuji tsawan dekachmau ai pachiachmau takamá wainak ,

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: senchi suwimkan susa , tikich aents wait aidaujai betek waittsati tusa idaimainai . Dutikam nui pujus senchi buutak daik takegtú pujumainai .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , diez nuwa muntsujut lámpara jukiag nuweenun uyuntsagtatus wejiajua nujai betekmamtin atinai .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Cinco nuwa aina nunú shiig anentaimsag umintsajui ; nuninai tikich nuwa cinco aina duka anentaimtugchajui nunak ,

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: nunidau asag lamparajin yajamainnak aceitenak jukichaju ainawai .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Untsu nuwa shiig anentaimas umintsaju aina duka , lamparajin juinakush botellanum aceiten aimak jukiajui .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Nuwenatna nu tachatai , dakai dakainakua kaji pujajuinam ashí kajigkajui .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Nunik kajigkag batsatai aehaet ai antukajui : ‘ ¡ Nuwenatta duka minawai , jiinjajum igkugtajum ! ’ tusa untsumjamun .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Tutai nunú nuwauch aidaushkam lamparajin ekemaktasag umiidau .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Nuniamunum nuwa nuna anentaimtugchaju aidauk , pachiakats pujuidau asag , tikich nuwa shiig anentaimas uminkaju aina nuna : ‘ Minash aceitijum machik yajatjuata , jutii lamparajig kajinainawai ’ , tuidau .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : ‘ Dekas aceite sujutainum wejum sumaktajum , akantunisa jukimak ajutá abuekashtatui ’ , tiaju .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Tiajam aceiten sumaktatus weenai , ukunum aents nuwenushkam tau , nunikmatai nuwa umintsag daká batsataidauk , nuwenku jistabaunum utsanawaju , nunikmatai waitin epediuwai .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Nuniku ai nuwa aceiten sumainak wegajushkam kaunkag : ‘ ¡ Apu waiti ujatjikia ! ¡ Apu waiti ujatjikia ! ’ wajaidau .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Imatjam ni ayaak : ‘ Wika atumnak wainchaujime , atumesh yatsu ainajum ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Jisus nuna tusa : — Nuaduí atumek aneaku batsamtajum . Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinaun taatnaitag duka tsawantak , nuigtú horash wajukeaig taatnaitja dushakam dekatsjume , — tiuwai .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: “ Apajuí aentsnum inama duka , aents wiyakuch tikich nugkanum wetatak pujus , ni inake aidaun untsuká ikaunman kuichkin tinamkauwa nujai betekmamtinai .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Makichik inaken cinco mil kuichkin susauwai , tikichin dos mil , kampatuma juna mil susauwai . Junak makí makichik dita takamainjin diijus tinamkauwai . Dutika ukuak tikich nugkanum weuwai .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Inak cinco mil kuichkin jukiuk , wajiin sumag sujak nuigtushkam imatiksag cinco mil kuichkin ikaugkauwai .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Tuja dos mil kuichkin jukiushkam , niishkam dutiksag dos mil kuichkin ikaugkauwai .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Untsu inak mil kuichkin jukiuk , nugkan tai yutua idaisauwai ni apuji kuichkijinak .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: “ Kuashat tsawan nagkaemakiu ai , apushkam ni inake batsatbaunum wakitki tauwai . Nunik , wajupak kuichkinash ikaugkaje tusa dekajuawagtatus nagkamau ,

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: nuniai dekatkau cinco mil kuichik susamua nu , nuigtú cinco mil juki ejentun chichajak : ‘ Apuh , cinco mil kuichik sujusmayum nunak juwi itajuajame , nunú kuichkia nuna takamtiksan , nuigtú cinco mil kuichkin ikaugkamua nunashkam itajuajame ’ , tau .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Tama apuji chichajak : ‘ Ayú , amek inak pegkeg , nuigtush chicham uminaitme . Machik susamuitkum imatikam ikaugkaume , yamaik aan kuashat amastajame . Mina jegajuí wayaata , nunikamin iijai dakujusmi . ’

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Tusa inagnaig , tikich dos mil kuichkin jukiuwa nu jegantun chichajak : ‘ Apuh , minak dos mil kuichik sujusmayume nunak juwi itajuajame , juna takamtiksan nuigtú dos mil kuichik ikaugkamua nunashkam itajuajame ’ , tau .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Tama apuji chichajak : ‘ Ayú , amek inak pegkeg , nuigtush chicham uminaitme . Machik susamuitkum , imatikam ikaugkaume , yamaik aan kuashat amastajame . Mina jegajuí wayaata , nunikamin iijai dakujusmi ’ , tiu .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: “ Nuniai tikich mil kuichkin jukiuwa dushakam jegantun chichajak : ‘ Apuh , wika ame waitkagkagtinaitam nuna dekagjame . Amek ajak ame ajakmachbau aig juukam yajumnaitme aminuchu aig ,

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: nunin asamin amina ishamakun kuichkigminak nugká tain yutuan idaisabiajai , dutikamun yamai juwi itajuajame , ju jukita ’ , tau .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Tutai apuji ayaak : ‘ Amek inak pegkegchau , dakitme . Wi ajakmachiatkun juukan yajumin dekajiatkumesh ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: ¿ wagka kuichik kawegti tusa egketainum takau aidau susachmayume ? Dutikauwaitkuminig wi taakun midau kawegkun jumain awajkajai .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Aanú kuichik atankijum , diez mil kuichik aja nu susatajum ,

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: wagki aents kuashat ajamuk nuní dukap suwam atinai , dutikamu asa nuní kuashat ajitnai ; untsu piipich aja duka , nu piipich ajamua duke atantam atinai .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ju inakak atsumnatsui , jukijum agaa suwea awi jiiktajum , nui pujusá buutak daik takegtú pujutnujiya nuanuí ’ , tiuwai .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: “ Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , mina senchigjai nayaimpinmaya aents aidaujai minaknuk , wi ekeemsa inamjatin tsawan wajas abaunum ekeemsatnaitjai .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Nunikmatai mina emtijui , ashí aents nugkanum batsataidauk tuwakagtinai . Imanikagmatai aents uwijá kuitamin , uwigjin chiwujai akanama numamtuk makí makichik akanjatnaitjai ,

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: midau aidaun untsugnum ijumkun , aents pegkegchau aidaunak menanum ijumjatnaitjai .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Dutikan wi Apu asan mina untsujuí ijumjamun chichagkun : ‘ Minitajum atum mina Apag pegkeemtikbau aidautigmek , nunikjum atum pujustinun Apajuí nugkash najannatsaig umikbauwa nui wayaatajum .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Atumek wi yapajakuish ajamjusbaijume , kitabiajai nuniakuish umutaig sujusbaijume , jeenchau wekagaish , atumi jeemin awaintuabiugme .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Nugkumain atsugtakuish atum sujusbaijume ; jaakun tepakuishkam taajum ijagtusbaijume ; achigkagmatai egketaish waitkatasajum tajutbaijume ’ , titinaitjai .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Nuna aatsa tai aents pegkejan takasú aidau : ‘ Apuh , ¿ wajutiya ame yapajú wekaeminish ayujabiajame ? ¿ Wajutiya kitamá wekaeminish umutaish amasbaiji ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ Wajutiya jeenchau wekaeminish iina jeenish awayabiajime , tuja nugkumain atsugtamkuish , wajutiya jaanchish amasbaiji ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ Iish wajutiya ame achinká pujaminish tajuawabiajime ? ¿ Wajutiya ame jaakum tepaminish taawabiaji ? ’ tujuttinaitjume .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Tujutkugmin wi ayaakun : ‘ Dekas tajime : Ju mina yatsug imanchauch ainaigkish wait anenjauwaitjum duka , mina dutijuau ainagme . ’

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: “ Nuna ti menajin ijunun Apu chichajak : ‘ Pegkegchau aidauwah , juwi minai ijuntsuk , jii ajumaish kajinchau iwanch ni aentsjijai egkematin umigkamua nuanuí wetajum .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Atumek wi yapajakuish ajamjuschabiugme , kitamakuish umutaig sujuschabiugme ;

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: jeenchau wekaekuishkam pujumainuk sujuschabiugme ; nugkutai atsumakuish sujuschabiugme , jaaknush tepebiajai , achinkanush pujubiajai , nuniakuish tajutuagmek ijagtuschabiugme ’ , titinai .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Tusa tama dita : ‘ Apuh , ¿ iish wajutiya ame yapagkim , kitaajam , jeenchau , jaanchjinchau wekaekuminish , nuigtú jaakum tepaminish , achinkam egketkuminish pachitskesh idaisabiagme ? ’ tiagtinai .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Tiagtai Apu ayaak : ‘ Dekas tajime : Atum ju aents imanchauch aina jujú wait anenjachuitjum duka , mina dutijuau ainagme ’ , titinai .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Aaja tima nunú aents aidauk suwimak nagkankashtina nui wegagtinai ; untsu aents pegkeg aidauk pujut tuke atina nui wayawagtinai ” , tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Jisus juna chichá chichaakua ashimak ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: — Jimag tsawan asa Pascua atata duka dekagme , nuanuí wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nunak , achijá maatnume tusag sujutkagtatui , — tiuwai .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Tuja nunú tsawantinig sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaushkam , tikich apu aidaujai sumo sacerdote Caifasa jeen agaajin ijunjajui .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Nunikag chichaman umikajui , Jisus tsanumjuja achiká maami tusag .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: — Tujash jista aigkik dutikachagmi , aents aidaujai pampandayamu ai , — tuidau .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Jisus Betanianum Simón lepra achimaku etsagagbau aajakua nuna jeen pujai ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: nuwa tajuauwai kaya alabastro tutai botella najanamunum , kugkuin shiig akik wajaknun takusá , nunik Jisus mesanum eketun jegantun nu kugkuinai buuknum ukatjauwai .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Nunú dutikamun ni jintintaiji aidau wainkag kajekajui , nunikag : — ¿ Wagka wainkash ibaunash ajapeawa ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Dekas aikatsuk shiig akik sujuka ujunauch aidau sumainajama , — tuidau .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Tiagtatman Jisus antuk ditan chichajak : — ¿ Wagka jusha nuwash kajejagme ? Mina jutija junak pegkejan aikae ,

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: ujunauch aidauk tuke atumjai batsamiagtatui , tujash wika atumjaig pujushtatjai .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Ju nuwa mina iyashjuí kugkuinun ukatjuka junak , mina ukugsagmatai jutijuawagtinun jutijawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Dekas tajime : Yamajam chichama juna etsejuinak ashí nugkanum yujainakush , ju nuwa mina jutija junak tuke pachisag chichatin ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Nuna timatai doce aina nuwiya , Judas Iscariote daagtin jiinki sacerdote apuji aidaujai chichastatus weuwai .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Nunik : — ¿ Wají sujumainaitjume , wi Jisusan atumin amaakuish ? — tau . Tutai dita aidau treinta kuichkin susaju .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Dutika akikbau asa , ni yupichu sujumainjin egatu .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Pag levaduragtuchu yutai nagkamak tsawaagmatai , ni jintintaiji aidau Jisusan jegaantag : — ¿ Tuwí umiktatji Pascuatin yuwatnush ? — tusa iniidau .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Yaakat wetajum , nunikjum atum aents wainjum nunú jegajuajum : ‘ Jintinkagtin chichaak : Mina tsawanjuk namputchí wajaschae , nuniau asamtai niina jeen mina jintintaig aidaujai Pascuan jistamatjai tujamae ’ titajum , — tiu .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tiajam Jisusa jintintai aidaushkam ni tibaunak imatiksag , Pascuatin yuwatnunak umikajui .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Kiyagmatai Jisus ni jintintaiji doce aina nujai mesanum jegantá ekeemsau .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Nui yuwamunum Jisus chichaak : — Dekas tajime : Atum ainajum juwiyag makichik minak sujutkattawai , — tau .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Tutai shiig senchi wake besemag dekapjag , makí makichik iniinak : — ¿ Apuh wichaukaitag ? — wajaidau .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Wijai nu platunmag uchutua yuwa nu minak sujutkattawai .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nunak , mina pachittsag agajajua nuna imatiksanuk umiktatjai , tujash ¡ aents mina sujutkatta nuna wait anentajai ! Duka dekas akiinmainchaunas akiinawabiataih , — tau .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Tutai Judas ni sujuktina nu chichaak : — Jintinkagtinuh ¿ wichaukaitag ? — tau . Tutai ni ayaak : — Ame tame duka dekaske , — tiuwai .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Yuwinak pekagbaunum , Jisus pagkan juki Apajin see ti , puuká , ni jintintaiji aidaun suwak : — Ju jukijum yuwatajum , juka mina iyashjua numamtinai .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Nuna ti , copanum vino yajaam ekeemtatman juki , Apajin see tusa jintintaiji aidaun suwak : — Ju copa juwiya ashí atum aidautijum uwagtajum .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Juka mina numpag ukaejamunum kuashat aents tudaujin tsagkugnajag uwemkagtina nuna , mina Apag yamagman anagtamawajua nunú uminkatnun iwainawai .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Dekas tajime : Wika ju uva yumijiya junak yamai nagkamsanuk awenanuk uwagchattajai , atak tsawan uminkui mina Apajú inamtain ataktú atumjai ijunkun uwagtinaitjai .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Nuna timatai kantamtain kantamawag Olivosan mujajin wegajui .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Nunikag nui jegantá Jisus chichaak : — Jujú kashia juwik , ashí atum aidautigmek mina anentaimjuttak kajimatkittagme , agagbauwa nui : ‘ Uwijá kuitamnun mantuawagtinai , dutikawagmatai uwigji aidauk pampagkagtin ainawai ’ tawa nunisag .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Tujash mantuawagmataish ataktú nantakin , atumek wegatsjuminig wiyá emkan Galilea wetatjai — tiuwai .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Ashí tikich aidau kajimatjamainakuish , wika aminak tuke kajimatkishtinaitjame , — tau .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Dekas tajame : Jujú kashia juwik , atash eke shinatsaig kampatuma imania : ‘ Jisusnak wainchaujai ’ tusam uugtuktatme , — tiuwai .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Tamashkam Pedro ayaak : — Amijai apaatuk mantuinakuish , wika nunak tichattajai , — tau . Nuna tutai ashí niina jintintaiji aidauk ditashkam dutiksag tiajui .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Tiagmatai juwakiag Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai ajak ajakbau Getsemaní tutainum jegauwai . Nunik ditan chichajak : — Juwi atumek ekemamatajum , nuniagmin wi awi wenu Apajuin ausatjai .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Tusa wegak Pedron , nuigtú Zebedeo uchijin mai juki wesa , shiig senchi wake besemag dekapeau asa , wake besekú .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Imaniak Jisus : — Senchi wake besemag dekapeakun , ane anentaimkawan jamain dekapeajai , atumek juwi batsamsajum wijai betekak iwá batsamtajum , — tiu .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Tusa ukuak machik kuwaesag tikishmag nugkan nijayin intaa pujus , Apajuin aujak : “ Apawah , nunimainaitkuig tsagkamjukaipa wi waitmainaitag nuwig . Tujash wi wakegamu achati , ame wakegamu atí ” , tiuwai .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Nuna ti ni jintintaiji batsakbaunum wakitkiu , nunik kajigká batsatun wainak Pedron chichajak : — ¿ Atumek wijai betekak makichik horakesh iwamainchauk dekapeajum ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Shintaagjum pujusjum Apajuí ausatajum , iwanch pegkegchau takastinme tusa dekapjamsainum . Wakanik dekaskenmag pegkeja nuna wakegawai , tujash iyashik kakakchau ainawai .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Tusa ukuak ataktú wakitki Apajin aujak : — Apawah , wi waitmainaitag nunú nunikchati tujutmaichakmek , ame wakegamua duke dutikata , — tau .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Nuna tusa ataktú tanta diikmá , ditak kaji senchi mainam kajigkag batsatun wainkauwai .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Nunik diisá ukuak kampatuma juwi wakitki Apajin aujak , ni tibaujinak dutiksag auju .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Nunik ni jintintaiji batsakbaun jegantun : — Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , aents tudaugtin aidaunum sujam atatag duka , yamaik horak jegae , kanakjum ayamjatajum .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Nantagtajum wegagmi , diistajum mina sujutkatin ashí taa mina nu , — tiuwai .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Tusa Jisus eke chichaak wajai , Judas Iscariote doce aina nuwiya , kuashat aentsun espada aidaun , numi aidaunaske takaku aidaujai saasá tajuntauwai . Nunú aidauk sacerdote aidau apuji , nuigtú apu aidau awemamu minidau .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Judas Jisusan sujuktina nu , nunú aents aidaun chichajak : “ Wi kugkuastatag nunú achiktajum , nunak Jisusan dutikattajai ” ,

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: tiu asa Jisusan adijak : — ¡ Jintinkagtinuh pujamek ! — takug kugkuasu .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Kumpajuh , ¿ wagka miname ? — tusa taun kauntuntag Jisusa achikag emetjaju .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Nuna dutikiagtai Jisusa jintintaiji aina nuwiya espadajin ukuini juwakug , dekas sumo sacerdote inake kuwishin asankauwai .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Dutikamtai Jisus chichajak : — Espadajum jukim awajata , ashí aents espadayai maanidauk , espadajai maam agtinai .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Atumek dekatsjumek , wi mina Apajun segamak yamaya juwik doce mil nayaimpinmaya aents aidaun ishitjumaina duka ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Tujash wi mantamnashtaish , ¿ utusag Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa dusha uminkati ? — tiuwai .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Nuna tusa nu aents aidaun chichajak : — ¿ Wagka kasa achiktasa utugtaya imanikjumesh espada , numi aidau takusjum achigkatasagmesh minitjagme ? wi atumin jintinkun kashí kashinig jega Apajuí ememattainum pujuweg nuaduik jutikajum achigchau agmaugme .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Tujash ju jutijajum juka , Apajuí etsegtin chicham tibau agagbauwa nunú uminu asamtai jutijagme . Nuna taig , ashí niina jintintai aidauk pisainak ukukiajui .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Jisusan achikag jukiaju aidauk , Caifás sumo sacerdoteya nuna jeen ejegawaju , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau tikich apu aidaujai ijunag batsatbaunum .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Tuja Pedroshkam ikaag pataetus wejá wejakua , sumo sacerdote jeen agaajin jegantá , niishkam wayaa achijatin aidaujai ekeemsau , wajuk inagnakagtig tusa diistatus .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Sacerdote apuji aidauk , apu chichaman inagdau aidaujai egatuidau , Jisusan tsanumjujag maatnume tusa sujukagtatus .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Tujashkam ejechaju kuashat aents tsanumjuinakush , nuninai inagnamunum jimag aents tsanumjugtin taawaju ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: nunikag : — Ju aents chichaak : ‘ Wika jega Apajuí ememattaiya junak tsaikan , kampatumchik tsawantai ataktú jegamainaitjai timayi ’ , — tuidau .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Tiagtai sumo sacerdote wajakí iniak : — ¿ Wagka machikish aimtsume ? ¿ Nunash wajinbaugmina jusha imatjutpainawa ? — tau .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Tamashkam Jisusak chichaachu , nunitai sumo sacerdote chichajak : — Apajuí tuke pujuwa nuna daajin tajame : Ame dekas Kristu , Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek dekas ujajatkata , — tau .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Nu tama Jisus ayaak : — Ame tujutam duka dekaske , nuigtushkam tajime : Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , Apajuí ashí senchigtina nuna untsujin eketun tsawan uminkamtai , yujagminum pachitkau minamu waitkatnaitjume , — tiuwai .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Nuna tutai sumo sacerdote nugkuagbaujin japikí ichigká chichaak : — ¡ Apajuin pegkegchaun chichagkae ! ¿ Nuigtush ya etsegtukti tusaya atsumaji ? ¡ Yamaik atumshakam Apajuí pegkegchau chichagka nu antukugme !

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ¿ Wajuk diyagme atumesh ? — tau . Tutai dita aiinak : — Dekaske , ayatak mantamnati , — tiajui .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Tiagtai yapinum usukinak awatuidau , nuna dutikainai tikich aidau yapinum ijuinak :

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: — Ame dekas Kristuitkumek dekakia : ¿ Ya ijupime ? — awajuidau .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Juna imatikainai Pedro agaa ekeemtatman , apú inake nuwa jegantun chichajak : — Amesh Jisus Galileanmayaya nujaimpap wekaemume , — tau .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Tusa tama ashí aents antuinamunum : — Wika dekatsjai ame tame nunak , — tiuwai .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak waitinum wetatman , tikich nuwa wainak aents nui ijunun ujaak : — Jushakam Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nujai wekaenuwejama , — tusa etsegtau .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Tujash Pedrok ataktushkam uwaak Apajuin adayas : — ¡ Wika au aentsnak wainchaujai ! — tau .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Machik asag aents nui batsatu Pedron jegaantag : — Dekas ameshkam auna jintintaijiyaitme , chichamjuminchakam dekanme , — tuidau .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Tama Jisusan pachis pegkegchaun chichajak , Apajuin adayas : — ¡ Wika au aentsnak wainchaujai ! — tau . Taig atash shinukuí .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Nunitai Pedroshkam Jisus chichajak : “ Atash eke shinatsaig kampatumá ugtuktinaitme ” tibauwa nuna adeaju , nunik senchi wake besemag dekapeg kajegmamak jiinki buutiuwai .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Tsawagmatai , ashí sacerdote apuji aidau chichaman inagnau aidaujai , Jisusak dekas mantamnati tusag shiig chichaman umigkajui .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Dutikawag jigkajá jukiag , Romanmaya apu Poncio Pilato pujamunum ejegawajui .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Judas Jisusan sujukua nunú , Jisusan dekas maawagtatus imatikiagtai , awake anentaimag sacerdote apuji aidaun tikich apu aina nujai treinta kuichkin awagtak :

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: — Wika tudau takasjai , aents pegkejam aig maatajum tusa sujuku asan , — tau . Tama dita aiinak : — ¿ Iish dusha utugkatjiki ? Duka aminuajama , — tiaju .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Tiagtai Judas kuichkin nagkimá , jega Apajuí ememattainum ukuak , we kajemjauwai .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Dutikamtai sacerdote apuji aidau kuichkin jukiag : — Ju kuichkia juka anentag Apajuinu atí tusa chimpitia nuwig egkemaitsui , aents mantamnati tusa akikmatkamu asamtai , — tuidau .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Tusag chichasag nunú kuichkia duwik , nugka ichinak najanku batsamtain sumakajui , aents tikich nugkanmaya jaidaun ukustinun .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Yamaya juwikishkam duka nugka numpeagbau tutayai .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Nuna pachis Apajuí etsegtin Jeremías agak : “ Jukiaje treinta kuichkin Israel aents aidau imaan akik atí tibaun ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: dutikawag sumakaje nugka ichinak najanku batsamtain , Apu dutikawagtinai tujutiuwa dutiksajag ” , tibauwa nu nuní uminkauwai .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Jisusan jukiag ejega apú emtin awajsaju , dutikawagmatai Pilato : — ¿ Amekaitam judío aidau apujim ? — tau . Tama Jisus ayaak : — Ame tujutam duka dekaske , — tau .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaujai tsanumjuinamash , Jisusak aimkag chichakchauwai .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Nunitai Pilato chichajak : — ¿ Amina kuashat imatjutpaina duka antatsmek ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Tamashkam Jisusak makichik chichamnakesh aikchau . Nunitai apuk anentai jegagchau .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Tuja apuk jistatinig aents achikbau aina nuwiyan makichik jiisagké au , aents aidau nu jinkiti tusa mamikiamua nuna .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Nuniamunum Barrabás daagtinchakam shiig pegkegchau achikam egketu .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Aents aidau nui ijuntatman Pilato iniak : — ¿ Yana jiiktí tusagmea wakegagme , Barrabasnak jiiktatag atsa , Jisus , Kristu daagtina nuna jiiktí tajumek ? — tau .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Nunak tuke aneas kajejuinak maatnume tusa sujukajun dekau asa , tiuwai .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Nuna tusa Pilatok chicham epegkatasa ekeemtaijin eketai , niina nuwe aentsun awetak : “ Amek aanú aents pegkegma duka niimjusaipa . Wi ishamainun kajamjamjai yamai , aanú imatikamunum ” , tiu .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Tujash sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaujai , aents tuwaká ijunun : “ Dekas Barrabás jinkiti , nunitai Jisus mantamnati titajum ” , tusa akatjajui .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Tiagtai Pilato ditan iniak : — ¿ Ju aents jimaja juiyanash , yana dekas jiiktí tusagmea wakegagme ? — tau . Tutai dita aiinak : — Barrabás jinkiti , — tuidau .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Tiagtai Pilato ditan iniak : — ¿ Tujash Jisus , Kristu daagtina junash utugkatjaki ? — tau . Tutai ashí pampanjag : — ¡ Anka achinjati ! — wajaidau .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Tiagtai apu ayaak : — ¿ Tujash jusha wají pegkegchauna takase ? — tau . Tutaishkam nuní senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Anka achinjati ! — wajaidau .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Tusag machikish itattsuk nuní senchi pampaidiagtai , Pilatok : — Yumi utugtitajum , — tima itaamtai , ditá eemtin ikigmaju , nuniak : — Wika ju aentsnumag shiig agkantaitjai , juka atumdauwai , — tiu .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Nunitai ashí aents pampanjag : — Jutiiní , tuja ashí ii uchijí aidaunum ju aents mantamnamuk juwakti , — tiaju .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Tiagtai Barrabasan jiikiu , dutikak Jisusnak asutia achigtinme tusa sujukui .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Dutikamtai apú suntaji aidau Jisusan jukiag apú pujusá inamtaijin ejegawagmatai , ashí suntag ijuntujaju ni wajamunum .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Nunikag jaanchin awitkag tikich jaanch yamakaitkaun anugjaju .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Dutiksag atsejutain jagkin najatuawag atsemitkakag , numin untsujin achimtikag , niina emtin tikishmatjag dushikinak : — ¡ Juuwai judío Apujig ! — awajuidau .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Imatjuinak usukidau , dutikainak numi atakuamujin jujukiag buuknum awatuidau .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Dutikainak dushí dushikinakua jaanch yamakaitkau anugjamunak awituk , ni nugkutaijinak anugjag juki emajui achijag maawagtatus .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Jinkamag yaakat Cirenenmaya Simón daagtinun wainkag , Jisus achigtin numi yapajia achiamun yanaktí tusag , susajui .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Nunikag Gólgota tutainum jegantajui . ( “ Gólgota ” tawa duka , “ buuk sakajua nunin ” taku tawai . )

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Nui ejentag , Jisusan vino chujuau dupa yapaujai pachimjamun uwagti tusag susajui . Nu susam apas dekapes idaisauwai .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Jisusan achijagmatai , suntag aidau jaanchjin jukiag : Yana kayajig jinkit , nu jaanchnak jukiti tusag , wasugkamaidau . Nuní uminkauwai Apajuí etsegtin chichaak : “ Mina jaanchjunak akandaikag jukiaje , kayají jintukbau aidau ” timawa nunú .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Nunikag pekaamsag dii batsamtuidau .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Tuja wajuk asamtaiya achijaje nuna pachisag chaiken : “ Juuwai Jisus , judío aidau apuji ” , tusa agatug anujtukajui .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Dutiksag jimag magkagtinun Jisusjai achijag , tikichia nuna untsugnum awajainak , tikichia nunak menajinini awajawajui .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Aents aidau duke ayaumas nagkaemainak , buukenak pegajag pegkegchau chichajuinak :

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: — Ame : Jega Apajuí ememattaiya nunak yumpuan kampatumchik tsawantaik ataktú jegamainaitjai , tinum nunú dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek , aaní nematsuk akaikim uwemjakia — awajuidau .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Dutiksag sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , Fariseo aidau , nuigtú tikich apu aidaujai ijunag dushikinak :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: — Tikichnak yajau uwemtikchauwe nuninaitak nigka uwemtsui . Dekas Israel aidaun apujiyaitkug , akaiki wajanmatai dekaskeapi tumainajama .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Apajuin kajinas anentaimtime , ni wakegakug yamai ayamjukti , wagki : Wika Apajuí Uchijiyaitjai tinuwe nuna dekas wainak tuchauwaitkug , — wajaidau .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Nunisag magkagtin achijam Jisusjai detaidaushkam pegkegchau chichajuidau .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Etsa tutupit wajasú ai nagkamas ashí nugkanum suwe wajas , etsa dukap tegau aishkam imanisag asauwai .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Imanik abaunum Jisus senchi untsumak : “ Elí , Elí , ¿ lama sabactani ? ” tiu . ( Nunak : “ Mina Apajuijuh , mina Apajuijuh , ¿ wagka minash idaitusume ? ” taku tiuwai . )

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Aents nui ijunaidauk nuna antukag : — Eliasan untsuawai , — tuidau .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Tusa taig , ijuna nuwiya makichik tupikaki esponja juki vino chujuaunum ajugká tagkanai aapi Jisusan uwagti tusa iwagkau .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Dutiktai tikich aidau chichainak : — Idaisakia , Elías uwemtijatatus minishtimpash , wainkami , — tuidau .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Tujash Jisusak ataktú senchi untsumak , jakauwai .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Nunikmatai jega Apajuí ememattainum jaanch ejaamuk , yakiin nagkamnas ichiinak jimaituk kanakuí . Nugkashkam senchi ugkauwai , imaniau asamtai kaya aidaushkam punjauwai .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Imanikmatai ukumatai aidauk ujaniajui , tuja Apajuí nemajin jinawaju aidauk kuashat nantajajui .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Ditak ukusbaunmaya jinjajui Jisusá nantakiu ai , nunikag Jerusalén utsanawajui , nunikun kuashat aents wainkajui .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Tuja capitán , tikich niijai ijunas Jisusan diyak ijunaidauk , ugbau imanikmatai , nuigtú kuashat ishamain nagkaemajun wainkag , senchi ishamkag chichainak : — Dekaskenum juka Apajuí Uchijiyai , — tuidau .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Nui nuwa aidaushkam ikaa ijunas dii ijuntuidau , Jisusan Galileanum nagkamsag saetusag yaijakú aina nunú .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Nuanuí María Magdalanmaya , tikich María Jacobo dukují Josenashkam dukujiya nu , nuigtú Zebedeo nuwe aatus wajaidau .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Kintamai Arimateanmaya José daagtin wiyakuch , niishkam Jisusa jintintaiji asa tauwai .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Nunik Pilatun wejí , Jisusa iyashin segauwai . Tama Pilatushkam : — Jisusa iyashí susatajum , — tiuwai .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: José Jisusa iyashin juki , sábana yamagmai pempeag ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: ni ukumasmig tusa kaya muun yamá tai umikbaunum egkea , kaya muuntan akagketuk waajin epeti ukuak weuwai .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Tuja María Magdalanmaya tikich María aatus , Jisus ukusbaunum jegantag eketaidau .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Ayamtai tsawaju asamtai sacerdote apuji aidau , fariseo aidaujai Pilato jeen jegajuawag :

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: — Apuh , adeagji wait aaya nunú , iwaaku pujus chichaak : ‘ Wika jakanush kampatumchik tsawantaik nantaktinaitjai ’ , tuuyi .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Nuniau asamtai , awemata aents ukusbauwa nuna kampatum tsawantai kuitamkatin , dutikashmak niina jintintaiji aidau kashi kautuawag iyashin jukiag , aents aidaun ujainak : ‘ Jakabia duka nantakne ’ , tiagtatui . Nuna dita aatus tuinakug yama nagkamchaku waitjuamun nagkaesau waitjuawagtatui , — tuidau .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Tusa tiagtai Pilato ayaak : — Anuwai suntag kuitamain aidauk , atum wejum wajuk wakegagme dutiksagmek umiktajum , — tau .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Timatai wegag Jisus ukusbau kaya aputukbaunak shiig asakug , nui suntag kuitamkatin aidaunashkam batsatkiajui .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Tsawan ayamtai nagkaemaki tumig tsawagmatai , María Magdalanmaya , tikich Maríajai Jisus ukusbaun diisagtasag wegaju .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Nuniamunum Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya akaetai senchi ugkauwai , nunik Jisus ukusbau kaya aputuka ukukbaunak ekek nui ni ekeemsauwai .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Nuna niimeg peemjai betek , jaanchjish puju nieve tutaya iman aajakuí .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Imanun wainkag Jisus ukusbaun suntag kuitamak batsatuk ishamkag jaka kakekajui .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Nunikaju ai , Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya nuwa aidaun chichajak : — Ishamkaigpajum , wika dekajai atum Jisusan achijag maawagma nunú egajum nunak .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Tujash juwig atsawai , nigka nantakne ni timaya nunisag . Juwi tantajum Apú ukusagma nunú diistajum .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Nunikjum waamak wejum : Jakama duka nantakne , tusajum niina jintintaiji aidau ujaktajum . Nigka ditak wenatsaig , niiyá eemak Galilea wetatui , awi wainkagtatui . Juna atumin tita tajime , — tiuwai .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Nu tima nuwa aidaushkam Jisus ukusbaunum jegantajuk ukuinak , ishamainayatak shiig aneasag nunú chichaman Jisusa jintintai aidaun ujakagtatus tupikaidau . Nunikag eke Jisusa jintintaiji aidaun ujaktagtus weenai ,

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Jisus wantintuk kumpamak : “ ¡ Atumkaitjum ! ” tau . Tama nuwa aidaushkam , Jisusan jegantag dawenum pagkukag emematuidau .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Dutikam ni chichajak : — Ishamkaigpajum , wejum mina yatsug aidau ujaktajum Galilea minitnume , awi minak waitkagtatui , — tiuwai .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Nunikag nuwa aidauk weenai , ujumak suntag nuna kuitamaidau yaaktanum wegag , sacerdote apuji aidaun dita wainkamunak ashí ujakaju .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Tusá ujakam wegag apu aidaujai ijunjag chichaman shiig umikaju . Nunikag kuashat kuichkin suntajan susaju .

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: Dutikainak : — Atumek aajajum etsegkatajum : ‘ Jutii kajigká batsatjin ni jintintai aidau kashi kautuawag Jisusa iyashinak jukiagmae titajum . ’

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Tuja apu dekaamtaishkam jutii tiagtatji , dutikaku atumek ayamjuktatjime , — tiaju .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Tiajam ditashkam kuichkin jukiag , dita titajum tusa akatjamunak imatiksag tuidau . Jujú tibauwa nunak yamaikishkam judío aidauk dutiksag tinu ainawai .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Tuja Jisusa jintintaiji once aina duka Galilea wegajui , Jisus nunú mujanum minitnume tibaunum .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Nunikag Jisusan wainkag emematuidau , tujash dita utujimushkam asaju .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Nuniagtai Jisus ditan jegantun chichajak : — Minak , mina Apag : ‘ Ashí nayaimpinmaya aidau , ashí nugkanmaya aidaush ame diistá ’ tusa idaitugsae ,

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: nuniau asamtai wetajum ashí nugkanum , nunikjum tikich aidaush jintintuatajum , dutikakjum mina Apajú daajin , mina pachittsajum , Wakaní Pegkeji pachisjumshakam yamigtajum ,

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: dutikakjum ashí ju umiktajum , atumin tiuwaitjim dushakam jintintuatajum . Wika ashí tsawantai , nugka nagkanbau atina duwish atumjaig tuke pujutnaitjai . Aatus atí .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Jisukristu Apajuí uchijiya nu yamajam chicham etsegbauk juní nagkamnauwai .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Nuna pachis Apajuí etsegtin Isaías agak : “ Wi mina chichamjun etsegnun emtikan awemajai , ni jintanak umigtamkati tusan .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Makichik aents eemak taa uwegshunum wekagas senchi jiiká chichaak : ‘ Apu wekaesatnun jintan shiig iwajug , esegak tutupit dakuegajama numamtuk , atumi anentaimish shiig iwajajum umiktajum , Apu minitin asamtai ’ , titinai ” tawa duka juuwai .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Ju aatsa tibau asamtai Juagshakam uwegshunum aentsun yamiau , nuniak etseju , tudau takatan idayinak yamimag tsagkugnagtinme tusa .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Nuna antukag ashí yaakat Judea nugkanmaya aidauk , ashí Jerusalegnumia aidaushkam kautuidau . Nunikag ditá tudaujin etsegtumagtai Juagshakam Jordagnum yamiau .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juagkak camello uje najanamun nugkujakuí , akachumtaijish duwap aajakuí , manchin dapá yumijijai yuujakuí .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Juan aents aidaun chichajak : “ Mina ukujui minittawai dekas mina nagkaetasu senchigtin . Wika nuna sapatjinakesh pujugsanuk ukuitmaitsujai niiya imanchau asan .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Wika ayatak yumiik yamiajime , tujash nigka Wakaní Pegkejiya duwi yamigmagtatjume ” , tau .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Nunú tsawantai yaakat Nazaret Galilea nugkanum awa nuwiya Jisus jiinki , Juan pujamunum jegauwai , nunikmatai namak Jordagnum yamijuí .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Dutika yamijam jinkamá Jisus wainkauwai nayaim ujantatman , nuniamunum Wakaní Pegkeji pauma nunin niina mamikis akagunashkam .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Nuniai nayaimpinmaya chicham antuekau : “ Ametme dekas mina uchig aneetaigmek , duwi aminig shiig aneajai ” tabau .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Juna timatai Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtug uwegshunum emauwai .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Nui Jisus cuarenta tsawan pujuttaman iwanch tsanujá pegkegchau takamtiksata tiuwai , nuigtushkam kuntin kajen aidau batsatbaunum Jisusak pujau . Dutikamtai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya kautuawajui kuitamkagtatus .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Juagkan achikag egkeawaju ai , Jisus Galilea yamajam chicham Apajuí inabaujin pachis etse etsegkawa weuwai .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Nuniak : “ Apajuí aentsnum inamjatta duka tsawantak namput wajaschae . Tudaujum idaisatajum nuniakjum yamajam chichama ju dekaskeapi titajum ” , tiuwai .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jisus Galilea kuchají yantamen wekaekamá Simogkan , ni yachi Andresjai namakan main asag retan ajuntuinak yujattaman wainkau ,

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: nunik : — Wegajai wi jintintuatjime , namak maatasajum yujagjum anmamtuk , Apajuí chichame etsegkujum aents aidau minai ikautjin atajum tusan , — tau .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tusa tamawaik wamkes ditá retjinak ukuinak niijai wegajui .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Nuwi nagkaemaki imachik kuwaesag wekamá , Zebedeo uchijí Jacobo ni yachi Juagjai , botejin chimpimas retjin apijuinak chimpimtatman wainkauwai .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Dutika nunashkam : — Wegajai , mina jintintaig atajum , — tiu . Tama ditashkam apají Zebedeonak , ditajai takau aidaunak botenum ukuinak Jisusjai wegajui .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Nunikag yaakat Capernaumnum jegawaju . Nunik tsawan ayamtai tsawagmatai Jisus jega ijuntainum wayaa jintinkagtau .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Nigka jintinkagtuauwai aents chichame antugtai aidaun nagkaesau , chicham umiktin aidaun jintinkagtin aidaujaishkam betekchaun .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Nuniamunum nunú jega ijuntaiya nui , makichik aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu eketu senchi untsumak :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: — ¡ Jisus Nazaretnumiayah ! ¿ Wagka amesh jutii pujamunmash miname , ijijatuatasamek minam ? Wika dekagme amek dekas pegkegmaitme , Apajuinmaya midau asam , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Tama Jisus wakan pegkegchaun ayaak : — ¡ Takamtak itatkata , jinkim wegakum aanú aentsuk ukuktá ! — tiu .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Tusa tamawaik aentsun waugmitkak nugká ajiajui , dutika shiig senchi untsumak jinki wegak ukukiuwai .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Nunikmatai wainkag puyatkaju . Nunikag ditak pempeentunikiag : — ¿ Jusha yaita ? ¿ Jintiamujish yamagmajama , wajuku asaya chichamesh senchigtinaita wakan pegkegchaunash chichamenig jiyá dusha ? — tudayinau .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Nunú nunikbaunak ashí Galileanmaya aidauk dekaawajui .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Nunik jega ijuntainmaya jinki Jacobo , Juan aatus , Simón Pedro , yachi Andresjai pujutain wegajui .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Simón Pedro tsatsajig tsuweak pegajin tepau , nuniau asamtai Jisusan : — Tsuweak tepawai , — tusag ujakaju .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam jegantun uwegnum achik inankiu , dutikamuik tsuweamunak megkaekau . Nunik nantakí yujumkan inajuk , Jisusan ajamsau niijai yujau aidaunashkam .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Etsa akaiki kiyaju ai , kuashat aents jau aidaun , wakan pegkegchau aidau egkemtuamu aidaunashkam Jisusan ikautkaju .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Tuja aents aidau nui batsatushkam ashí waitinmag tuwakaju .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus kuashat aents tikich jatai jau aidaun etsagakui , wakan pegkegchau aidaunashkam imatiksag aentsnumian jiijuí . Wakan pegkegchau aidauk Jisusnak shiig wainu , dutikamu asa chichaktí tusag idaichau .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Nunik tsawak eke suwe aig nantakí , yaaktan ukukí atushat aents atsamunum weu Apajin ausatatus .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Nunikmatai Simón ni kumpají aidaujai egaak wegajui ;

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: nunik Jisusan wainkag : — Ashí aents egapainawai , — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Tusa tama ni chichaak : — Wemí yaakat tikiju anem aina nui , awishkam chichaman etsegkatjai , — tau .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Nunik Jisusak ashí Galileanum makí makichik yaaktanum jega ijuntai aidaunum wayaa chichagkagtú wekagu , nuniak wakan pegkegchau aidaunashkam jiijá ishimu .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Imaní wekagai aents jata lepra tutai achikbau Jisusan jegantun tikishmatug pujujus : — Wakegakmek etsaentumainaitme , — tau .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam wait anentug uwejen antiak : — Wakegajai , yamaik tsagagta , — tiuwai .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Tusa chichaká ashimaig leprak megkaekauwai , nunik ashí iyashinig pegkeg wajasuí .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus shiig akateg ukuak :

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: — Makichik aentskesh ujakaipa , tutupit sacerdote pujamunum jegaata , nuniakum ame tsagaja pegkeg webaujum iwainmamkum , Moisés tibauwa dutiksamek jukim ejegata , ditash waipakag dekaskeap tsagaje tujabiagtinme , — tiuwai .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Tusa tibauwaitak , wegak ni tsagagbaujin pachis ashí aents aidaun ujá ujakua weuwai . Nuna imatika etsejau asamtai , Jisusak wantinak yaaktanmash waimainchau wajasú asa , uwegshunum wekagu . Nuniaig kuashat aents aidau niina wainkagtatus minituidau .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Nuna dutika wajumchik tsawan pujus Jisus wakitki Capernaum jegauwai ; nunikmatai ni pujamujin dekajuawaju .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Nunikag kuashat aents aidauk jeganmag pimuidiaju , waitinum nagkamnasag tikichish wayachmin awajsaju . Imanikagmatai niishkam Apajuí chichamen etseju .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Nuniai cuatro aents aidau , aents wekaechaun jukiag itawaju .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Dutikawag aents piyaku asamtai , Jisus wajamunum jegamainchau asag , Jisus wajamunum mamikis jegá tuntupen wakag chigkaidiag , wekaechauwa nuna tepetaijin aepsag akakiaju .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Dutikamtai Jisus niiní kajinas anentaimaidaun wainu asa , wekaechaun chichajak : — Uchijuh , amina tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje , — tau .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Nuna tutai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau nui pekajaidau ditak anentaimsag :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ ¿ Wagka jusha tuush chichawa ? ¡ Apajuin pegkegchau chichajak tu wekagajama ! Imá Apajuikeajama tudaun tsagkugkagtumainuk ” , tuidau .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Dita aatus anentaimainamujinak Jisus dekau asa : — ¿ Wagka aannush anentaimainagme ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Tuwaita imá yupichuch wekaechauwa ju tumainush , amina tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje taja dukaih , atsa nantakim tepetaijum jukim wetá tumainaitag dukaih ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinau asan , ju nugka juwish tudau aidaunash tsagkugkagtumainaitag nu dekaatajum . Tusa wekaechaun chichajak :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: — Amina tajame , nantakim ainká tepetaijum jukim jeemin wakitkita , — tiuwai .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Tama nantakug ainká tepetaijin juki ashí wainainamunum jinkiu . Nunikmatai puyatjukag Apajuin emematuinak : — Juna jutikauk duwikish tuke wainkachuitji , — tuidau .
