text2: Nunikag yaakat Capernaum jegawajui , nui jegá wayaa batsatbaunum Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun : ¿ Jintaa minisjumesh wají chichamjimugme ? tau .

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Tujash ditak chichainachu , jintaa minisag ditak pempeentunikiag , yaki imá wagaakush atinaita tudayaju asag .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Nuniagtai ekeemas , ni jintintaiji doce aina nuna untsuká ikaunman : Ni eme anentai atatus wakegauk , tikichi takajin nuigtú imanchauch amainai .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Nuna ti uchin ejapeen awajus midaaki juki chichaak :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: Aents mina nemagtuidau ju uchia jumamtin aina juna , shiig anentus juwidauk minashkam mina Apagnashkam aikasag juwinawai .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Tutai Juan : — Jintinkagtinuh , aents wainkamji amina daagmin wakan pegkegchaun jiyau , tujash jutiijai minitan dakitakui amek aikawaipa timaji , — tau .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Amek aikawaipa tusagmek tiigpajum . Makichik aentskesh mina daajui wainchatain iwainayatkug , pempeentugsagkek pegkegchaunak chichagtumaitsui .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Jutiin shiwagmatjamtsu duka , jutiinu asa nuniawai .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Tuja makichik aentskesh atum mina nemagtin asagmin , yumin uwagta tusa amasú aidauk , dita wají shiig pegkeg jukitnujig ajiagtinai .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: “ Mina dekaskeapi tusag nemagtuidau ju uchi piipichia jumamtin aidaun makichkikesh pegkegchaun takamtikaidauk , dekas kaya muun dekeetai aina iman jukí kuntugnum jigká detuais nayants ajugká ajapmain ainatai .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Amina uwejum tudaun takamtijamkuig , tsupika ajapmaina numamtuk wajaktá tudau takat idaikum . Dekas pegkejai tudau idaisau asá , pujut tuke atina nui makichik uwegtin waimaina numamtuk wajamuk , jimá uwegtin asá suwimak juwaku jii ajumaish kajinchau ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: akash jinuchu aina nui ajapeam amaina nu .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Amina dawem tudaun takamtijamkuig , tsupika ajapmaina numamtuk wajaktá tudau takat idaikum . Dekas pegkejai tudau idaisau asá , pujut tuke atina nui shutusá waimaina numamtuk wajamuk , jimá dawentin asá suwimak juwaku jii ajumaish kajinchau ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: akash jinuchu aina nui ajapeam amaina nu .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Amina jiim tudaun takamtijamkuish , ukuinkam ajapmaina numamtuk wajaktá tudau idaikum . Dekas pegkejai tudau idaisau asam , Apajuí inamtaijin makichik jiiyaik niimsá waimainaitam numamtuk wajamuk , jimá jiintin asam ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: akash jinuchu , jiish ajumaish kajinkashtina nui ajapeam amainaitam nu .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: “ Ashí nunú aidauk weegai kachikbau kakajus kautsama numamtuk , dita takasbaujijai jiinum batsatkush tuke jakachagtin ainawai .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Week dekas pegkejai , tujash jea jeatuji megkagak sakam wajasmataish , ¿ itugsaya ataktush jea jeatush emamainaita ? Dekas atumin weega anmamtinun Apajuí pujutan amasbau ajutjamainai . Nunikmatai tikich aidaujaish shiig anendaisajum agkan batsamainaitjume . ”

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Jisus Capernaumnumia jiinki Judea nugkanum jegaa , Jordagka amain katigkú . Nunikmatai aents aidau tuwagkajam ataktú ni jintinkagtutaijinak dutiksag jintinkagtau .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Nuniai fariseo aidau pegkegchaunum dekapsatasag jegaantag iniasaju , nuwennush nuwenash idaimainashit tusag .

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Tuinam Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Moisesash atumnash wajukatajum tujabiajuita ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : — Moisesak papí idaidaiku najantai umikjum nuwemek idaimainaitjume , tujabiuwai .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Juna dutikatajum Moisés tujabiajua nunak atum chicham umitnumash katsujam asagmin tujabiajui .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Tujash yama nagkamchakug Apajuik aishmagkun nuwajai najanauwai .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Dutikamu asag aishmag nuwenkug apajin , dukujin ukuak niina nuwejaig pujumainai ,

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: nunikag makichik iyash wemainai . Nunin asag jimaja nuninchauwai makichkia numamtinai .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Nunin asamtai Apajuí nuweamua nunak makichik aentskesh idaimitkamain ainatsui .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Tusa ukukmatai Jisusa jintintaiji aidau jegá jegawag , nuna pachis iniidau .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Tusá iniam : — Makichik aentskesh nuwen idayas tikich nuwajai nuwenkug , jeteken ekajeak nunimainai ,

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: nunisag nuwashkam aishin idayas tikich aentsnum nemakug , aishin ekajeak nunimainai , — tiuwai .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Juna ashí tusa inagnai , uchi aidaun Jisus uwejen antinjukti tusag ikautkajui . Imatikiagtai ni jintintaiji aidau , uchin ikaunmaina nuna jiyaidau .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Dutikiagtatman Jisus wainak kajek chichajak : — Tutsuk idaisatajum , uchi aidauk minai kauntatnume utugkajum awagkigpajum . Jujú uchi anentaimaina jumamtin aidaunum Apajuik inamjata tawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Dekas tajime : Aents aidau uchi mina anentaimjutuina imanis anentaimjutuinachuk Apajuí inamak amain ainatsui .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Jisus nuna tusa makí makichik uchin midaaki juki , uwejen achiak : — Apajuí yaimpaktinme , — tiuwai .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Nuna dutika Jisus jinki jintá wetatman makichik aishmag tupi tupikakua amainag tikishmatug pujus iniak : — Jintinkagtin pegkejah , ¿ wajina dutikmainaitja pujut tuke atina nuna jukitasanush ? — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wagka pegkejá tujutme ? Makichkish pegkejak atsawai , imá makichik Apajuiya duke pegkejak .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Amek dekame chicham umiktin agagbaunum : ‘ Tsanijinawaipa , magkagtuawaipa , kasamkaipa , wainkamek tsanumkagtujaipa , wainkam tsanumjam tikichdau jukipa , amina apa dukujai eme anentsam diyaakum yaigtá ’ , tusa tawa nunú .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Jintinkagtinuh , wika nunak uchuch nagkamsanuk ashí umikuitjai , — tiuwai .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Tutai Jisus wait anenmain diis chichajak : — Makichik umimain ajutjame : Wetá nunikam ashí amina ajutjamaina duka sujukam ujunauch aina nu susata . Nu dutikawamin nayaimpinum wajigmik ajutjamtinai . Nu dutika ukuakum waitiakmesh atsanjam nemagtukta , — tiuwai .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Nu tama antuk , nunimainchau dekapeg wake beseká weuwai , shiig wiyakuch asa .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus nui ijunun ayampá ashí diis ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Wiyakuch aidauk Apajuí minai inamjati tusag kakajus idaimamainchau ainawai .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Nuna tutai jintintaiji aidauk puyatkag ijuntsaju . Nunikagmatai Jisus ataktú chichaak : — Uchig aidauh , aents aidau niina wajiijin imá senchi puyatjuidauk , kakajus Apajuí inamak amain ainatsui .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Camellok aujá jiinish waigká nagkaemamainai . Tujash wiyakuch aidauk Apajuí minai inamjati tusag kakajus idaimamainchau ainawai .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Nuna tutai antukag nuní nagkaemas puyatkag : — ¿ Yaki tujash uwemjaush amainaita ? — tusag ditak iniinidau .

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan diis chichajak : — Aents diismak juka utugchatai machikish dutikmaitsui , tujash Apajuiyaig annuchui , nigka ashí dutikmainchaunash dutikmainai .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Jutii aidautik ashí iina ajutjamaidauk ukuinaku nemagkamiajime .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Ashí aents mina nemagtuinak yamajam chichama nunakesh etsejak , jeen , yachin , umayin , apajin , dukujin , nuwen , uchijí aidaun , nugke aidaunash ukukiu aidauk ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: yamaik ju nugka juwig pujusag , ciegka imania jukiagtinai : Jee aidau , yachi aidau , umayí aidau , dukují aidau , uchijí aidau , nuigtú nugke aidaujaí ukukbauwa nuna nagkagas . Waittsajash atak atina duwi pujut tuke atina nui pujusagtin ainawai .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Tujash kuashat aents dekatkau atatus wakegaina nu ukunum juwakagtinai . Untsu iman atan anentaimtumachu aina nu dekatkauk agtinai .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Jerusalén jegawagtatus weedau . Nuniamunum Jisus eemak wegai ni jintintaiji aidauk ishamainak puyatkiag weedau . Nuniagtai ataktú niina jintintaiji doce aina nuna yajuak akankiag , wajuk dutikawagtatua nuna pachis ujaidau .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: “ Yamai Jerusalén jegattag duwi , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak achigkag sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaunum ejetuawagtatui . Dutijuawagmatai dita jujukiag judiuchu aidaunum dita maatnume tusag sujutkagtatui .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Dutijuawagmatai pegkegchaun chichagtuinak dushí dushiktuinakuag , asututan asutu , usuktutnash usuktu awa awajtuinakua mantuawagtatui , tujash dutijuawagmataish kampatum tsawanta juwi ataktú nantaktatjai ” , tau .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Nuna timatai , Zebedeo uchijí aidau Jacobo Juagjai , Jisusan jegaantag : — Jintinkagtinuh , ii segattajam nunak dutiksag umigkagtukti tusa wakegaji , — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Tusa tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wajina dutijuati tusagmea wakegagme ? — tau .

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Tutai dita chichainak : — Wakegaji amina inamtaigmin , jutii jimajaitag nunuti makichik amina untsugmin ekenkum , tikich menagmin ekejattsatin atá tusaja .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Atumek mina segatjum duka dekatsjume . ¿ Atumesh mina waitkajus mantuawagtata dusha imanisjumkek waitmainaitjum ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Tuinam dita chichainak : — Ehé , iishkam duka waitmainaitji , — tuidau . Tiagtai Jisus ditan chichajak : — Dekas tajime : Wi waittsan jakattag imanisjumek waittsatin ainagme ,

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: tujash mina untsujuí , tikich mina menajuí ekeemsatin atajum tusanuk tumaitsujime . Nunak mina Apag ya aidau ekeemsatnujinak umigkauwaita nuna ekentsagtinai .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Nunú tabaun diez aina nu antukag , Juagkan Jacobojai senchi kajegkajui .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Nuniagtai Jisus ditan untsuká : — Atumek shiig dekagme , tikich nugka aina nuna apuji aidau judiuchu aina duka , aentsnak ditanua nunin emak inainawai . Untsu nunú apu aina nuna aentsji aidau , aents aina nuna dita wakegamun inau ainawai .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Tujash atumek aajagmek dutikdaimain ainatsjume . Nunitsuk atum ainajum anuiyatijum eme anentai atasajum wakegautigmek tikich aina nu takajin amainaitjume .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Atum ainajum anuiya eme anentai atatus wakegauk , ashí tikich aidaun inake amainai .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Wagki wi dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , atum aidautijum mina takagtustinme tusanuk taachuitjai , wi dekas atumin takagkun mantamnan kuashat aents aidau pujutin uwemtijata tusan taamjai , — tiuwai .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Nuna tusa Jericó jegawajui . Nuwiya jiinki Jisus niina jintintaiji aidaujai , nuigtú shiig kuashat aents ashinai , aents wainmachu Bartimeo daagtin Timeo uchijí jintá yantam ekeemas , aents nagkaemagtai kuichik sujustajum tusa sumá eketu .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: “ Jisus Nazaretnumia nagkaemawai ” , tabaun antuk , untsumtan nagkamau . Nuniak : — ¡ Jisusah David wegantu uchijiyah minash wait anenjugta ! — wajau .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Imattai kuashat aents aidau jiyaidau itatkati tusag . Tusá jiyamash nigka nuní senchi untsumak : — ¡ David wegantu uchijiyah , minash wait anenjugta ! — wajau .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Imattai Jisuschakam nui wajan : — Untsuktajum juwi tantati , — tiu . Timatai wainmachun untsuinak : — Yamaik untsugmawai kajintsam tantata , — tuidau .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Tama niishkam pataká nugkuagbaunak awik nugká aepeak , tseke wajakí Jisus wajamunum jegantuí .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus iniak : — ¿ Minash utugtukti tusamea wakegame ? — tau . Tama wainmachu ayaak : — Jintinkagtinuh wika wainmaktasan wakegajai , — tiu .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Tutai Jisus : — Yamaik wetá , amek kajintsá anentaimam duwi tsagajume , — tiu . Tusá tamawaik wainmakui , nunik Jisus wetai niishkam Jisusjai weuwai .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai Olivosan mujajin jegawaju , yaakat Betfagé , nuigtú Betania Jerusalegnum tikiju awa nui , nunik ni jintintaijin jimajan awemak :

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: — Au yaakat jegattak aents batsata awi wetajum , awi jegakmajum burro makichik aentskesh entsamchatai tsakatuch wajau wainkattagme , nu atia jukim itagtuatajum .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Nunú juwagmin makichik aentskesh , ¿ wagka aikagme ? tujamkujaish , Apu atsumawai , ajum awagtugmaktatui tusa ukuktajum , — tiuwai .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Tiajam wejiag diikmá , waitainum agaa jinta tuniasunum jigkam wajattaman wainkag atiidau .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Dutikiagtai nui aents ijunaidau : — ¿ Utugkatagsagmea burrush atiagme ? — tuidau .

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Tiagtai ditashkam , Jisus titá tibaunak , dutiksag ujak ukukiajui .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Dutikawag burron jukiag Jisusan itaantaju , dutikawag burro tuntupen awantak nugkuagbauji jukiag aitkajui , dutikawagmatai Jisus ekeemiu .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Nunik wetai kuashat aents asag , dita awantak nugkuagbaujin jintanmag aitug emaidau , dutikainai tikich aidauk dukan tsupijag jintanum ainag emaidau .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Dutikiagtai aents dekas eemak ashinu , ukunum minidaujai senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Apajuí awemamu iina agkanmitkagmatin miná jujú emematiagmi !

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: ¡ Iina apachji apu David inamajakua nunisag inamjatatus miná jujú emematiagmi , nigki nayaimpinmayanash agkanmitkattawai ! — wajaidau .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Nunik Jisus Jerusalén jegaa , jega Apajuí ememattainum wayauwai . Nunik nui ashí wají agtatmanak diis ukuak etsa akagu asamtai , niina jintintaiji aidaunak ashí yajuak Betania weuwai .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Betania kanag jiinkiag wegamunum Jisus yapajau ,

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: nunikmá higuera shiig dukejuk wajattaman ikaag wainak wejiu neje atsuash tusa diistatus . Nunikmá nejetí jegachu asamtai neje atsutai ,

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Jisus higueran chichajak : — ¡ Ame nejeamunak makichik aentskesh tuke yuwachagtin ainawai ! — titatman niina jintintaiji aidau antugkajui .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Jerusalén jegawag jega Apajuí ememattainum Jisus wayaa , nui sujak batsatun sumau aidaujaí agaa jiijú , dutikak aents kuichki yapajiin aidau mesajinashkam shitatki akaketuk , paumá sujin aidau ekeemtaiji aidaunash dutiksag ashí akaketkau .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Jega Apajuí ememattaiya nui makichik aentskesh takusá wayawainum tusa shiig dakitau .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Nunik jintinkagtak : — Apajuí chichame agagbaunum : “ Mina jegajuk ashí tikich nugkanmaya aidau Apajuí aujuinaku ijuntaiyai tama atinai ” tawa nuniaig atum kasá aidau batsamtai emaugme , — tiu .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Nuna timatai sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai antukag , wajuk maawajik tuidau . Tuinayatak ni jintinkagtamun ashí aents aidau puyatjus antujuidau asagmatai nuna ishamaidau .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Nuninai Jisusak kiitai niina jintintaiji aidaun yajuak , nunú yaaktanak ukuak yajá weuwai .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Nui kanajag kashikmasag nagkaemakmag , higuera ashí kagkapejai kukag wajattaman wainkajui .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Nunik Pedro adeag Jisusan chichajak : — Jintinkagtinuh , diisia ame higuera yumigjam ukukmaum nu kukajá wajana , — tau .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Imá Apajuiyaig kajintsá anentaimsatajum .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Dekas tajime : Makichkitigmekesh utujimsa anentaimtsuk , dekaskeap nuniktatua tusajum ju muja chichagkujum : ‘ ¡ Juwi atsuk nayantsanum wajaata ! ’ tamak nunisag nunimainai .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Nuaduí tajime : Atum Apajuí segattajum duka dekas sujustatuapi tusajum segatajum , nuniakjumek jukittagme .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Atum Apajuí aujkugmek , tikichjai kajegdaikamu ajutjamkuig tsagkujatajum , atumnashkam Apajuí nayaimpinum puja dushakam aikasag tsagkugtamjatnume atum pegkegchau chichakbaugminash .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Atum nu tsagkugchataik , atumin Apa nayaimpinum puja dushakam , atumin tudaugminash tsagkugtamjashtatjume .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Juna timatai wakitkiag Jerusalén kaunawajui . Nunik jega Apajuí ememattainum Jisus wekaetatman sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau nuigtú tikich apu aidaujai jegaantag ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: iniinak : — ¿ Aminash ya jintinkagtuata tusash awetamae ? ¿ Yana chichamenia jusha juniame ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tuinam Jisus ayaak : — Wishakam iniastajime , atum nu aigkagmin ujaktajime ya jutikata tujutmataiya jutikaja junash .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: ¿ Ya awemauwaita Juagnash yamijatjati tusash , Apajuik awemauwait , atsa aents aidauk awemauwait ? nunú aigkatajum .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Tama utujimkag , ditak pempeentunikiag chichainak : “ Juagnak Apajuí awemauwai tajinish , ‘ ¿ Tujash wagka dekaskeapi tichau ainagme ’ tujamtata jama ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: ¿ Aents awemauwai titajiash ? ” Tuinayatak ashí aents aidauk Juagkak dekaskenum Apajuí etsegtinai tuidau asagmatai ishamaidau .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Nuninak Jisusan chichajuinak : — Dekatsji , — tuidau . Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Ayú , wisha tichattajime yana chichamenia jutikaja nunak , — tiu .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Jisus ataktú augmatbaun pachis aents aidaun jintintak , tau : “ Aents niina ajajin uva aajakuí , dutika tanishig , uva yumiji ijugtinnash umik , wajasá diistinnash torre tutain yakí jiikuí . Dutika wajumak aentsun atum ju takastajum dutikakjum minash sujustajum tusa susa ukuak , nigka tikich nugkanum atushat weuwai .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Nunik uva juut jegamtai , makichik inaken awemauwai , aents ajanum takaina nui jegamtai , uva neje susam , juki itagtuati tusa .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Dutikam jegamtai ajanum takaina nunú achikag suwi suwimainakua , wainak awagkiuwai .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Dutikawagmatai tikich inaken awemauwai , dutikam jegattaman , nunashkam kayai tukuí tukuinakua upu upujukiag , pegkegchau chicha chichajuinakuag awagkiajui .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: “ Nuna dutikawagmatai ataktushkam tikichin awemauwai , dutikam jegattaman maawajui . Dutikamtai nuní kuashat ishiakui . Dutikawajam jegattaman , tikich aidaunak suwimawag ayatak awa awatuinakua awakenak , tikichnak maawajui .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Dutikawagmatai inagnamun niina uchijí makichkiuch aneetaiji ajamun , takaak batsatbaunum awemauwai : ‘ Mina uchignak ajantusampap diimain ainawa ’ tusa .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Tujash ajanum takaina nu ditak pempeentunikiag : ‘ Auwai ju aja juna jukitnuk , dekas maa ajapeaku , juka iinu emami ’ , tuidau .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Tusag achiká maawag ajá ukumtikiag ajapawajui .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: “ ¿ Nunash ajagtina dusha itugmainaita ? Dekas ajagtina nu tajakug nunú ajanum takaina nunak kajeg utsaak , tikich aents aidaun susa idaimainai .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: “ Atumek ausachukaitjum Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui : ‘ Aents jegá jegamin aidau kayá ajapawajua nunú , kaya dekas jegá ichichkatin apututia iman wajasé ,

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: nunak Apajuí dutikau asamtai , jutii anentaig ejetumaitsui ’ tawa duka ” , tiuwai .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Tutai : “ Nuna augmatus tawa nunak , iina tujamak tawai ” tusag achikta tuidau , tujash aents tuwakajua nuna ishamaidau asag ukuinak wegajui .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Nunik ukukiag fariseo aentsji aidaun , Herodesan aentsji aidaujai pachiachmau Jisus iniastajum , tamash wajintig timatai duwi tsanumjujagmi tusag ishiakaju .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Dutikawajam ditashkam Jisusan jegaantag : — Jintinkagtinuh , jutiik shiig dekainaji , amek dekaskea duke etsegme , tikich aentsun niimé diigsam shiig awajkatasamkesh chichatsme , imá Apajuí jintiya duke pachisam jintinkagtau asamin , amin iniajame : ¿ Roma apuji kuichkiji atinush sumainashit , atsa sumainchaukaih ? — tusa iniidau .

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Tama Jisus dita tsanubaujin dekaju asa : — ¿ Wagka minash tsanujatasagmesh wakejutagme ? ¡ Makichik kuichik itagtuakjua diistajai ! — tiuwai .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Tutai ejentuntam diisá : — ¿ Yana niimé dakumkaya daajish agagbauwaita ? — tau . Tama dita aiinak : — Anka Roma apuji dakumkamui , — tiaju .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Roma apujinua duka nigki susatajum , Apajuinua dushakam imá Apajuik susatajum , — tiuwai . Nuna timatai anentai jegagchajui .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Nuniku ai saduceo aidaushkam Jisusan tajuntajui , ditak aents jakauk nantakchagtin ainawai tinu asag Jisusan iniinak :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Jintinkagtinuh , Moisés papí agag ukugtamkiuwa nui : ‘ Aents nuwan juki uchí akiitsuk jakamtaig , ni yachintin nuwan juki uchin akiimainai , dutika yachí uchijiya nunin emamainai ’ tawai .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Nuniamunum siete yachigbau aajakuí . Nuanuiya nagkamchak iwai nuwenauwai , tujash uchin akiitsuk jakauwai .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Nunikmatai tikich yachi jukiuwai . Nunik niishkam uchinak akiitsuk jakauwai . Kampatuma nu jukishkam nunisag jakauwai .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nuni nuninakua siete aajakajua duka uchinak akiitsuk ashí jinawajui . Nunikagmatai duwi pujus nuwashkam jakauwai .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Siete aajakajua duka ashí nunak nuwatkaju aina duwish ¿ yana nuweg atinaita atak nantainamunmash ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Nuna tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Atumek Apajuí chichamen tawa dusha dekachu , niina senchijiya dushakam wainkachu ainajum nuaduí dewakugme .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Jakau aidau nantajagtin aina duwik makichkish nuwenachagtinai . Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinum batsata nuninuk agtinai .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Tujash jakau nantajagtinun pachis , Apajuí numi zarza tutai kegamunum chichakbau Moisés agagbauwa nui : ‘ ¿ Witjai Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aina nuna Apajuijinuk ’ tawa duka ausachukaitjum ?

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: ¡ Apajuik jakau aidaun Apajuijinchui , iwaaku aina nuna Apajuijiyai ! Nunin aig atumek shiig kuashat dewagme , — tiuwai .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Saduceo aidau tiagtai Jisus shiig aikmatai , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin antuku asa , jegantun iniak : — Chicham umiktin aina nuwiyash ¿ tuwaita dekas puyatjusa umimaina dusha ? — tau .

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Chicham umiktajum tibau aina nuwiya dekas puyatjusa umimainuk juuwai : ‘ Israel aidauwah , Apu iina Apajuijiya duka imá makichkiuchi .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Amina Apujum Apajuiya nu imá senchi aneeta , nuniakum imá niinig anentaimsam pujustá , Apajuinu pegkeg aina duke dekaata , ashí Apajuí wakega duke takastá ’ , tawa juuwai dekas puyatjusa umimainuk .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Untsu tikich jujai betekmamtina duka : ‘ Amijai ijutkamushkam amek anenmamsam aneeta ’ tawai . Tikich chicham umiktin juna nagkaesauk atsawai .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Ju aatsa tima chicham umiktinun jintinkagtinchakam : — Jintinkagtinuh duka dekas tame , imá makichik Apajuik awai , tikichik atsawai .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Shiig pegkejai Apajuí senchi aneamua duka , Apajuinu pegkeg aina nu dekamushkam , niinig anentaimsa pujuta dushakam , ashí ii takaamua duka imá niinuk atí tusa takaamushkam . Apajuí senchi anea duka aatus nunimainai . Nuigtú , amijai ijutkau aidaushkam amek anenmamsam aneeta tibauwa dushakam pegkejai , nunú aatsa nuniamu Apajuinak shiig awagmawai , tudau tsagkugnagtasa kuntin maa apeamua nuna nagkagas , — tiuwai .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Tusa shiig anentaimas timatai , Jisus chichajak : — Apajuí inatjati tusam idaimamtak namput wajatsme , — tiuwai . Nuna timatai makichik aentskesh iniimainchau dekapjaju .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum jintinkagtak : — ¿ Wajuk asamtaiya chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaush , Kristuk David wegantu atinai tuinawa ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: David Wakaní Pegkeji chichamtikam : ‘ Apu mina Apujun chichajak : Mina untsujuí ekeemsata , nunikamin wi amina shiwajum aidaunak aminí ikaunmakmatai duwi ame diisminum ’ , tiuwai .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: David mina Apug tawa nuniaish : ¿ Wajuk asaya David wegantush amainaita ? — tau . Tutai nui aents tuwakú aidauk shiig aneasag antujuidau .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Nui Jisus jintinkagtak : “ Atumek kuitamamkatajum chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , nugkutai esagman nugkujá yujatan wakegaina nunin aigpajum , ditak aents kuashat ayamunum igkuntuinakush eme anenjus kumpamjitnume tusa wakegainawai .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Nunisag jega ijuntainum utsanainakush , dekas apú ekeemtai shiig iwajamu aina imannum ekeemsatatus wakegainawai . Aantsag jistatin yuwamunmash dekas ekeemtai shiig iwajamunum ekeemsatatus wakegainawai .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Nuwa waje aidau jeenash atankiag , aents aidau pegkegnap takainawa tujuttinme tusag , Apajuin au aujuinakua ukú yujau aina nunin aigpajum . Nunú aidau imá senchi suwimkan jukiagtin ainawai . ”

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Jisus kuichik Apajuinu atin egketainum adijis ekeemas , kuashat aents aidau kuichkin chimpiinai , wiyakuch aidaushkam kuichkin kuashat chimpiagtai diyak eketu .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Nuniai nuwa waje wayaa niishkam jimagchik kuichik cobre najanamu , akiktanash imanis akikchaun egkeauwai .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Nuwa nuna egkeamtai Jisus wainak ashí ni jintintaiji untsuká ikaunmak chichajak : — Au nuwa waje ujunauchitak ashí aents kuichkin egkeena auna nagkagas egkeae .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Tikich egkeena auk kuichik ampinun egkeenawai , tujash jujú nuwa waje ujunauchitak ashí niinu auchinak egkeae , ni sumasa yumainjinakesh ampis ukutsuk , — tiuwai .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainmaya jiinki wetatman niina jintintaiji aina nuwiya makichik : — Jintinkagtinuh ¡ amesh diisia kayash yajau ekenjá iwaja jegamkamuajah ! — tau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Ju ibau ekenjá jegamkamu aidau wainam juka , makichik kayakesh ekenjamu aina nuwiyag juwakchatnai , ashí tsaikbau atinai , imanisagkek asashtinai , makichik kaya tsaikchamukesh tikich kayanum ekeemi juwakukesh atsustinai , ashí tsainkatnai , — tiuwai .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Jisus Olivosan mujajin waka , jega Apajuí emematku ijuntaijai niinis awa nui ekeemsau . Nunikmatai Pedro , Santiago , Juan , Andrés aatus jegantun niinak iniidau :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: — ¿ Nunash wajutiya dutikawagtin ainawa ? Ashí nunú aidau uminkatin tsawan jegattak wajataish , ¿ wají wantidiagtinaita ? nunú ujajatkata , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan ayaak : “ Kuitamamkatajum makichkish tsanugmajainum .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Wagki kuashat aents aidau mina daajun adaimasag miniagtinai nuninak , ‘ Witjai Kristunuk ’ tusag kuashat aentsun tsanuagtinai .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: “ Maaninawai tuinamu antitnaitjume , nuigtú maaniawagtasa pampandayamushkam , imaniakuish puyatkatin aigpajum . Duka aatus nagkaemaktinai , tujash nu achatnai nagkanbauk .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Nugka yaignum batsamin aidau tikich nuninum batsatujai maadiagtinai , tuja nuninai nugka muunnum batsamin aidaushkam mai imanumiajaig maadiagtinai . Ashí tikich nugkanmash ugtinai , yapagtash tepeatnai , kuashat pampandayamush atinai . Jujú aina juka waitut yamá nagkamnak imanitnai .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: “ Tujash atumek kuitamamkatajum , atumnak achigmakag apu chicham dekaatasa ijuntainum ejetamawagtinai , dutijamawagmatai jega ditá ijuntaiji aidaunum awaintamawag asutamawagtinai . Dutijamainak tikich apu aidaunmash ejetamawag , nui jujamkiag dekas apu nugkanum inamin aidaunmash ejetamawagtinai , mina nemagtin asagmin mina pachitus titinme tusag . Dutijamawagmatai ditá emtinish mina pachittsajum ujaktinaitjume .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Dekas nugka nagkanbau jegatsaig yamajam chichama duka , ashí tikich nugka aidaunmash etsegkamu atinai .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Tujash apunum ejetamawagtatus atumin jujamainakuish , wajintuk titaja tusagmek anentaimtusaipajum . Atumek Apajuí tujamtata nunú chichaktinaitjume . Duka atum chichakchattagme , Wakaní Pegkejiya nu chichamtijamkatnai .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Nunú nuniamunum ditá yachiuchijinash maatnume tusag sujiagtinai , aantsag uchigtin aidaushkam uchijinak sujitnai , uchi aidaushkam apají shiwagmawag maitin ainawai .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Atum mina nemagtin aidautigminak ashí aents aidau kajegtabiagtinai , tujash ni mina nemagtukbaunak nunisag pujusá nagkanbaunum jegá nu uwemjatnai .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: “ Apajuí etsegtin Daniel aajakua nu , Apajuí dakitmainun shiig pegkegchau dutikawagtinun pachis agajui ( nuna aujuk dekaatnume ) : Jega Apajuí ememattai pegkegma nui aents utsanainak , dita apajimatasa dakumkamun awayawagtinai tawa nuna dutikaidau wainkugmek ; atum Judea batsatutigmek mujanum pisagtajum .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Tuja jega jegamká tuntupé paka inagnakbaunum waka pujaushkam akaiki jegá wayaag wajiijinak jutsuk wemainai .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Aantsag ajanum takaak pujaushkam , pataká nugkugtinun jukitjai tusag waketjumaitsui .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Nunú tsawantin nuwa ejamtin , nuigtú uchí amuntsuaku agtina nunak wait anentuinajai .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Apajuí ausatajum , atum pisamua nu tsetsek tepeamunum ajutjaminum .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: “ Apajuí nugká najanauwa nui nagkamas yamaya juwish imanika waitchatain , atakea duwish imanika waittsashtin tikima senchi waitiamu atinai .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Apajuí nu waitut imadiaun imijtsuk idaitaik , makichik aentskesh uwemainchau ainawai . Tujash Apajuí niinu agtinun etegjauwa nuna wait anentau asa , waitut ayatak wegaunak imijkatnai .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: “ Tuja makichik aentskesh : ‘ Juwi Kristu pujawai diistajum ’ , tachakush : ‘ Awi pujume ’ , awajtamainakuish dekaskeapi tiigpajum .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Kuashat aents ‘ Kristuitjai ’ tusa tsanumiagtinai , aantsag ‘ Apajuí chichame etsejin ainaji ’ tusag tsanumaidaush agtinai . Nuninak aents dutikmainchau aidaun iwainainak aentsun tsanuagtinai , dutikaidau asag Apajuí etegkamu aidaunash dita tsanuamunak tsanujagtinai .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Nuaduí atumek kuitamamkatajum , ashí juna pachisnuk yaunchuk emtikan tibaijime .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: “ Nunú tsawan waitut nagkaemaig etsag suwe wajastinai , nantushkam etsanjashtinai .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya yaya punjau aidaushkam nugkanum kakeyagtinai . Imanidau asagmatai nayaimpinmaya machikish umuchmainchau aidaush buchitjatnai .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Nunú imaniai wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , yujagminum pachitkau ashí mina senchigjai tsawan wajasá minamun waitkagtinai .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Wi mina aentsug nayaimpinmaya aidaun ishiaktinaitjai , mina aentsug etejamu aidau ashí nugka nagkatkamunum batsatun ijumjatnume tusan .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: “ Numi higueran pachisan augmattsan titatjim nu anentaimtustajum . Atumek higuera duke betenkakuig wamkeap esat nagkamnattawa tusajum dekau ainagme .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Nunisjumek atumshakam ashí wi tajim nunú imanisag uminag wegau wainkugmek , yamaik Apajuí Uchijí Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nu taatnuk ashí jegaegapi , titin atajum .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Dekas tajime : Wi Jerusalegkan pachisan ashí tajim duka , yamai aents batsataina jusha ashí jinuinatsaig uminkatnai .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nayaimpik nugkajaig megkaejatnai , tujash mina chichamjuk umintsukek juwakchatnai .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: “ Tuja wají tsawantinig , wají horatinig taatnaitja nunak makichkish dekainatsui , nayaimpinmaya aents aidaukesh dekainatsui , tuja wikish dekatsjai , imá mina Apajuk dekawai .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Nuaduí atumek aneaku batsamsajum Apajuí aujú pujutajum , nu uminkatnuk tsawantak dekachu asajum .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Juka aents atushat tikich nugkanum wegak , niina inake aidaun , jega kuitamjutkatajum tusa makí makichik inake aina nuna takatan tinamak , waitin kuitamkatnunashkam aneaku pujusam kuitamkata tusa ukuak weuwa nujai betekmamtinai .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Aneaku pujustajum , jeennush wajutik taat , kintamkumpash minit , nuniachkush ae aetash , atash shinaimpash , atsa kashikmasampash taat duka shiig dekachu asajum .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Pachiachmau minak kajigká batsatjumin waipamaina numamtuk awajtamkainum .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Juna tajim junak imá atumnakek tatsujime ashí aentsun tajai : ¡ Niimkau aneaku batsamsatajum ! ”

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Pascua pag levadurajai pachimtsuk yutaiya nunú jegatin jimag tsawan ai , sacerdote apuji aidau chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai Jisusan egaidau , wajuk unupiajaik achiká maawag tusag .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Tujash jista aigkik dutikachagmi , aents aidaujai pampandayamu ai , tuidau .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Yaakat Betanianum Simón lepra achikbau etsagagbau aajakua nuna jeen , Jisus mesanum jegan ekeemtatman , kaya alabastro tutai botella najanamunum kugkuin nardo ayatak duke najanamu akik wajaknun takusá nuwa jegantau . Dutika nuna ujak Jisusa buuken ashí ukatjauwai .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Dutiktatman wainkag nui ijunu kajekag : — ¿ Wagka ibau kugkuinnash aikash ajapeawa ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Aikatsuk trescientos tsawan inagkeasa takasá kuichik jumaina imaan akik sujuka , nunú kuichkik ujunauch aidau yaimainajama , — tusag nuwan ashishmatuidau .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichajak : — Idaisatajum ¿ wagka nuwauchish kajejagme ? Nigka junak pegkejan jutijawai .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Ujunauch aidauk tuke atumjai batsamiagtatui , nuniakui atum wakegakjumek yaimainaitjume , untsu wika atumjaig pujushtatjai .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Juka nuwak mina mantuawag ukujuinak , iyashjun kugkuinai ukatjukag ukugsagtina nuaduí jutijawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Dekas tajime : Yamajam chichama juna ashí nugkanum yujasag etsejuinakush , ju nuwa mina jutija junak tuke pachisag chichatin ainawai .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Nuna timatai niina jintintaiji doce aina nuwiya Judas Iscariote , jiinki weuwai sacerdote apuji aidaujai Jisus sujuktinun chichaman umiktatus .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Nunik sacerdote batsatun jegají , dutik achimainaitjume tuinam shiig aneenak kuichkin akiktajame tusag anagkuawajui . Tiagmatai Judaschakam , wajuk yupichu sujukajak tusa egatu .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Pag levaduragtuchu yutai nagkamak tsawagbaunum , Pascuatin yuwatin uwig aishmag tsakat aidau mautai asamtai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidau : — ¿ Tuwig umiktaji Pascuatin yuwatnush ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Tiagtai jimagchik niina jintintaijin awemak : — Yaakat wetajum , nunikjum aishmag yumin aimak waketu wainkattajum nunú pataetuktajum ,

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: nunikjum jeen wayaakui : ‘ Jintinkagtin chichagtamak : Agkantash awash wi mina jintintaig aidaujai Pascuatin yumainush ’ tujamae titajum — tiu .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: — Nu tajumin ni inaktugmastatui yakí tesamu muun shiig umikbaun , nuanuí ashí jutii yuwatnuk umiktajum , — tiu .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tusa tiajam Jisusa jintintaiji aidaushkam wegag yaakat jegakmag , ni tibaunak imatiksag wainkag , Pascuatin yuwatnunak nui umikajui .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Kiyagmatai Jisus niina jintintaiji doce aina nujai jeganum utsanawaju .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Nunik mesanum pekaamsag yuwinamunum Jisus chichaak : — Dekas tajime : Atum ainajum juwiyag makichik wijai jimajuk yuwa nu minak sujutkattawai , — tau .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Tutai ditak wake besekag pekaamsaju , nunikag makí makichik iniininak : — ¿ Wikaitag ? — tutai , tikitchakam : — ¿ wikaitag ? — wajaidau .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Doce ainajum juwiya wijai nu platunmag uchutua yuwa nuuwai , — tau .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Tusa : — Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , mina pachittsag agajajua nuna imatiksanuk umiktatjai , tujash aents mina sujutkatta nunak wait anentajai . Duka dekas akiinmainchaunas akiinawabiataih , — tau .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Yuwinak pekagbaunum , Jisus pagkan juki Apajin see ti puuká , ni jitintaiji aidaun suwak : — Ju jukijum yuwatajum , juka mina iyashjua numamtinai .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Nuna ti idayak , copanum vino yajaam ekeemtatman juki Apajin see ti ditan susaju , dutikam ashí betek uwakajui .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Dutika ashí uwakagmatai chichajak : — Juka mina Apag , mina numpag ukaejamunum kuashat aents uwemkagtinun yamagman anagkagtuauwa nunú uminkatnun iwainawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Dekas tajime : Wika ju uvan yumijiya junak awenanuk uwagchatnaitjai , atak tsawan uminkui Apajuí inamtaijin atumjai ijuntinaitag duwi vino yamagman uwagtinaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Nuna timatai kantamtain kantamawag , Olivosan mujajin wegajui .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Nunikag nui Jisus chichaak : — Jujú kashia juwik , ashí atum aidautigmek mina anentaimjuttak kajimatkittagme , agagbauwa nui : ‘ Uwijá kuitamnun mantuawagtinai , dutikawagmatai uwigji aidauk pampagkagtin ainawai ’ tawa nunisag .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Tujash mantuawagmataish ataktú nantakin atumek wegatsjuminig wiyá emkan Galilea wetatjai , — tiuwai .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Nuna tutai Pedro ayaak : — Ashí tikich aidau kajimatjamainakuish , wika nunikchattajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Amek yamai kashia juwik atash eke jimajá shinatsaig , Jisusnak waintsamjai tusam kampatumá uugtuktatme , — tau .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Tamashkam Pedrok : — Amijai apaatuk mantuinakuish wika nunak tichattajai , — tau . Nuna tutai , ashí niina jintintaiji aidauk ditashkam dutiksag tiajui .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Tiagmatai juwakiag ajak ajakbau Getsemaní tutainum jegawajui . Nunik ni jintintaiji aidaun : — Juwi ekeemsatajum , wi awi wenu Apajuin ausatjai .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Tusa wegak Pedron , Jacobon , Juan aatus yajuak ditajai wesa , shiig senchi wake besemag dekapeau asa wake besekú ,

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: nuniak : — Senchi wake besemag dekapeakun ane anentaimkawan jamain dekapeajai , atumek juwi pujusjum iwá batsamtajum .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Tusa ukuak machik kuwaesag nugká tikishmag pujus Apajuí aujak : “ Apawah , nunimainaitkuig wi waitmainaitag duka nagkaetukchati ” , tau .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Nunik : “ Mina Apajuh , amek ashí dutikmainaitme , wi waitmainaitag duka datumtujata , tujash wi wakejamuk achati ame dekas wakejamua nu atí ” , tiuwai .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Nuna ti wakitki ni jintintaiji batsakbaun jegantun diikmá , kajig batsatun wainak Pedron chichajak : — Simón , ¿ kanamek ? ¿ makichik horakesh iwá pujumainchauk dekapeam ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Shintaagjum pujusjum Apajuí ausatajum , iwanch pegkegchau takastinme tusa dekapjamsainum , wakanik dekaskenmag pegkeja nuna wakegawai , tujash iyashik kakakchau ainawai .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Tusa ataktú weeshkam ni Apají ausamujinak dutiksag ausauwai .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Nuna tusa ataktú tanta diikmá kajigká batsatun wainak ishintau , dutikamash ditak kaji senchi mainamu asag , Jisus augmash aimainchau dekapjajui .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Kampatuma juwi waketjuki taak : — Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna aents tudaugtin aidaunum sujam atatag duka horak jegae , maake yamaik kanagtajum .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Nantagtajum wegagmi , mina sujutkatta duka ashí taa minawai , — tiuwai .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Tusa Jisus eke chichaak wajai , Judas doce aina nuwiya kuashat aentsun espada aidaun , numi aidaunaske takaku aidaujai saasá tajuntajui . Nunú aidauk sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaushkam , nuigtú apu awemamu aidaujai minidau .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Judas Jisusan sujuktina nunú : “ Wi kugkuastatag nunuwai Jisusak , shiig achikjum emetjajum jukitajum ” ,

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: tiu asa Jisusan adijak : — ¡ Jintinkagtinú ! — takug kugkuasui .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Dutiktai achikag shiig emetjaju .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Nuna dutikiagtai makichik nui ijuna nuwiya espadajin ukuini juwakug , dekas sumo sacerdote inake kuwishin asankauwai .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Tuja Jisus nu aents aidaun chichajak : — ¿ Wagka kasa achiktasa utugtaya imanikjumesh espada , numi aidau takusjum achigkatasagmesh minitjagme ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Wi atumin jintinkun kashí kashinig jega Apajuí ememattainum pujuweg nuaduik jutijuajum achigchau agmaugme . Tujash aatus chicham agagbauwa nu uminui , — tiuwai .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Nuna taig ashí niina jintintaiji aidauk pisainak ukukiajui .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Nuninaig makichik datsauch sabanan pempemag pataetuku , nunittaman achikajui ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: dutikam jaanchnak awik ukuak wisú tupikakiuwai .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Jisusan jukiag dekas sumo sacerdote pujamunum ejegawajui ; dutikawagmatai ashí sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaushkam , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai ijunjajui .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Tuja Pedroshkam ikaag pataetus wejá wejakua , sumo sacerdote jeen agaajin jegaa , achijatin aidaujai jiin anamak eketu .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Sacerdote apuji aidau , ashí chichaman inagdau aidaushkam egatuidau , Jisusan bakuag maatnume tusa sujukagtatus , imatikainakush ejetuinachu .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Kuashat aents aidau wainak tsanumjuidau , tujash dita tuinamuk betek jegaachu .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Nuniagtai wajumak aents wajaidiag tsanumjuinak :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: — Jutii ni tabauk antugkabiaji : Wi ju jega Apajuí ememattai uwejái takasbauwa nunak , yumpuan kampatumchik tsawantai tikichin jegamkattajai uwejai takaschamun timayi , — tuidau .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Nuna aatus tuinakushkam makichkish bakumainchaun tuidau .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Nuniai dekas sumo sacerdote ejapeen eketu wajatki Jisusan iniak : — ¿ Wagka machikish aimtsume ? ¿ Nunash wajinbaugmina jusha imatjutpainawa ? — tau .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Tamashkam Jisusak machikish aimkagkesh chichaachu , nunitai sumo sacerdote awentsag iniak : — ¿ Amekaitam Kristu , Apajuí Pegkegma nuna Uchijim ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Witjai , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , Apajuí ashí senchigtina nuna untsujin eketun tsawan uminkamtai yujagminum pachitkau minamu waitkatnaitjume , — tiuwai .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Tutai sumo sacerdote nugkutaijin japikí ichigká chichaak : — ¿ Nuigtush ya etsegtukti tusaya atsumaji ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Apajuí pegkegchau chichagka nu antukugme , ¿ wajinjupa atumesh ? Tutai ashí aents aidauk : — ¡ Ayatak mantamnati ! — tuidau .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Tiagmatai Jisusan usukidaush ainai , yapiin ejatkag ijuinak : — Dekakia , ¿ ya awatamni ? — awajuidau . Jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamnushkam Jisusnak yapinum awatuidau .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pedro apu agaajin nugká pujaun , sumo sacerdote inake nuwa aina nuwiya makichik tajuntau ,

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: nunikmá Pedro jiin anamak ekeemtatman wainak dii wajatu , nunik : — Amesh Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nujaimpap wekaemume , — tau .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Tama Pedro ayaak : — Wika wainchaujai , ame tujutam nunak dekatsjai , — tiuwai . Tusa ukuak wayamunmanini jinkiuwai , nuniai atash shinukuí .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Duke nuwauch ataktú wainak , nui tikich aidau batsatun : — Jujú aujai wekaenuwejama , — tau .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Tamashkam Pedrok ataktush aikasag : — Jisusnak wainchaujai , — tau . Nuniai machik asag nuwi batsatu ataktú Pedron chichajuinak : — Amek dekas auna jintintaiyaitme Galileanmaya asam , chichaakmesh dita chichau agma nunismek chichame , — tuidau .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Imatjuinam Jisusan pachis pegkegchaun chichajak , Apajuí adayas : — ¡ Atum tajum nunak wika wainchaujai ! — tau .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Nuna taig atash awentsag shinukuí , nunitai Pedroshkam Jisus chichajak : “ Atash jimajá shinatsaig , kampatumá waintsamjai tusam uugtuktinaitme ” tibauwa nuna anentaimtus , buutiuwai .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Kashikmasag sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich dekas apu aidau , nuigtú chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , nuigtú chichama inagnau aidaujai ijunjag chichasag , Jisusan jigkajag jukiag Pilato pujamunum ejegawaju .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Dutikawagmatai Pilato iniak : — ¿ Amekaitam judío aidau apujim ? Tama ni ayaak : — Ame tujutam duka dekaske , — tau .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Tujash sacerdote apuji aidauk shiig senchi tsanumjuidau .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Imatiagtai Pilato ataktú iniak : — ¿ Amek nuna imatjutpainakuish machikish aimtsumek ? diisia wajupa imatjupainatsua , — tau .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Tujash Jisusak nu tamashkam aimchau , nunitai Pilato anentai jegagchau .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Jistatinig aents achikbau aidaun nu jinkiti tusag makichik mamikiawagmatai , tuke jiisagké aidau .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Nuanuí Barrabás daagtinchakam , Roma apuji dakituinaku pampandayamunum ni kumpajijai aentsun mau asamtai achikam egketu .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Nuniamunum kuashat aents kaunkag makichik aents tuke akupdauwe , dutiksaik akupnakti tusag Pilatun segaidau .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tama Pilato ditan chichajak : — ¿ Wakegagmek dekas atumi apugmia nuna akupkati tusagmesh ? — tau .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Nunak sacerdote apuji aidau tuke aneas kajejuinak , maatnume tusa sujukajun dekau asa tiuwai .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Tujash sacerdote apuji aidauk aents tuwakú aina nuna : — Dekas Barrabás jinkiti , — tusa akatjajui .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tiagtai Pilato ataktú chichajak : — ¿ Atum iina apuji tajum nunash utugkati tujutjume ? — tau .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Tutai ataktú senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Achigtajum ! — tiajui .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Tiagtai Pilato ayaak : — ¿ Tujash jusha wají pegkegchauna takase ? Tutaishkam nuní senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Achigtá ! — awajuidau .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Imatiagtai Pilatushkam aents aidaujai shiig juwakta tau asa , Barrabasan jiyaak Jisusnak asutiatajum tima asutiawagmatai sujukui achigtajum tusa .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Dutikamtai suntag aidau apú pujusá inamtaijinian jukiag agaa jiikiagmatai , ashí suntag aidau ijuntujaju .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Dutikawag jaanch yamakaitkaun anugjag , atsejutain jagkí najatuawag atsemitkakag ,

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: eme anentsá kumpamji tusag : — ¡ Juuwai judío aidaun Apujig ! — awajaidau .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Imatjuinak tagkanai buuknum awatuidau , usuktanash usukidau , nuninak emematji tusag tikishmatuidau .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Dutikainak dushí dushikinakua jaanch yamakaitkaunak awituk jujuinak ni nugkutaijinak anugjag juki emajui , achijag maawagtatus .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Yaakat Cirenenmaya Simón daagtin Alejandro , Rufo apajiya nunú , ajajinia minittaman wainkag : Jisus achigtin numi yapajia achiamun yanaktí , tusag susajui .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Dutika jukiag Gólgota tutainum ejentajui , ( “ Gólgota ” tawa duka “ buuk sakajua nunin ” taku tawai . )

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Nui ejentag , vino mirrajai pachimjamun uwagti tusa susajui . Tujash nigka uwagchauwai .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Dutika Jisusa achijagmatai , suntag aidau jaanchji aidaun jujukiag , yana kayajig jiinkit nu jaanchnak jukiti tusag wasugkamaidau .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Jisusnak etsa dukap takunai achijaju ainawai .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Dutikainak wajuk asamtaiya achijaje nuna pachisag : “ Judío aidau apuji ” tusa agag adujtukajui .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Nuigtushkam jimag magkagtinun Jisusjai achijag , tikichia nuna untsugnum awajainak , tikichia nunak menajinini awajawajui .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Aatus uminkauwai agagbaunum chichaak : “ Pegkegchau takau aidaujai betek dutikam atinai ” , tawa nunú .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Aents aidau duke ayaumas nagkaemainak buuken pegajag pegkegchau chichajuinak : — ¡ Waj ! , ame jega Apajuí ememattaiya nunak yumpuan kampatumchik tsawantaik ataktú jegamainaitjai tinum jama ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: aaní nematsuk akaikim uwemjakia , — awajuidau .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Dutiksag sacerdote apuji aidaushkam , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai dushikinak : — Tikichnak yajau uwemtikchauwe , nuninaitak nigka uwemtsui .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: ¡ Kristuh , Israela Apujiyah ! achijam detam nu akaikikia , nuniakmin wainká iish dekaskeapi tiagmi , — tuidau . Nuwi Jisusjai achijam detaidaushkam aiksag pegkegchaun chichajuidau .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Etsa tutupit wajasú ai nagkamas ashí nugkanum suwe wajas , etsa dukap tegau aishkam imanisag asauwai .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Imanik abaunum Jisus senchi untsumak : “ Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ” tiu . ( Nunak : “ Mina Apajuijuh , mina Apajuijuh , ¿ wagka minash idaitusume ? ” ) taku tiuwai .
