text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Aents nui ijunaidauk nuna antukag : — Antukjua , Eliasa untsuana , — tuidau .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Nuniaig nuwiya makichik tupikaki vino chujuau pujaunum esponja ajugká juki , tagkannum etea Jisus uwagti tusa sutai : — Idaisakia , Elías juna uwemtijatatus minishtimpash nuniau wainkagmi , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Tujash Jisusak senchi untsumak jakauwai .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Nunikmatai jega Apajuí ememattainum jaanch ejaamuk , yakiin nagkamnas ichiinak jimaituk kanakuí .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Tuja capitán Jisus achigbaun diyaak wajau , Jisus senchi untsumká jaamun wainak chichaak : — Ju aentsua juka dekaskenmag Apajuí Uchijiyai , — tau .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Nuigtushkam kampatumak nuwa aidau ikaag ijunas diidau . Nuanuí María Magdalanmaya tikich María Jacobo José aina nuna dukují , Salomé aatus ijunu .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Nunú aidau Jisus Galileanum pujusá chichaman etsegtai , yujasag yaijakaju ainawai . Nuigtushkam kuashat nuwa aidau Jisusjai Jerusalén kaunawajua dushakam ijunaidau .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Tsawan ayamtaig etsa akaikimtai nagkamnatin asamtai , ashí takatan umikagtatus takainai etsashkam akagu .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Nuniai José Arimateanmaya apu dekas chichaman inagdau aina nuwiya eme anentsá diitaiya nu taú , niishkam Apajuí inatjati tusa wakejin asa ajantsuk Pilatun utua : Jisusa iyashin segauwai .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Nu tusa segam jakaek tusa anentai jegachu ; nunik capitanin untsuká itan : — ¿ Dekas Jisus jakamka ? — tusa iniau .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Tama jakame tusa ujakam , Pilatushkam Josen : — Jisusa iyashig jukita , — tiuwai .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Tima Joseshkam jaanch puju dekas pegkeg najanamun sumak Jisusa iyashin numinum achigbaun kuwakí juki pempeaju . Dutika kaya tai umikbaunum egkea , kaya muuntan akagketuk waajin epeti ukukiuwai .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Nui ukuamun María Magdalanmaya , nuigtú María Josen dukujiya nujai wainkajui .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Tsawan ayamtai nagkaemakmatai María Magdalanmaya , tikich María Jacobo dukují , nuigtú Salomé aatus , pegkeg kugkuinun sumakaju , Jisus ukusbaunum wegag Jisusa iyashin ukatkagtatus .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Nunikag tumig tsawaju asamtai , kashikmasag Jisus ukusbaunum wegaju , etsa yamá jiinai .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Nunik weenak pempentunisag : — ¿ Yaki eketjamkati waitainum kaya aputuamuwe nunash ? — tudayinau .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Tujash jegantag diikmá , kaya shiig muun aputukbauk ekemak atatman wainkajui .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Nunik utuawag diikmag untsugnumanini aents datsauch jaanch puju esagman nugkuaju ekeemtatman wainkag ishamkaju .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Nuniagtai nunú chichajak : — Ishamkaigpajum , atumek Jisus Nazaretnumian achijag maawagma nu egagme . Duka nantakne , juwig atsawai , anuí ukusagma nunú diistajum .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Tujash wejum niina jintintaiji aidau , nuigtú Pedroshkam ujaktajum . Nigka Galilea eemak wetatui , awi wainkagtatui ni tiuwa nunisag , — tiuwai .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Nu tima nuwa aidaushkam Jisus ukusmaunum jegantajuk ukuinak tupikakiaju , shiig senchi ishamkag kujaidau asag makichik aentsnakesh ujakchajui .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Jisus tumigtin kashikmas nantakí dekatkauk María Magdalanmaya wantintukui , ni siete wakan pegkegchau aidau chimpimtuamun jiijamu aajakua nuna .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Dutikam we Jisusjai yujajakú aidau , wake besemag dekapenak buutú batsatun jegajua ujak :

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: — Jisusak iwaakuwe , wi wainkamjai tusa ujamash , — ditak dekaskeapi tuinachu .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Nuigtushkam ni jintintaiji jimag , ajanum wetainum jintá wetatman tikich niimtina nunin wajas wantintuku .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Dutika wantintukam ditashkam tikich batsatun jegajiag ujakaju . Tuinamash ditanash dekaskeapi tichaju .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Nuniai niina jintintaiji once aina nunú mesanum pekajun wantintuku , nunik Jisus kakakan chichajak : — ¿ Wagka dekaskeapi tatsugme ? — tiu , wainkaju ujamash dekaskeapi tichaju asagmatai .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Nuna ti chichajak : “ Ashí nugkanum wetajum , nunikjum yamajam chichama ju ashí aents aidaunum etsegkatajum .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Nuna antuk dekaskeapi tusa nemagtukag yamiimaidauk uwemjagtinai , untsu dekaskeapi tuinachuk suwimkan jukiagtinai .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Mina dekaskeapi tujutuina duke wainchatai aidaunash iwainagtinai : Nuninak mina daajui wakan pegkegchau aentsun egkemtujunash jiijainak , yamajam chicham chichashtainash chichagtinai ;

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: dapi esaimash , jatai egketuamun umuinakush jakashtin ainawai . Jau aidaunash ditá uwejen achikag etsagaidiagtinai . ”

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Apu Jisus juna taka takawa ashimak , nuaduí nayaim wegak takuniuwai . Nunik waka Apajuí untsujin ekeemsauwai .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Nunikmatai Jisusa jintintaiji aidaushkam jiinjajui , ashí yantamnum chichaman etsegkagtatus . Nuniagtai Apu Jisus chicham etsegbaunash aents aidaush dekaskeapi titinme tusa , wainchatai aidau iwainamunmash yaigkuí . Aatus atí .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Kuashat aents agajaje jutiiní wají augmatbau dekaskenum nagkaemakiuwa nuna pachisag .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Dita Jisusan dekas wainkau aidau , chichaman etsejuina nu jutiinashkam dutiksag jintinjamawaju asamtai ,

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: wishakam aikasnuk , wajuk nagkamdauwaita nuna ashí iniimsan shiig dekaan agatjame , aneetaiju Teofiloh ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: amina dekaskea nuna jintinjamawajua nu shiig dekau aminum tau asan .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Herodes Judea apuji wajas pujamunum , nu tsawantinig pujujakuí sacerdote Zacarías , Abías wegantu . Niina nuweg Elisabet aajakuí Aarón wegantu .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Ditak Apajuí emtinish pegkegchauji atsugbau aajakajui , nunidau asag Apajuí chicham umiktajum tibaunashkam imatiksag betek umiidau .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Tujash uchijig atsujuidau , Elisabet kaga asamtai , nuigtushkam ditak muuntuch wajasaju asag .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Nuniamunum Zacariasjai ijunag Apajuí takajin aidau takastin tsawan jegamtai , jega Apajuí emematku ijuntainum takaak batsatbaunum ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: tuke dutikin asag : ¿ Yaki jega Apajuí ememattai dekatkau tesamu Pegkejam tutaya nui wayaash , kugkuin incienso tutainash apeati ? tabaunum Zacariasan antigkui .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Nunik Zacarías incienso apetai , ashí aents aidauk agaa ijunas Apajuin aujú ijunaidau .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Nuniai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya Zacariasan wantintuk , altar incienso apetainum ayaumas untsugnumanini wajantau .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Nunittaman wainak Zacariasak puyatuk senchi ishamak dii wajau .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Nunitai : — Zacariasah ishamkaipa , ame Apajuí aujam nunak Apajuik antugtamkae . Nuniau asamtai nuwem Elisabet aishmagkun uchigmakmatai , Juan adaikattame .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Nunikmatai shiig aneasam dakujustatme . Tuja kuashat aents aidaushkam shiig aneediagtatui nu uchi akiinamunum .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Duka Apajuí wakegamun takajin atinai . Uwagchatnai vinunash , umutai kajiau aidaunashkam . Dukují wakeen nagkamsag Wakaní Pegkejig tuke ajitnai .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Ni etsegbaunum kuashat Israelan uchijí wegantu aidauk , pegkegchau takatan idayinak , ditá Apuji Apajuiya nuna umijiagtatui .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Niiyá eemak taa etsegkattawai Apu minitnun , Apajuí etsegtin Elías , Wakaní Pegkeji senchijí ajujakua nunisag . Dutikak muun aidaush uchijijai chichaman iwajag pujustinme , aents intimkiu aidaushkam chichaman betek umiktinme , apu minitaish shiig anentus jukita tuidau asag .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Tusá tama Zacarías ayaak : — Wi , mina nuwajaí muumpakig juninnush ¿ itugsanuk dekaskeap tawa duka uminkattawa titaja ? — tau .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Tutai : — Wika Gabrielaitjai dekas Apajuí inakegaitjai , ni awetime chicham pegkeja nuna ujaktí tusa .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Tujash dekaskeap tujutua tatsum duwi , yamai nagkamsamek chichatsuk pujusam , tsawan wi tajam nu ejetatme , — tau .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Nuniai aents aidauk : “ ¿ Zacariasash wagkag jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaash imanikash megkaekae ? ” tusag daká batsatu .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Nuninai jiinki augmamainchau dekapeak ayatak iwiimau , nunitai aents aidauk : “ Jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa awiyap wantintuke ” , tuidau .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Nunik Zacariasak takaamujinak ashí umik ukuak , ni jeen wakitkiu .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Nuna nunik dukap tsawan pujatsaig nuwe Elisabet ejapjuku , nunik wantintsuk jeenig pujus cinco nantun inagkeakiu .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Nigka nunak : “ Apajuí wait anenjak jutijuae , yamaik tikich aidaush uchigmachui tusag dushijin agma nunak tujutchagtatui ” , tau asa nunikui .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Elisabet ejapjuk seis nantu pujai , Apajuí Gabrielan yaakat Nazaret tutai , Galilea nugkanum awa nui awemauwai ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: nuanuí makichik nuwa María daagtin aentsú takashtai , apu David aajakua nunú wegantu José anagmamu pujau asamtai .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Nunik Gabriel María pujamunum wayaa : — María pujamek , aminak ashí nuwa aina nuwiyan Apajuí wakejus etegtamjae . Dutijabau asa Apajuik amijai awai , — tau .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Tujash nigka nuna wainak puyatkau , wagkag tuush kumpamjawa tusa .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Nunitai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya chichajak : — María ishamkaipa , aminak Apajuí etegtamjau asa shiig anenjamui .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Dutikamu asam , ejapjukam aishmag uchigmakam adaikattame JISUS .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Duka eme anentai atatui , nuniau asa ‘ Apajuí Uchijí ’ tama atinai . Apu Apajuiya nu , niina muunji apu David inamajakua iman emattawai .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Dutikamu asa , Israela uchijí wegantu aidaunum tuke inamjatnai , ni inabaujig ajumaish nagkankashtinai , — tau .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Tutai María ayaak : — ¿ Dusha wajuk nunimainaita wi aishinchauwaitagjama ? — tau .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Tutai nayaimpinmaya aents chichaak : — Wakaní Pegkeji , Apajuí senchijiya nujai aminak tajutjamamtai ejapjuktatme . Nuaduí uchi akiinatta duka , pegkejam ‘ Apajuí Uchijí ’ tama atinai .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Tuja ame pataim Elisabetchakam muumpatnum uchin ejapjuke , nunik seis nantu wegawai , kagai tinu agma nunú .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Apajuí tujinmainuk makichkish atsawai , — tau .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Tutai : — Dekas wika Apajuí inakegaitjai , ame mina tujutam duka nunisag uminkati , — tiu . Timatai nayaimpimaya aentschakam wegak ukukiu .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Nunú tsawan wegamunum , María waujus jiinki weuwai , Judea nugka mujajin yaakat aunum .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Nuwi jegaa , Zacariasa jeen wayaa Elisabetan kumpamak ,

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: María chichatai , Elisabetan wakeenia uchi kakaaju , nuniaig Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtuju ,

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: dutikam senchi jiiká chichaak : — Ashí nuwa aina nuwiyan amina Apajuí etegtamjae , antsag amina uchigmishkam pegkegmai .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Wi imanchawaitag nunin aish , ¿ wagka mina Apujú dukujimesh waitkatasamesh miname ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ame jegaa wayaam mina kumpamjakum chichaam nuna antaig , uchi kakaaje shiig aneak .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Shiig aneastatme amek , dekaskeap Apu tawa duka uminkattawa tiu asam .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Tutai Maríashkam : “ Wika Apajuinak dekaskenum mina anentaimtagjaí emematjai , tikima senchigtina ibau asamtai .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Shiig aneamu ajutui Apajuí mina uwemtijin asa ,

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: wi imanchauch aigkish niina inake asamtai mina etegtua duwi . Yamai nagkamsag ashí aents mina pachitus chichainakug : Maríak Apajuí etegkamu asa shiig aneas pujusuí , tusag tuké tujutiagtin ainawai .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Apajuí dekas ashí senchigtina nunú minai uminkatnun tujuti duka shiig tumaitsui , niina daajig pegkegmai ;

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Apajuik aents aidau niina umijuidaunak tuke wait anentsagké atinai .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Nigka tikima senchigtina ibau asa junak jutikae ; dutikak , emebau aidaunash imanchau emakui .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Apu inamin aidaunashkam jiikí ajapeak , aents imanchau aidaun apu emakui .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Aikasag nujantai waituidaunashkam ashí pegkeg aidaunak susauwai , dutikak wiyakuch aidaunak wainak idaisauwai .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Ni inake Israel wegantun ayamjuke , dita wait anentanak kajimatkiche ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: jutii muunji Abraham aajakua nuna aatus anagkuauwai , nuigtú ni wegantu akiinak wegagtina nuwish tuke atina nuna . ”

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: María nuna ti , Elisabetan jeenig kampatum nantu tumain pujusuí , nunik wakitkiuwai niina jeen .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Elisabet tsawanji uminkamtai aishmagkun uchigmakui .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Nunikmatai nui ijutkau batsataidau , niina patayí aidaujai Apajuí wait anenjam uchigmakbaun antukaju asag shiig aneasajui .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Uchi akiina ocho tsawan wetai , judío aidauk uchi aishmag akiinaunak tuke pakaji ajapjin asag , jukiajui nuna dutikawagtatus . Nuninak : “ Uchik Zacarías atí , apají daajiya nunisag ” , tuidau .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Tujash uchí dukují chichaak : — Atsá , uchik Juan atatui , — tau .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Tutai : — Ame pataim aina nuwiyag tu daagtinuk atsajama , — tuidau .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Tutai uchí apajin iwiyas iniidau , ya atí tawaki tusag .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Nuniagtai , taapna sujustá tusa inakmatai susam : “ Uchí daajig Juagkai ” tusa agaju . Dutikamtai ashí anentai jegagchaju .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Nuna dutikamuik ataktú chichakú . Nunik Apajuin emematiu .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Nunitai nui ijutkau batsamin aidauk puyatjukaju . Ashí Judea mujajin batsamin aidaushkam nunak ashí dekaawaju .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Ashí aents nuna antuidauk : “ ¿ Ju uchish wajukuk atinaita ? ” tusag anentaimaidau , Apajuí niina senchijin yayamun dekaidau asag .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Zacarías Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtujam chichaak :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ Emematiagmi Apu , Israelan Apajuijiya nu , ni aentsjin uwemtijatatus tau asamtai .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Dekas senchigtin Uwemtikagtinun awetugmaji , ni inake David aajakua nu wegantun .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Yaunchuk nagkamas Apajuí etsegtin pegkejam aajakaju etsegkajua dutiksag ,

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: iina shiwaji aidaun , nuigtú ashí tikich aents kajegtamin aina nunash depetuk uwemtijamjatna nuna .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Iina muunji aajakajua nuna pegkejan anagkuak : ‘ Tuké aminak wait anenjatnaitjame ’ , tiuwa nunak kajimattsuk betek umiké .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Iina apajin Abragkan dekas umiktatjai tiuwa duka juuwai :

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: ‘ Wi ditá shiwajinash depetukan agkan ematnaitjai , dutikam ishamkagtutsuk minak umigtuinak ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: pegkediag batsamas , wi wakegamunak ashí tsawantai takastinme ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Nuna ti uchijinashkam : “ Amek Apajuí etsegtinai tama atatme ; amek Apu takastina nu emtikam umigkattame .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Ni aentsji aidau uwemjatnuji , tudauji tsagkugnagtinchakam pachisam ujaktatme .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Nunak Apajuí shiig wait anenjamu asa nayaimpinmayan Uwemtikagtinun awetugmae , etsa minak tsawantan tsaaptin emama numamtuk wajaktinun .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Tudau takainak , suwenum batsamas wajukmaina numamtuk wajainak , jaak megkaemainnum batsatunash tsaaptinun iwaintuktatui . Dutikak jinta agkan pujutnum ekagtina nui wetinme tusa dekamtijamattawai ” , tiuwai .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Uchishkam tsakaak nuní senchi jintiag anentaimu , nuniak uwegshunum pujusuí , Israelnum chicham etsegkatin tsawan jegatai Apajuí awemam wantinkatatus .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Nu tsawantin Roma apuji Augusto daagtin , ashí aents aidau daaji agatnakti tusa inamjau .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Junak dutikchatain Cirenio , Siria apuji we pujai dutikauwai .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Tibau asamtai aents aidauk makí makichik ditá yaaktajin agatmamjatatus shimuidau .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Tuja Joseshkam Galileanum yaakat Nazaret awa nuwiya juwaki Judea nugkanum jegau , yaakat Belén apu David akiinamu aajakua nui , nigka David wegantu asa .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Nui agatmamjatatus wegak , ni nuwenamig tusa anagmamuji María ejamtinun ayasá weuwai .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Nunikag nui jegaa pujuinai tsawan ni uchigmaktinji jegajiu .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Nunikmatai iwaijin aishmagkun uchigmaku , dutika uchi pempetaiyai pempeag tagku ayugtainum egkeauwai , ijagka kajiitainig dita ayamainuk agkantak atsusú asamtai .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Nunú kashia duwik , uwijá kuitamin aidaushkam nu nugkanmag uwigjin kashi kuitamainak batsatu .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Nuniai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya wantintuku , dutikak Apajuí tsaaptinjiya nu tsawan awasau dita batsatbaunum , dutikam shiig senchi ishamkajui .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Nuniagtai nayaimpinmaya aents chichaak : “ Ishamkaigpajum , wika atumin yamajam chichaman ujaktasan minitjime , nuna antuinak ashí aents aidauk shiig aneasagtata nuna .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Yamai kashia juwi , apu David akiinauwa nunú yaaktanmag uwemtikagtin Apu Kristu akiinae .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Tagku ayugtainum uchi pempeajam egketu wainkajum , juwapita titajum . ”

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Nuna taig kuashat aents nayaimpinmaya aidau wantinjau , nunikag Apajuin emematuinak kantamainak :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: “ Nayaimpinmash Apajuiya duke emematiagmi , nugkanmayanash ashí niina umijuidaunak shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan susatta duwi ” , wajaidau .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidau tusa ditan ujak , nayaim waketjamtai , uwijan kuitamin aidau pempentunisajag : — Belén uchi akiinae tusa Apajuí tujama nunú wegaja wainkagmita , — tuidau .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Tusag waujus wegag jegakmag , Marían Josejai , nuigtú uchi tagku ayugtainum egkemtatman wainkaju .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Nunik wainkag uchin pachis nayaimpinmaya aents tibaun etsejuidau .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Tusag uwijá kuitamin aidau etsejiagtai , ashí aents aidauk puyatus antuidau .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Maríashkam nu etsejuinamun antuk , sakapamainchau anentaimu .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Nunikag uwijá kuitamin aidau waketuinak , Apajuin emematuinak see tuidau , ashí nayaimpinmaya aents tibaunak imatiksag wainkaju asag .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ocho tsawan jegamtai , uchin pakaji ajapjuinak adaikaju JISUS . María eke ejapjumainchau aig , nu adaikattame tusa nayaimpinmaya aents tibaunak dutiksag .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nui , uchigmaku aidauk cuarenta tsawan jegatai pegkeetnume tibauwa nuna ejeyag , Jerusalén weenak uchin jukiaju Apajuí emtin iwainakagtatus ,

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Apajuí chicham umiktajum tibaunum : “ Ashí uchi aishmag iwai akiinuk Apajuinu atí ” , tibau asamtai .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Weenak Apajuinu atinun jukiaju chicham umiktajum tibaunum : Jimag tórtola , nu atsakuig jimag paum tsakat itaatajum tibauwa dutiksag .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Nunú tsawantinig Jerusalén pujujakuí Simeón daagtin , aents pegkeg , Apajuí senchi aneen , Israelan Apajuí agkanmitkamun wainkatatus daká pujujin , Wakaní Pegkejishkam ajamu .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Nuniau asa dekamtikau aajakuí : Apajuí awemamu waintsukek jakashtinaitme , tusa .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: José Maríajai Jisusan jukiag jega Apajuí ememattainum jegawaju , chicham umiktinum dutikatajum tawa nuna betek umikagtatus . Nuniai Simeogshakam , Wakaní Pegkeji anentaimtikjam jegau .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Nunik uchin midaaki juki Apajuin emematu , nuniak :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Apuh , yamaik ame chicham tujutbauwa duka uminkau asamtai , shiig anentaimsan jaaknush jakatjai .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Uwemtikagtina nunak yamaik mina jiijuí wainkajai ,

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: ashí aents aidaushkam ame awemamun wainkagtata nuna .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Juka tsaaptina nuninai , ashí aents judiuchu aidaunashkam uwemtikatin asa , tuja amina aentsjum Israel aents aina nunash eme anentai ematnai ” , tau .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Uchí pachis tutai , Josek Maríajai anentai jegachaju .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Nuna ti ditanashkam : — Atumnash Apajuí yaimpaktinme , — tusa idayak , Marían chichajak : — Nijah , jujú uchia junak Israel aents aina nuwiyag dakitiagtinai , nuniai kuashat nemajuidaush agtinai nuninak uwemjagtinai .

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: Nuniagtai Apajuí ashí aents anentaibaujin paan iwainatta duka , ( aminak nagkí ijumaina imatijamak anentaiminig waitkagmastinai ) , — tau .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Nuanuig nuwa Apajuí etsegtin Ana daagtin , Fanuela nawanji Aser wegantu shiig muuntuch wajasá pujau . Nigka shiig tsakatuch aishina siete mijan pujusuí ,

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: nuniau wajemea ochenta y cuatro mijan wegau , nuigtushkam jega Apajuí ememattainmag tuke tsawai kashishkam , yujumkan ijagmá pujus Apajuin aujú pujú .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Nunin asa Simeón tusa ashimkamtai , Anashkam jegantá , Apajuin see taku emematak Jisusan pachis : — Ashí aents Jerusalén agkanmagati tusa dakaina nunak ju uchi dutikatnai , — tau .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Apajuí chicham umiktajum tibauwa nunak imatiksag umikag , ditá yaaktajin Nazaret waketjaju Galilea nugkanum awa nui .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Nunik batsatbaunum Jisuschakam tsakaak iyashinish senchi wegau , nuniak nuní senchi jintiag anentaimu , Apajuí wakega nunashkam shiig dekau , tuja Apajuishkam niiní shiig aneau .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Makí makichik mijantin José Maríajai , Jerusalén tuke wesagké aidau Pascua jegatai .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Nunin asagmatai Jisuschakam doce mijan ajamu weu , ditajai Jerusalén jista inagkeautaiya nuna betek dutikatatus .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Nuwi jegawag batsamas , Pascua ashimnakmatai waketjaju , nuninai Jisusak Jerusalén juwaku , niina dukujish Joseshkam dekatsaig .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Dita anentaimsajag tikich aidaujais ijunag wegatai tusag , makichik tsawan kuwaekaju , nuniau ashí ditá waintai , nuigtú ditá patayí aidaunmash egakú .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Tujash wainkachag Jerusalén waketjaju egainak .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Nunikag kampatum tsawanta juwi wainkaju , jega Apajuí ememattainum chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai ejapena ekeemas , chichaagtai antak niishkam iniimak eketun .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Ashí aents ni chichaamun antujuidauk , yachajin diijus puyatkag diidau , dita iniamash shiig aimu asamtai .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Nunittaman apají dukujijai wainak puyatjuk , dukují chichajak : — Uchuchih ¿ wagka tikima aan wekaenaitme ? Nijah , wi apajai shiig senchi puyatjukan egakun wekaetusjamna , — tau .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — ¿ Wagka minash egatjume ? ¿ Atumek dekatsjumek mina Apag wakegamun takaakun pujumainaitag duka ? — tau .

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Tujash ditak , wagkag tawa tusag dekagmainchau dekapedau .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Nunikag Jisusan jukiag Nazaret waketjajui , Jisus nui pujusá ashí dita tabaunak betek umiau . Tujash niina dukujig ashí Jisus nunikbaunak tuke kajimattsuk anentaimtú pujau .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Tuja Jisuschakam nuní senchi tsakau , dekatjinishkam nunisag , tuja Apajuishkam , aents aidaushkam shiig anentuidau .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Roma apuji Tiberio quince mijadai ashí nugkanum inamu . Tuja Poncio Pilato inamu Judeanum , nuniai Herodes inamu Galileanum , untsu niina yachi Felipe inamu Iturea , nuigtú Traconitenum , untsu Lisanias Abilinianum inamu .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Nuniamunum Anás , Caifás aatus sumo sacerdote aajakajui . Nunú batsatai Zacariasa uchijí Juan uwegshunum pujuttaman Apajuí ujakuí chichagkagtukti tusa .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Tima namak Jordagnum tikiju batsataidaunum ashí wekagas chichagkagtau , tudau takatan idayinak yamimag tsagkugnagtinme tusa .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nunak Isaías Apajuí etsegtin agagbauwa nui , ju tibauwa nu tau asamtai nunikui : “ Makichik aents eemak taa uwegshunum wekagas senchi jiiká chichagkagtak : Apu wekaesatnun jintan shiig iwajug , esegak tutupit dakueg ,

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: ashí jinta japagau aidaunash nugkan aintug , nainnashkam yumpuag pakamak betekmak , jinta tunin aidaunash tutupit esegak , tutitag aidaunashkam shiig iwajug umiyajama numamtuk , atumi anentaimish shiig iwajajum umiktajum , Apu minitin asamtai .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Apajuí aents aidau uwemtikatnun awematta nunak ashí aents wainkagtinai ” , tawai .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Kuashat aents aidau Juan yamiijati tusag minituidau , nuniagtai chichajak : “ ¡ Atumek iwanchi uchijí asajum aents tsanú yujagme ! ¿ Wagka yamimagtasagmesh wakegagme ? ¿ Atumek ayatak yamimamuikis Apajuí suwimak sukagtumaina duka uwemtumainaitai tajumek ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Dekas tudau takatan idaisaush wajuku amainaita nunú iwainmamkatajum . Atumkek : Jutiik Abraham wegantu asaja yupichuch uweemain ainaji , tumamigpa . Dekas tajime : Apajuik jujú kaya aina junakeshkam Abragka uchijí emamainai .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ashí ajak nejechu aidauk , jachai ajaka tsupija apetiama numamtuk , aents tudaunak taká batsatun , Apajuí suwimak susatnuk uminas awai . ”

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Tutai aents aidau iniinak : — ¿ Tujash wajukmainaitji ? — tuidau .

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Tiagtai ni ayaak : — Jimag nugkumainji ajamuk atsugbaun susati , yumainji ajamushkam dutiksag dutikati , — tau .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin aidaushkam yamimagtasag kaunawag iniinak : — ¿ Jintinkagtinuh , jutiish wajukmainaitji ? — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Tiagtai : — Apunu kuichik atinun akikmainakui juwajum nunú , nuní inagkeasjum aents aidau akikmakta tigpajum , — tau .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Tutai Suntag aidaushkam dutiksag : — ¿ Jutiish wajukmainaitji ? — tuidau . Tiagtai : — Atumek aents uwakajum atanjum duka dutikawaigpa , tikitchakam wainkagmek tsanumjujaigpajum , atumí apujum akigmaina nujaig shiig aneasjum juwaktajum , — tau .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Tuja ashí aents aidauk , Apajuí awematnaitjai tibauwa nuna daká batsataidau asag : ¿ Juagchauwashit Kristu ? tusag anentaimtuidau .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Tu anentaibiagtai aents aidaun Juan chichajak : “ Wika ayatak yumí yamijatjai , tujash mina nagkaetasu senchigtin minittawai , wika niiya imanchau asan niina sapatjinakesh atitmaitsujai . Nunú yamigmagtatjume Wakaní Pegkejiya nujai , nuigtushkam nigki jiiyai suwimkan sukagtustinuk .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Nigki ashí aents aina nuwiyan akanjattawai , aents trigon ajakbau aidau juuká ijumag , awagti wampujin utsaak nejeen trigo ijumtainum yajumama numamtuk , Apajuí umigchaunak jii ajumaish kajinkashtina nui suwimkan suwak , niina umigkau aidaunak ni pujutaijin yajuaktinai . ”

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Juna aatus tusa nuigtush aents aidaun jintintu yamajam chicham pekeja nuna : “ Dekas Kristu Apajuí Uchijiya duka tajutjamae ” , tusa .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Tusa jintinkagtú wekagu asa Herodes Galileanmaya apua nuna igkua : “ Yatsum Felipe nuwe Herodías jujukium auk pegkegchauwai , tikitchakam pegkegchau takame ” , tusa jiyakú .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Tusá Juan tima , Herodes senchi kajeká nuní nagkaemas pegkegchaun takaak , Juagkan achiká aents achiká chimpitainum egkeauwai .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Juan ashí aentsun yamiak pujai , Jisuschakam yamimajui , nunik Apajuí aujai nayaim ujaniuwai .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Nunikmatai Wakaní Pegkeji pauma nunin wajas paan wainainamunum niiní akagu , nuniai nayaimpinmaya chicham antuekau : — Ametme mina uchig aneetaigmek , aminí shiig aneajai , — tabau .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Jisusak treinta mijanji ajamu tumain ni takaamujinak nagkabauwai . Jisusnak José uchijiyai tuidau , Josek Elí uchijí aajakuí ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Elik Matata uchijí , Matat Leví uchijí , Levik Melqui uchijí , Melquik Jana uchijí , Jana José uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: José Matatiasa uchijí , Matatías Amosa uchijí , Amós Nahuma uchijí , Nahum Eslí uchijí , Eslí Nagai uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nagai Maata uchijí , Maat Matatiasa uchijí , Matatías Semei uchijí , Semei José uchijí , José Judá uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Judá Joana uchijí , Joana Resa uchijí , Resa Zorobabela uchijí , Zorobabel Salatiela uchijí , Salatiel Neri uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Neri Melqui uchijí , Melqui Adi uchijí , Adi Cosama uchijí , Cosam Elmodama uchijí , Elmodam Era uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Er Josué uchijí , Josué Eliezera uchijí , Eliezer Jorima uchijí , Jorim Matata uchijí , Matat Leví uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Leví Simeogka uchijí , Simeón Judá uchijí , Judá José uchijí , José Jonagka uchijí , Jonán Eliaquima uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Eliaquim Melea uchijí , Melea Mainagka uchijí , Mainán Matata uchijí , Matat Natagka uchijí , Natán Davita uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: David Isaí uchijí , Isaí Obeta uchijí , Obed Booza uchijí , Booz Salmogka uchijí , Salmón Naasogka uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Naasón Aminadapa uchijí , Aminadab Arama uchijí , Aram Esroma uchijí ; Esrom Faresa uchijí , Fares Judá uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Judá Jacopa uchijí , Jacob Isaaka uchijí , Isaac Abragka uchijí , Abraham Taré uchijí , Taré Nacora uchijí ;

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nacor Serugka uchijí , Serug Ragau uchijí , Ragau Pelegka uchijí , Peleg Hebera uchijí , Heber Sala uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Sala Cainagka uchijí , Cainán Arfaxata uchijí , Arfaxad Sema uchijí , Sem Noé uchijí , Noé Lameka uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Lamec Matusalegka uchijí , Matusalén Enoca uchijí , Enoc Jareta uchijí , Jaret Mahalaleela uchijí , Mahalaleel Cainagka uchijí ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Cainán Enosa uchijí , Enós Seta uchijí , Set Adagka uchijí , Adagkak Apajuí najanamu .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Jisus Wakaní Pegkeji egkemtujam Jordagnumia jiinki wakettai , Wakaní Pegkeji uwegshunum emauwai .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Dutikam nui cuarenta tsawantai Jisus pujaun iwanch dekapsauwai . Imaan tsawan yutsuk inagkeau asa yapajuauwai .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Nunitai iwanch chichajak : — Dekas ame Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek , ju kaya nu pag emam yuwakia , — tau .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Agagbau awai : ‘ Aentsuk imá yujumkajaigkik pujumaitsui , Apajuí chichamega nujaishkam pujumainai ’ , — tiuwai .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Timatai iwanch nui inagkeaki Jisusan muja tsakajunum iwakuí . Dutika juú inaktamuik ashí nugkanum yaakat aina nuna , nuigtú ashí pegkeg aidaunashkam iwaintukui .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Dutika chichajak : — Ashí ju imaja junak amina amastajame . Juka minai idaisamui , nuaduí wi wakegamun sumainaitjai .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Ame mina tikishmajam emematjakminig , ashí aminuk atí tusan idaitustajame , — tau .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¡ Wetá iwanchih ! agagbau awai : ‘ Ame Apujum Apajuiya duke emematta , nuniakum imá nigki umigkata ’ , tawai — tiu .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Timatai nui inagkeaki yaakat Jerusalén ejegau , dutika jega Apajuí ememattainum yakí iwaká : — Ame dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitkumek juwi wajasmek tsekem iyaata ,

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: wagki agagbau awai : ‘ Apajuí ni aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidaun awetugmattawai kuitamjamkatnun ,

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: dutikamu asag uwegmin achigmakagtatui iyaakum kaya tukumkaim tusa ’ , — tau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Agagbau awai : ‘ Amina Apujum Apajuiya nu pegkegchaunum dekapsatasamek wakeyipa ’ , tawai — tiuwai .

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Timatai iwanchik pegkegchau takamtiksatatus anentaimtusbaunak ashí dekapes ukukiuwai , tikich tsawantinish dekapsatjai tusa .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Nunik Jisusak Wakaní Pegkeji senchimtikam Galilea wakitkiuwai , nunikmatai ashí nugkanum nui batsataidauk niina pachisag kuashat chichaidau .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Nui jegaa , jega ijuntainum wayaa jintinkagtutai ashí aents aidauk emematuidau .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Jisus Nazaret ni pujusá tsakagbaunum wakitki jegaa , tsawan ayamtai tsawagmatai jega ijuntainum wayau tuke nunin asa . Nunik wajainiu Apajuí chichamen ausatatus ,

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: nunitai papiin Apajuí etsegtin Isaías agagbaun susaju . Dutikam dakuek diikmá ju agagbauwa juna wainak , auju :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: “ Wakaní Pegkejig minai awai nuniau asamtai mina etegtuae , ujunauch aidaun pegkeg chicham aidaun ujaktí tusa . Apajuí minak awetine , achikbau aidaush agkanmagawagtatui tusam ujaktá tusa . Wainmachu aidaushkam wainmitkakta dutikakum waitkatai aidaush ayamjukta ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: tuja yamaik Apajuí aentsun wait anentawai tusam etsegkata ” tibauwa nuna .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Nuna aujus inagnak pempeag nui takaun susa ekeemsau . Nunikmatai ashí aents nui utsanawajuk , dii pekajaidau .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Nuniagtai : — Wi augbau antukujum juka yamai uminkae , — tiuwai .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Ashí aents aidauk niina pachisag pegkejan etsegtuidau , ni wají pegkeg pachisa chichamunashkam puyatjusag diidau , nuninak : — ¿ Jujú Josen uchijiya jama ? — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Tiagtai ni chichaak : — Dekaskenum jujú chicham : ‘ Ampijatnuh , amek ampimata ’ tibauwa ju tujuttatjume . ‘ Nuigtushkam kuashat wají Capernaum ame dutikamu antinuweg nu , yamai amina nugkemia juwish dutikata ’ tujuttatjume , — tau .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Nuna ti nuigtú : — Dekas tajime : Apajuí etsegtinuk ni nugkenig wakejusa antugmak achauwai .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Junak dekas tajai : Apajuí etsegtin Elías pujujakua nunú tsawantinig , Israel nugkanum batsamajakajui kuashat nuwa waje aidau , nuniamunum ashí Israel nugkanum nujantai waitiamu tepeauwai , kampatum mijan jimaituk yumi yutachu asamtai .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Tujash Apajuik atumní waje batsatun Elías yaigtí tusa awematsuk , Sareptanmaya nuwa waje judiuchu , yaakat Sidón tikiju awa nui pujaunum Eliasnak awemauwai .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Nuigtushkam kuashat aents jata lepra tutain achimaku Israel aijakuí , Apajuí etsegtin Eliseo pujujakua nunú tsawantin , tujash makichkish nunú aidaunak etsagautsuk , judiuchu Naamán Siria nugkanmayaya nuna etsagajui , — tiuwai .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Tusa tutai jega ijuntainum utsaanawajuk senchi kajekaju .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Nunikag wajatjag Jisusan achiká jukiag yaaktan ukumtikiag mujanum iwakaju , betsag tajaekaunum ajuami tusag .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Dutikam dita mininamunmag eteenki , eteenki waketak ukukiuwai .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Nunik Jisusak yaakat Capernaum Galilea nugkanum awa nui weuwai . Nui pujus tsawan ayamtai tsawautai jintinkagtau .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Nunitai puyatjusag antujuidau ni jintiamunak , nigka aents chichame antugtai aidaun nagkaesau jintinkagtau asamtai .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Nuniamunum aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu jega ijuntainum wayaa eketu , shiig senchi untsumak :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: — ¡ Jisus Nazaretnumiayah ukujatkita ! ¿ Wagka amesh jutii pujamunmash miname , ijijatuatasamek minam ? Wika ame yaitpa nunak dekagme , Apajuinu pegkegma nuuwaitme , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Tutai Jisus jiyaak : — ¡ Itatkata , takamtak jiinkim wegakum aanú aentsuk ukuktá ! Tama wakan pegkegchaushkam aentsun nugká ajiaju tikich aidau emtin , nunik jiinkiu , dutikashkam aentsnak machikish pegkegchauk emachui .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Nunikmatai wainkag ashí aents aidauk anentai jegagchaju , nunikag : — ¿ Jusha wajuku asaya chichamesh senchigtinaita , wakan pegkegchau aidaunash chichamenig jiyaa jusha ? — tuidau .

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Jisus dutikamua nunak ashí nugka tikiju aidaunum batsatuk antujajui .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Jega ijuntainmaya Jisus jiinki Simón Pedro jeen jegauwai . Nunikmá wainkau Simón Pedro tsatsají senchi tsuweak tepettaman , nunitai : — Wait aneasam etsagagta , — tusag segajui .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Tiagtai Simón Pedro tsatsajin jegantun tsuntsumtua : “ ¡ Tsuwemuwah ukuktá ! ” , tiu . Tamawaik pegkeg wajasuí , nunik yutain inajuk Jisusan , nuigtú niijai yujau aidaunashkam ajamsau .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Agkuantai kuashat aents jaidaun Jisusan ikautkajui , dutikawagmatai niishkam makí makichik achiká etsagakui .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Tuja wakan pegkegchau aidau kuashat aentsun egkemtujuk senchi untsumak jiinainak : — Amek Apajuí Uchijiyaitme — tuidau , Kristuk Apajuí awemamua nuna dekaidau asag , tujash Jisusak chichaktí tusag idaichau .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Nunik tsawau tsawaig yaaktanmaya jiinki , nugka agkantu aents atsamunum weuwai . Nunikmatai aents aidauk egai egainakua ni pujamunum jegawag : — ¡ Ukujatkipa ! — tusag segaidau .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Tuinam : — Wika tikich yaakat aina nuwish yamajam chicham Apajuí aentsnum wajuk inamua nunak etsegkattajai , nuna nunikti tusa awemamuitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Tau asa , Galileanum jega ijuntai aidaunmash wayaa jintinkagtau .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus kucha Genesaretnum uwet wekagai , kuashat aents Apajuí chichamen antukagtatus tuwakag chanuidau .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Imaniagtai niimkamá , jimag bote anugkam tepettaman wainkau , namaká main aidaushkam botenmaya jinjag redjin nijainak batsamtuidaun .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Nunik Simogka botejin egkemag : Machik ejapeen inanmanta , tusa nui ekeemas aents tuwakun jintintu .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Nunik ashimak , Simogkan chichajak : — Wiyankam ejapeen emam redjum ajugkam namak maata , — tiuwai .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Tama Simón ayaak : — Jintinkagtinuh , kashi tuke ajú ajunkawa tsawampakuish makichkish maachmaji , tujash ame chichamjumin ajugtajai , — tusa

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: ajugkú . Dutikkamá shiig kuashat namakan achikú , imatikamu asa rednak ichiau .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Nunitai ditá kumpají tikich botenmayan iwiyaidau , taawag yaimpaktinme tusag . Dutikam kautuawaju , nunikag namaknak botenmag mai aimkaju , dutikam botek tepeattak wajau .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Imanitai Simón Pedro , Jisusan tikishmatug pujujus : — Apuh , ukugkita minak , wika shiig tudauwaitjai , — tiu .

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Namakan imatika kajegkaju asag , ditajai yujaidauk puyatkajui ,

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Simogjai ijunja namak mautaiji aidau Jacobo , Juan Zebedeo uchijí aina dushakam . Nunitai Jisus chichajak : — Simogkah ishamkaipa , namak maatasajum yujagjum anmamtuk , Apajuí chichame etsegkujum aents aidau minai ikautjin atajum tusan wi jintintuatjime , — tiu .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Nunikag bote aidaunak anugkag , ashí ukuinak Jisusjai wegajui .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus makichik yaaktanum pujai , aents lepragtin tajuauwai , nunik Jisusan wainak tikishmag tsuntsumá , nijayin nugká antig pujusá : — Apuh , wakegakmek etsaentumainaitme , — tau .

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Tama Jisuschakam uwejen antiak : — Wakegajai , yamaik tsagagta , — tiuwai . Tusa tamawaik leprak megkaekauwai .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Dutika Jisus : — Makichik aentskesh ujakaipa , tutupit sacerdote pujamunum jegaata , nuniakum ame tsagaja pegkeg webaujum iwainmamkum , Moisés tibauwa dutiksamek ejegata ditashkam : Dekaskeap tsagaje , tujabiagti , — tiu .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Tujash ni dutikamua duka senchi naatu , nuniau asamtai tuwajuidau ni chichamen antugkagtatus , nuigtú dita jaamujinash etsaentugtinme tusag .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Tujash nigka kanaká nugka agkantunum wegau , nunik Apajuin auju .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Makichik tsawantai Jisus jintinkagtutai fariseo aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai wayawag antuinak pekajaidau , Galilea nugkanmaya , Judea nugkanmaya , nuigtú yaakat Jerusalén batsamin aidau kaunkajushkam , nunik wainaidau Jisus Apajuí senchijin aents jau etsagamun .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Nuniamunum wajumak aents aidau , aents wekaechaun ainká tepetaijin pataidiag itawag : Wajuk jegá wayaik Jisus wajamunum ejentag , tuidau .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Tujash kuashat aents tuwakú asa waimainchau asamtai , jegá tuntupen wakag chigkaidiag , wekaechauwa nuna ainká tepetaijijai nenawag akakiaju , dutikawag Jisusa emtin aepsaju .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Nunú aents aidau niiní kajinas anentaimaidaun wainu asa : — Aishmagkuh , amina tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje , — tau .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Nuna tutai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , fariseo aidaujai ditak anentaimsag : “ ¿ Niish ya asaya Apajuinash pegkegchaunash chichajua ? Imá Apajuikeajama tudaun tsagkugkagtumainuk ” , tuidau .

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Tu anentaimaidaun Jisus dekau asa : — ¿ Wagka annush anentaimjume ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: ¿ Tuwaita imá yupichuch tumainush , tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje taja dukaih , atsa nantakim wetá tumainaitag dukaih ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinau asan , ju nugka juwish tudau aidaunash tsagkugkagtumainaitag nu dekaatajum . Tusa wekaechaun chichajak : — Amina tajame , nantakim ainká tepetaijum jukim jeemin wakitkita , — tiuwai .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Tusa tamawaik ditash ijunaig , nantakí ni ainká tepamujin juki Apajuin emematki jeen wakitkiuwai .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Dutikamtai ashí aents aidauk puyatkag Apajuin emematuinak : — ¡ Yamai dekas wainkaji Apajuí senchijiya duka ! — tuidau .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Nuna dutika ukuak jiinkiu , nunik wekamá Levin wainkauwai , kuichik apunu atinun akikmagtai yajumak ekeemtatman , nunik : — Mina jintintaig atá , wemí , — tiuwai .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Tama ni takataijinak ashí ukuak Jisusjai weuwai .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Nunik nunú tsawantaik Jisusan eme anentus ajamsatatus niina jeen yutain shiig umikú , dutikamunum Leví kumpají , apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin aidaushkam , nuigtú tikich aidaujai mesanum pekajaidau .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Nuniagtai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau fariseo aidaujai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidaun ashishmatuidau , nuninak : — ¿ Wagka atumesh apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin , nuigtú aents pegkegchau aina ibaujai ijunjajum yuwakjumesh , umutash ditajaish umajume ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Aents jamamtuchu aidauk ampijatnunak atsumtsame , aents jau aidau ampijatnunak atsumame .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Wika aents tudaugtuchu aidaunak minitchauwaitjai , wika aents tudaugtin aidau tudaujin idayinak mina nemagtuktinme tusan tauwaitjai , tiuwai .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Jisus tutai dita aiinak : — ¿ Wagka Juan Yamijatna nuna jintintai aidauk , fariseo aidaujai yujumkan ijagmainaish , amina jintintaijum aidauk yuwinak , umutnash umu wajaash yujainawa ? — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Tutai ni ayaak : — ¿ Nuwena nunú aents ipaamu aidaush , nu nuwenu ditajai pujaigkish , yujumkan ijagmak pekamainkaih ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Tujash tsawan jegattawai nuwena nunú juwam atata nu , nunikmatai ipaamu aidaush wake besemag dekapenak yujumkanak ijagmakagtatui , — tiuwai .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Tusa junashkam augmatus : — Makichkish nugkutai yamagman tsupikag nugkutai mamujunmag adujtuchu ainawai , dutikamak nugkutai yamagmaitak besemain asamtai , tuja yamajam tsupikbau mamujunum adujtamashkam shiig juwamaitsui .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Tuja makichkish uva yumiji yamá ijugbaunak , vino yajatai duwap apagbau ajutnumag yajachu ainawai , dutikamak uva yumiji yamá ijugbau kajiak , duwap apagbaun ipatmainai , nunik vinuk ukagag duwap apagbaujai ajapnamainai .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Duwi uva yumiji yamá ijugbauk duwap yamajam apagbaunum yajataiyai , dutikamu asa vino kajiak pushutakushkam ayatak egkenag wetai nunisag pegkejak amainai .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Tuja umutai yaunchuk najanamun umin aidauk , yamagmanak wakegainatsui , ditak : ‘ Yaunchuk najanamua nu imá pegkejai ’ tuidau asag , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Tsawan ayamtai tsawaju ai , Jisus ajak ajakbaunum nagkaebau . Nuniamunum ni jintintaiji aidau trigo nejeen kupik jukiag uwejen pakajag yuwidau .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Nuniagtai fariseo aidau ditan chichajuinak : — ¿ Wagka atumesh tsawan ayamtai tsawagmataig takantsashti tibauwa nunin aish aikagme ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan ayaak : — ¿ Atumek agagbauk ausachuk ainajum , David niijai yujaamujai yapajuinak ,

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa , pag imá sacerdotek yuwati tibauwa nuna juki , niina kumpají aidaujai yuwawajua duka ? — tau .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Nuna ti , nuigtú chichaak : — Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinau asan , tsawan ayamtai tsawagmataish wajukmainaita nunak wikitjai tumainnuk , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Atakeshkam tsawan ayamtai tsawagmatai , Jisus jega ijuntainum wayaa jintinkagtau . Nuniamunum aents uwejé untsujiya nu chuwijú nui pujau .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Nunitai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , fariseo aidaujai Jisusan diidau , tsawan ayamtai aig etsagaun wainkag tsanumjugtasag .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Tujash nigka dita anentaibaujinak dekau asa , aents uwejé chuwijun chichajak : — Wajakim ejapeen wajantá . Tama niishkam wajakí ejapeen wajantú .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Nunikmatai Jisus chichaak : — Iniastajime : ¿ Tsawan ayamtai aish pegkeja duká takamainait , atsa pegkegchauk dutikmainait ? ¿ Tsawan ayamtai tsawaje tusaik , aentsuk etsagautsuk jakati tusa idaimainait ? — tau .

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Nuna ti ashí aents nui ijunun diisá , nuna aentsun chichajak : — Uwejum dakuekta , — tiuwai . Tama dakueku , nunik uwejenig pegkeg wajasú .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Dutikamtai senchi kajekag : Jisusash itugmainkita tusag ditá ditak chichaidau .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus Apajuin ausatatus mujanum weu , nunik nui kashi pujus Apajuí au aujkawa tsawampajui .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Nunik tsawaag ni jintintaiji aina nuwiyan doce etegkeg ijumjauwai , nunú aina nunak : “ Mina chichameg etsegtujin atajum ” , tiuwai .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Duka jujú ainawai : Simón , Pedro atí tibauwa nu , Andrés Simogka yachi , nuigtú Jacobo , Juan , Felipe , Bartolomé ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mateo , Tomás , Jacobo Alfeo uchijí , nuigtú Simón niina nugken agkanmitkatatus kuashat aents aidaujai chichaajakua nu .

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Judas Jacobo yachi , tikich Judas Iscariote Jisusan unupiag sujukua nu aatus .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Nunik ditajai ijunag akaiki , pakanum wajantú ni jintintaiji aidaujai . Nunikmatai kuashat aents tuwagkaju ashí Judeanmaya , Jerusalegnumia , Tiro nayants awa nuwiya , Sidognumia aidau , ni jintinkagtamujin antukagtatus , nuigtushkam dita jaamujinash etsaentugti tusag ,

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: nuniagtai wakan pegkegchau egkemtugbau aidaunash etsagakui .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
