text2: Ashí aents aidauk Jisusan antigtatus kakanmamaidau , niiniya senchi jiinak ashí aents jau aidaunak etsagau asamtai .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun diisá chichajak : “ Atum iik nagkamik iina senchijinig pegkeg pujuta duka jumaitsuapi tautigmek shiig aneasjum pujustajum , Apajuí atumiin inamjatin asamtai ” , tau .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: “ Atum yamai Apajuinu pegkeg takastasa wakegakjum , yapajaku waitmaina imanikjum waitiautigmek shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumnak Apajuí kuashat amastin asamtai . Atum yamai wake besemag batsatkujum buutú pujautigmesh shiig aneasjum pujustajum , atumek shiig aneakjum dushigtin asajum .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: “ Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunú nemagtuidau asagmin , aents aidau kajegtamainak yajá pujusta tusa jiipainak , pegkegchau chichagtamainak , daagmin adaisajash pegkegchau tujamainakuish shiig aneastin atajum .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Nuna imatjutpainakuish shiig aneasjum dakujustajum , atum nayaimpinum jukitna duka wají shiig pegkeg kuashat ajutjamaidau asamtai . Atumi muunjum aajakajua dushakam , yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin batsamajakajua nunashkam aatus waitkasaju ainawai .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: “ ¡ Tujash atum wiyakuch aidautigminak wait anentajime ! Atumek shiig aneasjum pujajume ashí ajutjamaidau asamtai , tujash atak waittsatin ainagme .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: “ ¡ Atum atsumkas yuwá batsatutigminak wait anentajime ! Atak yapajakjum waittsatin asagmin . “ ¡ Atum yamai uyumat aneakas ayatak dushit batsamtautigminak wait anentajime ! Atumek waitiakjum buuttin asagmin .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: “ ¡ Atum ashí aents pegkegnum chichajam aidautigminak wait anentajime ! atumi muunjum aajakajua dusha imatikas chichajujakajui waitá etsejin aidaun .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: “ Atum mina chichameg antugtautigmin tajime : Atumi shiwajum aidaush aneetajum , kajegtamaidaushkam pegkegnum yaigtajum ;

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: pegkegchau chichagtamaidaush pegkegnum chichagkatajum , wainak tsanumjutpainakuish Apajuí aujtustajum .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Yapinum awatamkujaish , juinia yapijuish awatita tusajum ayampatuatajum ; pataká awantak nugkuagbaugmin jujutjamkujaish , tikitchakam susata .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Atsumamun segapainakuig sujittsuk susata ; tuja atumin wajiigmin segapatsuk jujutjamkuishkam , awagtugkita tutsuk idaisatajum .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Atum tikich aidau shiig awajtuktinme tusajum wakejin ainajum nunisjumek tikichish shiig awajkatajum .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: “ Atumin anempa duke atumshakam aneakjumesh , ¿ wají imana juwagme ? Aents tudaugtin aidaushkam dita aneniamujaig aneninawai .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Atumin pegkegnum yaimpaina duke yayakjumesh ¿ wají imana juwagme ? Aents tudaugtin aidaush dita yainiamujaig yainin ainawai .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Atumí kumpajum kuichkin waamak awagtugmamaina duke tsagkatkugmesh ¿ wají imana juwagme ? Aents tudaugtin aidaushkam kumpajin tsagkatkag awagtugkitpash tusag dakainawai .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Atumí shiwajum aidaush aneetajum , nuniakjum pegkegnum yaimkatajum , tuja tsagkatkagtukmesh betekash awagtugkit tusagmek anentaimtú pujuigpa . Atum jukitnuk nayaimpinum kuashat wají shiig pegkeg aidau ajutjamiagtinai , aaja dutikakjum Apajuí uchijí atinaitjume . Nigka aents pegkegchau , niina see tuchau aidaunash wait anentin asamtai ,

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: wait anenkagtin atajum , atumin Apa nayaimpinum pujuwa nu wait anenkagtina ibau asamtai .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: “ Tikichi pujutjig augmatú yujaigpajum , Apajuí atumnash aikasag tujaminum . Tikich suwimak susatasagmesh chicham umijú yujaigpajum , Apajuí atumnash tikich itujajum dutiksag dutijamawainum . Dekas tsagkujatajum , Apajuí atumnash tsagkugtamjatnume .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Tikich atsumaushkam susatajum , atum tikich wajuk suwajume , dutiksag Apajuishkam atum atsumamunak amastatjume .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: “ Jisus junashkam augmatak tau : ¿ Wainmachush tikich wainmachunash jintanash inaktumainkaih ? ¿ Mai waanum iyaumainchaukaih ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Jintinbauwa duka jintinkagtinun nagkaesauk dekatsui . Untsu papí augbaujin ashimak , jintinkagtinjai betek wemainai .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: “ ¿ Wagka yatsum imanchau takaish , atum imá pegkegchau takaayatkugmesh , auk pegkegchaun takaawai tusagmesh augmatú yujagme ? Nu nuniakjumek aents niina jiin tsetse muun egketun waintsuk , tikichi jiin tsetse piipich egketun wainmaina numamtuk wajagme .

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: ¿ Itugsagmek atum imá pegkegchau takaajum nu wainmamchautigmesh : Yatsujuh , pegkegchau takaam duka idaisata titagme ? ¡ Aentsú tsanú aidauwah ! Dekas dekatkauk ame imá pegkegchau takaam nuuwá idaisam , duwi yatsum imanchau takaidaushkam , idaisata titajum .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: “ Ajak pegkeja duka pegkegchaunak nejemaitsui , ajak pegkegchaushkam pegkegnak nejemaitsui .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Ashí ajak aina duka niina nejeen dekanui , untukjak munchiinak nejetsame , aantsag uvashkam jagkinmayag juushtayame .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Aents pegkejak pegkegnumag anentaimu asa , chichaakush pegkegnak chichauwai . Nunisag aents pegkegchaushkam pegkegchaunak anentaimu asa , pegkegchaunak chichawai . Aentsuk ni wajukuna anentaimua , nunak chichaak iwainawai .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: “ ¿ Wagka mina chichameg umigtachiatkugmesh : ‘ Apujuh , Apujuh ’ tujutjume ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Ashí aents mina nemagtuidau , mina chichamjun antugtukag imatiksag umigtuidaush wajukuita nuna titajai .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Duka aents jegá jegamkatatus initak tai , kaya muunnum dekanmitkak ajia shiig jegamkamun , namak piyujak senchi tukuakush , makichkish umuchkachua numamtinai .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Tujash mina chichamjun antayatak umigtachuk , aents jegá jegamak , nugka suugnum kaya atsamunum initak ajitsuk jegamkamun , namak dujajua piyujak senchi tukú tegak ajapama numamtinai . ”

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Jisus jintinkagtamujin ashimak Capernaum weuwai .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Nui capitani inake dekas aneetaiji jakattak tepau .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Nuniau asamtai capitán Jisus pachisa chichaamun antuk , judío apuji aidaun wajumak awetiuwai : Wait aneas taa mina inakeg jaa juna etsaentujati , tusa .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Tima Jisusan jegajiag ujakaju , nuninak : — Au capitanik dekas wait aneasam yaimainaitme .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Nigka judío aidautinash anejatnuwe , nuniau asa jega ijuntainash jegamjutpakmayi .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Tiagtai Jisuschakam ditajai weu . Nunikag jegá tikiju wajasá weenai , capitán niina kumpají aidaun awetiu , dutikak : “ Apu kajegtukaigka , wika niiya ibaunak mina jegajuig awaimaitsujai ,

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: nuniau asan wi niina egamainnash egakchamjai , ayatak tsagagti tujutti tamak mina inakjush tsagagtatui .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Wi apu umigbau ajutui , aantsag suntag mina umigtuidau ajutuinawai , nunú aidaun wi : Jiinjajum shiyaktajum , tamak jiinag shimumainai , tuja : Waketjatajum , tamashkam waketug kaunmainai , nunisag mina inakeg aidaushkam : Ju dutikata , tamak betek umigtuinawai . Aantsag Jisus anuí pujusag , tsagagti tamak mina inakjush tsagaumainai tujamae ” , tuidau .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Tuinam Jisus antuk anentai jegagchau , nunik nui aents minidaun ayampattsag : — Israel aina nuigkish imatikas minai kajinas anentaimunak wainchaujai , — tau .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Nunú awemamu waketug jegá kaunkamá inak jaa tepau ukukbauk , tsagag pegkeg pujaun wainkaju .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Nuna nunik Jisus yaakat Naín tutainum wegau . Nunitai ni jintintai aidau nuigtú kuashat aents aidau saetukaju .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Nunik yaakta waitijin tikiju wajas wegai , nuwa wajé uchijí makichkiuch ajamu jakamtai ukustatus emaidau , nunitai nuwan uyunainak kuashat aents weedau .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Nunittaman Jisus wainak wait anenjau , nunik nuwan chichajak : — Buutipa , — tiu .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Tusa ukuak jakau egkea yanasá wegamun antigku . Dutikamtai yanasá weedaush wajantaju , nunikmatai chichajak : — Datsauchih nantaktá , — tiu .

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Tusá tamawaik jakaushkam nantakí chichau , nunikmatai dukujin susauwai .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Dutikamtai ashí aents aidauk ishamkag Apajuin emematuinak : — Apajuí etsegtin dekas senchigtin jutiinish ajutjamji , Apajuí ni aentsji aidautin yaimpaktatus awetugmaji , — tuidau .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Nu dutikamuk ashí Judeanmag antuejau , nui tikiju aneem batsatu aidaunmashkam .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Jisus dutikamun Juagká jintintaiji aidau antukag , Juagnashkam ujakaju . Dutika ujaam ni jintintaijin jimajan untsuká ,

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Jisus pujamunum awebau iniastinme : “ ¿ Amekaitam Apajuí uwemtikagtinun awematnaitjai tibauwa nunú ? ¿ Amechuitkuminig tikichnak dakastatag ? ” tusa .

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Tusá awemajam Jisusan kautuawag : — Juan Yamijatna nu amina iniasti tusa awetamaji , nuniak : ¿ Amekaitam Apajuí uwemtikagtinun awematnaitjai tibauwa nunú , amechuitkuminig tikichik dakastatag ? timae , — tuidau .

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Nuna tuinaig aents jau aidaun , tikich jatai waituidaunash , wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aidaun , nuigtú wainmachu aidaunashkam etsagaku .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Dutika Jisus ditan ayaak : — Wetajum , nunikjum atum wainkaujum ju , nuigtú antukujum dushakam Juan ujaktajum : Wainmachush wainmainawai , shutushkam wekagainawai , lepragtin aidaush tsagainawai , empekush antuinawai , jakaush nantainawai , tuja ujunauch aidaunash yamajam chichaman jintinmae tusajum .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Nuaduí wi takaamujua nuna wainainak dekaskeapi tujutuidauk , shiig aneasagtinai timae tusam ujaktá , — tiu .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Juan awemamu aidau waketjamtai , Jisus Juagkan pachis aents aidaun iniak : “ ¿ Wají wainkatasagmea uwegshunmash wegabiugme ? ¿ Tagkanan dase umpuau wainkatasagmek wegabiujum ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Nuniachkugmesh ¿ wají wainkatasagmea wegabiugme ? ¿ Aents shiig iwajamun nugkujá pujau wainkatasagmek wegabiujum ? Atumek dekagme , nugkutai iman iwajamun nugkujá iwagmamaidauk apú jeen pujuinawai .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Tujash ¿ wají wainkatasagmea wegabiugme ? ¿ Apajuí etsegtinuk wainkatasajum wegabiujum ? Dekas tajime : Duka Apajuí etsegtin aajakajua nuna nagkaesauwai .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Apajuí etsegtin niina pachis agajua duka juuwai : ‘ Wi mina chichamjun etsegnun amina emtimin awemajai , ni jintanak umigtamkattawai ’ , tawai .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Dekas tajime : Ju nugka juwi akiinaidauk Juan Yamijatna nuna nagkaesauk atsawai , tujash Apajuí inamtainig aents dekas imanchauchia nuuwai Juagkan nagkaesauk .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: “ Nunú tabaun antukag ashí aents aidau , nuigtú apunu atinun kuichki yajumin aidaushkam , Apajuí nuniktajum tibaun umiinak yamimakajui Juan yamijatbaunum .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Tujash fariseo aidauk , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai dakitjaju Apajuí umiktajum tibauwa nu umitnak , nunidau asag Juan yamijatbaunash pachikchajui . ”

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Nuniagtai Jisus chichajak : “ ¿ Wajina pachisan takunua antumtikmainaitjime ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Atumek uchi aidau kuashat aents ayamunum pekaamsag wasugkamainak : Wi nantsematnume tusan flauta tutaya nuna umpuakuish nantsemachmaugme , wake besemjan kantamtai buuttinme tamash , buutchamugme tusa pempeentuniki untsuniyama numamtuk wajagme .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Juan Yamijatna nunú yutai aidaunash yuwachu , vinunash umachu asamtai chichagkujum : Wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu asa aniawai , tajume .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Tuja wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinaun yutainash yuwakun , umutain umaish : Ju aentsua juka ayatak wekagas yu wekaewai , umutnash umú wekaewai , nuniau asa apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin tudaugtin aina nuna kumpajiyai , tujutjume .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Tujash Apajuí umijuidau wajuk pujuinawa nuna wainainak , Apajuí yachajiya nunak dekamain ainawai . ”

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Makichik Fariseo Jisusan mina jegajuí yujumak yuwami tusa ipauwai . Tima nuna jeen wayaa mesanum jegan ekeemsauwai .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Nuniai nuwa nu yaaktanmaya pujutji pegkegchau ajamu , Jisus fariseo jeen yujumkan yuwatatus we tabaun dekaa , kaya alabastro tutai botella najanamunum kugkuin shiig pegkejan juki tajuntau .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Nunik Jisusa naween ayaumas pujus buutak nawen negaikiajui , dutika intashinig ujugtau , nuniak nawen kugkuntak kugkuinui ukatkauwai .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Dutiktai fariseo Jisusan ipauwa nunú nigki anentaimas : “ Jujú Apajuí etsegtinaitkug dekamainapi ju nuwa pujutji pegkegchau niina antia nuna ” , tau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Nunitai Jisus chichaak : — Simón , iniastajame . Tutai : — Jintinkagtinú tujutta , — tau .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Aents kuichkin tsagkatkagtinun jimag aents diwimaidau , nuniamunum makichkia nu quinientos tsawantai takasá akikmamainun kuichkin diwimai , tikichia nu cincuenta tsawan takasá akikmamainun diwimu .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Nunidaun akikmamainji atsujiagtai mai tsagkujauwai . Yamai tujutta : ¿ Ju jimaja juwiyash tu imá senchish aneemainaita ? — tau .

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Tama Simón ayaak : — Diwijí imá muun ajamu tsagkujamua nu imá senchi nunak aneemainai tajai . Tutai : Duka dekas tame , — tiu .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Tusa nuwan diis Simogkan chichajak : — ¿ Ju nuwa wainmek ? Wi jeemin wayamtaish daweg nijamainkesh yumik sujuschamume ; tujash jujú dawejun negaikiag ni intashinig ujugtujae .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Kumpamjakmekesh minak kugkuntsachmaume ; tujash ju nuwa juka wayamag duwi nagkamas dawegnak kugkunjú pujawai .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Buukeajuish asaitaikish nijatkashmaume ; tujash jujú kugkuinui dawejun nijatjuje .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Nunin asamtai tajame ; ni tudauji shiig kuashta duka ashí tsagkugnaje , dutikamu asa imá senchi anentui , tujash aents tudauji ujumak ajamu tsagkujamuk ujumak anentui .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Nuna ti nuwan chichajak : — Tudaujum aidauk tsagkugnaje , — tiu .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Tuja mesanum niijai pekajaidauk ditak pempentunisag chichainak : — ¿ Jusha ya asaya tudaunash tsagkugkagtawa ? — tudayinau .

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Tuinaig nigka nuwan chichajak : — Ame kajintsá anentaibaunum uwemjaume , shiig aneasam wetá , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Nuna nunik Jisusak kuashat yaakat aidaunum , nuigtú yaakta ukukiag aents batsataidaunmash wekagas , yamajam chichaman Apajuí nuní inapaji tusa chichagkagtau , nunitai chicham etsegkata tusa ishiaktinji doce etegjamu aidau uyunaidau .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Nunisag nuwa wakan pegkegchau aidau egkemtuamu , nuigtú jau aidau etsagagbau aidaushkam uyunaidau . Nuanuí pachitkau María Magdalanmaya , siete wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu jiijamua nunú ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: tikich Juana , Chuza Herodesa kuichkijin kuitamnun nuwe , nuigtú Susana , tikich nuwa aidaujai kuichkin ijumag sumakag , Jisusan ni etegjamuji aina nujai atsumiagtaish yaidau .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Kuashat aents yaaktanmaya aidau Jisusan wainkatasag wegaju , nunikag shiig kuashat tuwakagmatai augmatak tau :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: “ Ajakan ajakbau ajajin ajaka jigkayin nagkimak ukutatus weuwai , dutika ajakmau asa . Nunik ajajin jegaa nagkimkau , dutikam wajumak jigkai jintaa kakekauwai , nunikun aents najakag ukukbaun yakiya pishak kaketuk amukajui .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Tikich jigkai kayá awanken nugka machik aunum kakekauwai , nunik tsapainiuwaitak jakauwai chupitnuchu asamtai .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Tikich jigkai kakekajui jagki ayaunum , dushakam tsapaidiajuitak jagki yutuam jinauwai .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tuja tikich jigkai nugka dekas pegkegnum kakekauwai , nunikajuk tsapaidiag muun wajas makí makichik ajak aidau cien jigkain nejeawajui . ” Nuna ti inagnak senchi jiiká chichaak : “ Dita antutaiji ajamuk antuktinme ” , tiuwai .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Nuna augmatus ashimkamtai niina jintintai aidau Jisusan : — ¿ Apuh wají takumea ajakan ajakbau pachismesh timaume ? — tusag iniidau .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Atumnak Apajuí ni aentsnum inamjatnuji dekajakchamun , Apajuí aentsnum inama nuna pachisan wi yamai etsejag nunash shiig dekamtijamatatus wakejutpagme . Tujash tikich aidaunak ayatak augmatbaun pachisan ujaajai , dutikamu asag ditak wainkujash wainmachu wajukmaina nuninawai , antakush antuchu wajukmaina nuninawai , — tiuwai .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: “ Wi ajakan ajakbaun augmattsan timag nunak juna takun timajai : Jigkaiya duka Apajuí chichamega nuuwai .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Jintá jigkai kakekaun pishak amukuí timag nunak , aents Apajuí chichamen antittaman iwanch juwatki , chicham ni anentain wayaun dekaskeapi tuinak , uwemjainum tusa yajuta nuna takun timajai .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Tikich jigkai kayá awanken nugka machik aunum kakekauwai timag duka , aents chichaman antuk dekaskeapi tusa wakegas nemajuidau , utugchatnum jegaak idayina nuna takun timajai .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Tuja tikich jigkai jagki ayaunum iyaaju timag duka , aents Apajuí chichamen antuinayatak , ju nugkanum wiyakchameauta nuna uyumainak , nuigtú niina shiig awagma nunak puyatjuinak , Apajuí chichamen pachitsuk idayinawai , nunin aidauk ajak nejechua nunin aina nuna takun timajai .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Tujash jigkai nugka pegkegnum iyaaju timag nunak , aents Apajuí chichamen antukag dekaskeapi tusag nemagkag , wakejus chichaman umiina nuna takun timajai . Nunin asag ajak shiig senchi nejekajua nunin ainawai .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: “ Makichik aentskesh lámpara ekemakajag dukukag idaichau ainawai , dutikachkush pegaká wakentinkish awayag apujchau ainawai . Dutiktsuk ekemakajag yakí ekenin ainawai , wayatatus minidaush tsaaptinun wainkatnume tusag .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Numamtuk yamai uukbauwa nunik awa juka , atak paan wantinkatnai . Aantsag yamai dekamainchauwa dushakam atak shiig dekamu atinai .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: “ Juna tajim jujú anentaimtustajum , ‘ ni imá kuashat ajá duka nuní dukap uwaetuka suwam atinai , untsu piipich ajá duka atantam atinai ’ . ”

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Tusa jintinkagtai ni dukují , yachi aidaujai tajuawajui . Tujash Jisus wajamunmag jegamainchau kuashat aents tuwakaju asamtai , agaa ijunaidau .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Nunitai niina ujainak : — Amina duku yatsum aidaujai waipaktatus tajutjamawag agaa ijunui , — tuidau .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Apajuí chichamen antukag umiina , nunú ainawai mina dukug , mina yatsug aidauk , — tiuwai .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai botenum chimpimjaju . Nunik : Kuchá amain katigkagmi , tusag weedau .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Nunikag wegamunum nigka kanaju . Nuniku ai dase shiig senchi dasentak kuchan umpuau , dutikam yumik botenum yajanu , imaniau asa ishamain wajau .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Imanitai niina jegantag ishintainak : — ¡ Jintinkagtinuh , Jintinkagtinuh iik jakektatji ! — tuidau . Tama shintaag dasen jiyak idayak , nayants tsukatunashkam : — ¡ Mijakta ! — tiuwai . Tusá tamawaik dase imaniauk mijak , namakash shiig miyaasu wajas patamsau .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Nunikmatai ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — ¿ Wagka Apajuiyai kajintsajum anentaimtsugme ? — tau . Tujash ditak ishamak puyatkag nuna wainak anentai jegagchaju , nunikag ditak pempeentunikiag : — ¿ Jusha ya asamtaiya dasesh , yumish antujuinawa ? — tudayinau .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Nunikag kuchá amain katigkag Gadaranmaya batsamtai nugkeen Galilea igkuas awa nuwi anumkajui .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Nunik Jisus jiinkimtai nunú yaaktanmaya aents , kuashat mijadai wakan pegkegchau egkemtujam pujú tajuauwai , duka shiig wisú jegaash pujuchu , ayatak aents ukutainum wekayin .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Nunú Jisusan wainak senchi untsumak tikishmatug senchi untsumak : — ¡ Jisusah , Apajuí nayaimpinum pujuwa nuna Uchijiyah , minash itugtuktasamea miname ! ¡ Wait aneasam suwimkak sukagtusaipa ! — tau .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: ( Nunak Jisus : Wakan pegkegchauwah aents jiinkim ukuktá tibau asa tiuwai . Nu aentsuk kuashat tsawantai wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu asa , jiju ikagmauwai uwegnumash , dawenum jigkagmashkam tsujiag utsag , wakan pegkegchau aents atsamunum emam nuwi pujú . )

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Tutai Jisus iniak : — ¿ Amesh yaitpa ? Tama ni aimak : — Wika Untsujiyaitjai , — tau . Nunak kuashat wakan pegkegchau aidau aentsun chimpimtua batsamtau asag tiuwai .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Imaan asag : “ Waa muun ishamain akaga nuwig chimpijatuawaipa ” , tusag segaidau .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Nuanuí kuashat kuchi mujanum yuwinak yujaidau asamtai , nuwi wayatjai tusag segajui . Tiagtai Jisuschakam : Nuniktajum , tiuwai .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Tima wakan pegkegchau aidauk aentsnak ukuinak kuchinum utsanawajui ; dutikam kuchishkam pisajag betsag tajagak kuchanum najataunum iyagkag jinawajui .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Nunikagmatai kuchí kuitamin aidauk pisajag yaaktanum jegawag etsejuinak , ajanum batsataidaunash dutiksag ujakajui .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Tusá ujakajam : Wagkag ankae diisagmi , tusag wejiajui . Nunik Jisus pujamunum jegakmag , aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu aajakua duka pegkeg wajas , shiig anentaimas Jisusai ayaumas nugkutai nugkujá ekeemtatman wainkaju . Nunittaman wainkag senchi ishamkaju .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Nuniagtai wakan pegkegchau aidau jiigbaun wainkaju aidau : “ Nuní dutika etsagagmae ” , tusag tikich aidaunashkam ujaidau .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Tiagtai ashí aents Gadaranmaya aidauk Jisusan : — Juwig pujutsuk yajá weta , — tiaju senchi ishamaidau asag . Tama Jisuschakam ayú tusa botenum egkemtai ,

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamu jiijamushkam : — Wisha amijai wekaesatjai , — tusa Jisusan segau . Tama nuna chichajak :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: — Amek jeemin wakitkita , nunikam shiig kuashat Apajuí wajuk amina wait anenjamjae nunú etsegkata , — tiuwai . Tima we Jisus niina kuashat wait anenja nuna pachis ashí yaaktanum etsegkau .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Jisus wakitki jegamtai kuashat aents tuwakajuk shiig aneas jukiaju , ashí aentsuk niina dakaidau asag .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Nuniamunum Jairo daagtin , jega ijuntaiya nuna apuji tajuntun Jisusan tikishmatug : — Jintinkagtinuh , mina jegajuí wemí ,

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: nunikam nawantug doce mijanji ajamu shiig makichkiuch pujugta nunú , jakattak tepaun ukukmag nu etsaentujata , — tau . Tama wetai shiig kuashat aents weedau asag Jisusan chanuidau .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Imaniamunum nui nuwa pachitkau doce mijadai numpan senchi puwak jaa pujú , kuashat ampijatin aidaunum ampimak kuichkijin ashimkau . Tujash imaniakush tsagagchauwai .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Nunú nuwa ukunum jegantun Jisus jaanch pataká nugkuagbauji wenin antigkui . Dutikamuik numpa puwamujinak megkaekauwai .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Dutikam Jisuschakam : — ¿ Ya antinkae ? — tau . Tutai aents nui ijunuk : — Achah yatsukait , — tuidau . Tiagtai Pedro chichajak : — Jintinkagtinuh , kuashat aents tuwakaju asag chanumpaina nuniaigkik , ¿ ya antinkae tame ? — tiu .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Tutai : — Dekas wika dekajai , aents mina antintuk mina senchijuí jaamujin tsagaja nunak , — tiuwai .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Tutai nuwak , dekajuagapi tusa puyatuk kujaukmaikia Jisusan jegantun tikishmatug , ashí aents antuinamunum , wajuk asaya antigke nuna pachis , nuigtú ni Jisus antiamuik tsagagbaujinashkam ujakú .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Tusá ujaam : — Nawantah , ame kajintsá anentaimam duwi tsagajume , shiig agkan anentaimsam wetá , — tiuwai .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Eke chichaak wajai , Jairo jega ijuntaiya nuna apuji jeenia aents tanta : — Nawanjumek jakame , nuigtuk jintinkagtinuk waitkasaipa , — tau .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Tabaun Jisus antuk : — Puyatkaipa , ayatak kajintsam anentaimjata , nawanjumik aneantatui , — tau .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Nunik jegá wayamunum tikich aidaunak awayachajui . Ayatak Pedro , Jacobo , Juan , nuwa jakau apají dukují aina duke utsanawajui .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Tuja ashí aents aidauk nuwauch jakaun pachis buutuidau . Nuniagtai chichajak : — Buutigpajum , jakache ayatak kanaje , — tau .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Tutai dushikidau , nuwauch jakau dekaidau asag .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Tujash nigka uwegnum achiak senchi chichaká : — ¡ Nuwauchih nantaktá ! — tiu .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Tusá tamawaik mayai egkemtujam nantakiu . Nunikmatai : — Yumain ayujatajum — tiu .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Dutikamtai nuwauchi apajig dukujijai shiig senchi puyatkaju . Nuniagtai Jisus : — Ju pachisjum makichik aentskesh ujakaigpajum , — tiuwai .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji doce aina nuna ijumag wakan pegkegchau aidau jiimainun , jau aidau etsagaumainnash niina senchijin susauwai .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Dutikak : — Apajuí aentsnum inama nu pachisjum etsegkatajum , nuniakjum jau aidaush etsagagtajum , — tusa ishimak

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: tiu : — Makichkish jukigpajum jintá wegaku atsumainuk . Ushujutaigkesh , wají egkesá jutaigkesh , yuwatnukesh , kuichkikesh , nuigtú nugkutaigmesh yachiagmek jukigpajum .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Atum tu jeganma wayattagme , nunikjumek nuwig pujusjum wegakjum ukuktajum .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Tuja tuwí atumin awaintamtan dakitjabiagtatua , dutijamainakuig nunú yaaktak ukuakjum , daweminia tsetse pegatjajum akaketkatajum , dita suwimak jukitnuji iwaintakjum .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Tiajam ditashkam jiinjag yaakta ukukiag , aents aidau batsatbaunum wegaju , nunikag yamajam chichama nuna etsejuinak , jau aidaunashkam etsagaidau .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Jisus ashí wají dutikamujin Herodes Galileanmaya apua nu antuk , shiig senchi anentaimá pujau , aents aidau chichainak : “ Juan maamua nu nantakí wekaewai ” , tuinai ,

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: tikich chichainak : “ Elías wantinkae ” tuinai , tikich tuidau : “ Yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin aajakajua nuwiya nantakne ” , tuidau asagmatai .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Tiagtai Herodes chichaak : — Wi Juagnak inamja ai buuken tsupikagmayajama , tujash ¿ jusha ya amainaita iman chichaman antujag dusha ? Tusa wainkatatus wakegau .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Jisus ishiakbau waketug kaunkag ashí dita dutikamujinak ujakajui . Dutikam ditan ashí yajuak kanakiag nugka agkantu yaakat Betsaida tutainum awa nui wegajui .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Tujash aents aidau dekaawag shimutkajui . Nunikag jegajuawajam Jisuschakam ditan shiig anentus jukiajui , dutika Apajuí aentsnum inama nuna pachis jintintak , jau aidaunashkam etsagau .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Nuniai etsashkam akagu asamtai , niina jintintaiji doce aina nunú jegaantag : — Juwig jutiik aents atsamunum batsatji aentsuk ishiakta , yaaktanum jegattak aents batsata nui wegag , aja tikiju aina nui yumainjin sumak yuwinak kajigtinme , — tuidau .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Tiagtai ni ayaak : — Atum dita yuwatnuk susatajum , — tau . Tuinam dita aiinak : — Imaan aents ayugmainuk atsugtamji , ayatak cinco pag , nuigtú jimagchik namak awai , ashí ju aents ayugkata takuik jutii wemainchawa dita yuwatin sumagkatasa , — tuidau .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Aishmag aidauk cinco mil aishmag tumain aajakajui . Tiagtai Jisus ni jintintaijin : — Cincuenta , cincuenta aents akanjajum batsagtajum , — tiu .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Tima ditashkam Jisus tibaunak betek umikaju .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Dutikawagmatai cinco pagkan nuigtú jimag namaka nuna juki , nayaimpinum pagkai see tusa puug jintintaiji aidaun tinabiu , dita aentsun tinamkatnume tusa .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Dutikawajam ashí shiig yuwawag ejemakaju , nunikagmatai ampinkaunak yajuakag doce chagkinnum aimjajui .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Makichik tsawantai , Jisus kanaká Apajuí aujak pujamunum ni jintintaiji aidaush , niijai pujuidau asamtai iniak : — ¿ Aents aidaush minash yaayai tujutuinawa ? — tau .

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : — Wajumak aents aidau : ‘ Juan Yamijatin maamua nuuwai ’ tujamainawai , tikich chichaidau : ‘ Auk Eliasai ’ tujamainai , tikich tuidau : ‘ Yaunchuk Apajuin etsegtujakú aina dutsu nantakitai ’ tujamainawai , — tuidau .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Tujash atumesh minash yaayai tujutjume ? — tau . Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Amek Kristu Apajuí awemamuitme , — tiu .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Timatai Jisus chichajak : — Makichik aentskesh mina pachittsagmek ujakaigpajum — tusa idayak :

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: — Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nunak , shiig senchi waitkagsag judío aidau apuji , sacerdote apuji aidaush , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai dakitjuinak mantuawagtatui , dutijuawagmataish kampatumchik tsawan asan nantaktatjai , — tiuwai .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Jisus nuna ti ashí aents aidaun chichajak : — Mina nemagtuktasajum wakegautigmek , atum wakegamuk idaikujum , kashí kashinig waitiakjumesh atsanjajum nemagtuktajum .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Ashí aents ju nugka juwi pujutan imá senchi wakegak , mina nemagtuk waittan dakitauk uwemjashtin ainawai . Untsu ashí aents mina nemagtuk nunisag jaa nu uwemjatin ainawai .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Aents ju nugka juwiya wají aidaun ashí niinu emakush , jaakug niina wakaninak tuké uwemtikmaitsui .

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Atum mina pachittsa chichat datsamakjum , chichamjushkam datsanjau aidautigminak , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna , mina Apajú tsaaptinjijai tsawan wajasan , nayaimpinmaya aents pegkejam aidaujai ataktú ju nugka juwi minaknushkam : Juka midauchu ainawai , titinaitjime .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Tujash dekas tajime : Atum juwi ijunjum juwiyatijum eke jatsuk , Apajuí inamaujiya nu wainkatnutigmesh ajume , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Nuna ti ocho tsawan pujus Jisus Pedron , Juagkan , nuigtú Jacobon juki mujanum wakauwai , Apajuí ausatatus .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Nunik Apajuin aujak pujus niina niimenig yapajinauwai , jaanchjish puju winchamtin wajasuí .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Nuniaig jimag aents Jisusan aujuidaun wainkajui , duka Moisés , Eliasjai aajakajui .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Nunikag tsaaptin winchamtin tenteamunum pujusag , Jisus Jerusalén waitkasa maam atinun pachis aujuidau .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Tuja Pedro ditajai ijunag yujaidaushkam , senchi kaji pujajuinam kajigkú shintaukmá , Jisus tsawan wajas Moisés , Elías aatus ijuntatman wainkajui .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Jimag aentsua nunú wegagmatai , Pedro Jisusan chichajak : — Jintinkagtinuh , jutiish maigkis juwi batsatagtai . Kampatum aak umikagmi , makichik aminu , makichik Moisesdau , nuigtú Eliasdau , — tiuwai . Tujash nunak shiig dekachiatak tiuwai .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Juna aatus Pedro chichai , yujagkim ditajai ijumag ijikuí , dutika yujagkim ijikam ishamkajui .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Nuniaig yujagminmaya chichaak : “ Juuwai dekas mina Uchig anetaijuk , nigki antugkujum umigkatajum ” , tabaun antukajui .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Nuna ti ashimaig diikmag , imá Jisusnak wainkajui . Nuna wainkajash makichkish tikich aidaunak ujakchajui .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Nunik kashinia duwi mujanmaya akagag mininai , kuashat aents Jisusan igkugtatus minidau .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Nuniai tuwakbaunmaya aents senchi jiiká chichaak : — ¡ Jintinkagtinuh , wait aneasam mina uchig makichkiuchia ju etsaentujata ,

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: junak wakan pegkegchau egkemtug senchi untsumtiknuwe , imatikam senchi kujainuwe , dutikak weninig saunak pushukasua emauwe ! ¡ Kakajus idaichamu asa tunamag pujugtawai !

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Imatikakui amina jintintaijum aidaun : Wait aneasjum wakan pegkegchau uchin waitkagta nu jiigtugkitajum timajai , tujash tujinkagmae , — tau .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Tusá tama , Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — ¡ Aents pegkegchau , minai kajinas anentaimchau aidauwah ! ¿ Wajupá dukapea atumjai ijunjanush pujumainaitja ? ¿ Wajupá dukapek dakastajime , minaig kajinas anentaimjatnume tusanush ? — tiu . Nuna ti idayak uchí apajin : — Uchijum juwi itantá , — tiuwai .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Tima uchijin juki Jisusai ejentattak emai , waugmitkak uchin nugká ajiajam senchi kujau . Imatiktai Jisus wakan pegkegchaun : “ ¡ Jiinkim wegakum uchi ukuktá ! ” , tiuwai . Tama wakan pegkegchau uchin egkemtuaushkam jiinki ukukiuwai , dutikam uchishkam pegkeg wajasmatai apajin susauwai .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Dutika etsagamun wainkag : Dekas Apajuin senchijiniap aikawa tusag , puyatjusag diidau . Ashí aents aidauk Jisus uchi etsagagbaun pachis puyatjusag augmatiagtai , niina jintintaiji aidaun chichajak :

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: — Wi tajim nunú shiig antuktajum , nunikjum aneaku atajum , wagki Apajuí Uchijiyaitak Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nunak , tikich aents aidaunum sujukag idaisagtatui , — tau .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Tutaish ditak nuna takumpap tawa tusajag dekamainchau dekapedau , eke Apajuí shiig dekamtikchamu asag . Nunidau asag iniaschajui ajaantuinak .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Nunikag ditak pempeentunikiag : “ Yaki jutii ainag juwiyash imá wagakush atinaita ” tusag tudayinau .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Jisus tusá anentaimainamun dekaju asa , uchin juki niiní ayaunas awajus ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: chichaak : — Aents mina nemagtuidau ju uchia jumamtin aina juna , shiig anentus juwidauk mina dutijuinawai . Tuja mina jujuidauk mina awetiuwa nuna juwinawai . Atum ainajum anuiya imanchauch anenmamaina nunú imá wagaaku atinai , — tiuwai .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Tutai Juan ayaak : — Jintinkagtinuh , wainkamji aents amina daagmin wakan pegkegchau aidau egkemtuamun jiyau . Dutikakui : Amek aikawaipa timajai , jutiijai ijunchau asamtai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Tutai Jisus : — Duka tiigpajum , jutiin shiwagmatjamtsu duka jutiinu asa aniawai , — tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jisus ashí jintinkagtamun ashimak , ni nayaimpinum wakitkitnuji tsawan jegau asamtai , puyatkas Jerusalén wegau .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Nuniak ni jintintaiji aidaun emtikak awemauwai . Dutikam ditashkam nugka Samarianum wegajui , nui aents batsatbaunum jegawag kanumainun egakagtatus .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Tujash Samarianmaya aidauk dita ikantanak dakituidau , Jerusalén weenak tuidau asamtai .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Dutikawajam Jacobo , Juagjai wakitkiag Jisusan jegaantag : — Apuh iish duwik ¿ Elías Apajuin segatí nayaimpinmaya jiin ajuntug ijinauwa dutikmainchaukaih ? — tuidau .

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus kakaakan aiká : — Atumek dekatsjume wajuk anentaimkugmea tajume duka .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak aents aidaun ijinata tusanuk taachuitjai , ayatak uwemtikatasan tauwaitjai . — Tusa idayak tikich aents aidau batsatbaunum wegajui .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Nuna yaaktan ukukiag ashinbaunum , makichik nuwiya Jisusan : — Apuh , wisha ame tuwig wekaetam nuniakminish tuke aminak nemagkiní wajatin atajai tusan wakegajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Kujancham aidauk kanutaijig ajuinawai , aantsag pishak aidaushkam pasugkeg ajuinawai , tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinaunuk jeenchau , tepesá ayamainkesh atsugtaig , wainkan wekaejai , — tiu .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Nuna ti Jisus tikich aentsnashkam : — Nemagtukta , — tiuwai . Tama : — Apuh , idaitusta mina jegajuí wenu , apag jakamtai ukusan ukuakun nemagkatjame , — tau .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Auk idaisata , aents wakanin jakaujai betekak batsata nu , apa jakamtaish ukustin atinme , amek yamai nagkamsamek mina chichameg yamagma nu etsegkum , Apajuí aentsnum inama nu pachismesh etsejata , — tiu .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Nuna timatai tikich aents chichaak : — Dekas Apuh , wi amina jintintaijum ata tusan wakegajai , tujash idaitusta , dekatkauk mina pataag aidaun ashí akattsan ukuktajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Aents nugkan tsayaak , nugka tsaitaijiya nuna bakajin nenaa tsayaak wekaetayatak , ukujin ayampatua dii wajauk shiig tutupit emamaitsui . Numamtuk Apajuí chichamen etsegkatatus wakegayatak patayin ukukchamin dekapeauk , Apajuí chichamen etsegkati tusaik atsumaitsui , — tiuwai .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Nuna ti idayas Jisus tikich aidaunashkam etegjauwai , setenta y dos aentsun . Dutika : “ Ashí yaaktanum wejum chichagkagtuktajum ” , tusa ni wetin aidaunum jimá jimajan ishiakajui .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Dutika chichajak : “ Dekas tajime : Shiig kuashat aents aidau Apajuí minaish inamjati tusa atsumainawai , tujash ujumchikiuchi yamajam chichama juna etsejuidauk , nuaduí Apajuí segatajum tikich ni chichame etsegmain aidaun ishiakti tusajum .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Nunin asamtai wetajum , tujash kuitamamkatajum , wi atumnak uwig ikamyawa batsatbaunum ishimaina numamtuk aents pegkegchau batsatbaunum ishimjime .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Wegakjumesh kuichkik , wají egkesá jutaigmekesh , sapatjumkesh jukigpajum . Jintá wesajum aents igkuakjumesh chichaakjum megkaekaigpajum , wamkesjum nagkaetajum .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Tuja atum yana jeenia wayattajume , nuniakjumek dekatkauk : ‘ Apajuí atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme ’ titajum .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Tajumin aents nui puja nu shiig aneas jujabiagtaik , Apajuí ditanash yaigtatui . Untsu atumin shiig aneas jujamchagtaik , Apajuishkam ditanak yaigchagtatui .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Nunú jega nuwig pujusjum dita yutain amainamuk yuwakjum , umutain amainakuish uwagtajum . Wagki aents taká duka akiam auwai . Makí makichik jeganum kanagjum nagkaemá yujaigpajum .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Tikich yaaktanum jegagminchakam , jeentin ni jeen jujamki yutain ajamjamainakuig yuwatajum .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Nuniakjum nui jau akuish etsagaitajum , dutikakjum : ‘ Apajuí aentsnum inamjatnuk tsawan namput wajaschae ’ , tusajum ujaktajum .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Tuja tikich yaaktanum jegagmin jujamtan dakitjamainakuig jiinkujum :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ‘ Atumi nugkem jutii sapatjin peemja juka , atuminig pegajá akakeka ukuaji , jutii chicham etsegbauk dakitjau asagmin . Tujash Apajuí aentsnum inamjatta duka namput wajaschae ’ , titajum .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Juna tajime : Suwimak sukagtamu tsawan jegatna duwik , nunú yaaktanmaya aents nunina nunak , Apajuí duwik yaakat Sodomanmaya aidaun suwimkan susauwa nuní nagkaemas suwimkan jukiagtinai .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ ¡ Corazignumia aidaunak , aikasnuk Betsaidanmayanash wait anentuinajai ! , ditak mina chichamjun dekaskeapi tujutchaju asagmatai . Yaakat Sidognum , Tironmash aents batsataina duka , wi atumin wainchatain iwaintajim imatika ditash iwaintam wainkujag , dita wake besemag pujaku iwainmamtain jaanchin nugkujag , buukenish yukuun batsakag , ditá tudaujin wake besemag batsatbaunash , Apajuin iwaintumain aajakajui .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Nuaduí Apajuí suwimak sukagtamu tsawan jegatna duwik , yaakat Tironmaya aents aidau , Sidognumia aidaujai suwimkan jukiagtin aina nuní nagkaemasjum atumek suwimkak jukiagtin ainagme .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Yaakat Capernaum batsamin aidauwah , atum anentaimsagmek : Jutiik jainakuish nayaimpinum juwam agtinaitji , tajume . Tujash dutikamak achatnaitjume , ¡ atumek tikich aents pegkegchau aidau jinawaju waitú batsata nui batsamsatnaitjume !

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: “ Atum chicham etsegbaun antugtamaina duka , mina antugtuinawai . Tuja atumin dakitjamaina nunak , mina dakitjak nuninawai . Untsu mina dakitjuinakug , mina awetiuwa nuna dakituinak nuninawai ” , tusa ishiakui .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Nunú setenta y dos ishiakbau waketug kaunak , shiig aneasag Jisusan jegaantag : — Apuh , wakan pegkegchau aidau aentsun egkemtuau aidaush amina daajum adaisa : Jinkita , tamak nunisag iinash antugtamak aents aidaunash jiinkiag ukuagmae , — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Dekaske wisha wainkabiajai , iwanch peem wajukea imanik nayaimpinmaya iyaun .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Nuaduí atumi shiwajum iwanchia nuna senchijí ashí depetkatnun , mina senchijun amasmajime . Dutikamu asagmin , dapi esapainakuish , titigkesh ijupakuish wajukashtatjume .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Tujash wakan pegkegchau aidau antugtamkaja duwikik shiig anenigpa , dekas imá senchi shiig aneetajum , atumin daagmik nayaimpinum agagbauwa nuaduí .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Nuna ti idayak Wakaní Pegkeji shiig anemtikam : “ Apawah , amek ashí nayaimpinum batsamin aidau , nugkaya aidaushkam apuji asamin emematjame , iman asam aents yacha aidauk iwaintutsuk , aents imanchauch aidau etegjamujum , tikima uchi itugmaina imatiksam iwaintukum nuaduí . Dekaske Apawah , amek aajam wakegame ” , tiu .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Tusa idayak : “ Mina Apag ashí nugkanmayag ame diistá tusa idaitugsauwai , nunin aig wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitag nunak makichkish dekajuinatsui , imá mina Apajuk shiig dekajui , aikasag mina Apagnash wainainatsui imá wiki shiig wainjai . Tuja wi iwaintamu aidau Apagnak wainmain ainawai . ”

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Tikich aidaun juna ujak idayak , dekas ni jintintaiji ijuntatman ayampatua : “ Atumek shiig aneastajum wi takaamush wainu asajum .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin aajakú aina duka , apu aidaush yamai atum wainjum juna wainkatatus wakegajakú ainawai , tujash wainkachu ainawai . Antutnash yamai atum antajum juna antukagtatus wakegajakú ainawai , nuninakush ditak antukchajui ju chichamnak ” , tiuwai .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Tutai chicham umiktajum tibauwa nuna jintinkagtin wajakí , Jisusan dekapsatatus : — Jintinkagtinuh , ¿ wisha wajina dutikmainaitja pujut nagkanchaun jukitasanush ? — tau .

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Chicham umiktinun Moisés agajua nunú aujkumesh , ¿ wajintu agagbauwa wainme ?

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — ‘ Amina Apujum Apajuiya nu imá senchi aneeta , nuniakum imá niinig anentaimsam pujustá , Apajuinu pegkeg aina duke dekaata , ashí Apajuí wakega duke takastá , nuniakum amijai ijutkamushkam amek anenmamsam aneeta ’ tawai , — tiu .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Timatai Jisuschakam : — Dekas tame , ame tame nunú imatiksamek umiktá , nunú nuniamunum pujut nagkanchauk ajutjamtatui — tau .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Tama nigka betek umiachu asa Jisusan iniak : — ¿ Yaita wijai ijutkau aidaush ? — tau .

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Tutai Jisuschakam augmatbaun nagkama ujaak : — Jerusalegnumia aents imá nigki , yaakat Jericonum wekamá kasanum egkemkauwai . Nunikmatai kasa aidau achikag , senchi suwi suwimainakua , ipu ipujú ashí maawag , ni takakbaujinak ashí yajutuk wegak ukukiajui .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Dutikamu ai sacerdote nunú jintanum nagkaemakmá wainak , ikaag diis ukukiuwai .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Tuja levita nagkaemakmá wainkashkam , ikaag wajas diis wegak ukukiuwai .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Nuniai aents Samarianmaya niishkam nu jintanmag nagkaemakmá wainak , wait anenmain diisuí .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Dutika jegaantun ampin vinujai juki , ipujamu aidaun ampijua , jaanchi ijijuk , nuaduí ni entsamtaijin ekeni juki , jega ijagkan kajiitaijin ejega kuitamak ,

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: kashinia duwi wegak , jeennun jimag tsawantai takasá kuichik jumainun akik ukuak : ‘ Ame kuitamjutkata , wi waketkun wajupa tujuttatme nunash akiktajame ’ , tusa nui aepeak weuwai .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Amesh wajintu anentaime kampatum aents aajakua nuwiyash , ¿ ya aajakuita dekas nigki anenmamas aents kasa suwimaam tepaun wait anenjaush ?

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Tusa tama ni ayaak : — Suwimaam tepaun wait anenjauwa nuuwai , — tiuwai . Timatai Jisuschakam : — Ameshkam wakitkim , dutiksamek amijai ijutkamushkam amek anenmamsam wait anenjata , — tiuwai .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Tusa ukuak Jisusak wega wegakua yaaktan ukukiag , aents batsatbaunum jegau . Nunikmatai nuwa Marta daagtin niina jeen juki awayauwai .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Nuna kai María daagtin pujau , Maríak Jisus chichatai ayaumas ekeemas antak eketu .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Tujash Martak kuashat takamain au asamtai , nuna uyumak wekaetau , nuniak Jisusan jegantun : — Apuh , aanú mina kaig ayatak eketa nu , kaim yaigtá , tusam awetujia , niish yainkati , — tau .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Tusa tama : — Martah , shiig kuashat takamain uyumakam wekaeme ,

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: dekas imá senchi puyatjumainuk makichkiuchi . Maríak dekas pegkejan etegka mina chichamjun antugtak eketui , nunak makichkish emegkatmainchau ainawai , — tiu .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Tikich tsawantai Jisus Apajuin aujak pujuttaman wainkaju . Nunik ashimkamtai makichik ni jintintaiji jegantun : — Apuh , Apajuish wajuk aujmainaita nunú jutiish jintinkagtuata , Juan ni jintintaijin jintintujakua dutiksamek , — tau .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Atum Apajuí aujkugmek aatsajum titajum : ‘ Apawah , amek nayaimpinum pujuwaitme . Pegkegmaitam ibau asamin ashí tikich aidaush imá aminak emematjabiagtinme . Amek jutiishkam inajatjata , amina aentsjum nayaimpinmaya ame wakegamun umigtamin aina dutiksag , nugkanmayashkam umigtuktinme tusam .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Dutiksamek ii yuwatnushkam kashí kashinig sukagtita .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ii tudaujishkam tsagkugkagtugta , jutii tikich pegkegchau takagtamaidaush tsagkugnaitag aikasmek . Iwanch pegkegchau takamtiksati tusamek idaikagtutsuk , ayatak yaijatkam agkanmitkagtuata ’ , — tiuwai .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Aaja segatajum tusa jintintua idayak : — Atum ainajum anuiyatigmesh kumpajum dekas shiig anendaitaijum ajutjamu asamtai , niina jeen aehaet jegantam : ‘ Kumpajuh , minash kampatum pag tsagkatjukta ,

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: mina kumpag imauya tajutua nunú ajaamain atsugtau asamtai tajame ’ tamin .

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Ni aigmak : ‘ Waitkagsaipa , waitinak epenin mina uchig aidaujai kanakun tepajai , nunin asan nantaknuk amamaitsujai ’ , ¿ tujamainkaih ?

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Nunak tujamtsuk sujustá tusa segamu asa , nantamainchau ayatak amina kumpajum asa , nantakí ame atsumaku segamunak ashí amamainai .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Duwi wi tajime : Apajuishkam segatajum , imatjamak amastatjume ; egatash egaktajum , egakjumek igkugtatjume ; untsuktajum , imatjamak waitin ujatjamtatjume .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Ashí aents sumauk suwam auwai , egauk igkuinai ni egamujinak , waitinum wajas untsumushkam waiti ujatam auwai .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: “ ¿ Atumesh uchijum yujumkan segapaig , kaya sumainkaitjum ? ¿ Dutikachkugmesh uchijum namakan segapaig , dapi sumainkaitjum ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: ¿ Dutikachkugmesh uchijum nujintan segapaig , titig sumainkaitjum ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Atum pegkegchau ainayatkugmesh uchigmik pegkeg suu ainagme . Atumkesh nuniagminish Apajuí nayaimpinum puja dusha , ¿ wagkag Wakaní Pegkejinash atum segamash amaschagti ? ” , tiuwai .

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Juna inagnak tikich tsawantai wakan pegkegchau aentsun egkemtua chichachu emamun , Jisus jiikí awetak chichamtikau . Dutikamun wainkag aents tuwak ijunuk puyatjukag diidau .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Nuninaig wajumak aents aidau chichainak : “ Juka Beelzebú , wakan pegkegchau aidau apujiya nuna senchijin wakan pegkegchaunak jiyaawai ” , tuidau .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Nuna tusag tuinaig , tikich aidau Jisusan , dekas Apajuí Uchijimpashit , tusag dekapsagtatus : Nayaimpinmaya wainchatai iwainkagtukia , tuidau .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Tama dita anentaimainamun dekau asa : “ Makichik nugkanmag batsatiatak pempeentuniki maaní batsatkujag megkaemain ainawai , nunisag makichik jeganmak ijunag batsatiatak , pempeentuniki maaní batsatkushkam , ditak megkaemain ainawai .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Aantsag iwanchakam niina senchijin mina sujus , aentsun wakan pegkegchau egkemtuau aidaun jiijati tujutkug , ditak pempeentunikiag shiwagmaemainai , nuniak ditá senchijinash megkaemain ainawai . Nunin aig minak , Beelzebú senchijin wakan pegkegchaunak jiyaawai tujutjume .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Beelzebú niina senchijin mina sujaish , atumi jintintaijum aidaunash ¿ ya senchijinash suwawa , wakan pegkegchau aidaun jiiktinme tusash ? Jutii jintintaiji aidauk Apajuí senchijiin jiyaawai tujutkugmek , atum wainka dewakjum tu yujagme .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Wi Apajuí senchijiin wakan pegkegchau aidau aentsun egkemtaun jiyaag nunak , yamaik atumiin Apajuí inamu asamtai jutikajai .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: “ Aents senchigtin niina jeen kuitamak waitinum akajun takus wajataig , niina wajiiji nui awa duka ashí betek amainai .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Tujash tikich aents niiya nuní senchi minitak , niina depetki akajun atanki jegá wayaa , ashí wajiinak yajutuk kumpají aidaun tinamainai .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: “ Aents wi takaag nujai shiig aneas juwachuk mina shiwagmatui , nunisag Apajuí chichame etsegbaunash yainchagtaik , kuashat aents uweemainun megkagainawai .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
