text2: Junashkam Jisus mijamtsuk Apajuinash ausatnume tusa jintinkagtak nagkama augmatu :

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: “ Makichik yaaktanum pujujakuí apu chichaman epegkin , duka Apajuinash ishamsash anentaimtuchu , aents aidaunashkam ajantus diichu aajakuí .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Nunú yaaktanmag makichik nuwa wajeshkam pujau asa utugchat ajusam , apun jegajua : ‘ Jujú epegtujuata ’ , tusa segau .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Tusa imatjú pujugmash yaitnak dakitú pujau asa nigki anentaimas : ‘ Apajuinash ishamsanush anentaimtuchuitjai , aents aidaunashkam ajantusnush diichuitjai ;

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: nunin akunush , nuwa waje waa waamak tajutak waitkaja junak , yaigkan epegtuatjai dutikam agkan idaitusti ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Jisus juna ti : “ Apu chichama epegkin tikima pegkegchaukesh aatus tiuwa nunin aish ,

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Apajuish niina nemajin aidau utugchatnum pujusag kashi tsawaishkam untsuamash , ¿ yaitsuk idaimainkaih ? ¿ Nuniachkush dukap asan yaigtajai tumainkaih ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Dekas tajime : Apajuik dukap atsuk waamak yaimpamainaitjume . Tujash wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna ataktú nugká minaknuk , wajumchik Apajuí anentaimtuidauk batsatai taatnaitjai ” , tiuwai .

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Aents aidau dita imá pegkejan takauwa iman anenmamainak , tikich aidaunak dakituidau asagmatai , Jisus jujú augmatbaun pachis :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: “ Jimag aents Apajuin ausatatus jega Apajuí ememattainum wegajui , makichik fariseo , tikich apú kuichkiji atinun yajumnujai .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Nunik fariseo Apajuin aujak wajai wajas : ‘ Apawah , see tajame , wika tikich aents aidau kasa , pegkegchau takau , tsanijimta wekaetin , jujú apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin puja juninkesh atsujai .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Wika aminak makichik tumigtinig jimag tsawantai yujumkan ijagmá pujusan segaugme , kuichkinash mina akijuinakuig diezmó wajaujai ’ , tau .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Tujash apú kuichkiji atinun yajumnuk nigka ukunum wajas , ni tudaujin anentaimtus wake besemag dekapeak , machikish nayaimpinak pagkaish diitsuk detsepen ijuak : ‘ Apajuiyah , wika tudauwaitjai , minash wait anenjugta ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Jisus nuna ti : “ Dekas tajime : Apú kuichkiji atinun yajumna duka tudauji tsagkujamu asa shiig aneas waketai , fariseok nunikchauwai . Ashí aents eme anenmamaidaunak Apajuik imanchauch diyawai ; untsu imanchauch anenmamaidaun eme anentus diyawai ” , tiuwai .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Nuna tusa ashimkamtai uchi aidaun Jisusan ikautuidau uchin antinjukti tusag . Imatikiagtai ni jintintaiji aidau wainkag uchigtin aidaun jiyaidau .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Tiagtatman Jisus antuk , uchin untsuká : — Tutsuk idaisatajum , ashí uchi aidauk minai kauntatnume , utugkajum awagkigpajum . Jujú uchi anentaimaina jumamtin aidaunum Apajuik inamjata tawai .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Dekas tajime : Aents aidau , uchi mina anentaimjutuina imanis anentaimjutuinachuk , Apajuí inamak amain ainatsui , — tiuwai .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Nuna Jisus timatai apu wiyakuch Jisusan iniak : — Jintinkagtin pegkejah , ¿ wajina dutikmainaitja pujut tuke atina nuna jukitasanush ? — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wagka pegkejá tujutme ? Makichkish pegkejak atsawai , imá Apajuiya duke pegkejak .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Amek dekame chicham umiktin agagbaunum : ‘ Tsanijinawaipa , magkagtuawaipa , kasamkaipa , wainkamek tsanumkagtujaipa , amina apa dukujai eme anentsam diiyaakum yaigtá ’ , tawa nunú .

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Tama ni chichaak : — Wika nunak datsauch asanuk ashí umikuitjai .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Nuna tutai Jisus antuk ayaak : — Nuigtú makichik umimain ajutjamui : Ashí amina ajutjamaina duka sujukam ujunauch aina nu susata . Nu dutikawamin nayaimpinum wajigmik ajutjamtinai . Nu dutika ukuakum mina nemagtukta , — tiuwai .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Nu tama antuk wake besekuí , shiig wiyakuch asa .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Nunik senchi wake besektatman Jisus wainak chichajak : — Wiyakuch aidauk kakajus Apajuí minash inatjati tusag idaimamainchau ainawai .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Camellok aujá jiinish waigká nagkaemamainai , tujash wiyakuch aidauk Apajuí minai inamjati tusag kakajus idaimamainchau ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Jisus tabaun tikich aidaushkam antukag : — ¿ Yaki tujash uwemjaush amainaita ? — tuidau .

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Aents aidau dutikmainchauwa nunak Apajuí dutikmainai , — tiuwai .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Jutii aidautik iina ajutjamaidauk ukuinaku nemagkamiajime , — tau .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Ashí aents Apajuinun takainak yujainak jeen , nuwen , yachin , uchijin , apajin dukujijai ukukiag yujaidauk ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: jujú nugka juwi pujusash , ni ukukbaujin nagkaesau jukiagtinai , nuigtushkam atak atina duwi pujut tuke atina nui pujusagtin ainawai .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Jisus ni jintintaiji doce aina nuna akanak juki : “ Jerusalén jegattag duwi , Apajuí etsegtin aidau , Apajuí Uchijí Aentsmaga Akiinauk nuniktinai tusa agajajua duka uminkattawai .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Nuniau asamtai minak aents judiuchu aidaunum sujutkagtatui , dutijuawagmatai pegkegchau chichagtuinak , dushiktuinak usuktiagtatui ;

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: asututnash asutu awa awajtuinakua mantuawagtatui ; tujash dutijuawagmataish kampatum tsawanta juwi ataktú nantaktatjai ” , tau .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Tujash ni jintintaiji aidauk shiig dekamainchau dekapedau , shiig antukchamnum tau asamtai .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Jisus yaakat Jericó jegattak wegai , aents wainmachu jintá yantamen ekeemas : “ Kuichik sujustajum ” , tusa sumá eketu .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Nuniau kuashat aents nagkaemainak pampainamun antuk iniimu : — Wagka imatainawa , — tusa .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Tutai : — Jisus Nazaretnumia wetai imatuinawai — tusag ujaidau .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Tiagtai senchi untsumak : — ¡ Jisusah , David wegantu uchijiyah , minash wait anenjugta ! — wajau .

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Imattai aents eemak ashinaidau itatkati tusag jiyaidau , tujash nigka nuní senchi untsumak : — ¡ David wegantu uchijiyah , minash wait anenjugta ! — wajau .

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Wainmachu imatbaun antuk Jisus wajantá : — Jukijum juwi itagtuatajum , — timatai jukí ejentuntam ,

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: Jisus iniak : — ¿ Minash utugtukti tusamea wakegame ? — tau . Tama ni ayaak : — Apuh , wika niimtijiti tusan wakegajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — ¡ Wainmakta ! Amek minai kajintsá anentaimam duwi tsagajume , — tiu .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Tusá tamawaik wainmakui . Nunik Apajuin emematkamaikia Jisusan nemagkauwai . Tuja ashí aents nuna wainkajushkam Apajuin emematuidau .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Nuna dutika ukuak Jisusak yaakat Jericó wayaa nagkaebau .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Nuniai Zaqueo apú kuichkiji atinun yajumin aidaun apuji shiig wiyakuch , nunú yaaktanmak pujau .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Nuniau asa , Jisusash wajukukita tusa wainkatatus wakegau , nuniayatak kuashat aents tuwagkagmatai wainmainchau dekapjau sutajuch asa .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Nuniak Jisus wetinmanini eemak tupikaki , numi sicómoro wajaunum waka ekeemsau , Jisus nagkaematai wainkatatus .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Nuniai Jisuschakam nui jegak pagkai diyak : — Zaqueoh , wamkesam akaikita , amina jeemin minajai , — tiu .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Tama Zaqueoshkam wamkes akaiki , shiig anentus Jisusan juki niina jeen emauwai .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Nunitai ashí aents aidau : Aents tudaugtinu jeen kanagtatus wegawai , tusag augmatuidau .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Tujash Zaqueok niina jeen ejega wajakí , Jisusan : — Apuh , yamai nagkamsanuk aents ujunauch aina auna jimaituk wajiijun akantukan tinamtajai , dutikakun wi kasagkamug aidaunash ipaksumta imajin susatjai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Yamaik ashí amina pataimijai uwemkaugme , Abraham dekaskeapi tiuwa nunisjumek dekaskeapi tujutium nuaduí , dekas Abraham wegantu wajasugme .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nunak , aents megkaejau aidaun egakan uwemtijatasan tauwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Jisus Jerusalén jegattak wegau asamtai , aents aidau ni chichaamu antugkaju asag , awi jegaa apu wajasá waamak inamjashtimpash tusag anentaimaidau asagmatai augmatbaun nagkabau .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Nuniak tau : “ Makichik aents ashí aents aidau eme anentsá diitai aajakuí , nunú tikich nugkanum atushat weuwai , nuwi apu emam wakitki niina nugkeen taatatus .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Eke wetsuk niina inaken diez aina nuna untsuká ikaunmak , makí makichik aentsun , cien tsawantai takasá jumainun kuichkin tinamí chichajak : ‘ Jujú kuichkia juwik wají sujakjum , kuichik aan kuashat ikaugkatajum , nuniagmin wisha taatjai ’ , tiuwai .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Nunikunak aents niina kajejuidau asag , dekas apun chichaman awetuinak : ‘ Jutiik dakitaji aanú iina apuji atí tusaik ’ , tiajui .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: “ Tujash nigka apu adaikam wakitki niina nugkeen tauwai . Nunik niina inake kuichik tinamká ukukbauji aidaun untsukaju , maki makichik aentsush kuichkinash wajupak ikaugkaje tusa dekajuatatus .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Tiajam makichik niiyá eemak jegantá : ‘ Apuh , ame kuichik sujusmayum nunak , aan nagkaemasan cien tsawantai takasá jumainun ikauntukjame ’ , tau .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : ‘ Ayú , amek inak pegkejaitme , machik susamuitkum kuashat ikaugkaume , duwi wishakam diez yaakat aina nuna apuji emattajame . ’

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Tusa inagnaig tikitchakam jegantun chichajak : ‘ Apuh ame kuichik sujusmayum duka , nuigtú cincoa imajin kawegke . ’

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Tutai nunashkam aikasag chichajak : ‘ Ameshkam cinco yaakta apuji atá ’ , tiuwai .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: “ Tuja tikitchakam tajuntun chichajak : ‘ Apuh , juuwai kuichkigmek jukita , jaanchi shiig ijian kuitamkamun itajuagme ,

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: wika amek senchi takamtikagtakum waitkagkagtinaitam nuna dekagjame , nuigtush ame susachu ayatkum atantin , aikasmek ame ajak ajakmachbau aig , juukam yajumin asamin , ishamakun kuichkigminak takamtiksachmajai ’ , tau .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Tama ni ayaak : ‘ Amek inak pegkegchauwaitme , amina chichamjuminig bakumattame , wi senchi takamtikagtakun waitkagkagtin , susachu ayatkun tikichnash atantin , aikasnuk wi ajachbaugnak ju waitiatkumesh ,

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: ¿ wagka kuichik kawegti tusa egketainum egkeam ukugtukchamiume ? Dutikauwaitkuminig wi wakitki taakun kawegkun jumain awajkajai ’ , tau .

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Tusa idayak tikich nui ijunun chichajak : ‘ Aanú kuichkin takaka nu jujukjum , cien tsawantai takasá jumainun ikaugka nu susatajum . ’

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Tutai aents chichajuinak : ‘ Apuh , niinuk cien tsawantai takasá jumain kuichik ikaugkamuji ajajama ’ , tuidau .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Tujash wi tajime : ‘ Ni kuashat ajá duka nuní dukap uwaetuka suwam atinai ; untsu piipich ajá duka , nu piipich ajamua duke atantam atinai ’ , tiu .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Nuna tusa idayak aents nui ijunun chichajak : ‘ Mina , apu we tusa dakitjuju aina nunú juwi itanjum kajegtajum ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Juna tusa ashimak Jisus nagkaemaki Jerusalén weuwai .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Nunik yaakat Betfagé tutai Betaniajai olivosan mujajin tikiju abaunum jegantatak wegak , Jisus ni jintintaijin jimajan awemak :

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: — Wetajum au yaakat jegattak aents batsata awi , awi jegakmajum burro makichik aentskesh entsamchatai jigkaam wajau wainkattagme , nu atia jukim itagtuatajum .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Nu atiagmin makichik aentskesh : Wagka atiame tujamkujaish : Apu atsumau asamtai juwaji titajum , — tiu .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Tiajam Jisusa jintintaiji aidaushkam wegag , jegakmá ni tibaunak imatiksag betek wainkaju .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Nunik jegantun atittaman burrugtin wainak : — ¿ Wagka burrush atiagme ? — tau .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : — Apu atsumau asamtai juwaji , — tiaju .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Dutika jukiag Jisusan itaantaju , dutikawag awantak nugkuagbaujin jukiag burro tuntupen aitkagmatai , Jisus ekeemiu .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Nunik Jisus wetai , aents aidauk dita awantak nugkuagbaujin jintanum ainag emaidau .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Nunikag olivosan mujají chapaibaunum jegantatak weenak , ashí Jisusa nemajin aidauk shiig dakujusag senchi jiikag Apajuin emematuidau , Jisus ashí pegkeg takaamun wainkaju asag , nuninak :

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: — ¡ Apajuí awemamu iina Apuji mina juuwai iina agkanmitkagmatna duka , nayaimpinum agkan batsata dushakam aantsag agkan batsamiagtatui ! — wajaidau .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Imatiagtai wajumak fariseo nui pachitkau aidau : — Jintinkagtinuh , amina nemagtamin aidau imataina nu imattsuk itatjata tusa itatmitkajia , — tuidau .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Dita itatiagtaik kaya aina ju pampaumain ainawai , — tiu .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Jisus Jerusalén tikiju wesa yaaktan wainak , aents nui batsamin aidaun anentaimtus buutu .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: “ Jerusalegnumia aidautijum , wi agkanmitkamainaitjim nunú yamaikish dekawagminig , Apajuik agkanmitkagmamainai . Tujash atumek Apajuí awemamuapita tujutchaujum nuaduí , Apajuishkam dekamainchau etamkaje .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Nunin asamtai atumnak tsawan tikima ishamain ajutjamtinaitjume , shiwajum kautjamkag yaaktagminak peegmak apagtamak , ashí yantamnum dakagmajag jetepakagtinai .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Dutijamainak atumnak ashí amupainak jeemnash ashí tsaikagtinai , imatikamu asa makichik kayakesh tikich kayanum patamiukesh juwakchatnai . Atumek Apajuí atumin tajutjabau aigkish : Iina uwemtijamjatasampap tae , tusagmek dekaachu asagmin . ”

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Nuna tusa idayak , Jisus wayau jega Apajuí emematku ijuntainum , nunik nui sujak batsamtatman jiijú .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Dutika chichajuinak : — Apajuí chichame agagbaunum : ‘ Mina jegajuk Apajuí aujku ijuntaiyai ’ tawa nuniaig , atum kasá aidau batsamtai awasaugme , — tiu .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Nunik Jisusak jega Apajuí ememattainum kashí kashinig jintinkagtau . Nunitai sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin , nuigtú judío apuji aidaujai wajuk maawajik tusag chichaidau .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Tujash yupichu dutikmainchau dekapedau , kuashat aents aidaush ni chichagkagtamunak puyatjus antujuidau asagmatai .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa , yamajam chichama nuna aents aidaun jintintak pujujai , sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin , tikich judío apuji aidaujai utsanawajui .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Nunikag Jisusan iniinak : — ¿ Aminash ya jintinkagtuata tusash awetamae ? ¿ Yana chichamenia jusha juniame ? — tuidau .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wishakam iniastajime , aigkatajum :

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: ¿ Ya Juagnash yamijatjata tusash awemauwaita , Apajuik awemauwait , atsa aents aidauk awemauwait ? — tau .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Tama utujimkag ditak pempeentunikiag chichainak : “ Juagnak Apajuí awemauwai , tajinish , ‘ ¿ Tujash wagka dekaskeapi tichau ainagme ? ’ tujamtata jama .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Tuja aents awemauwai tajinchakam , ashí ju aents aina juka : Juagkak Apajuí etsegtinai , tuidau asag kayai tukugmag mantamain ainawai ” , tuidau .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Nunikag : “ Dekatsji ” timi tusag Jisusan jegaantag : — Dekatsji , yatsu Juagnash yamijatjata tusash awemauwait , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Ayú , wisha tichattajime yana chichamenia jutikaja nunak , — tiu .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Junashkam Jisus aents aidaun jintintak augmatbau nagkama tau : “ Makichik aents ajajin uvan ajakmakui , dutika wajumak aentsun : ‘ Atum ju takastajum , dutikakjum minash sujustajum ’ , tusa susa ukuak weuwai dukap asan taamig tusa .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Nunik uva juut jegamtai , makichik inaken awemauwai , aents ajanum takaina nui jegamtai , uva neje susam jukí itagtuati tusa , dutikam jegattaman achikag suwi suwimainakua sutsuk wainak awagkiajui .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Dutikawagmatai tikich inaken awemauwai , dutikam jegattaman , nunashkam suwimawag pegkegchau chicha chichajuinakua sutsuk wainak awagkiajui .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Nuna dutikawagmatai ataktushkam kampatuma juna tikich inaken awemauwai , dutikamtaishkam ajanum takaina nu senchi suwimá , upu upujú jiikí ajapawajui .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: “ Dutikawagmatai dekas ajagtina nunú chichaak : ‘ ¿ Yamaish utugkatjaki ? dekas mina uchig anetaijua juna awetitjai , dutika ai nuna wainkag ajantus diischajaintash ’ tiuwai .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Tujash ajanum takainak batsata nu uchi minittaman wainkag : ‘ Auwai ju aja juna jukitnuk , dekas maa ajapami , dutika juka iinu emami ’ , tuidau .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Tusag achiká jukiag ajá ukumtikiag maawajui . “ ¿ Nunash ajagtina dusha itugmainaita ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Dekas ajagtina nu tajakug nunú ajanum takaina nunak kajeg utsaak , tikich aents aidaun susa idaimainai . ” Nuna Jisus tutai antukag : — ¡ Duka tuke dutikamak achatnaitji ! — tuidau .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan diyaak : — ¿ Tujash wajina pachisaya Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nuwish : ‘ Aents jegá jegamin aidau kayá ajapawajua nunú , kaya dekas jegá ichichkatin apututia iman wajasé ’ , tawa nunash tawa ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Aents nu kaya nui iyauk tsainkatnai , tuja kaya aentsnum iyaakug aentsnak tuke yuku ematnai , — tau .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Nuna augmatus tutai antukag : “ Jutiinak tujamak tawai ” , tusag sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai achikta tuidau . Nuninayatak aents aidaun ishamainak dutikainachu .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Nuninak aentsun awemajui , iish pegkeg aina duke takainaji tusajum yunumkajum , Jisus makichik iniibau iniastajum , wajintuk tujamit nunikmatai tsanumjuja achiká Romanmaya apunum sujukmi tusag .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Tiajam ditashkam Jisusan jegajiag : — Jintinkagtinuh , jutiik dekainaji amek dekas tutupit dekaskea duke jintinkagtame , aentsú imanjinkish etegkeatsme , Apajuí jinti dekaskea duke jintiame .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Nuniau asamin amina iniagme : ¿ Roma apuji kuichkijish sumainkaih , atsa sumainchaukaih ? — tuidau .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Tama Jisus dita anentaibaujin shiig dekaju asa : — ¿ Wagka minash tsanujatasagmesh wakejutagme ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Iwaintugkakjua makichik kuichik . ¿ Yana niimé dakumkaya daajish agagbauwaita ? Tama dita aiinak : — Anka Roma apuji dakumkamui tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Roma apujinua duka nigki susatajum , Apajuinua dushakam Apajuik susatajum , — tiu .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Nuna Jisus ashí aents antuinamunum timatai , tsanumjujag achikta tuinakush dutikmainchau diisaju , nuninak nu aaja aikam , ayatak puyatjukag diidau .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Juna tusa machik aig , wajumak saduceo aidau , jakauk nantagchagtin ainawai tinu asag , Jisusan iniinak :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Jintinkagtinuh , Moisés papí agag ukugtamkiuwa nui : ‘ Aents nuwan juki uchin akiitsuk jakamtaig , ni yachintin nuwan juki uchin akiimainai , dutika yachí uchijiya nunin emamainai ’ , tawai .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Tuja nuniamunum , siete yachigbau aajakajui , nuanuiya nagkamchak iwai nuwedauwai , tujash uchinak akiitsuk jakauwai .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Nunikmatai tikich yachi jukishkam , uchinak akiitsuk jakauwai .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Tuja kampatuma nu jukish , uchinak akiitsuk jakauwai , nuni nuninakua siete aajakajua duka , uchinak akiitsuk ashí jinawajui .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nunikagmatai duwi pujus nuwashkam jakauwai .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Siete aajakajua duka ashí nunak nuwatjaju aina duwish ¿ dekas yana nuweg atinaita atak nantainamunmash ? — tuidau .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Tusa tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Ju nugka juwig aishmag aidauk nuwenainawai , nuwa aidaushkam aishinainawai ,

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: tujash uwemkaju aidau jakau nantajag , tuke pujustin aina nuwig makichkish nuwenbauk atsutnai ,

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: jatanash jakachagtinai . Ditak Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinum batsata nuninuk agtinai , ditak jakauwaitak nantakiaju asag Apajuí uchijí agtinai .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Jakau aidau nantajagtinun pachis Moisés agajua nunú shiig dekamtijamui , Apajuí numi zarza tutai kegamunum chichaak : ‘ Wika Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aina nuna Apajuijiyaitjai ’ , tiuwai .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Wagki ¡ Apajuik jakau aina nuna Apajuijinchui , nigka iwaaku aidaun Apajuijiyai ! Apajuí diismak jakau aidaush iwaaku batsatainawai .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Aatus timatai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau : — Jintinkagtinuh yajau tichaume , — tuidau .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Nuna timatai ataktuk iniaschajui .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Nuniagtai Jisus ditan iniinak : — ¿ Wajuk asamtaiya Kristuk David wegantui tuinawa ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Davidchakam aikasag Salmosnum agak : ‘ Apu mina Apujun chichajak , ekeemsata mina untsujuí ;

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: nunikamin wi amina shiwajum aidaunak , ame najamsa ekeemtaigmin ikaunmakmatai duwi ame diisminum ’ , tiuwai .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: David Apug tujakua nuniaish ¿ wajuk asaya David wegantush amainaita ? — tau .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ashí antú ijunainai niina jintintaiji aidaun chichajak :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: “ Atumek kuitamamkatajum , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , nugkutai esagman nugkujag yujatan wakejin aina nunin aijum . Ditak aents kuashat ayamunum igkuntuinakush , eme anenjus kumpamjitnume tusa wakegainawai , nunisag jega ijuntainum utsanainakush , dekas apú ekeemtai shiig iwajamu aina imannum ekeemsatatus wakegainawai . Jistatin yuwamunmash , ekeemtai shiig iwajamunum ekeemsatatus wakegainawai .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Nuwa waje aidau jeenash atankiag , aents aidau pegkegnap takainawa tujuttinme tusag , Apajuin au aujuinakua ukú yujau aina nunin aigpajum . Nunú aidau imá senchi suwimkan jukiagtin ainawai . ”

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Jega Apajuí ememattainum wiyakuch aidau , Apajuinu atin kuichik egketainum anentag kuichik egkeamun Jisus wainkau .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Nuniai makichik nuwa waje shiig ujunauch jimag kuichik cobre najanamun egkettamanash wainkauwai .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Nunik : — Dekas tajime : Jujú nuwa waje shiig ujunauchitak tikich egkeawaja nuna nagkaesau kuichkin egkeae .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Tikich aidauk kuichik ampinun egkeenawai , tujash jujú nuwa waje ujunauchia juka ni sumasa yumainjinak ashí egkeae , — tiuwai .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Jisusak tusa chichá wajaig , wajumak aents aidau : Ju jega Apajuí ememattaya juka , kaya shiig pegkeg aidau ekenjá jegamkayap , Apajuinu atí tusag anentag ikaunmakbauwai imatika iwajamuita , tusag augmatuidau . Nuniagtai Jisus chichajak :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: — Atum ju imatiksa iwaja jegamkamu wainjum juka , makichik kayakesh ekenjamu aina nuwiyag juwakchatnai , ashí tsaikbau atinai , — tiuwai .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Juna Jisus tutai iniinak : — Jintinkagtinuh , ¿ nunash wajutik dutikawagtin ainawa ? ¿ Nunú aidau uminkatin tsawan jegattak wajataish , wají wantintinaita ? nunú ujajatkata , — tuidau .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : “ Kuitamamkatin atajum tsanugmajainum , kuashat aents aidau mina daajun adaimasag : ‘ Witjai Kristunuk , tsawantak jegawai ’ , wajagtinai , imatuinakuish dekaskeapi tusajum antugkaipajum .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Maaninawai tuinamu antitnaitjume , nuigtú maaniawagtatus pampandayamushkam , imaninakuish ishamkatin aigpajum , dekatkauk jujú aidauwá nagkaemagtinai , tujash nagkanmauk waamak achatnai . ”

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Tusa nuigtushkam : “ Nugka yaignum batsamin aidau tikich nuninum batsatujai maaniagtinai , tuja nuninai nugka muunnum batsamin aidaushkam , mai imannumiajaig maaniagtinai .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Senchi ugbaush ashí nugkanum atinai , yapagtash tepeatnai , nuigtú jata aentsun nagkaematug ijinbaush atinai . Nayaimpinmayashkam shiig ishamain wantinjatnai .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Tujash ju ashí wi tajim nu eke jegatsaig , atumnak achigmakag waitkagmasagtinai . Dutijamainak jega ijuntai aidaunum awaintamawag , nui jujamkiag aents achiká chimpitainum egkepawag , nui jujamkiag tikich apu aidaunum ejetamawag , nui inagkeapakiag apu dekas nugkanum inamin aidaunmash ejetamawagtinai , mina nemagtuidau asagmin , mina pachitus titinme tusag .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Tujash nuna dutijamainakuish , mina pachittsajum tikich ujamainuk yupichu ajutjamiagtinai .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Nuniakjumesh : ‘ Wajintu chichaknuk ayamjumkatja ’ , tusagmek anentaimigpajum .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Wi atum chichaktinnak dekamtikatnaitjime , dutikamu asagmin atum chichataik , makichkish aigmamainchau dekapiagtinai .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Tujash atumi apa , yatsum , pataim , kumpajum aina duke sujupakagtinai , dutijamawagmatai dita maamuk maam agtinai .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Atum mina nemagtin aidautigminak ashí aents aidau kajegtabiagtinai .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Imatijamainakush minaig datumtamain ainatsui .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: ¡ Wajiu wajastajum ! Atum mina nemagtukbautak pujautigmek , pujut nagkanchau jukiagtin ainagme .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: “ Suntag aidau Jerusalegkan tentea au wainkugmek , yaaktanak wamkeap tsaikagtatua titin atajum .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Nuna nuninakuig , atum Judea batsatutigmek mujanum pisagtajum . Jerusalén batsatutigmesh yaaktak jiinjajum ukuktajum . Tuja aents ajajin takaak batsatushkam , Jerusalén wakitkig waimainchau ainawai .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Duka Apajuí Israelan suwimkan susatnai tusa agagbauwa nunú uminak imanitnai .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Tujash nunú tsawantin nuwa ejamtin , nuigtú uchí amuntsuaku agtina nunak wait anentuinajai . Wagki Israel nugka juwig shiig senchi waitiamu atinai . Apajuí suwimkan suwau asamtai .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Maaniamunum maamush agtinai , dutikainak tikich aidaunak achijag , tikich nugkanum judiuchu aidau batsatbaunum kuashat yajuakagtinai . Dutikawag Jerusalén juwajunak , judiuchu aina nu inainak waitkagtin ainawai . Duti dutikainakua Apajuí tibauwa nu jegatai idaisagtinai .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: “ Nuniamunum etsa , nantu , yaya aidaushkam yaunchkesh nunishtaiji nuninamu wainnatnai . Ashí nugkanmaya aents aidauk senchi ishamiagtinai , nayants shiig senchi tsukatak uutbauji antuinak : Wajukawajik , wajagtinai .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Imatainak jaka iyauke agtinai , nugkanum nagkaemaktinun anentaimtusag ishamainak , nayaimpinmaya machikish umuchmainchau aidaushkam buchitaidau asagmatai .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Nunú imaniamunum wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna , yujagminum pachitkau tsawan wajasan mina senchigjai minamun waitkagtinai .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Nunú nagkamna imaninakuig atumek shiig aneastajum : Waamkeap waitiag nuna Apajuí agkanmitkagmattaji , tusajum . ”

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Junashkam Jisus augmatak tau : “ Diistajum numi higuera , nuniachkugmesh tikich numi esat dekatai aina dukesh .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Atumek nuna duke betenkainakuig : Waamkeap esat nagkamnattawa , tusajum dekau ainagme .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Nunisjumek atumshakam ashí wi taja nunú imanisag uminag wegau wainkugmek : Apajuí ju nugka juwi inamjatnuk namput wajatsuapi , titin atajum .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: “ Dekas tajime : Wi Jerusalegkan pachisan ashí tijim duka , yamai aents batsata jusha ashí jinuinatsaig uminkatnai .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nayaimpik nugkajaig megkaejatnai , tujash mina chichamjuk umintsukek juwakchatnai .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: “ Shiig kuitamamkajum umintsajum dakamsatajum , Apajuiyai anentaimtan datumtamain , nampet , ju nugka juwiya imá senchi anentaimtut aina nu tupanjajum batsatkujum , wi pachiachmau minakui ishamjukaijum .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ashí aents aidauk chinamunum kuntin dekeemama numamtuk wajakagtinai .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Atumek shiig umintsajum ashí tsawantai Apajuik aujú pujutajum , nunú ishamain nagkaemagtina nuanuish waitkats , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nuna aents aidaun suwimkan susatasan minakuish , ajankas igkunkamnujum . ”

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Jisusak tsawai jega Apajuí ememattainum jintinkagtua , kiitaik Olivosa mujajin weejakuí .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Nuniau asamtai kashikmasag jega Apajuí ememattainum aents aidauk kauntsagké aidau , jintinkagtamujin antukagtatus .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Jista pag levadurajai pachimtsuk inajua yutai Pascua tutai jegattak wajai ,

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai , aentsun ishamaidau asag , Jisus wajuk maawajik tusag chichaidau .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Nuniamunum Jisusa jintintaiji doce aina nuwiya Judas , Iscariote tuuta awagmatia nuna iwanch egkemtuau ,

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: dutikam sacerdote apuji aidaujai , nuigtú jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamin aidaujai : Wajuk Jisus achiká sujumainaita , nuna pachisag chichasaju .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Nuna chichas umikag shiig aneenak : Kuichik akikmí , tusag ame dutikata akiktajame , tiajui .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Tama Judaschakam ayú tusa wajuk Jisusan aents atsamunum sujukajak tusa egau .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Pascuatin , pag levaduragtuchu yuaku uwig aishmag tsakat maa yutai jegau asamtai ;

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Jisus , Pedron Juagjai awemak : — Wetajum , nunikjum Pascuatin yuwatin umiktajum , — tiuwai .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Tuinam dita aiinak : — ¿ Tuwí umiktí tusamea wakegame ? — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Yaakat wayamunum makichik aishmag yumí aimak waketu wainkattagme , nunú pataetuktajum ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: nunikjum jeentin jeen wayaakui : ‘ Jintinkagtin chichagtamak : Agkantash awash wi mina jintintaig aidaujai Pascuatin yumainush , tujamae ’ titajum ,

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: tajumin ni inaktugmastatui yakí tesamu muun shiig umikbaun , nuanuí umiktajum , — tiu .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tusa tiajam wegag Jisus tibaunak imatiksag wainkaju . Nunikag nui Pascuatin yuwatnunak umikajui .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Yujumak yuta jegamtai , Jisus mina chichameg etsegtugkatajum tusa etejamu aina nujai mesanum jegantag pekaamsajui .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Nunik chichaak : — Senchi wakemajai , eke mantuinatsaig ju Pascuan atumjai ijunjan yuwatasan .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Dekas tajime : Atumjaig ataktuk jutikanuk Pascuanak yuwashtinaitjai ; atak Apajuí inabauji jegatna duwi yuwatin asan , — tiuwai .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Nuna tusa idayak umutai copanum ekeemtatman juki , Apajuin see tusa jintintaijin suwak : — Ju copa juwiya ashí atum aidautijum uwagtajum ,

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: dekas tajime : Ataktuk jutikanuk uva yumijinak uwagchatnaitjai , atak Apajuí inabauji jegatna duwi uwagtin asan , tiuwai .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Tusa idayak pagkan juki Apajuin see ti puuká , jintintaiji aidaun susa chichajak : — Jujú pagka juka mina iyashig atumní mantamnatta nuna iwainawai , juka tuke jutiksagmeké atin atajum mina anentaimjutkujum .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Tusa ashí yuwawagmatai umutai copanum ekeemtatman juki , nunashkam aikasag Apajin see ti : — Ju vino copanum awa juka , mina Apag yamagman mina numpajuí atum uwemkatnun anagtamawajua nunú uminkatnun iwainawai :

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Mina sujutkatta duka ju mesa juwig wijai eketui .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Tuja wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna , nuniktinai tusa agajajua nuna umiktasan wejajai , tujash ¡ mina sujutkatta nuna imá senchi wait anentajai ! — tau .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Jisus tutai ni jintintaiji aidau pempeentunikiag iniinidau , yaki dutikati tusag .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Nuna tusag idayinak : Jutii ainag juwiyash yaki atakesh imá wagakush atinaita , tusag ditak pempeentunikiag pampandayidau .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Tudayagtai Jisus chichajak : “ Apu judiuchu aidauk aentsnak ditanua nunin emak inainawai , nuna dutikaidauk shiig takaawai tama au ainawai ,

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: tujash atumek nuninuk amaitsugme . Atum ainajum anuiya eme anentai atag takug , uchi eme anentsá diishtaya nunin anenmamain ainawai . Inamna dushakam aantsag tikichin takagna nunin amainai .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: ¿ Atumesh wajuk anentaimjume , mesanum eketa dukaih eme anentsá diitaish , atsa ajaama dukaih ? Mesanum eketa nunuwai . Tujash wika yujumkan ajamauwa numamtin wajasan , wi atumin ajampeajime .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: “ Atumek wi shiig utugchatnum wekaekuish wijaig ijuntsajum yujasú asagmin ,

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: wi atumnak apu emaktinaitjime , mina Apag mina apu etiuwa dutiksanuk ,

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: dutikamu asajum wi inamtinaitag nuanuí atumesh mina mesajuí wijai yuwatnaitjume , nuniakjum Israelan uchijí doce aajakajua nuanuiya wegantu aidau inakjum , ekeemtai aidaunum ekeemsatnaitjume . ”

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Jisus junashkam Pedron tiuwai : — Simón , iwanch Apajuin segae , trigo pegatiama numamtuk atumin pegkegchaunum dekapjamsatatus ;

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: tujash wishakam aminak segatmagme , minai kajintsá anentaibaujum mijakaim tusan , ame mina waintsamjai tujutmesh , ataktú minai anentaimjam tikich aidaush anentai ichichtugminum tau asan .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Apuh , wika amina achigmakag egkepainakuish , nuniachkush mantamainakuish amijai jakatasan umintsan wekaejai , — tau .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Pedro , yamai kashia juwik atash eke shinatsaig , Jisusnak waintsamjai tusam kampatumá ugtuktatme , — tiu .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Tusa idayak : — Wi atumin chichagkagtuktajum tusan ishimkun , wají egkea jutaigmekesh , kuichik , sapat aidaukesh jukigpajum tusan ishiakuitjim duwish , ¿ wají atsumjauwaitjume ? Tama dita aiinak : — Apuh atsumjachamiaji , — tuidau .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Tujash yamaik wají egkea jutaigmeshkam jukitajum , espadajum atsugtamkuig , awantak pataká nugkutaijum sujakum makichik sumaktajum .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Yamaik , duwik Apajuin etsegtin aidau mina pachitus againak : ‘ Aents pegkegchaujai betek maam atinai ’ , tibauwa nu minai uminkattawai , — tau .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Apuh , juwi jimag espada ajutjamui , — tiajui . Tiagtai Jisuschakam : — Maake idaisatajum , — tiuwai .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Tusa jinki weuwai Olivosan mujajin nui tuke weu asa , nunitai jintintaiji aidaushkam ashinkajui .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Nuanuí wakag ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Juwi pujusjum Apajuí aujú pujutajum , iwanch pegkegchau takastinme tusa dekapjamsainum .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Tusa ukuak nigka kanakí machik kuwaesag tikishmag pujus Apajuin aujak :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: “ Apawah , amesh wakegakmek wi waitmainaitag nu agkanmitkajuata ; tujash wi wakegamuk achati , ame wakegamu atí ” , tiuwai .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Tusa aujai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya wantintuku Jisusan anentain ichichtugtatus .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Jisus ni waittsatnujin shiig senchi anentaimtus , Apajuin senchi aujak numpan sekijai segaju , nunik nugká kitaidau .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Jisus Apajuí augbaun inagnak jintintaiji batsakbaun jegantun diikmá , wake besemag dekapenak ane anentaimainakua kajig batsatun wainak :

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: — ¿ Wagka kajiish batsatjume ? Nantakjum Apajuí ausatajum , iwanch pegkegchaun takastinme tusa dekapjamsainum , — tiuwai .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Tusa Jisus eke chichaak wajai , ni jintintaiji doce aina nuwiya Judas daagtin kuashat aentsun saasá ni emjuk tajuntau , Jisusan kugkuastatus .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Dutikam Jisus ayaak : — Judasah , Apajuin Uchijí Aentsmaga Akiinauk kugkuasmeap sujame , — tiuwai .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Jisusan achikagtatus nudiagtai , niina jintintaiji aidau : — ¿ Apuh , maaniattajik ? — tuidau .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Tusa tuinai , tikich nui ijuna nuwiya espadajin ukuini juwakug , dekas sumo sacerdote apuji inaken kuwishí untsujinian asankau .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Dutiktai Jisus : — Maake , aikatsuk idaisatajum . Tusa kuwishí asankamun juki ataktú anujtuk pegkeg awajtusui .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Nuna dutika sacerdote apuji , jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamin aidaujai niina achiktatus kauntau aidaun chichajak : — ¿ Atumek kasa achiktasa utugmaina imatijuagmeap , espadak tinamdaekajum , numi aidauk takuinasuajum minitjuinagme ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Wi kashí kashinig jega Apajuí ememattainum atumjai ijunnuweg duwikish jutikagmek achigchau agmaugme . Tujash yamaik atum mina jutijuatnun iwanch atumin inapakui jutijagme , — tiuwai .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Tuja Pedroshkam ikaag pataetus wega wegakua sumo sacerdote jeen jegantú ,

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: nunik jegaa jií ikapajag anamainak batsatbaunum , niishkam nui ditajai anamak ekeemsau .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Nunittaman makichik nuwa , apú inake tanta diikmá wainak dii wajatu , nunik : — Jushakam Jisusjai wekaemajama , — tau .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Tama Pedro chichaak : — Nuwah , wika wainchaujai aunak , — tau .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Nuna tusa machik eketaig , tikitchakam aikasag : — Amesh Jisusa jintintaijitamjama , — tau . Tama Pedro ayaak : — Atsa , wichauwaitjai , — tau .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Tutai idaisajam makichik hora tumain ekeemtatman tikitchakam aikasag : — Dekaskenum jushakam Jisusa jintintaiya jama , Galileanmaya asa , — tuidau .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Imatjuinam Pedroshkam : — Wika atum tajum nunak dekatsjai . Tusa chichaak wajai , atash shinukuí .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Nunitai Jisuschakam ayampá Pedron diisú , dutikam Pedroshkam Jisus chichajak : “ Atash eke shinatsaig kampatumá ugtuktinaitme ” , tibaun adeaju .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Nunik Pedro agaa jiinki senchi wake besemag dekapeg kajegmamak buutiuwai .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Jisus diyaku atajum tibau aidau dushikinak awatuidau .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Dutikainak jiin epetkag chichajuinak : — ¿ Dekakia ya awatamni ? — tuidau .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Tusag kuashat pegkegchaun chichajuinak waitkaidau .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Imá imatikainakua tsawajag , judío apuji aidau , sacerdote apuji aidau , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai ijunjag Jisusan jukiag , chichaman inagnau batsatbaunum ejegawagmatai , iniinak :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: — ¿ Ame dekas Kristukaitam ? tukagtita , — tuidau . Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wi Kristuitjai takuish , dekaskeapi tujutchattagme ,

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: wi atumin iniamash aigmaitsugme , nuigtush akupjumaitsugme .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Tujash yamaya juwi nagkamsanuk wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak , Apajuí ashí senchigtina nuna untsujin ekeemsattajai , — tiuwai .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tutai pampanjag iniinak : — ¿ Untsu amekaitam Apajuí Uchijim ? Tuinam Jisus ayaak : — Dekaske atum tujutjum nuuwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Nuna timatai : — ¿ Nuigtush ya etsegtukti tusaya dakainaji ? ii dekas ni chichaamu antugkagjama , — tuidau .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Chicham inagnatainum aents ijunag batsatuk ashí wajajag , Jisusan jukiag Romanmaya apu Pilato pujamunum ejegawaju .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Dutikawag Jisusa tsanumjuinak : — Jujú aents jutii nugken chichaman tsuwapak wekagas , witjai Kristunuk , Roma apujish kuichkik sumaitsui , tu wekagu asamtai juwi itaaji , — tuidau .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Tiagtai Pilato iniak : — ¿ Amekaitam judío aidau apujim ? Tama Jisus ayaak : — Ame tujutam duka dekaske , — tau .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Timatai sacerdote apuji , nuigtú tikich aents tuwakú aina nuna Pilato chichajak : — Wika jujú aentsnak makichkish pegkegchau dutikamunum bakumamainnak dekagtsujai , — tau .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Tutai nuní nagkaemasag : — Tujash aanú aents aidaun jintintak dapamkagtú wekaenuwe . Nuniak Galilea nagkamas jintí jintinkagtakua juwish Judeanmash dutiksag dapamkagtú wekaewai , — awajuidau .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Jisus Galilea nagkama jintinkagtinuwe tabaun Pilato antuk : — ¿ Dekas jujú Galileanmayachukaih ? — tusa iniimu .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Tutai : — Awiyayai , — tuidau , Apu Herodesa inamtaijinia asamtai . Nuna tiagtai dekaa , Pilato Jisusan Herodesai awemauwai , niishkam nu tsawantin Jerusalén taa pujau asamtai .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Dutika ejetim Herodes Jisusan wainak shiig aneasu , kuashat tsawantai : Itugsanuk wisha aents dutikmainchau ni iwainag takaamunash wainkag , tusa wakegá pujú asa ,

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: kuashat iniasu tujash nigka aikchauwai .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Nunitai nui sacerdote apuji , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai ijunaidau , wainak senchi tsanumjuidau .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Imatiagtai Herodeschakam ni suntaji aidaujai , Jisusan aentschau chichajus dushikinak , jaanch pegkeg apu nugkutai aina ibaun anugkug , ataktú Pilato pujamunum awebau .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Nuna dutikainak Herodesak Pilatojaig kumpamdayawajui shiwag pujuwaitak .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Ataktú itawagmatai , Pilato sacerdote apuji aidaun , tikich apu aidaun , ashí aents aidaujai ijumjau .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Dutika chichajak : — Atum jujú aentsun dapampawai tusajum itagtuawagmin atumesh antagmin , atum pegkegchau tajum nuna iniasan dekajuatakamanush dekajuachmajai .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Nunisag Herodeschakam dekajuachu asa awagkimtai juwi itawaje . Nuniau asamtai , wika ni mantamnati tusanuk tumaitsujai ;

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: ayatak asutiatajum tusan akupkatjai , — tiu .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Nunak ashí mijantin jista Pascua inagkeamunum , aents achikam egketaina nuwiya makichik jiikí idaitai asamtai tiuwai .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Tutai aents nui tuwak ijunuk ashí pampanjag : — ¡ Waagkamek ancha akupkatame ! ¡ Dekas Barrabás akupkata ! — awajuidau .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Duka Jerusalegnum Romanmaya apu dakituinaku pampandayamunum aentsú maú asamtai achikam egketu .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Tiagtaishkam Pilatok Jisusan akupkata tau asa , ataktú awentsag ditan chichajak : — Dekas Jisusan akupkatjai , — tau .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Pilato tutai nuní nagkaemasag senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Achigtá ! ¡ Achigtá ! — awajuidau .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Imatjiagtai kampatuma juwishkam Pilato chichajak : — ¿ Tujash wají pegkegchauna takasé jusha ? wika ni pegkegchau takasbaunum bakumaku mantamnamainjinak dekagchau asan , ayatak asutiawagmatai jiiktajai , — tau .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Tutaishkam nuní senchi untsumkag , achinjati wajainak Pilatunak wagagkiaju .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Imatiagtai Pilatushkam : — Dita tuina dutiksag uminkati , — tiuwai .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Dutikak Barrabás , Jerusalegnum Romanmaya apu dakituinaku pampandayamunum aentsú maú asamtai achikam egkemtatman , nunú jinkiti tuidau asagmatai nuna jiyaak , Jisusnak dita tuina dutiksag umiktinme tusa sujuk idaisauwai .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Tima Jisusan achigtatus juki emasag , yaakat Cirenenmaya Simón daagtin ajajinia minittaman , Jisus achigtin numi yapajia achiamun ayankaju . Dutikam Jisus eemak wetai , ukuunum yanas wegau .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Jisusan kuashat aents nemajus ashinainamunum , nuwa aidaushkam imanisag ukunum saegas , untsu untsumas buu buutuinakua ashinaidau .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Imatiagtai Jisus nuwa aidaun ayampatua : — Jerusalegnumia nuwa aidauh , minak eganjaigpajum , atumek egaamakjum uchijum anentaimtusjumesh buuttajum .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Tsawan jegagtamiagtinai , nunikmatai : ‘ Uchigtin aidautigmek uchigtuchu wajasjum , tikich nuwa kaga uchigtuchu muntsujinash amuntsuachu aidauk , yajau aneas batsatainatsuapita ’ , wajatin ainagme .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Imanik senchi waituinak mujá pagkajiag : ‘ ¡ Mujah , yumpunkum ijijatuakia ! ’ awajiagtinai .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Wi tudau takaschau aig , imatijuawag waitkajuinaish , ¿ Apajuish wagkag tudau aidaunash waitkaschati ? — tiuwai .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Jisusan jukiag , nuigtú jimag aents magkagtin aidaunashkam achijagtatus jukiag emaidau .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Dutikawag nain “ buuk sakajua ” nuninai tutainum ejegawag , Jisusan achijag , magkagtin aidaunashkam achijajui , dutikawag makichik untsugnumanini awajuinak tikichnak menajinini awajawajui .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Dutikam Jisus chichaak : “ Apawah , tsagkujata dekainachu asag , minak jutijuinawai ” , tau . Nuniai suntag aidauk , yana kayajig jinkit nunú Jisusa jaanchjinak jukiti tusag wasugkamaidau .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Nuniamunum aents aidauk Jisusan dii ijuntuinai , apu aidau dushikinak : — Tikichnak yajau uwemtikchauwe , yamai niishkam dekas Kristu , Apajuí etegjamuitkug nigki akaiki uwemjati , — tuidau .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Suntag aidaushkam dutiksag dushikinak vino chujuinun jukiag aagtatus jegantag ,

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: chichajuinak : — Ame dekas judío apujiyaitkumek , akaikim uwemjakia , — awajuidau .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Tuja ni chaikenchakam griego , latín , hebreo chicham aidauwai : “ Juuwai judío aidau apujig ” , tusa agatug adujtukajui .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Jimag magkagtin achijam deta nuwiya makichik Jisusan pegkegchau chichajak : — Ame dekas Kristuitkumek , aaní nematsuk amea akaikim , jutiishkam uwemtikagtujia , — tau .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Tutai nui tikich detau kumpajin aiká : — ¿ Amek machikish Apajuik ishamatsmek , niijai betek achinjam nemasmesh ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Jutiik pegkegchau takasbaunum dekaskenum waitiaji ; tujash juka pegkegchau takasbaujig shiig atsujui , — tau .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Tusa Jisusan ayampattsag : — Jisusah , minash ame apu wajasam inamjattam nuniakmesh kajimatjukipa , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajame , yamaya juwik amek wijai nayaimpinum pujuttame , — tiuwai .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Etsa tutupit wajasú ai nagkamas ashí nugkanum suwe wajas , etsa dukap tegau aishkam imanisag asauwai .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Nunik suwe wajas ai , jega Apajuí ememattainum jaanch ejaamu auk yakiin nagkamnas ichiinak jimaituk kanakuí .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Nuniai Jisus senchi untsumak chichaak : — Apawah , amina uwegmin mina wakanjunak idaijai , — tusa jakauwai .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Nunik jakamtai , nuigtú kuashat nagkaemajun capitán wainak , Apajuin emematak : — Dekas ju aentsua juka shiig pegkejai , — tau .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Aents nui ijunas dii ijuntuidaushkam Jisus nunik jakamtai wainkag , wake besemag dekapenak waketuinak , detsepenak awatkiag weedau .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Nuninai ashí Jisusa waintaiji aidauk , nuwa Galilea nagkamas , Jisusa saetusag yujajakú aidaushkam , ikaag ijunas Jisusan dii ijuntuidau .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Judeanum yaakat Arimatea tutai awa nuwiya José daagtin , niishkam apu chichaman inagdau aina nuwiya pegkeg aidaunak takaak pujau .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Nigka Apajuí minash inatjati tusa wakeyin asa , tikich aidau Jisusak mantamnati tiagtaish dakitjauwai .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Nuniku asa Pilatun jegají , Jisusa iyashin segauwai .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Dutika , numi yapajiamunum Jisus nemattaman akakí sábana pujuí pempeag , kaya waa muun tai umikbau , makichik aentskesh ukuschamunum egkeauwai .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Nunú tsawantak , tsawan ayamtai atin asamtai , ashí umintai aajakuí .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Nuwa Galilea nagkamas Jisusa nemajus yujasaju aidaushkam , José wetai pataetukaju , nunik wainkaju Jisusan wajuk ukusaje nuna ,

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: nunik waketug jegá kaunkag , Jisusa iyashí ukatkatnun shiig pegkeg kugkuin aidaun , nuigtú yakagtinnash najanawaju , dutikawag tsawan ayamtai tsawaju asamtai , ayamjaju chicham umiktinnum tawa nunisag .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Tumig tsawagmatai shiig kashikmasag nuwa aidau kugkuin najanamujin jukiag , Jisus ukusbaunum wegaju .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Nunik jegakmag wainkaju kaya muuntai epenbauk ekemak atatman .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Dutika wainkag utuawaju , tujash Jisusa iyashinak wainkachajui .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Nunikag puyatkag ijunai , jimag aents winchamtinun nugkuaju ditai ayaumas wajaantaju .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Nuna wainkag senchi ishamainak , nugká tsuntsumawag ijuntsamtai chichajak : — ¿ Wagka iwaaku pujaush jakau ukutainmash egagme ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Juwig atsawai nigka nantakne . Adeagtajum ni Galilea pujus

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: chichaak : ‘ Wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag junak , achijuk aents tudaugtin aidaunum sujutkagmatai mantuawagmataish , kampatumchik tsawantai nantaktinaitjai ’ , — tiuwa nunú .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Tama ditashkam yaunchuk , Jisus nuniktinaitjai tibauwa nuna adeajaju .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Nunik ukusmaunmaya waketug jegawag , ashí dita wainkamujinak Jisusa jintintaiji once juwakajua nuna ujakaju , aikasag ashí tikich aidaunashkam .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Duka ju aajakajui : María Magdalanmaya , Juana , tikich María Jacobo dukujiya nunú , nuigtú tikich nuwa aidaujai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidaunak ujakajui .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
