text2: Nuwa tusa etsejiagtaish , wainak tu yujatsuash tusag , ditak dekaskeapi tichajui .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Nuniagtai Pedrok jinkug tupi tupikakua Jisus ukusbaunum jegantá , tekená diikmá imá sabananak wainkau , nunik wajukamki tusa ane anentaimkawa jegá wakitkiu .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Nunú tsawantinig Jisusa jintintaiji jimag , yaakat yaijuch Emaús tutai , Jerusalén juwaki once kilómetro abaunum jegatatus wegaju .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Nunik weenak ashí Jisus dutikamun pachisag augmatuidau .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Nuna tuinak ditak tudayinai , Jisuschakam amainag ditajai ijunag ashinu .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Tujash ditak , Jisusapita tuinachu asag pachiakats ashinaidau .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Nuniagtai : — ¿ Jintá wesagmesh , wají augmatkugmea wake besemjash ashinjume ? — tau .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Tutai Cleofas daagtin ayaak : — ¿ Amesh Jerusalegnumiayaitkumek , wají nagkaemaki dusha dekatsum ? — tau .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wajuk awa ? — tau . Tutai : — Jisus Nazaretnumia Apajuí etsegtin , chichamesh senchigtin , Apajuí senchijin wainchatai aidaunash iwainag , ashí aents aidaush wainainamunum takauwe , nuna

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich judiuti apuji aidaujai mantamnati tusag , Romanmaya aidaunum sujua idaisagmae , dutikamtai numinum achijag maawagmae .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Tujash jutiik : Niimpap Apu wajas , Israel aents aidautinak ashí iina shiwaji aidaunmash agkanmitkagmattaji , tusa dakauji . Nuna dutikawaja duka kampatum tsawan nagkaemawai .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Nuniamunum nuwa jutiijai yujau aidau kashikmas Jisus ukusbaunum wegaju , anentai jegagmainchaun

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Jisusa iyashin waitkachag , nayaimpinmaya aents wainka ajin : Jisusak iwaaku pujawai , tujamaji tusag wakitki kaunawag ujapakagmae .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Tiagtai jutiijai ijunag yujau aina nuwiya Jisus ukusbaunum wejiag , nuwa tiagbaunak dutiksag Jisusa iyashinak wainkachag waketug kaunkagmae , — tuidau .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wagka shiig anentaimtugjum dekaskeapi tumainchaush dekapenagme , yaunchuk Apajuí etsegtin aidau ashí juniktinun pachis agajajua dusha ?

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Kristuk imatika waitkasa maam , ni inamtaijinig wayatnai tusa agagbauchukaih ?

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Tusa , Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa nuna , Moisés agagbauwa nui nagkamas , ashí Apajuí etsegtin aidau agajajua nuna ujakaju .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Nunik yaakat yaijuch Emaús jegamunum , Jisusak nagkaemaki wegau , nuní atushat wegau wajukmaina numamtuk .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Nunitai : — Dekas juwi jutiijai juwakta , kiyawai , — tuidau . Tima nui ditajai juwakui .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Nunik yujumkan yuwatatus mesanum jegantag pekaamsamunum , Jisus pagkan juki Apajuin see tusa puuká susaju .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Nunitai : Dekas Jisusapita tusag dekaawaju , nuninai ditajai eketu megkaekau .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Nunikmatai ditak pempeentunikiag : — ¿ Wagkaik jintá minis Apajuí chichameg nuní awai tusa ujapakui , shiig aneasua minimag duwish anentaimjaish diischamji ? — tudayinau .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Tamawaik Jerusalén waketug , Jisus chicham etsegkata tusa ishiaktin once aina nu , nuigtú tikich aidaujai ijunag batsatbaunum jegawaju .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Nunik jegawagmatai : — Dekas Jisusak nantakne , nunik Simogkan wantintuke , — tusag ujaidau .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Tama ditashkam : — Iish jintá wesá Jisus wainkamji , nunika jegá jegaa ajin , pagkan puuk amasmatai , dekas Jisusapi tusa dekaamji , — tusag etsejuidau .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Nuna pachisag chichainak batsatai , Jisus ejapeen wajantá ditan kumpamak : — Apajuí atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme , — tiuwai .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Tama ditak senchi ishamkaju , wakanchawashit tusag .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Imaniagtai Jisus chichajak : — ¿ Wagka minash wakanchawashit tusagmesh ishamjagme ? ¿ Wagka utujimsagmesh anentaimjutjume ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Tusa : — Wika Jisusaitjai , mina uweg dawegjai achikjum diigtustajum , wakanik nejesh ukunchish atsugnai .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Takug niina uwejen , dawenmashkam achiamu aajakua nuna ditan inaktusajui .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Dutikam shiig aneenayatak , dekaskeapi tumainchau dekapiagtai chichajak : — ¿ Yumainuk atsugtamainawak ? — tau .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Tutai namak achijuamun puukag , dapá yumijijai susaju ,

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: dutikam ditash wainainaig yuwauwai .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Nunik Jisus : — Juna pachisan atumjai pujusan , Moisés , Apajuí etsegtin aidau , Salmosnumash mina pachitus agajajua duka ashí uminkattawai tusan ujayajime , — tiuwai .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Nuna aatus taku Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa nuna shiig dekamtikawajui ,

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: dutika nuigtushkam : — Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nuwig , Kristuk waitkasa maam atinai nunikash kampatum tsawanta juwi nantaktinai ,

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: nunikmatai niina daajin pachis Jerusalén nagkamas , ashí nugkanmash etsejiagtinai , tudaujin idayinak tsagkugnagtinme tusag ,

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: atum ainagme ju ashí wainkaujum nunú etsejatin aidautigmek .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Tujash yamaikik Jerusalegkak juwaktajum , nuniagmin wi mina Apag Wakaní Pegkejin anagkagtuamua nuna awetitjime , ni senchimtijamawagtatui , — tiuwai .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Juna ashí ujak ni jintintaiji aidaun yajuak , yaakat yaijuch Betanianmanini weuwai , nunik nui Jisus uwejen takuí : Apajuí yaimpaktinme , tiuwai .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Tusa akateamuik yakí takuniuwai . Nunik nayaimpinum wakitkimtai ,

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: ememati ukuinak , shiig aneasag Jerusalén waketjajui .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Nunikag jega Apajuí ememattainum kashí kashinig tuke ijuntsagké aidau Apajuin emematuinak . Aatus atí .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Chicham dekaskea duka Kristui , nunú nugkash najannatsaig Apajuijai aajakuí , nunin asa niishkam Apajuike , nigki Apajuí wajukuita nunash shiig dekamtijamauwai .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Nagkamtinish nigka Apajuijaig tuke pujujakuí .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Apajuijai najankauwai ashí ii wainainag nunak , nunin asa ashí wají najankamu aina duka , makichkish shiig atsawai ditak najaneaku tumainuk .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Niinig pujutash aajakuí , nuniau asamtai , ni nunú pujutan aentsun inagkeatkiuwai , nunú tsaaptin nugká tauwa nu , ii dekachbaunash dekamtijamauwai .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Ashí suwe aidaunak Jisus tsaaptina nunú tsawan emauwai , imatikamu asa suwea dushakam tsaaptina nunak depetmainchau dekapjauwai .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Apajuí makichik aentsun Juan daagtinun awemauwai yamijatjatnun ,

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: nunú Jisus tsaaptina nuna pachis etsegtai , ashí aents aidaush dekaskeapi titinme tusa .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Juagkak Kristu tsaaptina nu ajakchauwai ; niinak Kristu tsaaptina nuna pachis , aents aidaun ujaktí tusa Apajuí awemauwai ,

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: nu ashí aents aidaun tsaapmitkatnuk waamak taatin asamtai .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Chicham dekaskea duka Kristui , nunú nugkanum akiinauwai . Nuigtushkam Kristuk najankauwai ashí najankamu nugkanmaya ii wainainag junak . Iman juwi taamtaishkam , juwapita Apajuí awemamuk tusajag dekaachaju ainawai .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Dekas nugkanum niinbau aidau batsatbaunum tauwai , nunikmataishkam ditak pachikchajui .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Ditanbauk dutikawagmatai , tikich aidau dita jukiag , niina chichamen etsegtai dekaskeapi tuinak , shiig wakejus antugkajui . Nu aents nunikaju aidaunak Apajuí uchijí emakui .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Ditak Apajuí uchijí wajasajua nunak , Apajuiya nu niina uchijí emakbau asag , ashí akiinaidautik , aentstí wakegamunum akiinainag nunin ainatsui .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Chicham dekaskea duka Kristui , nunú Aentsmaga Akiina jutiijai wajumchik mijan pujusuí . Jutii dekas Apajuí Uchijí tikima makichkiuchia nuna senchijig , ni dekas chichaamu , wait anenkagtamujiya nujai waitkabiaji .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juan Jisusan pachis chichaak : “ Wi atumin ujaakun mina ukujui minitta nunú , dekas mina nagkaetasuk atatui , nigka nagkamtinish tuke pujujakú asa , timayag duka juuwai ” , tiuwai .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Ashí niina imanjiya nuwiyag pegkeg pujutak jukiuwaitji , nunika ajin tuke kashí kashinig yaimpakui .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Apajuik duwik chicham umiktinnak Moisesan susauwai , dutikam ni aents aidaun ujakuí , untsu yamaik anejatta duka chicham dekas chichata nujai , Jisukristuiya juwaji .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Apajuinak makichik aentskesh tuke wainchau ainawai , tujash niina Uchijí , ni aneetaijiya nunú , Apajuí nuninai tusag shiig ujapakagji .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Jerusalegnumia apu aidau , sacerdote , levita aidaujai Juagkan aentsun ishitkauwai : Dekas Kristukaitam , tusajum shiig dekajuatajum tusa .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Nu tusá ishiakbau aidau jegají iniam , Juan shiig imagnis chichaak : — Wika Kristuchuitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Tusa timatai awentsag iniinak : — ¿ Dekas tujash yaitpa ? ¿ Apajuí etsegtin Elías aajakua dukaitam ? — tuidau . Tama Juan chichaak : — Wika Eliaschauwaitjai , — tau . Timataishkam awentsag iniinak : — ¿ Apajuí etsegtin taatna dukaitam ? Nu tamashkam : — Atsa , duchauwaitjai , — tau .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Tutai ashí tujinkag : — Wait aneasam amesh yaitpa dekaskesh nunú shiig ujajatkata , shiig dekaa jutii awetabiagma nu ujaktasa taji , dita amina dekagtamatatus wakejutpaidau asagmatai , — tuidau .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Tama Juan ayaak : — Wika makichik aents eemak taa , uwegshunum wekagas senchi jiiká chichagkagtak : ‘ Apu wekaesatnun jintan shiig iwajug esegak tutupit dakuegajama ’ numamtuk , atumí anentaimish shiig iwajajum umiktajum ‘ Apu minitin asamtai ’ , titinai tusa Apajuí etsegtin Isaías tiuwa nuuwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Fariseo aidau aents ishiakbau Juagkan ausatatus jegajiag batsamtuidau nuna timatai :

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: — Tujash ame Kristuchu , Eliaskeshkam Eliaschau , Apajuí etsegtin taatnai timawa dukesh achayatkumesh ¿ wagka aentsush yamiame ? — tuidau .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Tusa tama , Juan aiimak : — Wika yumí yamijatjai , tujash tikich atum ainajum anuí makichik pujawai , yamaikik duka Apajuí awemamuapita tusagmek dekatsjume .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Nigka duwik nagkamas tuke pujuwaitak mina ukujui patatkawai . Wika niiya ibauchu asan , ni sapatji jigkamunakesh atitmaitsujai , — tiuwai .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Nunak nugka Betábara tutai Jordán amain Juan yamijatak pujamunum tiajui .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Kashinia duwi Jisus minittaman Juan Yamijatna nu wainak : “ Juuwai dekas Apajuí Uwigji , ashí aents aidau tudaujin akikmak mantamnatta nunú .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juuwai atumin chichagkun : ‘ Mina ukujui , tikich minitta nunuwai dekas mina nagkaetasuk , nigka duwikish tuke pujujakú asa ’ , timag duka .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Wikishkam niinak wainchauwaitkun yumí yamijatmajai , Israel aents aidauk ni wantintai , shiig dekaatnume tau asan , tiuwai . ”

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Nuna ti junashkam : “ Wakaní Pegkeji pauma nunin wajas Jisusai ekeemtatman wainkabiajai .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nuniakuish wika niinak eke dekachbaijai yaita nunak , nuniai Apajuí yamijatjata tusa awetiuwa nu chichagtak : ‘ Wakaní Pegkeji akaiki yaayai ekeemu wainkattame , nunú atatui Wakaní Pegkejijai yamijatjatnuk ’ , tujutmayi .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Wika nuna wainkau asan , dekas nigka Apajuí uchijiyai tajai ” , tiuwai .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Kashinia duwi Juan Yamijatin ataktú jimag jintintaijijai wajai ,

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Jisus nagkaemattaman wainak : — Diistajum , auwai dekas Apajuí Uwigjig , — tiuwai .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Nuna Juan tutai Jisusan nemajuinak , Juagnak ukukiajui .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Nunik miniagtatman Jisus ukujin ayampá diikmá wainak : — ¿ Atumesh wají egagme ? — tiu . Tutai dita aiinak : — Jintinkagtinuh , ¿ dekas amesh tuwí pujame ? — tuidau .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Wegajai , awi wainkatajum , — tau . Tima niijai ijunag Jisus pujamunum , etsa ashí akagu asamtai , nuwig kajigkaju .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Nuna Juan Yamijatin takui antuka jimagti Jisus nemagkajuitag nuwiyag Andrés aajakuí , Simón Pedro tutaya nuna yachi .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Andrés Jisusan wainak , tikichnak tutsuk dekatkauk niina yachi Simogná weji : — Yamaik Mesías wainkaji , — tusa ujakuí . ( “ Mesías ” tawa nunak “ Kristu ” taku tawai . )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Nuna tusa Andresak Simogkan juki Jisus pujamunum ejegamtai , Jisus wainak chichajak : — Amek Simón Jonasa uchijiyaitme , tujash yamaik amina daagmik Cefas atatui , — tiuwai , ( nunak ‘ Pedro ’ taku tawai . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kashinia duwi Jisus Galilea wekamá Felipen wainkauwai , dutika : — Wegajai , mina jintintaig aminum , — tiuwai .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Duka Felipek yaakat Betsaidanum Andrés Pedrojai pujujakua nuwiyag niishkam aajakuí .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Dutikam Felipeshkam weuwai Natanaelan ujaktatus , nunik jegají ujaak : — Duwik Moisés chicham umiktin aidaun agak , ‘ Makichik aents Apajuí etegkamu nugkanum taatnun ’ pachis agajua nunú dekas wainkamji , tikich Apajuí etsegtin aidaushkam dutiksag agakajui . Nunú aentsuk Jisusai , José Nazaretnumiaya nuna uchijí .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Nunú tusa ujaam Natanael chichaak : — ¿ Nazaretnumiash makichik pegkejash jiinmainkaih ? — tiuwai . Tusa tama Felipe chichaak : — Dekas wemí amesh wainkamnum , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Tima Felipejai juwakiag Jisus pujamunum jegantagtatus wetatman , Jisus wainak : — Juuwai dekas Israel aents tsanumtanash tsanumainchauwa duka , — tau .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Tama Natanael antugmamak : — ¿ Minash tuwí waitkamume ? Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wika aminak Felipesh tajutjama ujapatsaig , numi higuera wakentin pujamin wainkamjame , — tau .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Tusá tama Natanael chichaak : — Jintinkagtinuh , amek dekas Apajuí Uchijiyaitme , ametme Israelan Apujimek , — tau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Higuera wakentin pujamin wainkamjame taja duwikik , ¿ Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita tujutam ? Tujash dekas juní nagkaemas iwainamu wainkattame .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Nuna ti nuigtú chichaak : — Dekas tajime : Atumek nayaim ujanmatai Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidau , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag nuna , minai taawag waketuidau wainkagtin ainagme , — tiuwai .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Kampatuma nu tsawamunum nuwenbau Galilea nugkanum yaakat Caná tutainum au asamtai , María Jisusa dukujiya duka nui pujau .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Jisuschakam jintintaiji aidaujai ipaamu asa , ditashkam wegajui .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Nuwenbau nagkamnamtai umuinamunum , vino abuekauwai . Nunikmatai María Jisusan chichajak : — Vinunak amukaje , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Dukuwah , ¿ wagka minash dusha tujutme ? Wi iwainmamkun shiig dekajuatnume tusan takamainuk eke tsawantak umintsui .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Tutai ajaamak yujaun María chichajak : — Ni tujamtata duka imatiksagmek umigkatajum , — tiuwai .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Timatai nui seis buits kaya najankamunum , judío aidau yumin aimag , tuke dutiktai atí tibau asamtai , nijamajakú aina nu batsatu , nu buitsnumag cincuenta , setenta litros tumain pimuidau .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Jisus ajaamak yujaun chichajak : — Yumi shikigjum aanú buitsnum aimjatajum , — tiu . Timatai ajamau aidaushkam yumin shikikag buitsnum aimjaju .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Imatika aimjagmatai : — Yamai shikikjum dekatkauk jista chichamja auwá susatajum , — tau . Tusa tima nunaa shikik susauwai .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Dutika susam jistan chichamjauk yumi vino emamunak dekatsuk uwag , pegkejan dekapjauwai . Inak yumin shikik aimkaju aidauk , yuminap jutikawa tusajag shiig dekaidau . Nuninaig jistan chichamja nu , nuwena nuna untsuká :

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: — Tikich nuwenaidauk yama nagkamchak pegkejan ajaamasag , aents senchi uwajagmatai , duwi vino imanchau ajamau agmae . Tujash amek nagkamchakum pegkeg ajamasmesh yamaish imanuk ajamame , — tiu .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Juna jutikauwa nunak Galilea nugkanum yaakat Caná tutai awa nui , aents dutikmainchaun Jisus nagkamchak yumin vino emauwai , niina imanjin iwainmamkatatus . Nuna dutikamtai niina jintintaiji aidauk : Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tusa shiig dekaawajui .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Nuna Jisus dutikamtai , ni dukují , niina yachi , ashí jintintaiji aidaujai ijunjag Capernaum jegawajui , nunik nui wajumak tsawantai batsamsajui .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Judío aidau jistamtaiji , Pascua jegattak wajasmatai , Jisusak Jerusalén weuwai .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Nunik jega Apajuí ememattainum waikmá , baka aidaun , uwig aidaun , paum aidaun sujuinak utsanawag , kuichkin yapajiin aidaushkam pekajaidaun wainkauwai .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Nunik nuwi duwap etsentsjamu atatman juki chapikmag , jiyaká iwiyag , jega Apajuí ememattainum batsatunak uwig aidaun , baka aidaujaí ashí jiig ishimak , kuichkin yapajidaunashkam nagkimjuk nugká akaketuk , mesajinashkam shitaki ajuntug idayak ,

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: paumá sujin aidaun : — Ju aina juka ashí agaa jiigtajum . Atumek , mina Apajun jeega juka wají sujutaig emaigpajum , — tiuwai .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Nuna tutai jintintaiji aidau Apajuí chichame agagbaunum : “ Amina jeemnak senchi akasmatjai ” , tusá agagbauwa nuna adeajajui .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Dutiktai apu aidau : — ¿ Wají iwainakmea aents dekas chicham antugtai wajukea nunikmesh , aentsush aikamesh jiigmesh ishime ? — tusa imatjuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Tusá tama Jisus ditan chichajak : — Ju jega Apajuí ememattaiya jujú tegaktatjume , dutikawagmin wi kampatumchik tsawantaik ataktú jegamkattajai , — tiuwai .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Tutai apu aidau : — Ju jega Apajuí ememattaiya ju cuarenta y seis mijadai jegamkamua duká , ¿ ame kampatumchik tsawantaik jegamkattam ? — tuidau .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Nunak Jisusak dekas jegan taku tichauwai ; niina iyashin pachis taku tiuwai , maam kampatumchik tsawantai nantaktin asa .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Jisus juna tiuwa nunak , niina jintintaiji aidaushkam ni mantamna nantakmatai , dekas niina iyashin takumpap tiuwaita tusag adeajajui . Nuninak Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa nuna , tuja Jisus tibauwa nunashkam dekaskeapi tiajui .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Jisus jista Pascua tutain inagkeaktatus Jerusalén jegaa pujus , makichik aentsush dutikmainchaun iwainag takatai , kuashat aents aidau , dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tiajui .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Nuniagtaishkam Jisusak : Dekaskeap imagnis anentaimjutuinawa tichauwai , nigka shiig dita anentaibaujinak waituidau asa .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Nigka , tikich aents aidau , juka aentsuk nuní anentaimainawai tusa ujatkati tichauwai , ni aentsun anentaimtajinak shiig dekaju asa .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Makichik aents Nicodemo daagtin fariseo aajakuí , ashí judío aina nui eme anentsá diitai .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Nunú Nicodemo Apajuin pachis ausatatus kashi Jisusan jegajiuwai . Dutika aujak : — Jintinkagtinuh , jutiik dekainaji dekas aminak Apajuí awetabiuwai , jutii aidautin jintintuati tusa . Apajuijai pujachuk aents dutikmainchau aidau , ame kuashat iwainajam takaam imatikag takamainchau ainawai .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Tusá tama Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajame : Aents wakanin akiinachuk Apajuí inamak amaitsui , — tau .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Jisus tutai Nicodemo iniak : — ¿ Wajukaya aents muuntash ataktú wakitkish akiinmainaita ? ¿ Ataktú dukujin egkemkag nuaduí akiinmainait ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajame : Wakaní Pegkejiya nu egkemtuja pujutí yapagtuachbauk , Apajuí inamtaijinig wayashtinai .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Aents akiiamuk aentsun uchijigke , untsu Wakaní Pegkejin akiinuk Apajuí uchijiyai , nunú Wakan egkemtugbau asa .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: ‘ Juna ataktú akiinmainai ’ , takui wajukaik nunikaishni tusamek utujimsam anentaimipa , ashí betek ataktú akiinmainai .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Daseg ni wakegamunum umpuawai , dutikak numi ishinbau antayatkuish , tuwiya minawa , tuja tuwí nagkaemakish wegawa duka dekashtayame . Ju shiig dekatsug juninke aents Wakaní Pegkejin akiinaushkam , — tiuwai .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Tama Nicodemo awentsag : — ¿ Nunash wajukag nunikainta ? — tusa iniau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Ame Israel aidau jintinnaitam ibauwaitkumek dusha dekatsum ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Dekas tajame : Iik dekamu chichaaji , tuja wainkamu etsegji . Tujash atumek dekaskeapi tatsugme .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Atum wi ju nugka juwiya pachisan tamash dekaskeapi tachautigmesh , ¿ Itusagmek dekaskeapi titagme nayaimpinmaya pachisa chichaakuish ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: “ Makichkish nayaimpinmag wachau ainawai . Tujash Witjai nayaimpinmayan , Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan juwi Akiinaunuk .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Moisés dapi dakumká najanamun uwegshunum yakí jiikua numamtuk , minashkam yakí jiigkagtin ainawai , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nunak ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: dutijuawagmatai , ashí aents mina dekaskeapi tujutuidauk pujut nagkanchauwa nuna jukiagtin ainawai .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: “ Apajuik ashí aentstin senchi anejatu asa , ni Uchijí makichkiuchia nunak awetugmauwai , ashí niina dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita tusa niinig kajinas anentaimaidauk , waitut nagkanchaunmag wechatnume , ayatak pujut nagkanchaunum Apajuijai tuke pujustin atinme , tusa .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Apajuik Uchijinak ju nugka juwig aentsun suwimkan susati tusag awetugmachui , ayatak aents aidaun ayamjuk uwemtikati tusa awetugmauwai .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: “ Apajuí Uchijiya nuna dekaskeapi tuinak , niinak umijuidauk waittanmag wechagtin ainawai , untsu niina dekaskeapi tuinachu , chichamenash umijuinatsu nunú waittanmag wegagtin ainawai .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Apajuí Uchijí ju nugka juwi taa , ditá tudauji aidaunak paan iwaintukajui , suwenum batsamaina numamtuk wajainamun . Dutikamaitak aents aidauk , tudau takatan imá senchi wakegaidau asag , Apajuí wakegamujiya nuna takainak tsaaptinnum pujumaina numamtuk wajamaina nuna dakitjaju asag , Apajuijaig tuke kanaak kanakagtin ainawai .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Tudau takau aidauk tsaaptinnak dakituinawai , nunidau asag , wi pegkegchau takaamujun iwaintugkai , tusag tsaaptinnak tupantuinawai .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Tujash dekaskenum pegkeja nuna takaidauk , ditá takatjin paan iwainaktasag Jisusai mininawai , Apajuí wakegamun takasú asag . ”

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Jisus juna tusa ukuak , ashí niina jintintaiji aidaujai Judea nugkanum wegajui , nui yamijatiagtai dukap tsawan pujusuí .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Nuniai Juagshakam Enón Salimnum jegaattak awa nui pujus yamijatu , nui yumi au asamtai , ashí aents niiní jegauk betek yamimakaju ainawai .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Nunak Herodes Juagkan eke achiatsaig nunikajui .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Nuanuí Juagká jintintaiji aidau , judío apuji aidaujai , aentsush wajuk tudaujinash pegkemainaita tusag tudayinau ,

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: nunikag Juagkan jegaantag : — Jintinkagtinuh , amijai Jordagkan amain pujubium nunú , ame mina ukujui minittawai tusam etsegmayum nu yamai yamijattai , kuashat aents aidau nemajuinawai , — tuidau .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Tama Juan chichaak : — Apajuí dutikata tichamuk aunak aikmaitsui .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Atumek shiig dekagtagme , wi atumesh ashí antuinagmin paan iwainakan , wika Kristuchuitjai , wika niina pachis etsegtukti tusa emtika awemamuitjai , tusan timayag duka .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Makichik aents niina nuwe atinjijai wajas chichaagtai , niina kumpají antujak shiig aneas wajama nunisnuk , wishakam shiig senchi shiig aneajai , nuna pachisag chichainamun antaknuk , aents aidau shiig antujuinak niinak nemajuidau asagmatai .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Niinak kashí kashinig aents tuwajuinak eme anentiagtatui , dutikainak minak junik diijiagtatui .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: “ Yakiya tau asa nigka ashí nagkaekagtasui . Untsu wi nugkaya asan , chichaaknush nugkaya aidaunak pachisan chichaajai .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya tauwa nu ashí ni wainkamujin dekas antukbaujijai pachis etsejui , nunitaish aents aidauk dekaskeapi tuinatsui .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Untsu ni etsegbaun aents antujuk dekaskeapita tuidauk , Apajuinu dekaskea nunaap tawa tusag shiig antujuinawai .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Apajuí awemamua duka Apajuinak pachis chichaawai , chichamenash shiig etsegtawai , Wakaní Pegkeji ashí susamu asa .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Apajuik niina Uchijin aneau asa , ni senchijinak susauwai ashí tikich aidaunash nigki diistí tusa .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Apajuí Uchijiin dekaskeapi tuidauk , pujut nagkanchaunum tuke pujusagtinai ; untsu Apajuí Uchijin dekaskeapi tuinachuk , Apajuí suwimke shiig ishamain atina nui pujus waittsagtinai ” , tiuwai .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Fariseo aidau : Jisus aents aidau jintinbau , nuigtú yamiamu aidau imá kawemai Juagdaun nagkaesau , tuinamun antukajui .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Jisusak yamijatjachui niina jintintaiji aidau yamijatjaju ainawai . )

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Nuniau asamtai fariseo aidau nuna dekaje tabaun antugmamak , Jisusak Judeanak ukuak ataktú wakitki Galileanum weuwai .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Nunik Samaria nugkanum nagkaemak ,

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: yaakat Sicar tutainum jegawajui , yaunchuk Jacob ni uchijin Josen nugkan susauwa nui .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Nunik Jisus miná minakua senchi pimpikiu asa , Jacopan yumigmatji aajakua nui , etsa tajiastatak wegai , nu yumigmatnum ayaumas ekeemsauwai .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Nuniai Samarianmaya nuwa yumin shikiak tantamtai : — Minash yumi ajamjusta uwagtajai , — tusa Jisus segauwai ,

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: jintintaiji aidauk yaakat yutain sumaktasag wegaju ai .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Nu tusá segam nuwa Jisusan ayaak : — ¿ Wagka minash ame judiuwaitkumesh , yumi ajamjusta tusamesh segatme , wi Samarianmaya aish ? Judío aidauk Samarianmaya aidaujaig makichkish augdaichau ainawai , — tau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Ame dekas wi Apajuí anentag awemamun , amina yumin segajam nunú dekajuamek , dekas tajame minashkam segatmainaitme , tujutkuminig wi dekas yumi pujut tuke atinun sukagtina nuna amamainaitjai , — tiu .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Tutai nuwa chichaak : — Apuh , ame yumi shikitai takaktsum aniaumesh , yumishkam initak awa aniaish , ¿ wajiyai shikikam sujustasamea tame ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: ¿ Ame ii muunji Jacob aajakua nunú nagkaesaukaitam ? Ii muunji Jacob aajakua nu juna yumigmatnak ukugtamkiuwai . Niishkam ju yumigmata junak ashí ni uchijijai umujakuí , tagkujinashkam junak suujakuí , — tau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Tusá tama Jisus chichaak : — Ju yumia juna umauk , ataktushkam tuke kitajagtinai ,

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: untsu wi yumi midauwa nu susam uwaju aidauk atakea duwish kitaagchatin ainawai , ayatak ni anentain tuke yumi pukuni jiinama imaní ajamu asa . Nu aentsnumag yumi pujutan sukagtina duka tuke atinai , — tiuwai .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Tama nuwa : — Apuh , nunú yumi minash sujustá , kitamakun yumin shikiakun waketjag imaní pujuig , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Weme aishum untsukam jukim juwi niijai tantata , — tau .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Tama nuwa ayaak : — Wika aishinchauwaitjai , — tiuwai . Tutai : — Dekas tame , wika aishinchauwaitjai tame duka ;

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: cinco aishum ajutjamajakuí , tuja yamai ajutjama dushakam amina aishumchauwai . Duwi dekas aishinchauwaitjai tame duka tame , — tau .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Nunú tama nuwa chichaak : — Apuh , ame dekas Apajuí etsegtin diyajame .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ii muunji aajakajua nu Apajuin emematuinak shimujakmauk au muja auwai , tujash atum judío aidautigmek , Apajuí emematku ijunmainuk imá Jerusalegkak awai tinu ainagme .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Nuwauchih , dekaskeapi tujutta , tsawan jegamtaig imá ju muja juwig , imá Jerusalegnumag Apajuk emematchatin ainagme .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Atumek ya emematjume dusha dekatsjume , tujamtai iik shiig dekau asa , Apajuí emematji , uwemtikagtinuk judiunmaya atin asamtai .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Yamaik tsawantak uminui , yamaya juwik mina Apajun emematuidauk , dekaskenum Wakaní Pegkeji tabauwa dutiksag emematiagtata nunú . Mina Apajuk aatus emematjitnume tusa wakegawai .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Apajuik Wakani . Nunin asamtai niina emematin aidaushkam dekaskenum Wakaní Pegkeji wakega dutiksag emematmain ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Tutai nuwa ayaak : — Mesías Kristu daagtin taatna nunak dekajai , ni taak ashí ujapaktinai .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Nunak wi amina augjam juuwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Tusa nuwan aujak pujaun jintintaiji kaunkamá wainkag anentai jegagchajui . Nunikajash ¿ wají pachismea nuwash augme ? ¿ Wagka augme ? tutanakesh tichajui .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Nunik kauntamtai , nuwak yumi shikitaijinak ukuak yaaktanum weuwai . Nunik jegaa aents aidaun ujaak :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: — Atumesh minijum diistajum , awi aents pujuma nu , waitchauwaitak wi nunikbaugnak ashí ujatkame . ¿ Yakita , Mesiaschawashit ? — tiuwai .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Tutai aents aidaushkam , Jisus pujamunum jegajiagtatus ashintukajui .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Nuwa yaaktanum wematai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidau : — Jintinkagtinuh , amesh yuwata , — tuidau .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Mina yutaijuk atum wainchamu ajutui , — tau .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Tutai ditak pempeentunisajag : — Tikichiash yutainash ajamsagma , — tudayinau .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichajak : — Mina awetiu wakejamu umiamua nu , nuigtú ni takatji ashimjamua nuuwai mina yutaijuk .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Atum chichaakjum : Ajak juutak eke ipaksumat nantu awai , tinu ainagme . Tujash wi tajime : Pagkai diistajum , ajak ajakbauk uminag saigká , juumain wajas awai .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Ju ajak juwaamun mina yaintuidaunak , wi ajakan ajakú asan , akiktatjai pujut nagkanchau tuke ajitnun , dutikam niishkam nunú juwaamun yainkau asa , shiig dakujus pujustinai wijai betek .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Duwik chicham tibau awai : Makichik aents ajaawai , dutikamun tikich juwaawai , tibauwa duka waitchauwai .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Wika atumnak , atum takasá ajakmachbaugmin juuktajum tusan ishiakbaijime , dutikamu asajum tikich ajakmamuk juukbaijume , — tiuwai .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Nuna tutai niina jintintaiji aidaushkam yumigmatnum ayaumas pujusag chichaak pujuinai , nuwa yaakat jegaa : “ Wi nunikbaugnak ashí ujatkame ” , tusa etsegbaun antukag , kuashat Samarianmaya aents nunú yaaktanum batsataidauk , dekas Kristuapita tiaju ainawai .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Nunikag Jisusan kautuawag : Juwi kanajam wetá , tusag segajui . Tuinam nui jimajá kanajui .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Nui pujus chichatai niina chichamen antuinak , nuní kuashat dekaskeapi tiaju ainawai .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Nunikag nuwan chichajuinak : — Yamaik imá ame ujajatkamum duwikik dekaskeapi tatsuji , dekas jutiishkam ni chichaamuk shiig antugkaji , nunikaju asaja : Dekas juwapita ashí aents aidau ditá tudaujin suwimak jumainun ayamjuktina duka , tuinaji — tiajui .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Samarianum jimajá kanag Jisus jiinki Galilea weuwai .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Jisus junash pachis : “ Apajuí etsegtinuk niina nugkenigkik eme anentamak achauwai ” , tiuwai .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Galilea jegaamtai , nuwiya aents aidau shiig anentus jukiajui , Jerusalén pujus takaamun ditashkam jista Pascua tutain jistamainak jegawag ashí wainkaju asag .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Ataktú Jisus Galilea nugkanum yaakat Caná tutainum jegauwai , duwik ni yumi vino emamunum . Nuwi tikich yaakat Capernaum tutainum makichik suntajá apuji uchijí jaak tepau .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Nunú suntajá apuji Jisus Judeanmaya jiinki Galilea tae tabaun antuk , tajua igkug chichajak : — Mina jegajuí tajutuam mina uchig ashí nagkanki tepegtima nu etsaentujata , — tusa segauwai .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Tama Jisus chichaak : — Aents dutikmainchau iwainamu waintsukek kakajus dekaskeapi tumaitsume , — tiuwai .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Tutai suntajan apuji ayaak : — Apuh , wait aneasam , mina uchig tikima mayai nagkantsaig jegaam etsaentujakia , — tau .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Tama Jisus chichajak : — Wetá , amina uchigmik tsagaje , — tiuwai . Tutai suntajá apuji Jisus tabaun dekas nuniktatuapi tusa wakitkiuwai .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Nunik waketkamá jintá ni inake minittaman igkugkui . Dutika igkugkam apujin chichajak : — ¡ Amina uchigmik tsagagmae ! — tusa ujakuí .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Tama : — ¿ Etsash wajukeaiya tsagagmae ? Tutai inakshakam : — Yau etsa tegawai bichatjame tsuweamunak , — tau .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Tama uchí apajishkam anentaimjau : — Jisus etsa nuní aimpap : “ Uchigmek tsagagtatui ” , tujutmae tusa . Nunik suntajá apuji ni ashí patayijaí : Jisusak dekas Apajuí awemamui , tiajui .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Jisus jimaja juna wainchatain iwainakua nunak Judeanmaya jiinki Galilea jegaa dutikauwai .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Duwi pujus Jisus Jerusalén weuwai , judío aidau jistamiagtai pachinkatatus .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Yaakat Jerusalén pegmagbaunum dekatkau wayamunum , waiti Uwijá Waitai tutainum , ayaumas tikijuch yumi ipiakbau hebreo chichamaik Betesda tutai aajakuí . Nuanuí uwet cinco aak pekaamu au .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Nunú aaknum kuashat aents aidau wainmachu , shutú , iyashí jaka ekeemjukbau aidaujai nugká tepetpet waigkag batsataidau .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Nuanuí makichik aents treinta y ocho mijadai jaa pujú tepau .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Nunik tepettaman wainak , kuashat mijadai nunisag tepenun dekau asa , Jisus jegantun : — ¿ Tsagagtasamesh wakegatsmek ? — tusa iniasui .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Tama jau ayaak : — Apuh , yumi tagkittai yuminum ajunmain atsau asamtai , tikich imá iyainawai , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Nantakim ainká tepetaijum jukim wetá , — tiuwai .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Tusá tamawaik nunú aentschakam tsagajui . Nunik ainká tepetaijinak juki weuwai , duka tsawan ayamtai aig nunikui . Nunik wetatman tsawanchakam ayamtai tsawaju asamtai ,

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: judío aidau , aents tsagajun chichajak : — Ju tsawanta juka ayamtaiyai , nuniau asamtai amek amina ainká tepetaigmek jukimek wemaitsume , — tuidau .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Tama ni ayaak : — Tujash mina etsaentuju chichagtak , amina ainká tepetaigmek jukim wetá tujutmajamah , — tau .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Tutai dita iniinak : — ¿ Yae amina ainká tepetaijum jukim wetá tujabiush ? — tuidau .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Tujash nigka : Jisusap etsaentugmae , tusagkesh dekachu , Jisusak weu asamtai , nuigtushkam kuashat aents asamtai dekaachui .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Dutikamu ajuma duwi Jisus , jega Apajuí ememattainum waikmá , ni aents etsagagbaujin wainkau , dutika chichajak : — Nijah , yamaik tsagajam pegkeg wajasume , ankauwaitkum awagkimek tudauk takasaipa , jamayum nuní nagkaemasam jata jujutmamkim , — tiuwai .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Nu tusa tima aents tsagajushkam judío aidaun wejí : “ Mina etsaentugma duka Jisusai ” , tusa ujakajui .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Tusá ujakajam judío aidaushkam : Jisus tsawan ayamtai aig etsaegkagtuje , tusag egaidau .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Imatikam Jisus chichaak : — Mina Apajuk yamai tsawanta juwish takaawai , nuaduí wishakam dutiksanuk takaajai , — tiuwai .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Nuna tutai judío aidauk kajegkag maata tuidau , tsawan ayamtai aig etsagaju asamtai , nuigtushkam : Wika Apajuijai betek takaajai , mina Apajuk Apajuiyai , tau asamtai dutikaidau .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Nu imatjuinam Jisus chichaak : “ Dekas tajime : Wika Apajuí Uchijí asan wi wakegamunak takamaitsujai , ashí mina Apag takaamun wainag nunak takamainaitjai , nunuwai mina Apag wakegamuk .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Nunak mina Apag anentu asa , jintinjawai nuní nagkaemasashkam shiig puyatjusa diyaam atí , tujutu asa .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Mina Apajuk aents jakaunash inanki ataktú pujutan egketug apugna ibau asamtai , wishakam wi wakejamugnak pujutan suwajai .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Apajuk aentsnak , ju uwemjati , tuja juka uwemjashti tusag etejashtinai . Nunak ashí mina idaitugsauwai , ame duka dutikata tusa .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Mina tujutiu asa mina antugtin aina dutijamsag , aminash antugtabiagti tusa ashí minaig idaisauwai . Tujutiu asamtai mina antugtuinachuk , Apag mina awetiuwa nunashkam antujuinatsui .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: “ Dekas tajime : Wi tajim juna antuk , shiig dekaskeapita tusa taku mina awetiuwa nunash dekas niimpap awemauwaita tauk , ni jaakush suwimak jukí waitmainjinak ukuak , dekas pujut tuke atina nuna jukiag pujusagtinai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Dekas junashkam tajime : Aents yamai tsawanta juwi pujuidaush pujutjinig jakaujai betek ainawai , nuniai minak umigtak pujuidauk , wi Apajuin Uchijin minakun untsubaun shiig paan antugtukagtin ainawai , nu ainawai tuke pujusagtin aidauk .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Apajuk shiig senchigtinai , iman asa nigki pujutan sukagtinuk . Ni iman asa , wi niina Uchijí asamtai , minashkam nigki pujutan sukagtiti tusa sujusmayi .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Dutijusag wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmagan Akiinau asamtai , amek aents aidaushkam diistá ju uwemjati , tuja juka uwemjashti tusam etegjata , tujutiuwai .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Juna wi tajim juka anentai jegagchamin anentaimtigpajum . Tsawan jegatnai ukusbau aidau wi untsubaun antukag ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: aents pegkejan takasú aidauk , pujut tuke atina nuna jukiagtatus nantajagtina nunú . Untsu pegkegchaun takasú aidauk suwimkan jukiagtatus nantajagtinai .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: “ Wika wi wakegamunak takamaitsujai , mina Apag dutikata tujutbauwa dutiksanuk dutikajai , nunin asa wi dutikamua duka pegkejai , nuaduí wika wi wakejamunak takatsuk , mina Apag awetiu wakejamunak takaajai .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Wi wiki pachimasan nuninaitjai tusan etsegtumakuig , wainak tawai tujutmainaitjume .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Tujash awai tikich mina pachitus shiig etsegtuju , nunú mina pachitus etsegtuja duka dekas tawai .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Atum mina pachittsajum dekatasajum , aents aidau Juan pujamunum awemauwaitjume , dutikam ni atum awemamun ujakua duka dekaske , wainkag tichauwai .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Wika aents mina pachitus etsegtugkatnume tusanuk wakegatsjai , junak atum uwemjamnujum tau asan tajai .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juagkak lámpara ekemakam kegak tsaaptin emama numamtinuk aajakuí . Nuniau asamtai wajumak tsawanchik atumshakam dekas niina chichame wakejusjum antugkujum shiig aneejakuitjume .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Juan etsegtugkauwa nunú mina iwaintawai , tujash nuní nagkaemas wi takasbauwa nu minak iwaintawai . Wi takaag nunak mina Apag dutikata tujutmawa nunak takaajai , nunú dekamtijamainawai dekas mina Apag awetiuwa nunak .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Nuigtushkam mina Apag juwi awetiuwa dushakam , mina pachitus shiig etsegtujui . Atumek ni chichaamujig antugchauwaitjume , waintashkam wainchau ainagme .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Atumek niina chichamega duka umigtsugme , dekas Apajuí awemamuapi tujutchau asajum .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Atumek Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nunú shiig kuitamsajum augjume , nuwiya pujut tuke atina dushakam jukitasajum , tujash nunú agagbauwa nuwig mina pachitus chichaawai .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Nuniaig atumek minaiya dekas pujut jutak dakitajume .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Tujash wika aents aidau mina eme anenjus chichagtitnume tusanuk wakegatsjai .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Wika atumnak shiig dekajime , Apajuí aneatsjum nunashkam .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Wika mina Apag awetimtai juwig taajai , nuniaig atumek minak dakitjagme . Tuja tikich , awemachmaitak nigki nagkami minakuig , imá shiig anentsajum jumainaitjume .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Atumek , imá atumek pempeentunisjum eme anendayakjum , Apajuí emematmaina duka pachiatsjum aniautigmesh ¿ itugsagmek mina chichamjush dekaskeapi tujuttagme ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Atumek ni Apajin ujatjamak bakugmattawai tusagmek minak anentaimjutigpa . Wika bakumaitsujime . Atumin bakugmatnuk Moisés chicham umiktajum tibauwa nunú umiktasa batsatjum nu bakugmattagme .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Tujash atum Moisés agagbauwa nu dekaskeapita takugmek , minash dekaskeapi tujutmain ainagme , nunak mina pachitus agajui .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Moisés agagbau dekaskeapi tichautigmesh , ¿ itugsagmek mina chichamjush dekaskeapi titagme ? ” , tiuwai .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Nuna ti ukuak Galilea kuchají Tiberias tuuta awagmatia nuna amain Jisus katigkuí .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Nuniamunum kuashat aents saetukajui , nigka aents dutikmainchaun takaak , jau aidaun etsagamun wainkaju asag .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Aents imaniagtai Jisusak mujanum waka , ni jintintaiji aidaujai ekeemsauwai ,

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Judío aidau jistamtaiji Pascua tutai tikiju wajasú ai .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Nunik nuwi ekeemas Jisus niimkamá shiig kuashat aents minidaun wainak , Felipen iniak : — ¿ Yutaish tuwiya sumaktatji aents imanik miniina au ayugmainush ? — tiuwai .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Jisusak ni dutikatnujinak shiig dekayatak , Felipen wajintuk aigkat tusa dekapeak tiuwai .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Nu tama Felipe ayaak : — Doscientos kuichki pag sumaka , makí makichik aents imá imachik tinamash tuké jegamaitsui , — tiuwai .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Tutai tikich Jisusa jintintaiji Simón , Pedro tuuta awagmatia nuna yachi Andrés chichaak :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: — Juwi makichik uchi cinco pag cebadajai najanamun , nuigtú jimagchik namakan takakui . Tujash junakeuchik imaan aents aina duka betek yumain ainatsui , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Tusa tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Aents aidauk shiig pekaajum batsagtajum , — tiuwai . Tiajam ditashkam dutiksag nui chijichi kuashat ayau asamtai , nuwig betek pekaa batsasajui cinco mil aishmag tumainun .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Dutika umikagmatai Jisus pagkan juki Apajuin see tusa , ni jintintaiji aidaun tinabiuwai , dutikawajam dita aents aidaunak ashí imatiksag tinabiajui . Dutiksag namaknashkam aents wakegainamujinak imatiksag tinamkajui .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Aents shiig yuwawag ejemakagmatai , Jisus jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Pag ampinka duka yajuaktajum , wainak utsankai , — tiuwai .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Tiajam ditashkam , cinco pag cebada najanamu puujá tinamkamua nuna yuwinak , ampigbau aidaunak yajuakag doce chagkinnum aimjajui .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Dutikawagmatai aents aidaushkam , Jisus aents dutikmainchaun dutikau asamtai chichainak : — Juka dekas Apajuí etsegtin ju nugka juwi taatnai timawa nuuwai , — tuidau .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Nuna tuidau asag aents aidauk : Jisus dakitaigkishkam ijuuntuja jukí , iina apuji emá apusami , tuinamun Jisus dekaa , jiinki ataktú muja yakí jiitkaunum nigki wakauwai .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Nunikmatai , Jisusa jintintaiji aidauk kiyau asamtai , kuchanum utsaanawajui .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Nunikag botenum chimpimjag kuchanum Capernaum katigkagtatus shimuidau . Kiyag suwe wajasú aigkishkam Jisusak tatsuk megkaekau asamtai ,

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: ditak ashinainai , dase senchi dasentak , kuchanak senchi tsukatmitkau .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Imatikamaitak seis kilómetros amainun kuwagainai , Jisus yumí awanken wekagas boten adijkattak minittaman wainkajui . Nunik wainkag sapigmaidau .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Imaniagtai Jisus chichaak : — ¡ Witjai ishamjukaigpajum ! — tiuwai .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Nuna timatai shiig anentus botenum egkejag jukiag , machik wesag wamkes dita jegatasa wegamunmag anuumkajui .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kashinia duwi aents kuchá amain batsataidauk , Jisusa jintintaiji aidauk imá makichik bote tepaun jukiag weenak , Jisusnak jutsuk ditak ashinkamun adeajaju .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Nuniamunum yaakat Tiberiasnumia bote aidau , Jisus Apajuin see tusa pagkan puujá , aents aidaun ayugkauwa nui , tikiju anumkajui .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus ni jintintaiji aidaujai nui atsuagtai , nunú bote anumkauwa nuwig chimpimjag Capernaum wegajui , Jisusan egakagtatus .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Nunik kuchá amain katigkag nui Jisusan wainkag : — Jintinkagtinuh , ¿ wajutiya amesh juwish katigmaume ? — tusag iniidau .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Atum mina egatuinajum duka , wi aents dutikmainchaun iwainakan dutikamag dui , iina dekamtijamatasampap aikagmae tusa dekachiatkujum , wi pag tinamim shiig ejemakaju asajum egatjume .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Yutái dukap atsuk ashimdauwa duka anentaimtigpajum . Dekas anentaimtustajum yutai abuechau tuke pujutan sukagtina nu jukitasajum . Nunak wi Aentsmagan Akiinaun , Apajuí mina Apajua nu : Ame duka dutikata , tusa inatjau asamtai amastatjime .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Timatai aents aidau iniinak : — ¿ Wají dutikmainaita Apajuí wakejamu umigkatasaish ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Apajuik atumnak , wi awemag juna dekas Apajuiyap awemae tusag niinak anentaimtiagtinme tujamjume . Nuuwai ni wakejamuk .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Tutai : — ¿ Tujash amesh wají wainchataish iwainagmea takaame , jutiish nu wainkaja dekas Apajuí awemamu asampap aikawa tumainush ? — tusag iniinak ,

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: — jutii muunji duwik batsamajakajua dushakam yutai maná tutain yuujakú ainawai , Apajuí chichame agagbaunmashkam nuna pachisag , nunak ‘ Apajuí nayaimpinmaya pagkan akaketujakuí ’ , tawai — tuidau .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Moiseschauwai nayaimpinmaya pagkan aentsun akaketkauk . Mina Apajui yutai dekas nayaimpinmayan sukagtauk , ni dutikauwai .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya akaiki ju nugka juwi taa puja nuuwai , ashí aents nugkaya aidaun pujutan susatnuk . Nuuwai pag Apajuí sukagtamuk .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Tutai : — Apuh , nunú pag dekas tuke pujutan sukagtin tame duke sukagtita , — tuidau .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Witjai yutaiya numamtin pujut tuke atinun sukagtinnuk . Aents minai minidauk tuke yapajuashtin ainawai . Nunisag aents mina dekas Apajuiyap awemauwaita tujutushkam tuke kitaagchagtinai .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Tujash duwik timajim dutiksanuk yamaishkam tajime , atumek minak waitiatkujum : Dekas Apajuí awemamap tae , tusagmesh dekaskeapi tujuttsugme .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Ashí mina Apag ikautjamu minaig kaunainawai ; aents minai kaunaidaunak jiiknuk ajapmaitsujai .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Wi nayaimpinmayan ju nugka juwi taag nunak , wi wakegamugnak takastasanuk junikchamjai . Wika mina Apag awetiuwa nunú wakejamun takastasan tauwaitjai .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Mina Apag awetiuwa duka ashí aentsun wi niina suwag nunak , imatiksag shiig kuitamas , makichkish emegkautsuk , jakagmataish tsawan dekas nagkanbaunum nigki inanjatin atí tusa wakejutawai .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Mina Apajuk , wi ni Uchijitag juna waitkag , dekas kajinas anentaimaidauk tuke pujustin atinme tusa wakegawai . Nunú aents aidaunak jakagmataishkam , tsawan nagkanbaunum wiki inanjagtinaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Jisus : “ Witjai yutaiya numamtin pujut tuke atinun sukagtinun nayaimpinmayan taunuk ” , tibaun pachis judío aidau pampantuinak :

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: — ¿ Ju Jisus José uchijiyae duchaukaih ? Juna apají niina dukujijai jutii shiig wainnuweg jamah , ¿ wagka nayaimpinmayan akaikin nugkaa taajai tusash tawa ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Wi timajim duka pampantsuk idaisatajum .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Makichik aentstigmekesh mina Apag wakemitkagmashkuig , atumek wakekagmek minaig kaunmaitsugme . Aents minak jikatjus kautjuidaunak , nugka nagkanbaunmash inankin uwemtijatnaitjai .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Apajuí etsegtujakú aina nu agagbaunum : ‘ Apajuí taa ashí jintinkagtitnai ’ , tabau awai . Nuaduí ashí mina Apajun antujuidauk niiniyan unuimajag , minai kaunainawai .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: “ Mina Apajun wainkaju asagkesh nuninatsui . Imá wikitjai niina shiig wainnunuk , niijai pujaun juwi miniu asan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Dekas tajime : Mina , dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapi tusa dekaskeapi tujutuk , pujut tuke atina nuna jukiagtinai .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Witjai yutaiya numamtin dekas pujut tuke atinun sukagtinnuk .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Yaunchuk atumin muunjum aidau uwegshunum batsamsag , maná nayaimpinmaya kakegun juuká yujakajush batsatainatsui , jinawaju ainawai .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Tujash junak yutai manaya nuna pachisnuk tatsujai . Wika nayaimpinmayan akaikin aentsnum tau asan , mina nemagtuidauk pujutan jukiagtinme atakesh jakachmig tuinakjag tusan tajai .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Witjai yutaiya numamtin pujut tuke atinun sukagtin nayaimpinmaya akaikiunuk . Jujú pagka juna yuwauk tuke pujutnui . Wi yutai sukagtittag duka mina iyashjuke . Nunak ashí aents juwiya aidaush pujut tuke atina nuna jukitnume tau asan dutikattajai . ”

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Nunú tabaun judío aidau antukag ditak chichainak : — ¿ Utugkaya nunash niina iyashinianakesh yutai jukish yuwatajum tusash sukagtumainaita ? — tusag pampantuidau .
