text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ditan chichajak : — Dekas tajime : Atum Aentsmaga Akiinauwa nuna iyashinia yuwachkugmek , umutash niina numpe umachkugmek , tuke pujuta duka jukishtinaitjume .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Aents mina iyashjun yuwak , umutnash mina numpajun umauk , pujut tuke atina nuna jukiagtinai ; nuniku aidaunak tsawan nagkanbaunmashkam wi inankiagtinaitjai .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Wagki mina iyashjua nuuwai dekaskenum yutai shiig ichichmamtan sukagtina duka , antsagke mina numpajua dushakam .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Mina iyashjun yuwak , umutnash mina numpajun umauk , dekas wijai ijutkau ainawai . Nunidaujaig wishakam ditajai pujajai .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Apag mina awetiuwa nuwi dekas pujutak awai , nuniau asamtai wika niijai pujajai , wi wajukeag nunisag aents minaiyan yuwidaushkam wijai pujusagtinai .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Wika junak pag nayaimpinmaya nugkaa akaikiuwa nuna pachisan chichaajai . Jujú yutaig atumin muunjum duwik maná tutain yuujakú aina nuninchauwai . Tujash nuna yuwawaju aidauk ashí jinawaju ainawai , untsu ju yutain yuwidauk tuke pujusagtinai .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Jisus juna pachis jintinkagtuauwa nunak , yaakat Capernaum jega judío ijuntaijin wayaa jintinkagtuauwai .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Nunú tu jintinkagtamun kuashat niina ijuntú yujaidau antukag : — Juna tawa duka shiig dakitmainai ¿ yaki nunash antugkati ? — tusag ashishmatuidau .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Nuna tiagtatman Jisus dekajua : — ¿ Wi tajim duka atumnak shiig awajtamkachajek ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Atumesh wi Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag juna nayaimpinum mina duwik pujutaijua nui , ataktú waketbau waitkugmesh , ¿ wajuk anentaimtugmainaitjume ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Dekas Wakaní Pegkejiya nuuwai pujut tuke atinun sukagta duka , tuja wi timajim nunak minaig kajintsá anentaimsatajum tusan timajime , nunak wika dekas mina iyashig yuwatajum tusan tichamjime . Wi atumin timajim nunuwai Apajuinumiag , nuigtú pujutnash sukagtina duka .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Nuniaigkishkam atum ainajum anuiyatijum , dekaskeap nunak tawa tichamin anentaimaidautigmeshkam ainagme . Nunak Jisusak , duwik yama nagkamchak niina jintintaijin etegjauwa duwik ya dekaskeapi tuinatsua , nuigtush ya sujama atinaita nunashkam dekaajakuí , nunin asa tiuwai .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Nuigtushkam ekesag tiuwai : — Atum mina dekaskeapi tujutuinachu asagmin , makichik aentstigmekesh mina Apag wakemitkagmachkuig , minaig tamaitsugme timajime .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Nuna timatai kuashat aents niina ijuntú yujajuidauk tuke tupantuinak ukukiajui .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus ni jintintaijin doce aina nuna : — ¿ Atumesh anka wetasajum wakegatsjumek ? — tau .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Tutai Simón Pedro ayaak : — Apuh , ¿ jutiish yaayaig wetaji , ame chichamjum pujut tuke atinun sukagta aniaish ?

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Jutiik ame tame duka dekaskeapi tuinaji . Nuniau asá shiig dekaji , amek Kristuitme Apajuí pegkegma nuna Uchijí , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Wichaukaitag atum doce ainajum nuna etegjaunuk ? Dutikamu ainajuminig anuig makichik iwanch pachitkawai , — tiuwai .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Jisus tiuwa nunak Judas Iscariote , Simogka uchijiya nu niijai wekaenaitak pempeentuki sujam atin asa tiuwai .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Juna tusa idayas Jisusak Galileanmag wekaesauwai , Judea nugkanmak wetsuk , nuwiya aidau maata tabau asa .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Tujash judío aidau ditá muunji uwegshunum aakmaja yujajakbau anentaimtusa jistamtaiji tsawan jegattak wajai ,

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: niina yachi chichajuinak : — Amek juwig juwatsuk , Judea nugkanum jintintaijum batsata nui wetá , ditash ame takaamugmin wainkatnume .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Aents ni takaamun iwainagtatus wakegauk uukag takachu ainawai . Ju ame takaam imag takaakmek , ashí tikich aents aidaush wainainamunum takastá , — tiajui .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Nunak niina yachi aidaukesh : Dekas Apajuí awemamuapi , tusag dekainachu asag tiajui .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Nunú tama Jisus chichaak : — Apag mina awetak , ashí tikich aidaush iwaintuja takastá tujutbauwa duka eke tsawan jegatsui , tujash atuminig ashí tsawantak agkan ajutjamainawai .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Atumnak ju nugkanmaya aents aidauk kajegtamain ainatsui , tujash minak kajegtuinawai , wika dita pegkegchaun takainamun wainu asan , pegkegchauwai tuinamu asag .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Atumek jistanmag wetajum , wika minishtatjai . Mina awetiu takastá tujutbauwa nunú eke tsawan jegachu asamtai , — tiuwai .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Nuna tusa idayak nigka Galileanum juwakui .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Nunik juwakuitak niina yachi shiyakagmatai , niishkam aents dekajuawainum tusa uumak , yaunchuk aak aakmaja yujajakbau pachisa jistabaunum weuwai .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Judío aidauk nu jistanum batsamsag , Jisusan wainkatasag egainak : — ¿ Dusha tuwig pujawa ? — tusag imatuidau .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Nunú imat yujainai , nu aents tuwakbaunmaya wajumak niina pachisag : “ Duka aentsuk dekas pegkejai ” , tuinai , tikich chichaidau : “ Auk pegkegchauwe , aentsun wainak tsanú wekaenuwe ” , tuidau .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Tusa tuinakush iwainak paanmasag chichainachu , apu aidaun ishamaidau asag .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Jistamainamu tsawan ejapeantu ai , Jisuschakam jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa jintinkagtuauwai .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Nunik nui jintinkagtutai , judío apuji aidauk puyatjusag diinak : — Imaanik papiin ausachua annaitkush , ¿ utusaya imatikash dekawa ? — tiajui .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Nunú aaja tuinam Jisus chichaak : — Wika midaunak jintinkagtatsjai , wika mina awetiuwa nudaun jintinkagtajai .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Aents dekas Apajuí wakegamun takastatus wakega nunú minak : Dekas Apajuin chichamen jintinjamji , nigka niinunak jintinjamtsuji , tusa dekamain ainawai .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Aents niina imanjin pachis chichauk , aents antugtuidau eme anenjitnume tusa tinu ainawai , untsu aents mina awetiuwa nuna eme anentinme tusa chichauk , waitjusagkesh chichatsuk , nigka dekaskea nunak chichau ainawai .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: “ ¿ Dekas Moisés atum chicham umiktinun amaschaukaitjum ? Tujash nunú susamuitkujum makichkitigmekesh umiatsjume . Nuniayatkugmesh ¿ wagka minash mantuatasagmesh wakejutagme ? ” , tau .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Tusa tutai aents nui pekajaidau aikag : — Aminak dekas iwanchia nu pujugtame , ¿ ya aminash mantamata tawa ? — tiajui .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Wi tsawan ayamtai aig , aentsun etsagagmag nuaduí anentai jegatsjume .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Moisés , uchi aishmagkuch akiinkuig tuke pakaji ajapjitajum tujabiajui , ( nunak Moisesak ni nagkamachu aig , atumi muunjum nagkabau asamtai ) atumshakam tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aigkish tuke dutikin ainagme .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Duka dekaske , atumek Moisés timawa nuna uwaekaig tusajum , tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aigkishkam uchi aishmag akiinamtaig pakaji ajapjin ainagme . Nunin ainayatkugmesh ¿ wagka wi tsawan ayamtai tsawaju aig , aents jaun etsagagmag duwish kajeagme ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Atumek aents dutikamujiya nu shiig dekagtsukek pegkegchauwai tiigpajum , shiig dekaajum duwi nuninai takugmesh titajum , — tiuwai .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Nuna tutai wajumak aents Jerusalén batsamin aidau antukag : — ¿ Auchukaih maatasag egaa yujajiagma nu ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Diisjua aents tuwakbaunum wajan chichataish pachitsuk idayinana . ¿ Dekas Apajuí awemamui tuidau asajampash apu aidaush ayatak diina ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Jutiik ju aents tuwiyampaita duka shiig dekaji , tujash Kristu minamujinak makichkish dekajuachagtinai , — tiaju .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Tuinamun Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum jintinkagtak pujau antuk , senchi jiiká chichaak : — Dekas atumek dekagjume , wi tuwiyanua minaja duka . Tujash wika . wi wakegamun takastasanuk minichuitjai , wika atumin wainchataigmia nunú awetimtai tauwaitjai .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Wika niijai pujaun juwi tau asan niinak shiig dekajai , nigki minak awetiuwai , — tiuwai .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Nuna tutai achiká jukiagta tuidau , tujash makichik aentskesh jegaantag achikchajui , ni achinkatnujig eke jegaachu asamtai .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Kuashat aents dekas Apajuí awemamap tae tuidau asag : — ¿ Kristu taatnai tibauwa nu taash , ju aents jutii wainchataijin iwainag takaa juní nagkaemasampash takastinait ? — tuidau .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Aents aidau Jisus pachisa chichainamun fariseo antukag , sacerdote apuji aidaujai ijunag chichasag , achijatin jega Apajuí ememattai kuitamin aidaun : — Jisus achiktajum , — tiajui .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Tiaju ai Jisus chichaak : — Wika atumjaig wajumchik tsawanchik pujusan , nuaduí mina awetiu pujamunum wetatjai .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Atumek minak egatkagtinaitjume , tujash waitkashtin ainagme , wi pujamunmag minimainchau asajum , — tiuwai .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Timatai apu aidau ditá ditak iniininak : — ¿ Aush tuwig ii wainmainchaunmash wetí ? ¿ Judío aidau kanajag shiyak , griego aents batsatainamunum pujuina nuna jintintak wetin asampash tawa ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ¿ Nunash wajuk tujamkua , ‘ atumek minak egatkugmesh waitkashtin ainagme , wi pujamunmak minimainchau asajum ’ , tujama nunash tujamji ? — tiajui .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Jista ashimnamua nunú tsawan dekas imá puyatjusa anentaimtutai asamtai , nunú tsawantin Jisus wajantá senchi jiiká chichaak : — Aents kitabauk , minai tanta uwagti .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Ni mina dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita tusa anentaimtujuidaunak , agagbau chichaa nunisag , niina anentainig yumi pujutan sukagtina nunú pukuni jiintitnai , — tiuwai .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Jisus nuna tiuwa nunak , niina dekaskeapi tusa nemajuidauk Wakaní Pegkejin jukiagtinun pachis taku tiuwai . Nu tsawantaik Wakaní Pegkejig eke taachu , Jisus eke mantamna anean nayaimpinum waachu asamtai .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Nunú tabaun aents antukaju chichainak : — Juka dekas Apajuí etsegtin taatnai timawa nu taajamah , — tuidau .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Tikich chichaidau : — Juka Kristui , — tiajui . Nuna tuinai tikich chichaidaushkam : — Atsa duchauwai ¿ Kristu Galileanmaya amainkait ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui chichaak : ‘ Kristuk David wegantunum akiinu asa , Davitash Belegnum akiinauwa nunisag niishkam Belegnumak akiinatnai ’ , tawa aniaish — tuidau .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Nuna tusag aents aidauk Jisusan pampankiag ditak kanajajui .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Nuninai tikich aents Jisusan achiká jukiagtatus wakejuidaushkam achikchajui .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Nunikag achijatin jega Apajuí emematku ijuntain kuitamin aidauk jegawajui , fariseo aidau , tikich sacerdoten apuji aidau batsatbaunum . Nunikagmatai : — ¿ Wagka Jisusash juwi itachugme ? — tusag iniasajui .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Tusá tuinam dita aiinak : — Makichik aentskesh nu aents chichama imatika chichauk tuke wainkashbauwai , — tiajui .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Tiagtai fariseo chichainak : — ¿ Atumesh tsanuamak yujainajum ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Jutii apuji aidau , nuniachkush fariseo apuji aidaukesh niiní dekaskeapi tuinawash dusha wagka anentaimsajum diyatsjume ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Au aents chicham umiktinun dekatsu auk tikí pegkegchauwai , — tuidau .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Tiagtai nui Nicodemo niishkam fariseowaitak Jisusan ausatatus kashi jegajiuwa nunú chichaak :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: — Jutii chicham umiktinji chichaak : ‘ Aents chichaamuji antugtsukek suwimak susami tumaitsui , dekatkauk chichamujiyá antugka , nuaduí shiig ni dutikamujish dekajua dutikmainai ’ tujamji , — tiuwai .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — ¿ Amesh Galileanmayagkaitam ? Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa nu shiig kuitamsam ausam diisia , Galileanmaya aentsush Apajuí etsegtinush asauwashit nunú , — tiajui .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Tusa ukuinak makí makichik ditá jeen shiyakajui .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Tujash Jisusak Olivosan mujajin weu ,

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: nunik kashinia duwi kashikmas wakitki , jega Apajuí ememattainum jegauwai . Nunikmatai kuashat aents tuwagkam ekeemas jintinkagtutan nagkamauwai .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Nuniai chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidau , fariseo aidaujai , nuwa tikich aentsjai takamun wainkag jukiag itajiajui . Dutika itaa aents tuwakag ijunbaunum ejapea awaantag ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Jisusan iniinak : — Jintinkagtinuh , ju nuwa ekagmaku jukí itanji .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Moisés chicham umiktajum tujabiuwa duka , nuwa junin aidaunak ayatak kayai tukua tukuakuajum maatajum tawai , ¿ tujash amesh wajinpa ? — tuidau .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Nunak wajintig ni timatai duwi tsanumjugtasag tiajui . Tujash Jisusak tsuntsumá ekeemas uwejen nugkanum agau .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Nunitaishkam ayatak iniidau , imatjam Jisus pagkai chichaak : — Atum ainajum anuiyash yaita machikish tudaun takachush , nu iman dekatkauk kayai tukutí .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Tusa ataktú tsuntsumá nugkan agau .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Nuna timatai ditá tudaujinash dekagmamaidau asag , muunchinum nagkamna makí makichik jii jiinkawag ashí shimuinak , imá Jisusnak nuwajaig ukukiajui .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Nunikagmatai Jisus pagkai niimkamá aents atsuagtai nuwan iniak : — Nuwauchih , amina aents itagmawagma dusha wajukawagmae . ¿ Makichkikesh tukugmachajek ? — tau .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Tusa tama nuwa ayaak : — Apuh , makichkish tukugchaje , — tiuwai . Tusa tutai Jisus chichagkushkam : — Wishakam aminak suwimkan jukiti tusanuk tumaitsujame . Yamaik jeemin wetá , tujash awagkimek tudauk takasaipa , — tiuwai .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Aents aidau ataktú ijunjamtai , Jisus jintinkagtak : — Witjai ju nugka juwi tsaaptinjai betek tauwaitag nunak . Nunin asamtai aents mina nemagtuidauk tsaaptin pujutan sukagtin tuke ashimnachua nuna jukiagtatui , nuna jukiajuk suwenmak wekaesachagtinai .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Nuna tutai fariseo aidau chichajak : — Ame imanaitjai tusam etsegtumam duka tikima pegkegchauwai , — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Wi wiki pachimasan taja dushakam wainkachui . Wika dekagmamjai tuwiyanua juwi taamja nunak , nunisnuk tuwí wetatja nunashkam shiig dekajai , nuniaig atumek shiig dekagtatsjume .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Atumek ju nugkaya aents aidau aentsun etegkin aina nunisjumek aentsuk etegkeagme , tujash wika makichik aentsnakesh etegkeatsjai .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Tujash wi etegkeaknuk dekaskenum dutikmainaitjai , ju pegkegchauwai , ju pegkejai tusanchakam . Wikik nunak dutikmaitsujai , mina Apag awetiuwa nujai atuekan etegmain asan .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Atum chicham umiktin papiinum agagbauwa nuwig : Jimag atuegak mai nunak pachis etsegtuinakui nuaduí dekaskeapi takugmesh titajum , tibauwai .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Wishakam chicham dekaskea nuna etsegjai tumamjai , tuja mina Apagshakam aikasag : Chicham dekaskea nunak etsejui , — tujutui .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Nuna tutai : — ¿ Amina Apash tuwí pujawa ? — tusag iniidau . Tama Jisus ayaak : — Atumek minakesh dekagtsugme , nuniau asajum mina Apagshakam dekamaitsugme . Atum minash dekagkugmek mina Apagshakam dekamain ainagme , — tiuwai .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Nunak Jisusak jega Apajuí emematku ijuntainum jintinkagtak tiuwai , Apajuinu kuichik anentag suwaku chimpitai puja nui pujus . Ni achinkatnujig tsawantak eke jegachu asamtai , makichik aentskeshkam achikajag jukichu ainawai .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Jisus ataktú chichaak : — Wika wetatjai , nunikmatai atum mina egatkagtinaitjume , nuniakjumesh atumek wi tuwí wegaja nuwig minishtin ainagme , atumin tudaujum idaitsuk pujusjum jau asajum .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Tutai judío apuji aidau chichainak : — Atumek wi wegamunmag minimaitsugme tujama nunash , nigki maamatin asampash tujama , — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Nuna tusa tiagtai Jisus ditan : — Atumek juwiyag ainagme , wika yakiyayaitjai . Atumek ju nugka juwiya aentsuitjume , tujash wika ju nugka juwiyachuitjai .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Atumek mina : Dekas juwapita Apajuí Uchijig , tujuttsujum duwi jaakjumesh atumin tudaugminig jakatnaitjume timajime , — tiuwai .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Tutai iniinak : — ¿ Tujash dekas amesh yaitpa ? — tusa tuidau . Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wika nunak atumnak yaunchuk nagkamsan tuké ujajime .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Atumdaun pachisan nuninawai tusa etsegmainuk kuashat ajutui , mina awetiuwa dushakam dekaskea nunak chichauwai , wi ju nugkaya aidautigmin tajim nunashkam , wika ni chichaamun antukbaujun tajime .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Nuna aatus chichataish , ni Apajinap pachis tawa tusajag dekainachu .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Nuaduí Jisus ditan chichajak : — Atumek minak wi Aentsmagan Akiinauwaitag nu , yakí numinum achiijajum takugjum detusjum , nuaduí dekas juka Apajuin Uchijimpapita tusagmek , nuigtú wi wakegamun takaatsug dushakam dekajuatin ainagme . Wika mina Apag jintinjuamua nunak atumnashkam tajime .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Mina Apag awetiuwa duka wijaig tuke pujawai , imá minakek idaitatsui , wika ashí ni wakejamua nunak takau asamtai , — tiuwai .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Nuna Jisus tutai kuashat aents : Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tiajui .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Jisus judío aidau niiní dekaskeapi tiaju aidaun chichajak : — Wi atumin tajim jujú chicham betek umigtakjumek , dekas mina nemagtin amainaitjume .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Nuniakjum chicham dekaskea dushakam dekamainaitjume . Nu dekaskea nunú agkanmitkagmamainai , — tiuwai .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Tutai dekaskeapi tichau aidau aiinak : — Jutiik Abragka uchijí wegantu asaja , makichkiakesh tikich inaku waitkamak asachuitji . Nunin ainajinish , ¿ amesh wajukeakmea agkanmaemainaitjume tukagtame ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Aents pegkegchaun takaina duka , pegkegchau takata nuna waitkatai ainawai .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Inakak inamnun jeenig tuke pujuchu ainawai , nuna uchijinchu asag , untsu inamnun uchijiya nunú jegag tuke pujuwai , duka niina uchijí asa .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Nuniau asamtai atumin Apajuí Uchijí agkanmitkagmakuig , dekas shiig agkanbaekagtin ainagme .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Dekagjime atum Abraham wegantuitjum nunak , nuninaitkujum mina chichameg dekaskeapi tumainchau dekapeau asajum mantuatasajum wakejutagme .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Wika mina Apag iwaintugkamun wainkau asan chichaajai , atumshakam nunisjumek atumin apa tabauwa nu dutiksagmek takau ainagme , — tau .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Iina muunjig dekas Abragkai , — tuidau . Tiagtai Jisus chichajak : — Atum dekas Abragka uchijí ainakjumek , ni takasua dutiksagmek takamain ainagme .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Wi dekaskea nu jintinmaitkujum , minak ayatak mantuatasajum wakejutagme . Abragkak makichkish annunak anentaimajakchauwai .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Atumek , atumin apajai betek takaagme , — tiu . Tama dita aiinak : — Jutiik wainka kasanum akiamuk ainatsji , iina apajiya duka dekas Apajuiya nuuwai , — tuidau .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaakshakam : — Atumin apa dekas Apajuiyaitkuig minashkam anenmain ainagme . Wika wiki nagkamnuk juwig taan pujatsjai , mina Apag awetakui wika taan juwi pujajai .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Wagka wi chichaamush dekamain dekapeatsjume ? Duka mina chichameg antut dakituidau asajum nuniagme .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Atumin apa duka iwanchia nuuwai . Atumek niinu asajum , ni takaamua dutiksagmek takastasajum wakegajume . Yama nagkamchakug iwanchia nu nagkamauwai magkagtutan , dekaskea nunak dakitak waitjutan imá waitjin weuwai . Nigka waita nuna apají asa , waitjutan pujugnai , nu imá shiig awagmamu asa .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Atumek nunin asajum , wi dekaskea nuna etsegkuishkam dekaskeapi tujuttsugme .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Atum aidautigminiash ¿ ya wi tudau takasbaugnash dekagtuinawa ? ¿ Wagka wi dekaskea nuna etsegkuish , dekaskeapi tujuttsugme ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Apajuinu aidauk , Apajuí chichamen antujuk umijin ainawai . Tujash atumek Apajuinuchu ainajum nuaduí , nu antutak dakituinagme .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Nuna tusa tutai judío aidau Jisusan chichajuinak : — Juwi tibaiji , amek Samarianmaya aents asam wakan pegkegchau egkemtugmagmatai tu wekaeme , timayag duka dekaske .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Makichik iwanchkesh minak atsugtawai . Wi takaag nunak Apajun ememattasan aikajai , dutikaig atumek minak emematjuinatsjume .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Wika wikik emematjitnume tusanuk wakegatsjai , nuniaig Apajuí ememattinme tujutu asa , nigki nunak egak mina emematjumainnak iwainawai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Dekas tajime : Aents wi taja nuna dekaskeap tawa tusa tauk ajumaish jakashtinai , — tiuwai .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Tutai nuigtú judío aidau aikag : — Yamaik shiig dekaji , dekas aminí wakan pegkegchau pujugtamuapi tusaik . Abraham , nuigtú tikich Apajuí etsegtin aidaushkam ashí jinawajui , nunikaju ainaig ame yamai chichaakum : ‘ Mina chichamjun umigtauk ajumaish jakashtinai ’ , tame .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ Amek dekas ii muunji Abragka nu nagkaesau asamek dusha tame ? Abraham , nuigtú tikich Apajuí etsegtin aidaush ashí jinawajua nuniaish ¿ amesh wajuk takumea dusha tumame ? — tiajui .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wi wiki emematmamkun midaunak pachimasa chichaamuk tikí wainak amainai . Tujash minak mina Apag emematjawai , atum iina Apajig Apajuiyai tajum nunú .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Nunú tusá tayatkugmeshkam nigka wainchauwaitjume , tujash wika wainnujai . Wainchaujai takunuk atum tikima wait ainajum , wisha ibauk wegakun tumainaitjai . Wika shiig wainu asan , ni tujutbaunashkam dutiksanuk umigjai .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Atumi muunjum Abraham aajakua duka , wi ju nugka juwi taamujun waitkatatus wakegas dakak pujusuí , nuniau mina waituk shiig aneasui , — tiuwai .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Nuna tutai judío aidau Jisusan chichajuinak : — Ame cincuenta mijankesh pujatsum aniayatkumesh , wajutí wainkau asamea , ¿ Abragkan wainkabiajai tame ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Dekas tajime : Wika Abragkash akiintsaig tuke pujuwaitjai , — tau .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Tutai aents aidauk kayan jukiaju tukutasag , tujash Jisusak uumak jega Apajuí ememattainmayag jiinkiuwai .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Jisus nuwiya jiinki wekamá , aents yama akiinmawaik tuke wainmachu akiinaun wainkauwai .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Nunikmatai ni jintintaiji aidau iniinak : — Jintinkagtinuh , ¿ wagka jusha wainmachush akiinauwaita ? ¿ Ni apají tudaujiniash ankauwait , atsa niina tudaujinigkiash aanin akiinauwait ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Juka ni tudaujinig junikchauwai , tuja apají dukují tudaujinkish ankachui . Ju junin akiinauwa juka , Apajuí ni senchijin iwainaktatus wakegau asamtai aanin akiinauwai .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Eke tsawaiya juwik , mina awetau dutikata tujutmawa nunak takastajai , kiyagtatui , nunikmataig makichkish takamainchau agtatui .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Yamai nugkaa pujag juwik , nugkan tsaaptinjiyaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Nuna tusa Jisus nugkaa usukmá , niina usukinig nugkan uchupig juki , wainmachu jiin anujtukui .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Dutika chichajak : — Yumi ipiagbau Siloé tutaya awi weme nijamita , — tiuwai . ( “ Siloé ” tawa nunak : “ Awemamu ” taku tawai . ) Tusá tima wainmachushkam we , nijami shiig wainmaku .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Nunik wainmakmatai nu wainmachujai ijutkau batsamin aidau , tuja tikich niina wainin aidaushkam : — ¿ Juchaukaih jintá ekeemas wainkauch sujustajum tusa sumá ekeemnuwe nunú ? — tusag iniimaidau .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Nuna tiagtai tikich aents chichainak : — Ehé , nunuwai , — tuinai tikich chichainak : — Duchauwai auk , ayatak nujai betekmamtinai , — tiajui . Tiagtai nunú aents tsagaju nigki etsegtumak : — Witjai , — tumabiuwai .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Tutai : — ¿ Tujash wajukamea wainmakume ? — tusag iniidau .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Tama ni etsejak : — Makichik aents Jisus daagtin , niina usukin nugkajai machik pachimag jiijuí anujtujuk chichagtak : ‘ Yumi ipiagbau Siloé tutaya nuwi weme nijamita ’ , tusa awetime . Tujutmatai wenu nijamakman wainmakmajai , — tau .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Tutai : — ¿ Nu aentsush tuwí pujawa ? Tusá iniinam : — Achah , dekatsjai , — tiuwai .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Nunú duwik wainmachu aajakun jukiag fariseo batsatainamunum ejegawajui .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Jisus aents wainmachun tsawan ayamtai aig , usukin nugkan uchupig jiinum anujtuk etsagaju asamtai ,

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: fariseo aidau : — ¿ Duwik wainmachumesh yamaish utusamea wainmame ? — tusag iniidau . Tama ni chichaak : — Minak Jisus usukin nugkan uchupig jiijuí anujtujuk : Nijamita , tujutmatai nijamin wainmakmajai , — tau .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Wajumak fariseo aidau chichainak : — Nunú aents dutijama duka Apajuí awemamuk amaitsui , dekas Apajuí awemamuitkug tsawan ayamtai aig takamaitsui , — tuidau . Nuna tuinai tikich chichaidau : — ¿ Tudaugtinaitkush utusaya aents dutikmainchaunash aikash takaawa ? Tusag ditak kanajajui .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Nunikag waketjusag duwik wainmachu wekayin tsagajun jegaantag : — Amesh aents amina etsaentamjaush ¿ ya tame ? Tusa iniam ni chichaak : — Wika Apajuin etsegtinai tajai , — tiuwai .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Nuna tutaish judío aidauk , dekas jujú wainmachuwe nuuwap wainmake tumain dekapenachu , nuninak wainmachu apajin dukujijai untsukag ,

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: iniinak : — ¿ Jukaih atumi uchijum wainmachu akiinauwai tuina nunú ? ¿ Nunin akiinaush yamaish utugsaya wainmawa ? — tuidau .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Tiagtai nuna apají dukujijai chichaak : — Juka iina uchijí wainmachu akiinauwa nuuwai ,

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: tujash wajuk wainmake duka iik dekagtsuji , tuja yaki niimtikme dushakam dekatsji . Ni iniastajum , nigka uchuchichua aanin asa , nigki ujapamainai ni wajuk wainmake nunak , — tiuwai .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Nuna tiajua nunak judío aidau : Jisusak dekas Apajuí awematnaitjai tibauwa nuwapita tuidauk jega ijuntainmak jiikí ajapami , waichu atí tusa chicham umikbau asamtai , nuna dutijamawainum tusa ishamainak tu chichakajui .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Nuniau asamtai wainmachu apajig dukujijai : — Ni iniastajum tikima uchuchichui , — tiuwai .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Nuna timatai judío aidau duwik wainmachu aajakun ataktú untsuká itan chichajak : — Apajuiya nuna emtin dekaskenum waitjutsuk etsegkata . Jutiik dekainaji nu aentsua duka tudaugtinai .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Tiagtai ni ayaak : — Wika dekatsjai , dekas tudauwashit nunak . Wika duwik wainmachuitkun , yamai wainmag junak shiig dekajai , — tiuwai .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Tutai ataktú iniinak : — ¿ Utugtamkame ? ¿ Niimtijamtatkush wajina dutikame ? — tuidau

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Tusá iniam : — ¿ Wagka dutik etsaentugmae tusa etsegkuish dekaskeap tawa tujutchayatkugmesh , ataktú etsegkati tusagmesh wakegagme ? ¿ atumesh ni nemagkatasajum wakegau asagmek tajum ? — tiuwai .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Tusa tutai pegkegchau chichajuinak : — Amek nunú aents nemagme , tujash jutiik Moisés aajakua duke umigji .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Moisesan Apajuí aujujakua duka dekaji , tujash au aents amina etsaentamja duka machikish dekantsui , niish tuwiyampaita duka , — tiaju .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Tuinam aents wainmachu tsagaju chichaak : — ¡ Waj ! anentai jeagmainkaih mina etsaentuja nu , tujash atumek dekatsjume tuwiyagkita nunú aentsush .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Jutiik dekaji Apajuik aents tudaugtin aidau wakegamunak umigtsui , nigka niina emematuinak ni wakegamun umiina nuna antujuinawai .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Duwikish tuke dekachbauwai , aents wainmachu akiinaun makichik aents etsagajui tusa etsegbaukesh .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Aents mina etsaentuja nu , Apajuí awemam taachuitkug , makichkish aikamaitsui , — tau .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Tusa tutai : — Ame akiinmawaik nagkamsam ibau tudau aajakuitkumek , ¿ jutii jintinkagtuatasam wakegam ? — tusag jega ijuntainum pujaun jiikiag awemajui .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Nunú dutika wainmachu tsagaju jiikí awemamun Jisus dekaa wekamá wainak : — ¿ Amesh Apajuí Uchijinish dekaskeapi tamek ? tiuwai .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Tama nu aents chichaak : — ¿ Apuh dusha yaita ? Wisha nuna wainkan niinig dekaskeapi titajai , — tau .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Amek duka wainme , wi amijai chichaag juuwaitjai , — tumabiuwai .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Tutai nu aentschakam Jisusan tikishmatug pujujus : — Apuh , yamaik ame tame nunak dekaskeapi tajame , — tiuwai .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Wi ju nugka juwi tauwaitag nunak , aents aidau : Wika pegkegchau asan wainmachua nuninaitjai , nunin asan Apajuinak dekatsjai tumamainak , Apajuin tsagkugtugta tama , ditá pegkegchauji tsagkujam , wainbaujai betek wetinme ; nuniai tikich aidau : Wika pegkegchaunak takachujai , nunin asan wainmaujai betekaitjai tumamaidau asamtai , Apajuí ditá pegkegchauji tsagkujacham , Apajuinak dekatsuk wainmachujai betek juwakagtin asamtai , tauwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Nuna tutai fariseo aidau wajaidau iniinak : — ¿ Jutiish wainmachu aina annukaitag ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Atum wainmachu ainakjumek atumin tudaugminish bakumamainchau amainaitjume , tujash atum wainbauwaitji tajum awi dekas bakumatin ainagme , — tiuwai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Nunik Jisus chichaak : “ Dekas tajime : Uwijá wenuke waitijiya nuní waitsuk , yajá yantamnum wayaa nunak aents kasa nunin ainawai ,

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: tujash dekas uwijan kuitamna duka waitijin wainai .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Tuja waitin kuitamnuk , uwigjintin minitai ayatak waitin ujati idaitinai , nunak uwigshakam niina chichamenak shiig antujin ainawai . Nuniau asa ni jiyaakushkam makí makichik daajinak adaituk jiinai .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Dutika jiijá juki ni eemak , uwijan ukuunum saak weegame , nunitai uwigshakam nuna chichamenak shiig antuju asag saetinai .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Uwijak niina wainchataijinak , chichamenakesh yajá antujiatkug nemagchau ainawai , ayatak pisag shiminai ” , tiuwai .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Jisus juna pachis fariseo aidaun jintintuauwai ; dutikamashkam ditak nuna tujamkumpap tawa tusag dekaachajui .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Jisus ataktú chichaak : “ Dekas tajime : Witjai uwijan wenuke waitijiya numamtinnuk .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Tuja wi taatsaig kuashat kaunawaju ainawai , tujash nunú aidauk kasa , uwijan yajumin ainawai . Nunak uwijak chichamenash antujuinatsui .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Witjai waitiya numamtinnuk , aents minai waidauk uwemjagtin ainawai . Nunú aents aidauk shiig dakujus batsamtinai Apajuí kuitabau asag .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: “ Kasak ayatak kasamkatatus , magkagtuatatus , jegan tsaiktatus mininai . Tujash wika pujutan jukitnume , nunikag shiig atsumkas batsamsatnume tusan miniuwaitjai .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Witjai dekas aents uwijan shiig kuitamna numamtinnuk . Nunin asan mina aentsug uwemjatnume tabaunum mantamnattajai .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Untsu aents ayatak akiká , kuitamjutkata tusa ukukbau aidauk , kuntin yukagtin uwijan yuwatatus minittaish , uwijak niinuchu asagmatai tupikaak ajapa ukukmatai , nunú kuntin yukagtin yuwak ipisig ishimnai .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Nunú aents tupiká duka , ni tagkujichu asamtai , ayatak akikam takau asa nuniawai .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: “ Witjai dekas aents uwijan shiig kuitamna numamtinnuk . Wika mina aentsug aidaunak shiig dekainajai , nunisag ditashkam minak shiig dekajuinawai .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Aantsag mina Apajush shiig dekajui , wishakam niinak imatiksanuk shiig dekajai , nuniau asan wika mina aentsug pujutan jukitnume tabaunum mantamnattajai .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Uwig tikich wenuknumiaya numamtin , tikich mina nemagtuidaush ajutui , nunashkam yajuakan makichik wenuknumak chimpiaku utugmaina numamtuk ijumjattajai , dutika ai ijunjag batsamsag , mina chichamjun antugtuinakui wiki ditanak kuitamkattajai .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: “ Mina Apajuk anentui , wika mina aentsug aidau uwija numamtin aina nuna ayamjakun , mantamnan ataktú nantaktin asamtai .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Tuja minak mantumain ainatsui . Wika wiki sujumankattajai . Wiki sujumankan jakan ataktushkam wiki nantaktinaitjai . Wi nunimain ajuta nunak mina Apag nunikta tujutiuwai . ”

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Jisus tusá chichaamun judío aidau antukag , ditak pempeentunikiag pampandayidau .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Nuninai kuashat aents chichainak : — ¿ Wagka aanin wakan pegkegchau egkemtuam imaanag chichaa wekaga aniaush antujuinagme ? — tuidau .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Tujash tikich chichaidau : — Makichik aentskesh wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamuk junak imatiksag chichamaitsu jama . ¿ Itusaya aents wakan pegkegchau egkemtuamush aents wainmachunash niimtikmainaita ? — tuidau .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Tsetsek tepeau ai , Jerusalén jistamaidau jega Apajuí ememattai jegamkamua nunú tsawan jegau asamtai .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Tuja Jisus jega Apajuí ememattainum Salomón waiti ujagbaunmanini wekagun ,

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: judío aidau Jisusan tentea apakag chichajuinak : — ¿ Wajupa asamea shiijash etsegkattame ? Ame dekas Kristuitkumek , shiig ujajatkakia , — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Wika timajime , tujash atum minak nuna etsegkuish dekaskeapi tujuttsugme . Mina Apag dutikata tusa inatjamunak wika paan iwainakan atumnash iwaintajime .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Tujash atumek mina aentsjuchu asajum , dekaskeapi tujuttsugme .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Mina aentsug aidaunak shiig wainjai , ditashkam shiig chichamjunash antugtuidau asag , uwig aidau uwijá kuitamnun nemajuina numamtuk nemagtuinawai .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Wi ditanak pujut tuke atina nunak suwajai , dutikamu asag ditak tuke waittsashtin ainawai . Minai batsatunak makichkikesh atanjukchagtin ainawai .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Mina Apag ashí tikich aidaunash nagkaesauwa nunú minak sujusuí . Nunin asamtai niina uwejen aunak makichkish atanmain ainatsui .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Wika mina Apagjaig makichkiuchitji , — tiuwai .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Tutai judío aidau kayan jujukiag tukutá tuidau ,

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: dutikainam Jisus chichaak : — Wi mina Apajun senchijin takaakun kuashat pegkeg aidaun atumin iwaintukmajime . Tuja , ¿ wají takasbaunma minash kayaish tukugtasagmesh wakejutagme ? — tau .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Tama dita aiinak : — Jutiik ame pegkeg iwainajam takaamunmag kayaik tukumaitsujime , amek dekas shiig aentsuitkum Apajuí pegkegchau chichagkum , Apajuiya imanuk jumamam duwi kayaik tukunjattame .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Atum chicham umiktina nuwig : ‘ Wika atumnak apajuí ainagme tajime ’ , tusa agagbauwai .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nuanuig : ‘ Atumek apajuí ainagme ’ tujamui , nunak dekas tujamainawai .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Apajuí mina ju nugka juwi awetimtai tau asan , wika Apajuin Uchijiyaitjai takuish , ¿ wajuk anentaimsagmea , Apajuí pegkegchau chichagkaume tusagmesh tujutjume ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Wi mina Apag wakega dutiksanuk takaachbau wainkugmek dekaskeapi tujutigpajum .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Mina dekaskeapi tujutchamin dekapeakjumesh , mina Apag dutikata tujutmawa nuna wi iwainakan takaakui , nu wainkajum dekaskeapi tujuttajum , nuniakjum minai Apag ai , wi niijai pujag dushakam dekaajum dekaskeapi timinjum .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Tutai ataktú achikag jukiagta tuidau , imatikainam Jisus jiinki wegak uwemjauwai .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Nunik Jisus wakitki namak Jordagkan amain etsá minitaijiya nuní Juan yamijatujakbaunum jegaa pujusuí .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Nunikmatai kuashat aents wejiag wainainak : — Juan aents dutikmainchaun iwainachkush jujú aentsun pachis chichaaya duka dekaske , — tuidau .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Nuna tuidau asag nui batsataidauk kuashat aents Jisusnak dekaskeapi tiajui .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Yaakat Betanianmaya aents Lázaro daagtin jaak tepau . Duka umayí María , Marta aatus ijunag nunú yaaktanmag batsamajakajui .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Maríaya juuwai kugkuinu juki Jisusan nawen ukatug niina intashinig ujugtujua nunú .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: María , Martajai Jisusan chichaman akupjuinak : — Apuh , amina kumpajum aneetaigmea duka jaawai , — tiajui .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Nu akatjamu tusá ujaam Jisus : — Aunak tuke jaak jakashtatui , Apajuí senchijin , nuigtú Apajuí Uchijí senchijinashkam iwainaktatus aniawai , — tiuwai .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jisusak Martan niina kaijai , nuigtushkam umayí Lazaronashkam senchi aneejakuí .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Imaatiknaitak jaawai tabaun antukashkam wetsuk , ni pujamunmag jimajá kanajui ,

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: nunik ni jintintaiji aidaun chichajak : — Judeanum ataktú wakettsaik wegagmi , — tiuwai .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Tama dita ayaak : — Jintinkagtinuh , amina awiya judío aidau kayai tukú tukugmainakua mantamawagtatus imatijabiagmaya nuniaigkik , ¿ awi ataktú wemi tusamesh tame ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Makichik tsawantan doce hora ajatsuak ? Aents tsawai wekaguk tukuumaitsui , shiig wainak wegau asa .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Untsu kashi wegauk tukuumain ainawai , tsaaptinum wainmak wegachu asa .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Nuna ti nuigtú : — Iina kumpají Lazarok yamaik kanag tepawai , tujash wi wejin inankittajai , — tiuwai .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Nuna tutai ni jintintaiji chichajuinak : — Apuh , dekas kanag tepauku nantaktatajama , — tuidau .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Jisusak Lázaro jakamtai taunak , ditak ayatak kanagmatais tawatai tusag tiajui .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus paan iwainak : — Lazarok dekas jakae ,

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: tuja wi awi juwakchau asan shiig aneajai , atumek wi au inanbau wainkajum dekaskeapi tiagtin asagmin . Tujash jegaa diisagmi , — tiuwai .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Tutai Tomás , Jimagmamu tutaiya nunú , tikich Jisusa jintintaiji aina nuna chichajak : — Jutiish niijaig wegagmi , mainakush jutiijai mantamatnume , — tiuwai .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Jisus Lázaro pujutain jegakmá , Lázaro ukusam cuatro tsawan wegai jegauwai .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betaniak Jerusalén jegattak kampatum kilómetro jegaantu .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Tuja kuashat judío aidau shimutkajui Marían , Martajai ijagsagtatus , umayí jajukam buutuinak senchi wake besemag batsatu asamtai , anentain ichichtugtasag .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Nuninai Jisus taattak minawai tabaun Marta antuk , Jisusan igkugtatus jintai , Maríak jegag juwakui .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Nunik Marta Jisusan igkug chichajak : — Apuh , ame juwi pujutaik mina ubajuk jamain wajakchae ,

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: tujash wika yamaikish ame Apajuí segamunak imatiksagkeap amamainaita tajai , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Tusá tama Jisus ayaak : — Amina umaimik aneantatui , — tau .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Tama Marta chichaak : — Dekas tame , wika dekajai tsawan nagkantina duwi aneantina nunak , — tiu .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Witjai jakaunash inanmainnuk , wikitjai pujutnash sukagtinnuk . Aents minai kajinas anentaimaidauk , jakaash pujut nagkanchaunum pujusagtinai .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Tuja yamai iwaaku batsata dushakam , mina : Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapi , tujutuinak imá minak umigtuidauk , waitut nagkanchaunmag wechagtin ainawai . ¿ Dusha amesh dekaskeap nuniktinaita tamek ? — tiuwai .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Tama : — Ehé Apuh , wika dekaskeapi tajame . Amek Apajuí Kristun ju nugka juwi awematnaitjai timawa nunú asam , Apajuí Uchijiyaitme , tiuwai .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuak , Martak kai Marían jegantun niinak akanki : — Jintinkagtin juwi taa untsugmawai , — tiuwai .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Nunú tamawaik Maríashkam wajaakug Jisusan wainkatatus wejiuwai .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Jisusak yaaktanmag eke waitsuk , Marta igkugbaunmag pujau .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: María waujus jiinki wetai , judío aidau María anentai ichichtuinak kauná batsatushkam : Umayí ukusbaunum jegantá buuttasas wegatai , tusag pataetukajui .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Nunik Maríak Jisus wajamunum jegantá tikishmatug pujus : — Apuh , ame juwi pujutaik , mina ubajuk jakachampastaih , — tau .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Tusa María buuttai , judío Marían pataetuk kaunkaushkam buutiagtatman Jisus wainak , shiig senchi wake besemag dekapjauwai .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Nunik : — ¿ Tuwí ukusmaugme ? — tusa iniimu . Tutai : — Apuh juwi ukusmaji , tantá diistá , — tiajui .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Tima jegan diikmá wainak Jisus buutu .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Nunitai judío aidau : — ¡ Diisjuah , yaitnaku aneejakuajah ! — tuidau .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Tiagtai tikich aidau : — ¿ Jujú wainmachunash wainmitkauwe ibaush , Lázaro jataish utugkatnuki , ni pujutaish jakatnasha ? — tuidau .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Jisus ataktú senchi wake besemag dekapjau , nunik waa muun taimunum ukusá kaya aputukbaun jegantun :

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: — Kayak ekektajum , — tiuwai . Tutai Marta chichaak : — Apuh , mejeawastaih , ukusam cuatroa imania kintamjae , — tau .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Ame dekaskeapi takumek Apajuí senchijí iwainamu wainkattame timajam duka , dekaskeap dutikmainaita tatsumek ? — tiuwai .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Timatai Lázaro ukuaku epenbaun , kayan eketkaju . Dutikamtai Jisus nayaimpin pagkai diyaak : — Apawah see tajame , amek minak tuke antugtau asamin .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Wika shiig dekajai , amek minak tuke antugtusmeké ame nunak . Nuniayatkun yamai tajame , jujú aents ijuna jushakam shiig wainkag , dekas Apajuí awemamuapi tujuttinme tusan , — tau .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Nuna ti idayak senchi untsuká : — ¡ Lázaro , nantakim agaa jiinkita ! — tiuwai .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Tama Lazaroshkam ukuaku uwejé nawejai jaanchi shiig pempeaja , nuigtú yapiin jaanch aputusa ukusbauk imanisag jiinkiuwai . Nunikmatai Jisus chichaak : — Atiatajum wetí , — tiuwai .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Kuashat judío aidau Marían uyunainak yujaidauk , Jisus nu dutikamu wainkag : Dekas juka Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tiajui .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Tujash wajumak aents fariseo aidaun jegajuawag , Jisus dutikamun pachis ujakajui .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Nunú ujakajam fariseo aidau , sacerdoten apuji aidau , nuigtú apu ditan nagkaesau aidaujai ijunjag chichainak : — Au aentsua nunú aents dutikmainchaun kuashat iwainag takaa aush ¿ utugkattaji ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Ayatak idaisa ajinig ashí aents aidau niinak : Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tusag nemajiagtai , Romanmaya apu aidau suntajan ishitjamkamtai kautjamak , jega Apajuí emematku ijuntaiya juna yumpunjamainak ashí jutiijai amupaktatajama , — tuidau .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Nuna tiagtai nuwiya Caifás daagtin nunú mijantin sumo sacerdote atí tusa adaikam pujau asa chichaak : — Atumek duka machikish dekatsjume ,

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: anentaimsagmesh diyatsjume , ashí aents jinumaina nuna makichik aents mantamnamaina duka , — tiuwai .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Nunak Caifasak nigki nagkamig tichauwai . Nunú mijantin ni sumo sacerdote wajas pujau asamtai , Apajuí tu anentaimtikbau asa , Jisusai judío aidaunum mantamnatnuk , tiuwai .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Tujash imá judío aina nuwigkik maam amaitsui , ashí aents tikich nugkanum batsata nunashkam uwemtikak niina uchijí emakta tau asa , Jisus maam atinun taku tiuwai .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Nuna timatai nunú tsawantaik apu aidauk : Jisusak dekas mantamnati , tusag chichaman umigkajui .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Tibaun Jisus dekagmama shiig wantinka wekaemainchau asamtai , Judea nugkanak ukuak , makichik yaakat yaijuch Efraín tutai uwejush tikiju anem aunum weuwai . Nui jegaa ashí niina jintintaiji aidaujai ijunag pujusuí .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Nuniamunum judío aidau Pascuatin uwijan maawag yuujakú aina nu tsawan tikiju wajasú asamtai , kuashat aents Jerusalén ashinaidau , nui jegawag : Nu jista tsawaakuig pegkediaja jistamtai atí , tibau asamtai nuna umikagtatus .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Tuja aents aidauk Jisusan wainkagtatus egaa yujajuidau , nunidau asag jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa ekeemsajash pempentunisag iniininak : — ¿ Atumesh Jisusash wajuk anentaimtagme , ju jistanmash minitpash , atsa pujustimpash ? — tuidau .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Fariseo aidau sacerdote apuji aidaujai aentsun akatenak : — Makichkitigmekesh Jisus pujamuji dekagkugmek etsegkatajum , achiká jukimi , — tiajui .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Seis tsawan asa jista Pascua jegatin ai Jisusak Betania weuwai , Lázaro jakamtai ni inankiuwa nuna pujutaijin .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Nui jegamtai Jisusan eme anentsag yutain umigkajui . Dutikawagmatai Marta yutain pekasmatai , Lázaro , nuigtú tikich aidaush Jisusjai mesanum jegantag ekeemsag yuwidau .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Nuninai María kugkuin ayatak nardok najanamu , senchi akik trecientos gramos ajamun juki tajuntun , Jisusa nawen ukaatuk , niina intashinig ujujtujui . Nu dutikamu kugkuntig jeganak akijuauwai .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Imanikmatai Judas Iscariote , Jisusa jintintaijitak pempeentuki sujuktina nu chichaak :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: — ¿ Wagka dekas trescientos tsawan takasá kuichik jumaina imaan akik sujuka , nunú kuichkik ujunauch aidaun yaimainnash aikawa ? — tau .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Nunak Judasak dekas ujunauch aidaun puyatjakug tichauwai . Nigka kasa asa kuichik egketai kuitamkata tusa susam wekagas , aents aidau nu egketainum kuichik chimpiamun , wakenmag kasamá wekagu asa dutikatatus tiuwai .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Nuna tutai Jisus chichaak : — ¡ Tutsuk idaisata ! Junak mina ukugsagmatai jutijuawagtinun jutijawai .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: ujunauch aidauk atumjaig tuke batsabiagtatui , untsu wika atumjaig pujushtatjai , — tiuwai .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Kuashat judío aidau Jisus Betanianum pujawai tuinamun antukag wegajui , niina wainainak Lazaronashkam jakau aig Jisus inankiu asamtai , wainkata tuidau asag .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Nudiagtai sacerdoten apuji aidaushkam : Lázaro maami , tusag chichaman umigkajui ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: ni nantakbaujin wainainak kuashat judío aidau Jisusan : Dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tusag nemajuidau asagmatai .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jista Pascua atin asamtai , kuashat aents Jerusalén wegajui . Nunik kintamag tsawaukmag , Jisus taattak minawai tuinamun antukag ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: duká tsupijag jiinjag igkuinak , senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Apajuí awemamu jutii Israel aidauti Apuji , iina agkanmitkagmatatus mina jujú emematiagmi ! — wajaidau .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jisusak burrun wainak nui ekeemi minau , duka duwik agagbaunum :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Yaakat Siognumia aents aidautigmek ishamkaigpajum , diistajum atumin apujum burrunum entsatkau mina nunú ” , tawa nu uminkauwai .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Jisus burrunum ekeemi wetaish , ni jintintaiji aidauk nu agagbau tawa nunak anentaimtugchajui , nunikajuitak Jisus nayaimpinum wakitkimtai , Jisus nuniktinun pachis yaunchuk agajajua duka , dekas imanisagkeap uminkae tusag adeajajui .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Aents aidau Jisusa nemajus yujaidauk , Jisus Lázaro jakaun untsuká inantun wainkaju asag , nuna dutikame tusag , ashí dita wainkamujinak tikichnash ujaidau .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Jisus aents dutikmainchau dutikamua nuna antukaju asag , aents aidauk Jisusan igkugkagtatus jintujajui .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Nuniagtai fariseo aidau pempentunisag tudayinak : — ¡ Diisjuah , ashí aents igkugtatus ashintuinana ! Ii chicham umikmag duka dutikmainchau emaji , — tiajui .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Jista tsawagmatai Apajuin emematiagtatus Jerusalén wegamunum , wajumak griego aents aidaush pachiinkajui .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Nunú aidau , Felipe yaakat Betsaidanmaya Galilea nugkanum pujuwa nuna jegaantag : — Apu Jisus wainkatasa wakegaji , — tiajui .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Tima Felipe Andresan jegajua ujakú , nunik niijai atuegak Jisusan jegajuawag , tujamainawai tusag ujakajui .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Tusá ujaam Jisus chichaak : — Wi Aentsmaga Akiinaun nayaimpinum wakitkittag duka yamaik tsawan umiintugkae .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Dekas tajime : Ajakan jigkayí akaká nugkaa ajachmak nunisag makichik jigkaik awai , untsu nugkaa initak ajaam jaka tsapai nejeakug kuashat jigkaijuwame .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Aents ju nugka juwi pujutan imá senchi wakegauk uwemjashtin ainawai . Untsu aents pujutin uyumachuk uwemjatin ainawai .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Aents mina umigtuktatus wakegauk nemagtuktinme , mina umigtin aidauk wijai pujusagtinai , tuja mina umigtin aina nunak mina Apagshakam eme anentinai .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: “ Yamaik shiig kuashat anentaimkun waitiajai . ¿ Wajintajaki : ‘ Apawah , mina mantuawagtata nunak idaitustinme ’ , titajash ? Tujash wika ni tabaun umiktasan tauwaitjai . ”

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Nuna tusa : “ Apawah , amina senchijum aents aidaush iwaintukta ” , tiuwai . Nuna tai nayaimpinmaya chichaak : “ Mina senchignak iwainakbaijai , tujash ashí aminí nagkaemaktata duwi awentsanuk iwainaktatjai ” , tiuwai .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Nu tabaun nui aents ijunu antukag : — Ipamtai , — tiajui . Tuinai tikich chichaidau : — Nayaimpinmaya aents chichaké , — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Juna chichaa nunak mina antumtijuktasag tatsui , atumin antumtijamkagtatus tawai .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Aents ju nugkaya aidau etegnagtina duka yamai jegawai , tuja yamaiya juwiki iwanch ju nugka juwi inama nunú depetkamu atata dushakam .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Mina numinum achiijag yakí takujiagmatai , jakan nantaakun , ashí aentsnak minai minaig ikaunmantatjai , — tiuwai .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Nunak ni wajuk maam atinaita nuna aentsun dekamtikak tiuwai .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Tutai aents aidau aiinak : — Jutii chicham umiktina nuanuig : Kristuk tuke pujutnui , tusa agagbauwa nu dekaji . Nunú taish , ¿ wagka amesh Aentsmaga Akiinauk , maatasa yakí takuam atatui , tame ? ¿ Nu Aentsmaga Akiinaush yaita ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Yamaikik atumjai ijunjan pujajai , tujash dukap tsawantak pujushtatjai , wajumchik tsawanchik pujuttajai . Witjai tsaaptinjai betekmamtinnuk , eke atumjai pujag juwik wi jintinkagtamuk unuimagtajum . Suwenum wekaguk dekatsui ni wegamujinak shiig wainak wegachu asa .
