text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Wi tuke tsaaptinjai betekmamtinun atumjai pujag juwik dekaskeapi tujuttajum , atumesh wi tsaaptinaitag nuna uchijí aminjum . Juna Jisus tusa idayak , aentsun ejamki jiinki weuwai .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Jisus aents dutikmainchaun iwainag ditash wainainamunum takataish dekaskeapi tichajui .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Dita nuninamunum Apajuí etsegtin Isaías agagbau : “ Apuh , ¿ ya iina chichamenash dekaskeapi tuinawa ? ¿ Apush yana niina senchijinash iwaintuke ? ” tawa nu betek uminkauwai .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Aatus nunidau asag dekaskeapi tumain dekapenachu . Tuja junashkam Isaías agak :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: “ Apajuí , nu aents aidaunak anentaimtanash anentaimainchau emakbau asag , jiinchakam epetkamua numamtin ainawai . Nuninchau ainakug mina chichamjun antukag pujutjin yapajinakuig , wi ditanak uwemtikmainaitjai ” , tiuwai .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaías juna tiuwa nunak , Jisusa imanjin wainkau asa , niina pachis tiuwai .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Tujashkam kuashat aents aidau , nuigtú apu aidaushkam Jisusnak dekaskeapi tiajui . Nuninakjash fariseon ishamainak iwainmamainachu , ditá ijuntaijin tuke jiyaku jiyaam aig tusag .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Nunak aents eme anenkagtamua nuna imá senchi wakegainak , Apajuí dekas eme anentam amaina nunak imanchau anentuinak nunikajui .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Jisus senchi jiiká chichaak : “ Aents mina dekaskeapi tujutuina duka , mina Apag awetiuwa nunashkam dekaskeapi tuinawai .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Tuja mina waituina duka , mina awetiuwa nunashkam wainainawai .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Wika ju nugka juwig tsaaptinnum wainmatiama numamtuk aents aidaun dekamtikatasan taamjai , mina dekaskeapi tusa nemagtuidauk suwenum wekagu wajukmaina numamtuk tudaunak takaa batsaminum tusan .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Aents mina chichamjun antayatak umigtachunak wika bakushtatjai ; wika aents aidaun bakutasanuk juwig taachmajai , aentsun uwemtikatasan taamjai .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Mina dakitjak , chichamjunash betek umiachun bakutnuk awai , chicham wi tukagtimag nunuwai tsawan nagkanbaunum bakujattinuk .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Wika wi wakegamunak chichaatsjai , Apag mina awetiuwa nunú chichagkagtukta , nuniakum jintinkagtuata tujutbaun tajai .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Nuaduí wika mina Apag umiktajum tukagtimua duka , pujut tuke atina nunap sukagtawa tajai . Tau asan wi atumin ujaajim , nunashkam mina Apag tujutmawa dutiksanuk ujaajime ” , tiuwai .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Pascua jegatin tikiju wajasú ai , Jisus ni Apajin wegaku ju nugka ukuktinjin dekau asa , ni jintintaiji aidaun nagkamsa aneejakbaujin iwaintukui , wetatak pujusash imatiksaik aneamujin .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Nunik yujumkan yuwinak pekaamsamunum Judas Iscariote Simogkan uchijiya nuna , Jisus sujutnum iwanch anentaimtijauwai .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Tuja Jisusak Apajuijai pujau taamujinak dekau , nunisag dekau ataktú Apajuiyai wakitkitnujin , nuigtú niina Apají senchimtika : Ashí ame diistá , tusa idaitusbauwa nunashkam .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Nuniau asa yujumak yuwaku pekagbaunum Jisus wajakí , awantak pataká nugkuagbaujin awimak toalla juki akachuma wajantuí ,

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: nunik mantignum yumin yajaa apujus , niina jintintaiji aidau nawe nijattan nagkama nijatuk , toalla akachumamun juki ujugtuk emau .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Dutikak Simón Pedronashkam jegantun , nawe nijatjata tama : — Apuh , amek ibauwaitkumek mina dawejuk nijatjumaitsume , — tau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Yamaikik wi juna jutikag juka dekatsme , tujash duwi dekaattame , — tiuwai .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Tusa tama Pedro chichaak : — Apuh , amek mina dawejuk tuke nijatjugchattame , — tiuwai . Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Amina nawemin wi nijagchamtaig , amek wijaig ijunmaitsume , — tau .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Tama Simón Pedro chichaak : — ¡ Untsu apuh , imá dawejuk nijatsuk , uwejush nijatjakum , buukeagshakam nijatjugta ! — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Yamá mainuk pata patakag maak pujumaitsui tsuwatjin ajapau asa , ayatak naweeg nijatam amainai , anmamtuk atumek tsuwatchau ainagme , tujash ashí tsuwatchauk ainatsjume , — tiuwai .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: “ Ashí tsuwatchauk ainatsjume ” , tiuwa nunak aents niina sujuktin jutiijai pachitkau asamtai wainu asa , tiuwai .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Nuna ti ashí niina jintintaijin nawen nijatuk , Jisus ataktú ni awantak pataká nugkutaijin nugkujá mesanum jegantá ekeemas : — ¿ Wi juna jutikajim dusha atumesh shiijak dekajum ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Atum mina : Jintinkagtinú , Apú , tujutjum duka dekas iman asamtai tujutjume .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Wi Jintinkagtin , Aputnash Apuitkun atumin nawemin nijatjajim antsagmek , atumesh atumin kakagchaujum pempeentunikjum iwaintuniktajum .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Junak atumin ditash juna wainkaja jutiksag takastinme tusan iwaintakun aikajime .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Dekas tajime : Inakak apujin nagkaesauchui , tuja awemamua dushakam awekagtiuwa nuna nagkaesauchui .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Juna wi tajim jujú shiig dekaajum , atumesh umiktasajum takaagtaik , Apajuí shiig aneas pujustinme tusa yaimpaktatjume .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: “ Tujash junak ashí atumin takun tatsujime . Wika shiig dekajime atumnak wi etegjau asan , nunin aigkish duwik Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui : ‘ Wijai ijunag yuwina nuwiyag pempeentugkiag sujutkagtinai ’ , tibauwa nunash dekajai .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Nuniayatkun junak ujajime , nu tsawan jegakui dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita tujutminjum tau asan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Dekas tajime : Wi awemamun dakittsuk juwauk , mina jujuinawai . Untsu mina jujuina duka , mina awetiuwa nuna juwinawai . ”

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Jisus nuna ti senchi wake besemag dekapeg , ashí antuinamunum paan iwainak : — Dekas tajime : Atum ainajum juwiyag makichik minak sujutkattawai , — tau .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Nuna timatai niina jintintaiji aidaushkam yana takug tawa tusag , mai niinia , mai niinia wajaidau .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Nuniai niina jintintaiji aina nuwiya , makichik Jisusa aneetaijiya nunú yujumak yuwamunum Jisusai ayaumas yuwak eketu .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Nunittaman Simón Pedro tutaya nu : Ame iniasta , tusa iwijau .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Dutikam ni Jisusan : — ¿ Apuh , dusha yaita ? — tusa iniau .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Yana wi pagkan uchutuan susattaja nunú atatui . Tusa pagkan puuk juki uchutua Judas Iscariote Simogkan uchijiya nuna susauwai .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Nuna dutika suwaig wamkes Judasan iwanch egkemtujui . Dutikamtai Jisus chichajak : — Ame dutikata tame duka wamkesam dutikata , — tiuwai .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Nuna tutaishkam makichkish anentaimtugchajui , ni sujam atinun takumpap tawa tusajag .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Judas kuichkin kuitamin asa , kuichik chimpitain takaku asamtai , tikich anentaimsajag jista atinnum atsumna nu sumakta tusampash tawa , nuniachkush ujunauch aidau susata tusampash tawa , tiaju .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Tama Judaschakam pagkan waujus yuwa jinkiuwai . Nunak kashi nunikui .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Judas jiinki wematai Jisus chichaak : — Apajuí senchigtina nunak , wi Apajuí Uchijiyaitkun Aentsmaga Akiinauwaitag duwi dekaawagtatui , nunak wi nuniktatag nuna wainainak Apajuinak eme anentiagtatui .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Wi niinak puyatjusa umigkamu asa , yaunchuk wi aajakbaujua nunak imanuk etittawai .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Uchuchig aidauh , atumjai ijunjanuk kuashat tsawantaik pujushtatjai . Judío aidaun : Egatkugmesh waitkashtatjume , timag dutiksanuk atumnashkam tajime . Atumek wi wegamunmag yamaikik minimain ainatsjume .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Chicham umiktajum tibaun yamai wishakam tajime . Ashí iikdaisajum makí makichik aneeniamu iwaintuniktajum . Wi atum aneamujun iwaintukjim aikasjumek atumshakam tikichjaish iikdaisajum aneenimain ainagme .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Atum aaja pempeentunikjum aneediagtaik , dekas Jisusa jintintaijimpap ainawa tujabiagtin ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Nuna tutai Simón Pedro iniak : — Apuh , ¿ tuwí wetatme ? — tau . Tama : — Wi wetatag nuwig yamaikik minimain ainatsjume , tujash duwi pujusjum minitin ainagme , — tiu .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Tutai Pedro ayaak : — Apuh , ¿ wagka yamaikish minimainchauwaitja ? Wishakam amijai jakatasan umintsan wekaejai , — tau .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Dekaskek wijai mantamnatasam umintsam wekagam ? Dekas tajame : Eke atash shinatsaig kampatumá : ‘ Wika Jisusnak waintsamjai tujuttatme ’ , — tiuwai .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Nuna ti : “ Atumek wi tajim nunú anentaimtakjum wake besemag pujuigpajum . Apajuiyaig dekaskeapi tusajum imá senchi anentaimkujum , minaishkam imanisjumek anentaimtajum .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Nayaimpinmag mina Apag pujamunmag kuashat agkan awai atum pujumainuk . Nu achakuig ujamaitsujime . Nu iman au asamtai , wi atum pujustinnak umigkatjime tusan wegajai .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Yamai wenu atum pujustinun umikan , ataktú wakettsanuk taattajai , mina pujutaijui pujustajum tusan atumin juwakun .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Atumek wi tuwí wegaja duka dekagme , nuniau asajum jintashkam wainjume , wajuk wi pujamunmash wamainaitjume dushakam . ”

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Tutai Tomás : — Apuh , ame wegamuk dekatsug aniautish , ¿ wajuk dekaik minitji ? — tau .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Tutai Jisus ayaak : — Witjai jinta numamtinnuk , tuja dekasketnash wikitjai , nuigtushkam wikitjai pujutnash sukagtinnuk . Imá minaig kajinas anentaimaina duke mina Apajuig jegamain ainawai .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Atum wi yaitja nunú shiig dekagkugmek , mina Apagshakam aikasjumek dekamain ainagme . Yamaiya juwikiuch mina waitjum nunisjumek mina Apagshakam wainjume , — tau .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Tutai Felipe chichaak : — Apuh , Apa iwainkagtukta , nu wainká maak juwakagmi , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : Felipeh , tuke atum wijai ijunjajum batsamin ainayatkugmesh , ¿ eke shiig dekagtsumek ? Mina shiig dekajuina duka , Apagnashkam aikasag dekainawai . Nuniaish , ¿ wagka Apa iwaintugkata wainkatjai , tame ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: ¿ Dekaskeapi tujuttsumek wi mina Apagjai makichik aentsua numamtinaitag duka ? Wi tajim nunak nuigtú iwaintajim nunashkam wi wakegamugnakek dutikatsjai . Mina Apag dutikata tibaun iwaintajime .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Wi mina Apagjai pujau asamtai , mina Apag minai pujawai taja duka dekaskeapi titajum . Nu dekaskeapi tichamin dekapeakjumesh , wi takaamu wainkugmekesh , dekaskeapi tujuttsajum dekapjustajum .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Dekas tajime : Mina dekas Apajuin Uchijimpapita tusag umigtuidauk , ditashkam wi takaag juní nagkaemas takasagtin ainawai , wi mina Apag pujamunum wemataishkam . Awi wakan atumin pachisan Apajun segattatjime , ni atumin yaimpaktinme tusan .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Atum ashí atsumamu pachisjum , mina Apajush wakegamu , wisha wakegamua nu segatkugminig , imatiksanuk amastatjime , mina Apagnash shiig emematiagtinme tusan .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Atum mina pachittsajum dekaskeapi tusajum , ashí atsumamu segatkugminig imatiksanuk umiktatjai .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: “ Atum mina anenkugmek , wi chicham umiktajum tajim nunú betek umiktajum .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Dutika umigtakjuminig Apajun segattajai , atumiin pujus tuke ichichtamtina nuna Wakaní Pegkejin awetugmati tusan .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Nunú Wakaní Pegkeji dekaskea nunak jintinkagtina nunak , aents mina umigtuchu aidauk jumain ainatsui , waintanash wainchau asag , ni tabaunash dekamainchau ainawai . Tujash atumek wainjume , nigka atumiin pujau asa , aantsag tuke atuminig pujutnai .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: “ Tuke bitaika numamtukek ukukchatnaitjime , waketjusnuk ataktú tajuatnaitjime .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Machik asa mina umigtuinatsu duka waitkachagtatui , tujash atumek waitkattajume mantuawagmatai aneantatag duwi . Witjai pujutan sukagtinnuk , nunin asamtai atumshakam tuke wijaig batsamtin ainagme .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Tujash nu tsawan jegattawai , nunikmatai shiig dekattagme , wi mina Apagjaig makichik aentsua nuninaitag duka , antsagmek wi atumjai ijutkau pujamushkam .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Aents wi chicham umiktajum timawa nuna umiakug dekas mina anentak nuniawai . Nuna nuniaun mina Apagshakam aneettawai . Aikasnuk wishakam aneettajai , dutikamu asajum aan nagkaemasjum shiig dekajuattagme . ”

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Tutai Judas ( Iscariotechu ) chichaak : — Apuh , ¿ amina nemagtamchau aidau wantiintutskesh itusamea imá jutiikesh wantinkagtuktatme ? — tau .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Mina anentuk wi taja nuna umiktatui ; nudiaun mina Apajuk aneettawai . Dutikakui , wishakam mina Apagjai niina anentain tajuan tuke pujustinaitjai .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Untsu mina anenchau wi taja nunak umigtukchattawai . Atumin wi tajim duka mina chichamjuchui , Apag mina awetiuwa nuna chichamegai .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: “ Junak atumjai pujag juwik ashí ujajime .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Tujash wi mina Apajun segattajai Wakaní Pegkeji atumi ichichtamjatnun awetugmati tusan , nunú wi wemataish yaimpaktatjume nuniak jintinjamattajume , nuigtushkam ashí wi jintintuajim nunashkam anemtijamjattagme .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: “ Shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan ukugjime . Wi shiig agkan anentaimsan pujutaijua nuna amajime , wika ju nugkanmaya shiig aneetan sukagtina nujai beteknak amatsjime . Nu uyumakjum anentaimkujum ishamá pujuigpajum .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Wika wegajai , nuniknush wakettsanuk atumjai pujustasan tajuattajime , tabaushkam antugtukmaugme . Dekas mina shiig anenkugmek , wi Apag mina nagkaetasu asamtai , nui wegajai tabaug antugtakjumek shiig aneemain ainagme .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Junak emtikan tajime , nu uminu wainkujum dekaskeapi timinjum tusan .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: “ Atumjaig kuashat chichaa pujushtatjai , ju nugka juna apuji iwanch midau asamtai , nigka mina depetumainjig senchijig atsujui .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Tujash mina Apag tabaun umigkattajai , wi mina Apag aneamujun ashí dekaatnume tau asan . “ Wajagtajum , juka ukuaku wegagmi .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: “ Witjai dekas uva numijiya numamtinnuk , untsu mina Apajui ajakan kuitamna numamtina duka .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Mina kanaweg nejeachunak tsupiawai , untsu nejeaunak , jegamujinak asantak kuitamui aan nagkaemas nejektí , tusa .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Atumek wi jintintuamjim nu umiau asajum , ajak jeeshji asanjamua numamtin ainagme .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Wi atumjai ijuntsan pujag antsagmek atumshakam wijaig ijutkau atajum . Ajakan kanawe , numijin achitkachu nigki kanakí auk nejemaitsui . Atumshakam numamtuk wijai ijutkau achakjumek pegkeg aina duka iwainamaitsugme .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: “ Witjai dekas uva numijiya numamtinnuk . Atumek mina kadaujua numamtin ainagme . Wijai shiig ijutkauwa nunú pegkeg aidaunak iwainamainai . Atumek wijai ijutkau achakjumek Apag wakegamua duka makichkish dutikmain ainatsjume .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Makichkitigmekesh wijai ijutkau achakjumek , numí kanawe nejeachu asamtai tsupika ajapamu kukagmatai apetiama numamtuk awajam atinaitjume .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: “ Tujash atum wijaig ijutkau pujakjum , wi ashí jintintuajim dushakam betek umiakjumek atum atsumamu segattajum , nuniakjuminig ashí amastinaitjime .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Atum pegkeg takaamu aina duke iwainagtaik , tikich aidaush mina Apagnash shiig emematiagtatui , nuninak dekas mina jintintaig ainajum nunashkam dekagmawagtatui .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: “ Apag mina anenta aikasnuk atumnashkam aneajime . Wi aneajim antsagmek atumshakam aneenitajum .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Wi chicham umiktinun ukugjim ju umiakjuminig wishakam aneettajime , wi mina Apajun chichamen umiju asamtai , ni anenta aikasnuk .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: “ Juna wi tajim nunak wijai betekak shiig aneasag dakujus pujustinme tusan tajime .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Chicham umiktajum tibaun wi patasnuk tajim duka : Mina nemagtin aidautigmek pempentunisjumek aneenitajum , wi atumin aneajim antsagmek , tajim nuuwai .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Makichik aents ni kumpajin ayamjuktatus mantamna nu iwainawai senchi anejata nunak , nu anejata nuna nagkaesau anejatmainuk atsawai .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Atum wi tajim nu imatiksagmek umiautigmek mina kumpag ainagme .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Nuniau asagmin wika inak ainagme tumaitsujime . Inakak apuji takaamujinak ashí dekagchau ainawai . Wika atumnak kumpag ainagme tajime , mina Apag tujutbaunak ashí ujakjim nuaduí .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Atum minak etegtuachu ainagme , witjai atumin etegjaunuk , dutikau asan mina chichameg etsegkujum , ajak senchi nejegama numamtuk wajaktajum timajim duka ajumaish tuke atinai . Nuaduí atum atsumamujum mina pachittsajum mina Apag segamak amasagtinai .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Yaunchuk timajim dutiksanuk tajime : Mina nemagtin aidautigmek pempentunisjumek aneenitajum .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: “ Aents mina nemagtuchu aidau , atum mina nemagtau asagmin kajegtamainakuish , adeagtajum , mina dekas nagkamchakug kajegtuku ainawai .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Atum ditajai betek agtaik , dita aneenina aikagmasajag anempamain ainagme . Tujash wi atumnak dita aina nunin ainum tusan etegjan midau emakbau asajum , ditajai betekchau ainajum duwi kajegtamainawai .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Wi , ‘ inakak apujin nagkaesauchui ’ timajim duka aneaku atajum . Mina waitkagsaju aina dutiksajag atumnashkam waitkagmasagtinai . Mina chichamjun antugtukag umiidauk atum etsegbaun antuinakush , dutiksag umikagtatui .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Nunak mina nemagtuidau asagmin imatijabiagtinai , mina Apag awetiuwa nuna dekajuinachu asag .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: “ Wi juwi taan chichaman etsegkachuitkuig ditá tudaujinig bakumamainchau ainawai . Tujash yamaik mina chichamjun antukaju asag , wika dekachu asan tudaunak takaayajai tumain ainatsui .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Mina kajegtuidauk mina Apagnashkam kajejuinawai .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Wi iwainajan dita wainainai tikichish dutikmainchaun takaschauwaitkuig bakumamain ainatsui . Tujash wi iwainaja takaamun wainainayatak ayatak kajegtuinak , mina Apagnashkam kajejuidau asag bakumagtinai .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Nunak dita chicham umiktinjin agagbauwa nui : ‘ Wainak kajegtukagtinai ’ , tawa nunú uminu asamtai aikajuinawai .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: “ Tujash wi mina Apajuiyan Wakaní Pegkeji dekaskea nuna jintinkagtinun awemattag nunú atumnak yaimpaktatjume , dutikak mina pachittsash shiig dekamtijamattagme .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Dutijamainakui atumshakam yama nagkamawaik tuke wijaig batsamsau asajum , mina pachittsajum tikich aidaush ujaktatjume .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: “ Nuna wi jintintuajim nunak minai kajintsá anentaimat megkaekaijum tabaunum tajime .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Tsawan jegataik jega ijuntainum wayaagminish agaa jigmagtin ainawai , dutijamawag mantamainak : Juka Apajuí wakegamu takaju asá jutikaji , tiagtinai .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Nunak mina Apagnash , minashkam shiig dekajuachaju asag dutijamiagtinai .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Juna tajim nunak , nu tsawan jegagtamkujaish wi tibauwa nu adeagminjum tusan ujajime . “ Junak yaunchkek tichamiajime atumjai pujau asan .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Tujash yamaik mina awetiuwa nujai pujustasan wegajai , makichkitigmekesh tuwí wegame tusagmekesh inintsachugme ,

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: wi nuna takui ayatak wake besemag pekagjume .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Tujash dekaskea nuna tajime : Dekas wi juwi pujutsuk wegamua nu imá pegkejai . Wi wechataik , atumin yaimpak anentain ichichtugmamaina duka tajutjamaitsugme . Nuaduí wi wenu nunak awetittajime .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Dutikam Wakaní Pegkeji taa , aents aidaun ditá tudaujin paan dekamtikattawai , pegkeg takata nuna , nuigtú aents aidau tudau takaidaun Apajuí suwimkan susatna nunashkam .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Tudau takaina duka , mina dekas Apajuí Uchijimpapita tujutuinatsu nu ainawai .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Wi pegkejan takaunuk mina Apajuí wetatjai , nunikmataig ataktuk waitkashtatjume .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Wakaní Pegkejiya duke Apajuí ju nugka juna apujin suwimkan susatna nunash dekamtikattawai .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: “ Atumin ujamainjuk juní kuashat ajutui , tujash atumek yamaikik ashí dekamain ainatsjume .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Tujash Wakaní Pegkeji dekaskea nunak chichauwa nunú , ashí dekaskea nunak jintinjamattajume . Nigka ni wakegamujinak chichatsuk , mina Apagdaun antukbaujin , atak agtina nunashkam dekamtijamattajume .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Wakaní Pegkejiya nu mina imanjua nunak iwaintugmak , imá midaunmayanak atumnak dekamtijamattagme .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ashí mina Apagdauwa duka midau ainawai . Nuaduí Wakaní Pegkeji imá midaunmayanak atumnak dekamtijamattawai taja nunak tajime .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: “ Wajumak tsawantai minak waitkashtatjume , nunikjum dukapech tsawan asajum ataktú waitkattagme , eke mina Apajuí wegatsaig . ”

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Nuna tutai niina jintintaiji aidauk ditak pempeentunikiag iniininak : — ¿ Wajuk nunash takua , wajumak tsawantai minak waitkashtatjume , nunikjum dukapech tsawan asajum ataktú waitkattagme , eke mina Apajuí wegatsaig tujamji ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: ¿ Wajina takua : Wajumak tsawan asajum tujama nunash tawa ? Wajuk takus tawa dekamaitsui , — tuidau .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Nuna tusag dekas iniasmi tusag anentaimiagtatman Jisus wainak : — Atumin wi chichagkun : Wajumak tsawantai waitkashtatjume , nunikjum dukapech tsawan asajum ataktú waitkattagme , tajim duká , ¿ atumek pempentunikjum iniininajum ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Dekas tajime : Atumek wake besemag anentaimtugkujum buuttatjume , nuniagmin aents pegkegchau aina duka shiig aneeniagtatui mina mantuinak . Nuninai atumshakam wake besemag pujamugmik sakapakjum ataktú shiig aneastatjume , wi nantakin wantintuktatjim duwi .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Nuwa uchigmatji jegagmak najaimak wake besemag pujuwame , nuniau uchin uchigmak shiig aneak najaimajakbaujinak kajimatame .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Anmamtuk atumshakam yamaikik buuttatjume , nuniagmin ataktú wi wantinkamtai waitkajum , atumi anentaiminish shiig aneasjum dakujustatjume , nu dakujutnak makichkish emegkatjamain ainatsui .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: “ Nunú tsawantaik makichkitigmesh inintsashtin ainagme . Dekas tajime : Mina pachittsajum mina Apag segamak , mina jintintaig asagmin ashí amastatjume .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Duwikik atumek minak eme anenjusjumek mina Apajuk segachuitjume . Tujash yamaik segatajum , mina Apag yaimpakui shiig aneasminjum .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: “ Yaunchkek atumnak augmatbaujai apattsan tuké jintinnujime . Tujash tsawan jegattawai , wi shiig paan mina Apajun pachisan ujaktatjim nunú .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Nunikmatai atumek tutupit mina pachittsajum Apag segatajum , wika atumi pachisnuk segatú pujugchattajime .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Apajuk tuké atumnak anempajume , atum mina anentu asagmin , nuigtushkam Apajuí dekas awemamuapita tujutjum duwi .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Wika Apagjai pujaun ju nugka juwig tauwaitjai , nunikun yamaik ju nugka junak ukuakun ataktú mina Apajuí wegajai . ”

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Tutai niina jintintaiji aidau chichajak : — Yamaik augmatbaujai apatka tutsuk shiig antumain tukagtiume .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Yamaik dekaji amek ashí dekame , nunin asam jutii anentaibaushkam shiig dekame , nuniau asam atsumatsme dita anentaibaujin tujuttinme tusamek . Nuaduí jutiik dekas Apajuiyap awemauwaita tuinaji , — tuidau .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Nuna tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Yamá dekaskeapi tujutjumek ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Tujash yamaik tsawantak jegae , atum makí makichik kanagjum shimakjum , imá minakeuch ukugkittajum nunú . Tujash imá wikik juwakchattajai , mina Apag wijaig pujawai .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Junak wika atumek wijai ijutkau batsatkujum , shiig agkan anentaimsajum pujusminjum tusan tajime . Ju nugka juwi pujusjumek kuashat waitiamu igkugtinaitjume , tujash nuniakjumesh minai kajintsá anentaimsatajum , ju nugka juwi iwanch pegkegchaun takamtikagtina nunak wi depetkajai .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Nuna ti idayak Jisus nayaimpinum pagkai : “ Apawah , minak tsawantak umintugkae . Minash ememattai etita aents aidaushkam : Dekas Apajuin Uchijimpapita , tusag dekajuatnume . Wishakam aminash dutiksanuk aents aidaunmash iwainaktajame , emematjamiagtinme tusan .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Ame minak ashí nugkanmaya aina nunak , nigki diistí tusam idaitugsaume , dutikakum senchigmishkam sujusmaume , mina nemagtin aidau ame sujusmauwa nunash pujut nagkanchaun susati tusam .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Nu pujut nagkanchauwa nunak , amina dekagmawag : Imá jukeapita dekas Apajuik , tujamainak , ame mina awetiuwaitam nunashkam : Dekas juwap uwemtikagtumainaita , tuidau jukiagtinai .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: “ Wika ju nugka juwi pujusnuk emematjame aminak , nuniakun ame umiktá tusam tujutiuwaitam nunash imatiksanuk takaakun dekamtikajai aents aidau emematjamtinme tusan .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Apawah , yamaik ame minash yaunchuk nugkash najannatsaig amijai emematjamin aajabia imanuk etita .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: “ Ame ju aents aidau etegjam sujusuitam nunak , wishakam amina pachisnuk shiig jintintuawagjai . Duka aminuk sujusuitme , dutikamu asag ditashkam chichamjumnak betek umigtamainawai .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Nunidau asag yamaik ashí wi takasbaug aina nunak shiig dekaawaje , dekas Apajuí dutikata tibaunak betekap takasé , tusag .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Aikasnuk ame mina chicham etsegtugkata tusam tujutbaunak imatiksanuk ujakagmajai , dutikam ditashkam wakejus antukagmae nuninak : Dekas Apajuí awemamuap tauwaita , tusag dekaskeapi tujutuinawai .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: “ Duwi ditanun pachisan segagme aminu asagmatai , tikich aents mina nemagtuinatsu nuna pachisnuk segatsjame .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ashí aents midau aina duka aminu ainawai , tujamtai aminu aidauk midau ainawai . Nunú aidau mina emematjuinawai , tikich aidaushkam Jisusa imanjin wainkatnume tusag .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: “ Wika aminí minau asan ju nugka juwig nuigtuk pujushtatjai , tujash jujú aidauk juwainawai . Apawah pegkegmah , amina senchijum sujusbauwai wi kuitamag aikasmek kuitamkata . Iina umigtamainak ii makichik anentaimag nunisag ditashkam anentaimtinme .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Wi ju nugka juwi ditajai pujaknuk , ame senchijum sujusbauwai ditanak kuitamnujai , makichkish emegkatkachjame , dutikamaitak makichik megkaekae , yaunchuk chicham agagbauwa nu uminu asamtai .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: “ Nunikmataish ditak shiig aneetnume , wi shiig aneag imanisajag tusan , eke anuí minitsuk segajame .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Amina chichamjumnashkam jintintuawagmajai , dutikai aents aidau ditanak kajejuinawai . Wi ju nugka juwiyachuitag ditash nuninuk asagmatai .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Nunú aents aidaujai ijunag batsamsainum ditash batsasta tusanuk segatsjame , iwanch waitkainakuish ayamjukta tusan segajame .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Wi ju nugkanmayachuitag nunisag ditashkam juwiyachu ainawai .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Amina chichamjum dekaskea nunak umigtamkatnume ditash pegkeemtikata .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Ditanak aents katsek aidau batsatbaunum ishimjai , chichamjumin jintinkagtuatnume tusan , ame mina awetiuwaitam dutiksanuk .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Wi amina takagkun mina pujutjunak ashí idaitusjame , nunisag ditashkam aminu dekaskea nuna takagtamainak , ashí ditá pujutjinak idaitugmastinme tusan wakegajai .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Imá jujú aidaunakek segatsjame , dita chicham etsejuinamun antuinak : Dekas nigkiap uwemtikagtumainaita , tusag nemagtukagtin aidaun pachisnushkam segajame .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Wi amijai ijutkau asamtai , ameshkam minai ijutkam nunisag , ditashkam pempentunisag ijutkau atinme , nuninak jutiijaish ijutkau asag makichik agtinme . Nuniagtai aents amina dekaskeapi tujamchau aidaush , ame mina awetiuwaitam nunash dekajuatnume , tusan segajame .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Dutiksanuk amina imanjum inagkeatjukiuwaitam nunak , imatiksanuk ditanashkam wisha inagkeatkijai , ii makichik duke anentaimag nunisajag , ditashkam nuninuk agtinme tau asan .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Wi ditajaig ajai , ame wijai ame , nunisag ditashkam makichkiuchia nunin agtinme . Nu dita nuninamun wainainak aents amina dakitjamin aidaush : Jisusnak dekas Apajuiyap awemauwaita , juna anea imatiksagkeap jutiinash anempaji , titinme .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: “ Apawah , ame sujusbau aina nunak mina pujutaijui ditash pujusag , nugkash najannatsaig ame mina anentujakú asam , amina imanjum ashí mina sujusum nunash wainkatin atinme tusan wakegajai .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Apag pegkegmah , aents amina dekaskeapi tus umigtamainachuk dekagmainatsui , tujash wika aminak wainjame , ju ame sujusbau aina jushakam ame mina awetiuwaitam nunak dekainawai .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Wi amina pachisnuk ditanak shiig dekamtikamjai , aan nagkaemasnush tuke dekamtiksanké atatjai , ame mina anentam aantsag ditaish atí , nuniakui jutiishkam ditajai ijutkau amí tau asan ” , Jisus tiuwai Apajin segaak .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Jisus nuna ti inagnak , niina jintintaiji aidaun yajuak jiinki entsa Cedrón tutai amain katigká , numi olivos tutai ajakbaunum jegantaju .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Judas Jisusan sujuktinchakam nunak shiig dekau , nui Jisus ditajai kuashtá ijunin asamtai .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Nunin asa Judas , kuashat suntag Romanmaya aidaun yajuak , nuigtú sacerdote apuji , fariseo aidau ditashkam , jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamin aidau ishiakbaujai , lamparan , nuigtú jii ekemajag , nagkin tinamdaekag , Jisusan kautuawajui .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Imaninaig Jisusak ni dutikam atinjinak shiig dekagmamu asa , paan ditá emtin wajantá : — ¿ Ya egagme ? — tiuwai .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Tuinam dita aiinak : — Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nu egainaji . Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Witjai nunak , — tumabiuwai . Judas Jisusan unupiagtatus wekagushkam , nui ditajai ijutkau asa ,

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Jisus : “ Witjai ” , tutai puyatkag wakettsag nugkaa kakekaju .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Nunikagmatai awentsag : — ¿ Ya egagme ? — tiuwai . Tutai dita aiinak : — Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nu egaji .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Tiagtai Jisus ayaak : — Yaunchuk witjai timajim jama , mina dekas achigkatasa egatkugmek , tikich aina juka idaisatajum , wetinme , — tiuwai .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Nunak Jisus Apajin segaak : “ Apawah , ame sujusbaunak makichkish emegkatkachjame ” tiuwa nu betek uminu asamtai tiuwai .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Nuna tusa taig Simón Pedro tutaiya nu , espada akachumamujin ukuini juwakug , dekas sumo sacerdote inake Malco daagtinun kuwishí untsujiya nuna asankauwai .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Dutiktai Jisus Pedron chichajak : — Espadajum jukim awajata , ¿ amek , mina Apag waittsati tujutbauwa nunak umimainchauk anentaimtujam ? — tiu .

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Nuna tusa taig suntag aidau , ditá capitanji , nuigtú jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamin aidaujai ijuntujag Jisusan achikag jigkajajui .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Dutikawag Anasa jeen ejegawajui Caifasa wegajin , nu mijantinig Caifás sumo sacerdote wajas pujau asamtai .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Nunú Caifás judío aidaun chichajak : “ Ashí aentsun ayamjuk uwemtijatnuk , dekas makichik aents mantamnamainai ” , tiuwa nunuwai .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Jisusan jukiag emagtai , Simón Pedro tutaya nu , tikich Jisusa jintintaijiya nujai ukunum pataesag weedau . Nunú tikich Jisusa jintintaijiya duka , sumo sacerdote waintai asa , Jisusan apú jeen awayagtai niishkam wayauwai .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Nunitai Pedrok agaag juwakui . Nunikmatai nu sacerdote waintaiji asa wayauwa nunú , waiti kuitamnun aujus Pedron awayauwai .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Nui Pedro waittaman , nuwa waiti kuitamin chichajak : — ¿ Amesh auna aentsun achikaja nuna jintintaijichukaitam ? — tusa iniau . Tama Pedro ayaak : — Atsa , wika auna jintintaijichuitjai , — tau .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Tsetsek asamtai , sacerdote apujin inake aidau , suntajá apuji aidaujai , jiin ikapajag anamainak ijunbaunum Pedroshkam nui jegan anamak wajau .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Nuniai sumo sacerdote Jisusan jegantun , niina jintintaiji aidaun pachis , nuigtú wají jintinkagtinume tusa iniau .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Tama Jisus aimak : — Wika ashí aents antuinamunum chichaujai . Tuke jintinkagtinujai jega ijuntainmash , jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaanush ashí judío aidau ijunainamunmash paan iwainakan chichaujai .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: ¿ Wagka minash ininjume ? Minak inintsuk dekas wi chichaamun antuku aina nu , wajina pachisaya jintinkagtinuwe tusajum iniastajum . Dita wi tibaugnak shiig dekainawai , — tiuwai .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Juna Jisus tutai , jega Apajuí emematku ijuntain kuitamin makichik juwatki yapinum awatak : — ¿ Amesh sumo sacerdotesh tu chichagkamum ? — tiuwai .

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Dutikam Jisus ayaak : — Wi pegkegchaun chichakmataig tujutta , wajina tija nunú . Wi pegkejan taja duwish ¿ wagka awatame ? — tiuwai .

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Nuna timatai Anás Jisusnak jigkagbautak awemauwai sumo sacerdote Caifás pujamunum .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Nuna dutikainai Pedroshkam jií anamak wajattaman : — ¿ Amesh juna aentsun achikaja auna jintintaijichukaitam ? — tuidau . Tama Pedro chichaak : — Atsa wichauwaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Tusa titatman sumo sacerdote inake , Pedro kuwishí asankauwa nuna patayí jegantun chichajak : — ¿ Wi amina Jisusjai numi olivos ajakbauwe nuwi niijai wajamin wainkamjamjama ? — tau .

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Nu tamashkam Pedrok ataktushkam aikasag : “ Wichauwaitjai ” , taig atash shinukuí .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Nunikmatai Caifasa jeenian Jisusa jukiag Romanmaya apu pujusá inamtaijin ejegawajui . Dutikawag pag levadurajai pachimtsuk inagkamu yutai Pascua tsawau asamtai , judío aidauk nuwig wayachajui : Pegkegchau utsumakaja Pascuatin yuwachajaig , tuidau asag .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Nunidau asagmatai Pilato jiinki wajan iniinak : — ¿ Jusha wajukamtaiya achikjumesh itagtuaugme ? — tiuwai .

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Tutai dita aiinak : — Pegkegchaun takachuitkuig jutika achikaik itagmaitsujime , — tuidau .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Tiagtai Pilato chichaak : — Untsu atum jukijum , atumi chicham umitaigminish wajuk aentsush suwimak susami tibauwaita dutiksagmek suwimkak susatajum , — tiuwai . Tuinam apu aidau chichainak : — Jutii judío aidautik numinum achinag mantamnati tuinaji , tujash makichik Romanmaya apukesh , atum dutikatajum tichamu asaja iik dutikmaitsuji , — tiajui .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Nunak Jisus yaunchuk chichaak , dutik mantuatin ainawai tibau uminu asamtai tiajui .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tiagmatai Pilato ataktú jega niina pujusá inamtaijin wakitki wayaa , Jisusa iniak : — ¿ Amekaitam judío aidau Apujim ? — tau .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — ¿ Dusha amek anentaimsamek inintam , atsa tikich mina pachitus tujabiagmataig tujutam ? — tiuwai .

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Tama Pilato ayaak : — Wika judiuchuitjai , ame pataim judío aina nunú , sacerdote apuji aidaujai achigmakag jujamkiag minai itagmawaje . ¿ Wají pegkegchauwa takasmaume juna jutijamawagtatkuish ? — tau .

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Mina inamtaijuk ju nugka juchauwai . Wi juwiya ataik , mina jintintaig aidau achikag judío apuji aidaunum sujukainum tusag ayamjutuinak maanimain ainawai , — tiuwai .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Tutai Pilato chichajak : — ¿ Untsu nuniakmek amek dekas Apuapitme ? — tau . Tama Jisus ayaak : — Ame tujutam duka dekaske . Wika ju nugka juwig chicham dekaskea nuna etsegkatasan tauwaitjai . Ashí aents chicham dekaskea nuna antukag umiina nu mina chichamjunak antugtuinawai , — tiuwai .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Nuna timatai Pilato : — ¿ Wajimpaya dekaskea dusha ? — tusa iniau . Nuna ti ukuak agaa jiinki , judío aidau ijuntatman chichajak : — Wika ju aents bakumamainjinak dekajuachjai .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tujash Pascua jegakuig , aents achikbau makichik jiiktá takugmin tuké jiinuweg dutiksag , atumi Apugminash ¿ jiiktí tusagmesh wakegagmek ? — tau .

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Nuna tutai ataktú ashí senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Aanka jiikipa , dekas Barrabás jiiktá ! — wajaidau . Duka Barrabasak kasa aajakuí .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Imatiagtai Pilato Jisusan suntag aidaun asutiatajum tusa inajui .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Dutikamtai suntag aidaushkam jagkin chapikmajag atsejutain najanawag atsemitkakag , jaanch yamakaitkaun anugjag ,

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: chichajuinak : — ¡ Juuwai judío aidaun Apujig , emematmi ! — awajuidau . Tuinakug yapinum awatuidau .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Dutikainai Pilatushkam ataktú jiintuki : — Wika ju aents bakumamainjinak makichkish dekajuachjai , tau .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Tusa Jisusan jagki atsejutai najana atsemitkakbaun , nuigtushkam jaanch yamakaitkau anugjamunak imatiksag jiikiuwai , dutika Pilato chichaak : — ¡ Juwi itanjai diistajum ! — tiuwai .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Nunik jiinkimtai wainkag , sacerdote apuji aidau , achijatin aidaujai ijunag senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Achigtá ! ¡ Achigtá ! — awajuidau . Imatiagtai Pilato ditan chichajak : — Imatjakjumek atum jukijum achigtajum . Wika ni pegkegchau takasbaujin mantamnamainjinak dekajuachjai , — tiuwai .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Tutaishkam apu aidauk : — Jutii chicham umiktin agagbauwa nu umiaku maumainaitji , wagki nigka , Apajuí Uchijiyaitjai tumamu asamtai , — wajaidau .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Nuna imatiagtai Pilatushkam nuní senchi ishamkagtukui .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Nunik jega niina pujusá inamtaijin ataktú wayaa Jisusan iniak : — ¿ Amesh tuwiyampaitpa ? — tau . Tamashkam Jisusak aikchau .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Ayaacham Pilato chichaak : — ¿ Wagka minash aigtsume ? ¿ Dekatsmek wiitagjama achigtajum takunush , akupkatajum tusanush tumainaitag duka ? — tiuwai .

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Tusa tama Jisus ayaak : — Mina Apag dutikata tujamchakuig , makichkish minak dutijumaitsume . Tujash mina aminí itajiaja nu ainawai dekas amina nagkaetamsag tunamaina duka , — tiuwai .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Nuna tutai Pilato Jisusan , utusanuk jiikiag tusa kakantu , nunitaishkam judío aidauk senchi untsumkag : — Ame aanú akupeakmek Roma apujiya nuna kumpajig achattame . Aanka Jisusak nigki apuitjai tumamá wekaenuwe , nunin asa Roma apujiya nunak shiwajiyai , — awajuidau .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Nunú tuinamun Pilato antuk , Jisus agaa jiiktajum tusa idayak , chicham dekaku ekeemtaijin ekeemsauwai hebreo chichamnum Gabata tutainum . “ Gabata ” tawa nunak “ kaya ukatkamu ” taku tawai .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Pascuatin yuwatnun uminainak batsatai , etsashkam tutupit wajasú asamtai , Pilato judío aidaun chichajak : — ¡ Pai , juwi atumí Apugminak itantajime ! — tau .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Tama senchi untsumkag : — ¡ Mantamnati ! ¡ Mantamnati ! ¡ Achigtá ! — wajagtai , Pilato chichajak : — ¿ Atumí Apugminash wagkanuk achigtaja ? — tiuwai . Nu tamashkam sacerdote apuji aiinak : — ¡ Aanka iina apujinchui , iina apujig Roma puja duke ! — tuidau .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Tiagtai Pilatushkam : — Achigtajum , — tusag ditai sujua idaisauwai , dutikamtai dita Jisusan jukiajui .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Dutikam Jisus ni achinjatnunak numi yapajiamun yanakí jiinkiu , nain “ buuk sakajua nuninai ” tutainum jegatatus . ( Duka hebreo chichamnumag Gólgota tawai . )

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Nui ejentag achijag , nuigtushkam jimag magkagtinun achijag , Jisusan ejapeawag awajawajui .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Dutikawagmatai Pilato Jisusa chaiken taapnanum : “ Jisus Nazaretnumia , judío aidau apuji ” , tusa agag adujtukui .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Duka hebreo chichamai , griego chichamaish , latín chichamaishkam agagbau aajakuí . Dutikamun Jisusak yaakat tikiju achigbau asamtai , kuashat judío aidau nui nagkaemaidauk nu agagbaun aujuidau .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Nu dutikamu asamtai , sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaujai Pilatun jegantag aujuinak : — ‘ Judío aidaun Apujiyai ’ tusam agajum auk aikatsuk , juka ‘ judío Apujiyaitjai tumamá wekaenuwe nuuwai ’ , tusam agagta — tiajui .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Nunú tuidaun Pilato chichajak : — Wi agagmag duka nunisag atatui , — tiuwai .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Suntag aidau Jisusan achijag , jaanchjin jujukiag ipaksumta imajin ichiajag makí makichik tinamdaekajui . Nuna dutikawag tikich dekas nugkutaiji ayatak yakiin nagkamsa apajá nugkaan ashimkamu asamtai ,

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: suntag aidau ditá ditak pempeentunikiag chichainak : — Dekas juka ichiagchagmi , yana kayajig jiinkit nunú dekas jukiti , — tiajui . Nuní uminkauwai , duwik agagbau chichaak : “ Mina jaanchjun , yana kayajig jiinkit nu jukitnai ” , timawa duka .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Jisusa dukují , niina kaijai , tikich María Cleofasa nuwe , nuigtú María Magdalanmaya aatus Jisus achigbaunum anijus ijunaidau .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Nuniagtatman Jisus dukujin wainak , ni jintintaiji dekas niina aneetaijiya nunashkam wainak chichajak : — Dukuwah , yamaik anuwai amina uchigmik , — tau .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Tusa idayak , duwi ni aneetaiji wajattaman : — Anuwai amina dukuk , — tiuwai . Nunú tima niina dekas aneetaijig Jisusa dukujinak juki jegá emauwai .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Nuna ti Jisus ashí ni dutikmainjinak umikú asa , duwik agagbau uminkati tus : — Kitamajai , — tiuwai .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Tutai buitsnum vino chujuau aimkam pujaunum esponja ajugká juki , numi hisopo kanawen ayai takuji aapawajui .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Dutikam Jisuschakam vino chujuaunak uwag chichaak : — ¡ Yamaik ashí umikjai ! — tusa tsuntsumá jakauwai .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Junak Pascua jegatsaig nuniku asamtai , apu judío aidau , aents achigbau aidauk achinjamutkek achagti , tusag dakitin asag , nunú tsawan ayamtaiya duka dekas puyatjusa diitai asamtai , Pilatun jegajiag chichajuinak : Suntag ishitkata aents achijam detaina nuna kagkajin kupijag , ashí kuwajag yajuaktinme , tiajui .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Tima niishkam suntagnak imatiksag ishitkauwai , dutikam suntagshakam dekatkau aents Jisusjai ayaumas achijam deta nuna kagkajiná kupigkajui , tikichnashkam dutiksag kupigkajui .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Nuna dutikawag Jisusan jegantun diikmag , jaka nematai , kupigtsuk idaisajui .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Dutikawaju ainaig makichik suntag nagkí Jisusan bijagnum iju ichigkuí . Dutikam numpa yumijai saekiuwai .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Wika nunak dekas wainkau asan etsegjai , wainkachbaugnak etsegtsujai . Wi wainai dutikawaju asagmatai , atumshakam shiig dekaatajum , nunikjum dekaskeap nunikuita timinjum tusan ujajime .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Nuna ukunchin kupigkachajua nunak , Apajuí etsegtin agagbaunum : “ Makichik ukunchinakesh kupigkachagtinai ” , tibauwa nunú uminkauwai .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Tikich Apajuí etsegtin agagbauwa nuwishkam : “ Ijumu wainkagtinaitjume ” , tawai .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Nuna dutikawagmatai , José yaakat Arimateanmaya , niishkam Jisusa jintintaiji asa , judío aidaun ishamau asa wakenmataik Pilatun jegají : Jisusa iyashin wi jukin ukustajai , tusa segauwai . Tama Pilatushkam : Jukita , tima José wejí Jisusa iyashin jukiuwai .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Nuna dutika ai , Nicodemo Jisusan kashi ausatatus jegajiuwa dushakam , treinta kilos kugkuin mirra , áloe tutaijai pachimjamun takus tauwai .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Nunikmatai Joseshkam nujai atuegak Jisusa iyashin jukiag , jaanch pegkeja jukiag kugkuin itanbauwai ukatuk pempeajag , judío wajuk ukumau ainawa dutiksag ukusajui .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Jisus achigbaunum ayaumas numi ajakbau aunum , aents ukustin waa taimu yamagmauch makichik aentskesh ukuschamunum ,

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: judío aidau ayamtaiji tsawan ashí jegau asamtai , Jisusa iyashinak jukiag ukusajui nu imá tikiju asamtai .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Tumig tsawagmatai kashikmas suwe aig , María Magdalanmaya Jisus ukusbaunum weuwai , nunik jegakmá Jisus ukusá kaya aputuka ukukbau ekekam atatman wainak ,

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: tupi tupikakua Simón Pedro tikich dekas Jisusa aneetaijiya nujai pujaun jegajuawag chichajuinak : — Iina Apujin ukusagma nunak jukiaje , tujash dekatsji tuwig ukusaje , — tusa ujakuí .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Tusa ujakajam Pedro tikich Jisusa jintintaijiya nujai ukusbaun diisagtatus wegajui .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Nunik mai tupikainayatak , tikich Pedro nagkaesau tupikau asa , niiyá eemak Jisus ukusbaunum jegantuí .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Nunik jegantá tekená diikmá imá sabananak wainkauwai , tujash nigka wayachui .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Nuniai Simón Pedro ukunum juwaku taankug , Jisus ukusbaun utuauwai , nunik diikmá imá sabanak atatman wainkauwai ,

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: nuigtushkam Jisusa buuké pempenjamuk dushá akanka shiig ninuja aipkimun wainkauwai .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Nunú niiyá tantauwa dushakam wayaa niish wainak : Dekaskeap nantakne , tiuwai .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Ditak Apajuí chichame agagbaunum : Jisusak maamash ataktú nantaktinai tibauwa nunak aneenachu , nunidau nuna wainkag shiig dekaawajui .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Nunikag Pedro , tikich Jisusa jintintai aajakua nujai ditá jeen wakitkiajui .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Nuninaig Maríak juwak Jisus ukusbau agaajin ayaumas buutú wajau . Buutkabaikia Jisus ukusbaun tekenas diikmá ,

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: jimag nayaimpinmaya aents pujun nugkuaju chaiknum makichik eketai , tikich dawenmanini ekeemtatman wainkauwai .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Nu nunik pekajaidau iniinak : — ¿ Wagka buutme ? Tama nuwa chichaak : — Wika mina Apujun jujutkiagmatai , tuwig ukusagmae nunash dekachu asan buutjai , — tiuwai .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Nuna tusa ayampakmá aents wajattaman wainkauwai , dutikash Jisusapi tusag tachau .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Nuniai nu aents iniak . — ¿ Wagka buutme ? ¿ Ya egame ? — tiuwai . Tama ni anentaimsag , ajak ajakbaun kuitamnuskaitai tau asa : — Ame Jisusa iyashí jukiuwaitkumek tuwí ukusmaume nu ujatkata , wi jukitjai , — tiuwai .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Tutai : — ¡ Maríah ! — tiu . Tama ayampatua diikmá Jisusan wainak hebreo chichamai : — Rabuni , — tiuwai . ( Nunak jintinkagtinú taku tiuwai . )

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Nuna takug achikta tama Jisus chichajak : — Achigkaipa , eke mina Apajuí waatsjai . Wetá nunikam mina dekaskeapi tujutin agma nu , yamaik iina Apají pujamunum wegajai tujamae tusam ujaktá , — tiuwai .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Nu tima María Magdalanmaya dushakam , Jisusa jintintaiji aidau batsatbaunum jegaa : Wi dekas Apunak wainkamjai , nuniai juna akatugmae , tusa ujakajui .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Nunú tsawantin kintabaunum , Jisusa jintintaiji aidaushkam , judío apuji aidaun ishamainak , waitin shiig epediag ijunag batsatainai , pachiachmau Jisus ejapena wajantá ditan kumpamak : — Apajuí atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme , — tiuwai .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Nuna tusa uwejen achigbaun , bijagnum nagkí ijumunashkam iwaintukui . Nunitai Jisusa jintintai aidaushkam Jisusan wainkag shiig aneasajui .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Nuna dutika iwaintuk Jisus ataktú chichajuinak : — Apajuí atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme . Mina Apag juwi awetiuwa dutiksanuk atumnashkam uwemat pachisjum etsegkatajum tusan awemajime , — tiuwai .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Nuna takug ditainini suut umpuinui , dutikak : — Yamaik Wakaní Pegkeji jukittajume .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Atum ju nugka juwi tsagkujashbauk , nayaimpinmashkam tsagkugnagchatnai . Untsu atum ju nugka juwish tsagkujamuk nayaimpinmashkam tsagkugnagtinai , — tiuwai .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Nuwi Jisus wayaunak , Tomás Jimagmamu tutaya duka atsau asa wainkachui .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Nuniku asamtai wainkau aidau : — Apu wainkamji , — tusag ujaidau . Tama Tomás chichaak : — Wika Jisusa uwejen clavo akaetukbaun wainkan , nuigtushkam bijajin nagkí ijuagmaya nunash inujuan dekapsan , dekaskeap nantakne tumainaitjai , — tiuwai .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ocho tsawan asag ashí Jisusa jintintaiji aidauk ijunjajui , nuwig Tomaschakam pujau . Waitinak shiig epenag batsataig ataktú Jisus ejapeen wajantá kumpamak : — Apajuí atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme , — tiuwai .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Nuna tusa Tomasan chichajak : — Tsajam uwegmin mina uweg inuata dutikakum shiig diistá , juwi tantam bijajushkam inuata . ¡ Utujimá pujutsuk , dekaskeapi tujutta ! — tiuwai .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Tama Tomás ayaak : — Mina Apujuh , amek mina Apajuijuitme , — tiu .
