text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Tomasah , yamai mina waitkaum duwi dekaskeapi tujutme . ¡ Mina waittsuk dekaskeapi tujutuina nu imá shiig aneasagtinai ! — tiuwai .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Jisus aents aidau dutikmainchaun ashí iwainag niina jintintaiji aidaush wainainamunum takasua duka , ashí ju papinumag agagchamui .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Nuniaig juka : Atumesh Jisusak , Kristu , Apajuí Uchijimpapita , tusajum dekaskeapita takujum , pujut tuke atina nu jukimnujum , tusan agatjime .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Nunik tikich tsawantai ataktú Jisus kucha Tiberias tutai tugkitken batsatun wantintukui . Junak juní dutikauwai .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simón Pedro , Tomás Jimagmamu tutai , Natanael Caná Galilea awa nuwiya , Zebedeo uchijí aidau , nuigtú jimag Jisusa jintintaiji aidau batsataidau .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Nuninamunum Simón Pedro chichaak : — Namakan maatjai , — tau . Tutai , tikich aidaushkam : — Iinum wegagmi , — tusag botenum chimpimjag shiyakaju , nunikag aju ajuntuinakua tsawampainakush makichkish maachajui .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Nunikag yamá tsawaig , Jisus kuchanum uwetus wajau , nunittaman niina jintintaiji aidau wainainakush , Jisusap wajawa tichajui .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Nuniai Jisus : — Uchig aidauh , ¿ makichik namakkesh maachugmek ? — tiuwai . Tama dita aiinak : — Atsá maachji , — tiajui .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Tiagtai Jisus chichaak : — Retjum untsugnumanini ajugtajum dutikakjum namak achiktatjume , — tuinam dutiksag ajugkag kuashat namak chimpimkamtai jiiktakamag tujinkajui .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Nunikmatai Jisusan dekas aneetaijiya nunú Pedron chichajak : — ¡ Auk Apu Jisusai ! — tiuwai . Tabaun Pedro antamuik kutugjin nugkujá namaká tseke iyagkuí .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Nuniai tikich aidauk botenum minidau , retnum namak chimpimkaun japisag , anumkatnuk cien metros au asamtai .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Kukag jiinkamag jii ikapagbaunum makichik namak , pagjai jiyamun wainkajui .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Dutikainai Jisus chichaak : — Namak achikujum aanú wajumak itatajum , — tiuwai .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Tutai Simón Pedro namak muun aidau ciento cincuenta y tres retnum chimpimkaun , botenum egkemtug japikí kukag jiikí , wajumak juki ejeetuauwai . Imaan chimpimkash rednak ichiagchauwai .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Nunik ashí uminkamtai Jisus chichaak : — Tantajum yujumak yuwatajum , — tiuwai . Nuna tutaish makichkish : Amesh yaitpa , tusagkesh iniaschajui , juka Jisusapita tuidau asag .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Nuna ti kaunkamtai Jisus jegantá , pagkan juki tinamak , namakan jukishkam dutiksag tinamkauwai .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Junak Jisusak maamu nantakí kampatuma juwi niina jintintaiji aidaun wantintukui .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Yujumak yuwá nagkankamunum Jisus Simón Pedron iniak : — Simón Jonasa uchijiyah , ¿ minash jujú anentuina juní nagkaemasmek anentam ? — tiuwai . Tama Pedro ayaak : — Ehé Apuh , ame wi aneajam duka dekagtame . Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Mina aentsug aidau uwijá uchuchiji kuitamtaya numamtuk kuitamjutkata , — tau .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Tusa ataktú iniak : — Simón Jonasa uchijiyah , ¿ minash anenmek ? — tau . Tama Pedro ayaak : — Ehé Apuh , amek dekagtame wi aneajam duka , — tiuwai . Tutai Jisus chichajak : — Nuniakmek mina nemagtin uwija numamtin aina nunú shiig jintintuata .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Tusa kampatuma juna iniak : — Simón , Jonasa uchijiyah , ¿ minash anenmek ? — tau . Tama Pedro wake besekú , kampatuma juwishkam : Minash anenmek , tabau asa , nunik Pedro ayaak : — Apuh , ame ashí dekagtame wi dekaskenum aneajam duka . Tutai : — Untsu ame mina nemagtuina nunú uwig kuitamtayama numamtuk kuitamjutkata .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Dekas tajame , ame datsauch asamek , amek nugkujam ame wakegamunum wejakuitme . Tujash wi tajame , ame muuntuch wajasaminig , tikich aidau kuntujum awentamin anugtamjag , ame weta tachamunmag jujamkiag etabiagtinai , — tiuwai .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Nunak Pedro wajuk maam atinaita nuna ujaak tiuwai . Nuna ti : — ¡ Nemagtukta ! — tiuwai .

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Tima Pedro ayampá niimkamá Jisusa dekas aneetaiji , duwik tikich tsawantai yujumak yuwamunum niiní ayaumas wajas : Apuh , yaita amina sujupaktinush , tusa iniasua nu minittaman wainak :

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: — Apuh , ¿ tujash jusha wajukatnaita ? — tau .

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Wi wakegaknuk nigka iwaakuk pujaig taatin atajai tumainaitjai . ¿ Amesh dusha wagka uyumame ? Duka tutsuk amek minak nemagtukta , — tiu .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Nunú tabaun tikich Jisusa jintintaiji aidau antukajui . “ Dekas jakashtinai tawapita ” tuidau . Tujash Jisusak : “ Juka jakashtinai ” , tusag tichauwai . “ Wi wakegaknuk nigka iwaakuk pujaig taatin atajai tumainaitjai , ¿ Amesh dusha wagka uyumame ? ” tiuwai .

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Junak Jisusa dekas jintintaiji aajakua nunú , ashí ni wainkamujinak , jintiamujinashkam dekaske tusa agajui . Dutikamu asamtai dekaskeapi tuinaji .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Jisus takasbauwa duka shiig kuashtai , nunú makí makichik pachisa agamak , ju nugka juwig ayatak papikes piyakaintai . Aatus atí .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Mina anetaiju Teofiloh , wi yama nagkamchakun papiin agajan awetibiajam nunak , Jisus nagkamchak ashí takasbauji , jintinkagtuamujinashkam ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: ni nayaimpinum wegak takuniuwa nuna pachisan agatjabiajame . Eke nayaimpinum wetsuk , ni : Mina chichameg etsegtugkatajum tusa ishiaktinji etegjamu aidaun jintintuauwai , jutika takastajum tusa , Wakaní Pegkeji dutikata tabau asa .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Waitkasa maam nantakí , ni chichame etsegkatin aidau etegjamua nuna , cuarenta tsawantai paan kuashtá wantintukui , dekas iwakuapi tujuttinme tusa . Nuniak Apajuí inabaujin pachis jintintuauwai .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Nui ditajai ijunag pujusá , Jisus ni etejamuji aina nuna chichajak : — Jerusalegnum dakastajum , mina Apag Wakaní Pegkejin amastajime tusa anagtamamun ujakmajim nunú umintsaigkik wegpajum .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Juagkak yumiik yamijatjauwai , tujash atumek dukap tsawan atsuk Wakaní Pegkejiya nujai yamigbau atatjume , — tiuwai .

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Tutai ni jintintaiji aidau iniinak : — ¿ Apuh , yamaikik jutii apuji wajasam , yaunchuk agkan batsamiag nuninuk ekagtittam ? — tuidau .

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Tama Jisus ayaak : — Mina Apajua duke tu tsawantinia dutikatnaita nuna umikua duka , atumek dekamaitsugme .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Ni Wakaní Pegkejin sujamsatta nuna senchijí jukijum , mina pachittsajum juwi Jerusalegnum , Judeanum , Samarianmashkam , ashí tikich nugka atushat aina nuwishkam etsegkattajume , — tiuwai .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Nuna tutai ditash dii ijunaig takuniuwai , nuniaig yujagkim ijikuí . Nunikmatai awenag wainkachajui .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Nunik Jisus nayaimpinum wetai pagkai dii ijunai , jimag aents pujun nugkuaju ditai ayaumas wajaantaju ,

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: nunikag ditan chichajuinak : — Galileanmaya aents aidauh , ¿ wagka nayaimpish diish ijunjume ? Yamai Jisus nayaimpinum wegak takuniu wainkaujum junisag ataktush minitnai , — tiaju .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Nunú tusá tiajam Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etejamu aidauk , Olivosa mujajin batsatu Jerusalén wakitkiajui , tsawan ayamtai tsawagmataig tikijuk wekaenasti , tibau asamtai .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Yaaktanum jegawag jega yakí tesamunum wakaju nui batsataidau asag , nuna daajig ju ainawai : Pedro , Juan , Jacobo , Andrés , Felipe , Tomás , Bartolomé , Mateo , Jacobo Alfeo uchijiya nunú , Simón Zelote tutai , Judas Jacobo uchijiya nunú .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Ashí nunú aidauk kashí kashinig makichik anentaiyaik ijunas Apajuin aujuinak ijunaidau , Jisusa yachi aidaujai , María Jisusa dukujiya nu , nuigtú tikich nuwa aidaushkam .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Nunú tsawantin ciento veinte ijunjajui Jisusa nemajin aidau , nunikbaunum Pedro wajakí chichaak :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: Yatsug aidauh , David Wakaní Pegkeji dekamtikam agak : Judas Jisusan achiktinme tusa unupiagtinun pachis tibauwa duka uminkae .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Judasak jutiijai ijunag wekagas niishkam jutii takaag jutiksag takaajakuí .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: ( Nuninaitak Jisusan sujak kuichik jukimui nugkan sumaku ainawai , tujash nigka kajeemag tsujimak achapai iyaak pujaká ampujin jiijá jakauwai .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Nunik jakamtai Jerusalegnumia aents aidau antukag , nunú nugkan Acéldama adaikajui ditá chichamen . Junak “ nugka numpeagbau ” taku tiajui . )

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Nuna nunikua nunak , yaunchuk David Salmosnum agak : “ Niina jeeg ukumkimu atatui , makichik aentskesh nuwig pujuschatnai niina takatjinak tikich takastinai ” , tiuwa nunú uminkae .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: “ Nunin asamtai Jisus jutiijai pujusmatai tuke ijunag yujasajua nu jutiijai batsatainawai .

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: Duka Juan Jisusan yamijua duwi nagkamas , tuke Jisusjai wekagas , nayaimpinum wegaunash wainkauwa nuwiya amainai . Nunin asa imá shiig Jisus nantakbaun pachisash jutiijai betekak shiig etsegmainai . ”

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Pedro tutai , jimag aentsun ju atí tiaju , José daagtin Barsabás tuuta , Justo tuuta awagmatia nuna , tikichin Matiasan .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Nuna tiagmatai Apajuin aujuinak : “ Apuh , amek ashí aentsú anentaimtajig dekauwaitam ibau asam , ju jimaja juiyash yaita ame etegkamush , nunú iwainakta juuwai tusam ,

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: niishkam ame chichamjum etsejuinag juna uyumakti , Judas ni tudau takaamujin waittsatnujiya nuwi wegak ukukí nuna takastí tusam ” , tiajui .

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Tusa Apajuin segag , José kayajin , Matiasa kayajijai egkea pegajajui , dutikamunum Matiasan kayají jiinkiuwai ; nunikmatai , Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa ishiaktinji etegjamu once juwakua nuanuí Matiasan pachiawajui .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Tsawan jista Pentecostés tutai tsawagmatai , ashí Jisusa nemajin aidauk dita tuke ijuntaijin jeganum ijunjajui .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Nunik nui ijunai , dase minak wajukea imatuk nayaimpinmaya senchi uutun , ashí nu jeganum batsatuk antukajui .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Nu imatbaunmaya jiiya numamtin , ashí aents nui ijununak makí makichik buuken pekaamtujui .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Nunikmatai Wakaní Pegkejishkam ashí aentsun egkemtujajui , dutika Wakaní Pegkeji chichamtikam tikich chichaman chichaidau .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Nunú tsawantinig Judío Apajuinun puyatjus umin aidau , tikich nugkanum batsamin aidaushkam Jerusalén jista asamtai ijunjajui .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Nunú imatuk uutbaun antukag kuashat aents aidau ijunjaju , nunikmag makí makichik ditá chichamen chichaidaun antukag puyatkajui .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Nunikag puyatkag ditak pempentunisag : — ¿ Ju aents aina jujú Galileanmaya ainatsuak ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: ¿ Nuninaitkujash utusaya imatiksash ii chichamenash chichainawa ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Juwig ijunjaje : Partianmaya , Medianmaya , Elamnumia , Mesopotamianmaya , Judeanmaya , Capadocianmaya , Pontonmaya , Asianmaya ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Frigianmaya , Panfilianmaya , Egiptunmaya , juka ditak nugka Libia tutaya nuwiya , Cirene tutaiya nuna nagkaikiag atushat batsamin ainawai . Tuja Roma batsatushkam ,

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: wajumak judío aidau , nuigtú tikich ayatak judío atajai tumabiag judío waigkú aidaujai kaunkaje . Tuja Cretanmaya aidaushkam , Arabianmaya aidaujai kaunkaje . ¡ Jutiishkam ashí iina chichamen Apajuí imanjin pachis etsejuina duka shiig antuinaji ! — tudayinau .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Nuna tusag ashí aents aidauk senchi puyatkag : — ¿ Wajukaya junash juninawa ? — tudayinau .

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Juna aatus tuinai , tikich aidauk tuke aneas dushikinak : — Nampejajama , — tuidau .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Tusa tiagtai Pedro ditá kumpají aidaujai ijunag eketu wajakí senchi chichaká : “ Mina pataag judío aidauwah , ashí Jerusalén batsamin aidauwah , jujú shiig antuktajum wi titatjim nu .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Atum nampejaje tukagtajum duka nuninchauwai , kashikiajamah .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Ii juniag juka duwik Apajuí etsegtin Joel nuniktinai tibauwa nu uminkui juniaji , duka :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: ‘ Ashí aents aidaunak , tsawan inagnamunum Wakaní Pegkejin susatnaitjai . Dutikamu asag ditá uchijí aidau , nawanji aidaushkam mina pachittsag etsejiagtinai . Datsauch aidaunak paantak iwaintakun , muuntuch aidaun kajanum iwaintuktinaitjai .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Wakaní Pegkejiya nunak , aishmag mina nemagtuidaun , nuwa aidaujaí betek amastinuitjime . Dutikawajam duwi mina pachittsagmek etsegtugtinuitjume .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Nayaimpinmaya ishamain aidaun iwaintuktinuitjime . Nugkaashkam duwikish wainkashbaun iwaintuktinuitjime numpan , jiin , nugkanum senchi bukuitamun .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Etsag etsanjashtinai , nantushkam numpa kapantuwa iman wajastinai , eke Apu Apajuí minitin tsawan iman atina nu jegatsaig .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ashí aents Apu Apajuin segauk uwemjagtinai ’ , tawai .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: “ Israel aents aidautigmesh wi chichaakui antuktajum : Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nuna Apajuí niina senchijin susauwai , dutikam aents dutikmainchaun atumin iwaintugmakajui , dekaskeapi tujuttinme tau asa , duka atumek shiig dekagme .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Tujash Apajuí yaunchuk nunikti tiu asamtai , atum achikjum aents pegkegchau aidaunum sujukuitjume , dita numinum achijag maatnume , tusajum .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Tujash Apajuí ataktú inankiuwai ni jaak najaimak waittsamujiya nuna agkanmitka , dutikamu asa jaamua duka Jisusnak depetkachui .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: “ Davidchakam Jisusan pachis agajui : ‘ Wainbaijai mina Apujuk tuke wijai pujaun , mina untsujuinini , makichkish ishamain ajiní tujutu asa .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Nuaduí mina anentaijuish shiig aneajai nuniakun shiig aneasan kantamjai , jakanush nantaktinapitja tau asan .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Apajuiyah , mina wakanjuk ukumatainmagkek amek idaitugsashtatme . Tuja amina inakem pegkegma duka kaugtí tusamkesh idaisashtatme .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Ame inaktugsauwaitme jinta pujutnum ekagta nunú . Dutijuam amek minai pujau asam , minashkam shiig aneemtijusuitme . ’

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: “ Yatsug aidauh , shiig dekaji jutii aidautik iina muunji David aajakua nu jakamtai ukusbauwa duka . Nu ukusbauk yamaikishkam awai .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Tujash Davitak Apajuin etsegtin asa dekaajakuí , Apajuí chicham yapajimainchaun anagkuak , ni wegantunum makichik akiinatna nu Apu atinai tusa .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Nuna aatus ujaam dekau asa , Kristu maawagmatai , Apajuí ukusbaunmag idaitsuk , inankimu asa kaugchatnunashkam nuniktinai tusa etsejujakuí .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Nunú Jisusan Apajuí inankiuwa duka , jutii ashí wainkau asaja etsegtuinaji .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Dutikam nantakí niina Apají inamtaijin untsujin ekeemsauwai . Nunik Apajuí Wakaní Pegkejin amastinaitjime tusa anagkagtuauwa nuna awetugmamu minamu antukugme , waintash yamai wainjum nuuwai .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Nayaimpinum wakauwa duka Davidchauwai , nigki juna agak : ‘ Apu mina Apujun chichajak , ekeemsata mina untsujuí ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: nunikamin wi amina shiwajum aidaunak amina dawemin ikautkatjame , dutikamtai ame wajuk dutikattame nu dutikamnum ’ , tiuwai .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: “ Duka ashí Israel aents aidautik shiig dekamain ainaji , nunú Jisus atum achigjum mauwaitjum nuna , Apajuí atumi Apujum ema ni Uwemtikagtin atí tusa etegkauwai . ”

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Nunú tabaun antukag puyatuk kuashat wake besemag anentaimjag , Pedron , nuigtú tikich aidau Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegkamu aina nuna iniinak : — Yatsug aidauh , ¿ tujash jutiish wajukmainaitji ? — tuidau .

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Tiagtai Pedro ayaak : — Tudau takat idaikujum pujutjum yapajiatajum , nunikjum makí makichik Jisukristu daajin yamimagtajum . Nuniagmin Apajuí tudaugmin tsagkugtamjag , Wakaní Pegkejinash amastinme .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Apajuí anagkagtuamun Joel tiuwa duka atumdau , atumi uchijum aina nudaun , nuigtushkam ashí nugkanum atushat batsataina nudaunush atinun tiuwai . Nunak iina Apuji iina Apajuijiya nu aents aidaun midau atinme tusa untsuktin asa , tiuwai .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Nuna ti , tikichnashkam kuashat chichaman aents aidaun tiuwai : — Aents pegkegchau takaina duka atumek uwemtugtajum .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Tusa Pedro tabaun antukag dekaskeap tawa tuidauk , kuashat aents yamimakajui . Nunú tsawantinig Jisusan dekaskeapi tuidauk tres mil aents kawegkajui .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegjamu aidau jintintuamun betek umiinak , shiig ijuntsag pempentunisag yainidau dita ajuinamujijai . Nuninak Apajuin aujuinak ijunjag , Jisus minak anentaimjuttsajum pag yuwatajum tibauwa dutiksag yuwidau .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegjamu aidau , aents dutikmainchaun kuashat iwainaja takaamun wainkag puyatjusag diidau .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Nuninak Jisusan dekaskeapi tusag nemajuidauk shiig ijuntsag batsataidau , nuninak ashí ditá wajiiji ajuinamujai atsubiagtaik iikdaisag sudayidau .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Nunidau asag , ditá wajiijin sujukag , nugkenashkam sujuk , makí makichik atsumainamun diis kuichkin akandayidau .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Kashí kashinig jega Apajuí ememattainum ijuntsagké aidau , nuninak Jisus mina anentaimjuttsajum pag yuwatajum , tibauwa nuna ditá jeen ijunjag shiig anendaisag dakujusag yuwinak ,

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Apajuin emematuidau . Imadiagtai ashí aents aidaushkam wakejus diinau . Nunidau asagmatai Apajuishkam kashí kashinig aentsun uwemtikak ikaweau .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Makichik tsawantin Pedro , Juagjai jega Apajuí ememattainum wegajui etsa dukap tegau ai , Apajuí aujku ijuntai jegau asamtai .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Nunú jega Apajuí ememattaiya nuna waitiji daajig Shiijam tutai aajakuí , nunú waitinum aents shutú akiinkush nuninuk akiinau asamtai , kashí kashinig waitinum itan apujin asa apukiuwai , aents wainiagtai kuichkin segamtí tusag .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Nunin asa , Pedro Juagjai jega Apajuí ememattainum wayattak minittaman wainak : — Wait aneasam kuichik sujustá , — tusa segau .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Tama Pedro Juagjai wainkag : — Diijattsakiah , — tiu .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Tama shutuuk sujustatkumpap tujutua tusa dakau .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Nunitai Pedro chichajak : — Kuichkik atsugtawai , oroshkam atsugtawai , tujash mina ajuta nuna amastajame . Jisukristu Nazaretnumiaya nuna daajin tajame : ¡ Wajakim wekaesata !

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Nuna takug uwejé untsujin achiká awajkiu . Dutikamuik nawe , wanuseshkam pegkeg wajasú .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Nunikmatai tseke wajakí wekagu , nunik ditajai ijunag jega Apajuí ememattainum nigki wekagas tsekeas dekapki , Apajuí emematki wayau .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Nunik wekagas Apajuí emematun ashí aents wainaidauk ,

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: jega Apajuí ememattai waitiji Shiijam tutainum ekeemas segamá ekeemnuwe dukeapi , tusag puyatjuk ishamkag diidau , wajukag ankae tusag .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Pedro , Juagjai shutú etsagagbauwa duka ditanak akupeachu . Nuniai ashí aents aidauk nuna antukag , pisajag Salomón waiti ujagbau tutainum pujuttaman jegaantag , ijuuntug puyatjuk diidau .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Imatikainam Pedro aents aidaun chichajak : “ Israel aents aidauwah , ¿ wagka imanikjumesh puyatkaugme ? ¿ Wagka imanikjumesh diijatjume ? Iina senchijinkish juka etsagagchaji . Jutii imá pegkeg asajaikish juka aikatsji .

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Junak iina muunji Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aina nuna Apajuijiya nunú , mina Uchijun Jisusan ememattinme tusa jutikae . Atum achiká sujukagminish Pilatok akupkata taig atum dakitjauwaitjum nuna .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Aents pegkejam , pegkegchau takachu ayamjutsuk , aents pegkegchau magkagtin ayamjakjum jiikiuwaitjume .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Nu dutikakjum Jisus dekas pujutan sukagtina nunú mauwaitjume . Tujash Apajuí inankiuwai , duka jutiik ashí shiig dekainaji , wainkaju asaja .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Atum jujú tsagaju wainjum juka , Jisusai kajinas anentaimu asa tsagaje . Jisusai kajinas anentaimak tsagaja juka ashí atumshakam wainjume .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: “ Mina yatsug Israel wegantu aidauh , wika shiig dekajai , atum atumí apujum aidaujai , Jisus mauwaitjum duka dekachu asajum mau ainagme .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Jisusan dutikawajua nunak , duwik Apajuí etsegtin aidau : ‘ Uwemtikagtin atí tusa etegkamua nunak maawagtin ainawai ’ , timawa nunú imatiksagmek umikugme .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Nuniku akugmesh yamaik tudau takat idaikujum pujutjum yapajiatajum , Apajuí atumi tudaugminash esaktugmag ichichmamtan amastinme .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Tuja Apajuí atumi uwemtijamjatnun Kristun , yaunchuk etegkauwa nuna ataktú awetugmatnume .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Tujash yamaikik Jisukristuk nayaimpinmag pujuttawai , ashí wají aidau yamagmitkamu tsawan jegatnun , Apajuí etsegtin aajakaju etsegkaju aina nu jegatí tusa .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Moiseschakam ii muunjin chichajak : ‘ Apu Apajuí makichik aentsun jutii wegantunmayan mina chichamjun etsegtujin atí tusa etejatnai mina utugtukua dutiksag , nunú antugkatajum .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Tuja ashí aents nunú Apajuí etsegtina nuna chichamen antugkachajuk tuke megkaekagtinai , niina aentsji aidaujaish ijunjachagtinai ’ , tiuwai .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: “ Tikich Apajuin etsegtin Samuelash aikasag tiuwai ; tuja nuigtú tikich Apajuí etsegtin aidaushkam Jisusan pachisag aikasajag ni taatnujinak tiajui .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Apajuí niina etsegtin aidaun anagkuauwa duka atumdauwai tuja jutii muunji aajakajua nujai chichaman apakua dushakam atumdauwai . Nuna tiuwa nunak juna Abragkan tiuwai . ‘ Amina tijajum wegantunmaya makichik akiinatna nuaduí ashí nugkanmaya aidauk pegkegnum yumigsamu agtinai ’ tiuwai .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Apajuí ni Uchijin maawagmatai inanki dekatkauk atumná awetugmae , mina Uchig yaigtinme dutikam makí makichik tudaujin idaisatnume tujamu asa . ”

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Pedro Juagjai aents aidaun aujak chichaa wajai , sacerdote aidau , jega Apajuí ememattaiya nuna kuitamnun apuji , saduceo aidaujai kautkaju .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Nunikag Pedro Juagjai aentsun jintintak : Jakau aidau nantagtinnak , Jisus maam nantaak iwainak ukukni , tuidau asagmatai kajekaju .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Nunik achiká jukiag aents achiká egketainum egkeawag ukukiaju etsa akagu asamtai , kashin dekajuami tusag .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Tujash kuashat chicham etsegbaun antukaju dekaskeapi tuidauk , imá aishmagkuk dekapam cinco mil aents wajasajui .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Kashinia duwi Jerusalén ijunjaju judío apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaushkam , nuigtú chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaujai .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Nuanuí pujau sumo sacerdote Anás , tuja nuwig pujuidau Caifás , Juan , Alejandro , nuigtú tikich sacerdote aidau , sumo sacerdote patayí aidaushkam .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Nunikag , Pedron Juagjai itantagmatai ejapeen awaantag iniinak : — ¿ Yana senchijinia jusha , yana daajinia jutikagme ? — tuidau .

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Tama Pedro Wakaní Pegkeji chichamtikam chichaak : — Yaakta apuji , Israel aents aidaun apuji aidautigmeshkam antuktajum :

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: Atumek aents jau pegkegnum yaigkag nu pachisjum iniimjume , junash utugkag etsagaje tusajum shiig dekaata tusajum .

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: Nunin asamtai ujaktajime shiig dekaatajum , ashí Israel aents aidaush dekaatnume , ju aents ashí wainjum juka , Jisukristu Nazaretnumia atum achigjum maawagmin Apajuí inankiuwa nuna daajin tsagaje .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: “ Nunú Jisus atum aidautijum , aents jegá jegamin aidau kayan dakitug idayin aina dutikajum idaisauwaitjume . Tujash yamaik kaya dekas jegá ichichkatin apututia iman wajasé .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Tikichik iina uwemtijamainuk atsawai , ashí nugka aina nuwiyagkesh Apajuí juna nemajuinak uwemjatnume tusa awemamuk tikichik atsawai ” , tiuwai .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Pedro Juagjai ajankas chichaagtai apu aidau wainkag , papiinash ausachu unuimagchau aina nuninaitkush itugsaya imatikash chichainawa tusag anentai jegagchaju , nunikag dekas Jisusa jintintaimpap ainawa , tusag dekaawaju .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Aents tsagajush nuwig wajaun wainaidau asag , aikag nuní atsu jama tusag tumain dekapenachu .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Nunidau asag agaa jiijaju , nunikag juwakag ditá ditak ijunag chichainak :

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: — ¿ Au aents aina dusha utugkagtatji ? Aentskesh dutikmainchaun aikawaja nunak ashí Jerusalegnumia aidauk wainkajajama . Imatikawaju asagmatai waitai tusaikish tumaitsuji .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Tujash nuna pachis augmatiagtai tikich aidau Jisusan dekaskeapi tiinum tau asa : ‘ Yamai nagkamsagmek Jisus pachisjumek makichik aentskesh ujakaigpajum , nu idaichakjuminig suwimkan amastatjime ’ timí , — tuidau .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Tusag Pedron Juagjai untsukag : — Yamai nagkamsagmek Jisusa daaji pachisjumek makichik aentskesh jintintuawaigpajum , — tiaju .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Tama dita aimainak : — Atumesh anentaimsatajum ¿ Apajuí emtinish pegkegkai ni umigmaina nu idaiku atum umigmaina dusha ?

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Jutiik ii wainkamu antukbau aina duka tutsukek idaimaitsuji , — tuidau .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Tiagtai apu aidau : — Atum nu idaichakjuminig suwimkan amastatjime tusag awemaju , suwimak jumainnak waitkachaju asag . Nuigtú aents aidaush nunú dutikamun wainkag , Apajuin emematuidau asagmatai .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Makichkish tsagaumainchau aig etsagagbauwa duka cuarenta mijan tumain ajujakuí .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Pedron Juagjai jiikí awemajui , dutikam Jisusa nemajin aidau batsatbaunum jegawag , sacerdote apuji aidau , tikich apu aidaujai tiagbaunak aatus tujabiagmae tusag ashí ujaidau .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Tusa ujainam antukag ashí ijunag Apajuin aujuinak : “ Apuh , ametme nayaim , nugka , nayants aina nu najankam ashí nui batsamsatin najankaumek ,

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: amina inakem David jutii muunji aajakua nunú Wakaní Pegkeji chichamtikam : ‘ ¿ Wagka aents aidaush pampainawa ? ¿ Wagka shiig anentaimtsukesh chichamnash najanainawa ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Nugkanmaya apu aidau nuigtú yaakta apuji aidaushkam ijunjag , Apun kajejuinak ni etegka Apu ema Uwemtikagtin emauwa nunash kajejiagtinai . ’

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: “ Tibau asamtai , Herodes Poncio Pilatojai jujú yaaktanum ashí Israel aents aidau , judiuchu aidaujai ijunjag , amina Uchijum Jisus pegkejam etegkam awemauwaitam nuna kajejuinak ,

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: ame yaunchuk nuniktin atí tibauwa dutiksag umikaje .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Apuh , ameshkam dekame amina inakem aidaun awantuina duka . Dutikau asam senchijum susata , ditash ishamkagtutsuk chichamjumin etsegkatnume ,

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: nuninak jau aidaunash ame senchigmin etsagainak , ame Uchijum Jisusa daajin aents dutikmainchaunash iwainatnume , tusam . ”

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Nuna tusa Apajuin aujus nagkanai dita batsatbau buchitkau . Nuna aatus nuniaig Wakaní Pegkeji aents nui ijununak ashí egkemtuju , dutikamu asag sapigmakas Apajuí chichamenak etsejuidau .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Ashí Jisusa nemajin aidauk betekak anentain idajus anentaimtunidau , nunidau asag betek anentaimaidau . Tuja makichkish imá midauk atí tusag anentaimainachu asag ikdaikag sudayidau .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Tuja Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegkamu aidaushkam , Apu Jisusa senchijin ni maam nantakiuwa nuna pachisag etsejuidau , imadiagtai Apajuishkam niina nemagkaju aidaunak senchi yayau .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Makichik aentskesh atsumamujig atsujuidau , wagki Apajuí yayamu asag . Nuninak ditá nugken sujukag , jee ajuinamunashkam sujuk kuichkin jukiag ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegkamu aidau batsatbaunum itaidau , aents aidau atsumamujin diijus susatnume tusag .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Nuanuí makichik aents José , Leví wegantu ajuntai Chiprenmaya nuna Jisus etejamu aina nu Bernabé adaikamua nunú , nui pachitkau . ( Bernabé tawa duka “ ichichkagtin ” taku tawai . )

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Nunú aents nugken sujuk kuichkin juki , Jisus etejamu aina nuna susauwai .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Tuja Ananiaschakam niina nuwe Safirajai nugken sujukui .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Nunik kuichkin jukiag nuwejai chichasag , kuichkin akanak ukuinak , tikich akankamun jukiag Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegkamu aidaun susauwai .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Nunikmatai Pedro chichajak : — Ananiasah , ¿ wagka iwanch wakejamu takaakmesh , Wakaní Pegkeji tsanugtasamesh wakejame , nugkem sujukam kuichik jukim aminu amain ukukiuwaitkumesh ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Nugka sujukum duka aminui . Nunin asamtai nugka sujakum kuichik jukium dushakam aminui . Nunin aish , ¿ wagka jusha juniame ? Amek aentsuk tsanugchaume , Apajuí tsanujume , — tau .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Nu tusa tamawaik Ananiasak jaka iyaantui , tuja ashí aents nuna dekaawajuk senchi ishamkajui .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Nunik jakamtai datsauch aidau tajuntag pempeag jukiaju ukustatus .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Nunik kampatumchik hora nagkaemai , Ananiasa nuweshkam aishi jakamunak dekatsuk wayau .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Nunikmatai Pedro iniak : — Nugka sujuka kuichik jukimuk ashí itaji tibaujum nu ¿ dekaskekaih ? — tau . Tutai nuwa ayaak : — Ehé , nunichik sujukmaji , — tau .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Nuwa tutai Pedro chichajak : — ¿ Wagka aishumjai betekash Wakaní Pegkejiya dusha tsanugtasagmesh wakegagme ? Amina aishumin ukusag ukuinak kauntaja anke aminashkam ukugmasagtatui .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Tusa tamawaik Safirashkam Pedro wajamunum ayaumas jaka iyaantu . Nuniktatman datsauch aidaushkam waikmá jaka tepettaman wainkag jukiag , aishi ukusbaunmag ayaunas ukusajui .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Nu nunikagbaun Jisusa nemagkaju aidauk tikich aents aidaushkam antukag senchi ishamkajui .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegkamu aidau , aents dutikmainchau aidaun ashí aents wainainamunum kuashat iwainaidau ; tuja Jisusa nemajin aidaushkam jega Apajuí ememattai Salomón waiti ujagbaunum ashí ijunaidau .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Tujash Jisusa nemajuinachuk eme anentus diinayatak ditajai ijuntanak dakituidau .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Tujash Jisusan dekaskeapi tusag nemajuidauk aan kuashat kawegku aishmag aidau nuwa aidaushkam .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Tuja jau aidaunashkam ainká tepetaijijai jiikiag jintanum batsaidau , Pedro nagkaematai makichkinakesh niina wakaní wakanman wajantati , dutikam tsagagtinme tusag .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Jerusalén tikiju batsataidaushkam jau aidaun , aents wakan pegkegchau waitkam batsamin aidaunash yajuakag ikaunmamu aidauk ashí tsagagkaju .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Imatikiagtai sumo sacerdote , saduceo aidaujai wainkag senchi kajegkaju .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Dutikawag chicham etsegtugkata tusa Jisus etegjamu aidaun achikag , aents achiká chimpitainum egkeawajui .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Tujash nayaimpinmaya aents kashi tajua waiti ujati jiyaak :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: “ Wetajum , nunikjum jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaajum , ashí ju chicham pujutan sukagtina jujú aents aidau ujaktajum ” , tiu .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Nu tabaun antukag kashinia duwi , jega Apajuí ememattainum wayawag jintinkagtuidau . Nuninai sumo sacerdote ditajai ijunja chichataiji aidaujai , nuigtú ashí judío apuji aidaun untsukag , chicham epegkatasa ijuntainum ijunjag , Jisus chicham etsegkata tusa etegjamu aidau achiká egkeamun : Jiikjum itatajum , tusag suntajan awemaju .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Tima jegajua diikmag wainkachaju , nunikag waketjag ditan ujainak :

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: — Aents achiká chimpitaig shiig epenjamuwe , suntag nuna kuitamaidaushkam waitinum ijunmae . Tujash ujai wayaa diikmá wainkashmaji , atsuagmae , — tuidau .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Tusa etsejuinamun sumo sacerdote , tikich jega Apajuí ememattain kuitamin aidaun apuji , nuigtú sacerdote apuji aidaujai antukag ijunjag chichainak : — ¿ Tujash nunash wajukeakug nunikainta ? — tusag anentai jegagchajui .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Nuna tu ijunai makichik aents tanta : — Atum aents achikjum egkeamujum duka , jega Apajuí ememattainum wayaa batsamas aents aidaun jintintú pujuagma jamah , — tuidau .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Tiagtai suntajá apuji aidau niina suntajijai wejiag , shiig kuitamsag juki itawaju , tutit awajai aents juna antujuidau kayai tukú tukujuinakua mantuawainum tuidau asag .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Itawag , apu aidau tuwakbaunum ejapeen awantagmatai , sumo sacerdote chichajak :

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: — ¿ Antukchamkaijum ii yamai nagkamsagmek Jisus pachisjumek aents aidauk jintintuawaigpajum tibaijim duka ? ¿ Wagka antukchaugme ? Atum aajajum ashí Jerusalegnumia jintinbau asag , jutii aidautin ditap nu aentsnak mau ainawa tujamainawai , — tuidau .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Tuinam Pedro niina kumpají aidaujai chichainak : — Dekas dekatkauk , aentsuk umigtsuk Apajuí umigkata tabauwa nuuwai jutiinuk .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Atum Jisus numi yapajiamunum achigjum maawagmin , iina muunji aajakajua nuna Apajuijiya nunú inankiuwai .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Dutika niina untsujin ekentsauwai Apu ema Uwemtikagtin atí tusa , nuigtú Israel aents aidaush tudaujin idayinak tsagkugnagtinme , tusa .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Jutiik dekas wainkau asaja etsegji , tuja Wakaní Pegkejiya dushakam dutiksag etsegtau asa jutiinash dekamtijamji . Wagki Apajuik niina umijuina nuna Wakaní Pegkejiya nunak suwawai , — tuidau .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Nunú tuinam kajegkag maata tuidau .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Nu apu aina nuwiya makichik fariseo Gamaliel chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin asamtai , chichamesh dekas umigtai wajakí : — Atumek agaa jiinkijum machik wajastajum , — tusa jiikí ni wajantá .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Tikich apu aidaun chichajak : — Israel aents aidauwah , ju aents aidau maatasajum anentaimtuinajum duka kuitamamkatajum .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Adeagtajum yaunchuk , Teudas nigki wi apu atajai timatai ayú tusag , cuatrocientos aents saetus yujajuidau nuna maawagmatai wainak pampagkag megkaejajua nu .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Nu nuniku ainai , Judas Galileanmayashkam aentsú daaji agatbau jegamunum , niinashkam kuashat aents nemagkajui , tujash nunash maawagmatai niina nemajuidauk pampagkajui .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Nunin asamtai dekas jujú aents aina juka waitkatsuk idaisatajum wetinme . Jujú dita takaina ju ditak jutiká yujainakug megkaekattawai ;

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Untsu dekas Apajuinuitkuig atumek depetmaitsujume , Apajuí takatji aig Apajuijai maaniaku aaní batsattsujiash , — tiuwai .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Nuna tusag Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa etegjamu aidaun awayawag asutiawag : — Jisus pachismek aents aidauk ujakaigpajum , — tusag akupkaju .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Tiajam ditashkam apu batsatun ukukiag weenakush , shiig aneasag dakunkut weedau , wagki ditanash Apajuí eme anentus , Jisus pachisa etsegbaunum waittsatnume tabau asa .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Tusá imatjuawagmashkam yamajam chichama nuna , Jisusnak Apajuí etegkauwai Uwemtikagtin atí , tusa etsegtanak idaitsuk , kashí kashinig aents aidaun jega Apajuí ememattainum , makí makichik jeganmashkam jintinkagtuidau .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Nunú tsawantin Jisusa nemagkaju aidau kuashat kawegkaju asag , griego chichau aidaun nuwe waje aidau , yutai shiig ajampenashbau asag , hebreo chichau aidaujai kajegdaikaju .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Nudiagtai Jisus chicham etsegtugkatajum tusa doce etegjamu aina nu , nui batsataidau asag , ashí Jisusa nemagkau aidaun ijumjag chichainak : — Apajuí chichame etsegmaina nu idaiku , yujumkan wajuk yuwawagtatua nu uyumaka wekaetuta duka shiigchauwai .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Nunin asamtai yatsug aidauh , atum ainajum anuiya siete yatsug kajittsá diimain etegjatajum Wakaní Pegkeji ajamu , shiig anentaimas dutikmain , nunú aidau ju takatnak diistinme .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Nuninai jutiik Apajuí aujut , chichame etsegta nujai uyumakagmi .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Nuna aatus tiagtai , aents tuwakaju aidauk wakekaju , nunikag etegkawaju Esteban Apajuiyaig kajinas anentaimna nuna , Wakaní Pegkejish ajamun , tikichin Felipen , Procoron , Nicanoran , Timogkan , Parmenasan , Nicolás Antioquianmaya judío atajai tumamiuwa nujai .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Nuna etegjag jukiag Jisus chicham etsegtugkata tusa etegjamu aidau batsatbaunum ejegawaju , dutikawagmatai ditashkam buuknum achikag Apajuin aujtusaju .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Tuja Apajuí chichame etsegbaushkam nuní senchi wegau , nunisag Jisusa nemajuidaushkam nuní senchi Jerusalegkak kawegkaju ; sacerdote aidaushkam kuashat Jisusa nemajuidau .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Apajuí niina senchijin , Estebagkan senchi yayau , dutikamu asa aents dutikmainchaun aents aidaun iwaintau .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Jega judío agkanmagau aidau ijuntai tutaya nui ijunin aidau , yaakat Cirenenmaya , Alejandrianmaya , nugka Cilicianmaya , Asianmaya aina nu ijunjag Estebagjai tudayinau .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Tujash Estebagnak wagagsag chichajuinachu , nigka Wakaní Pegkeji dekamtikam chichau asamtai .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Nunidau asag tikich aidaun : — Atum : ‘ Moisesan pegkegchau chichajak , Apajuinashkam pegkegchau chichaju ii antugkabiaji ’ titajum , — tusag wakenmag akikaju .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Nuna dutikawag aents aidaun , judío apuji aidaun , chicham umiktinun jintinkagtin aidaunashkam inajaju . Dutikawajam Estebagkan achikag jukiag , chicham dekaku ijuntainum ejegawaju .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Dutikawagmatai wainak tsanumjugti tibau aina nu chichajuinak : — Ju aentsuk jega Apajuí ememattai pegkegma nuna pachis , chicham umiktina nunashkam pegkegchau chichajú wekaewai .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Jutii dekas antukbaiji , ni chichaak : ‘ Jisus Nazaretnumiaya nunú ju jega Apajuí ememattaiya junak tsaiká idayak , Moisés ju jutikatajum tujabauwa nunashkam yapagkattawai ’ timayi , — tuidau .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Ashí aents nui ijunjajuk nuna tiagtai , shiig esettsag Estebagkan diikmag , nayaimpinmaya aentsu yapijai betek wajas eketun wainkajui .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Sumo sacerdote Estebagkan : ¿ Dekaskek tujamaina ? tusa iniasu ,

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: tama ni ayaak : “ ¡ Yatsug aidauh , muun aidautigmesh antuktajum ! Ii Apajuiji dekas imana nunú , iina muunji Abraham aajakua nuna , Harán wegatsaig Mesopotamia pujuttaman wantintuk ,

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: chichajak : ‘ Nugkemik pataim aidaushkam ukuktá , nunikam wetá wi nugkan inaktustatjam nui ’ , tiuwai .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Tima Abragshakam Caldea nugkanak ukuak , Harán nugkanum pujustatus weuwai . Nuwi pujai apají jakamtai , Apajuí ii yamai batsatag ju nugkanum awemauwai .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Tujash nugkanak niinu atí tusag susachui , eke uchijish atsujaig ayatak anagkuauwai , ni jakamtaish niina uchijí wegantu aidau batsamsatnunak susatnaitjai , tusa .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Nuigtushkam Apajuí Abragkan chichajak : ‘ Amina uchigmiin akiinak wegagtina duka , tikich nugkanum pachinawag nugkenchau , inaku waitkam cuatrocientos mijan batsamsagtinai ’ , tiuwai .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Tuja nuigtush Apajuí : ‘ Wi ditan inak waitkaidaunak suwimkan susatnaitjai , dutika ai nuwiya jiinjag jujú nugka juwi kaunawag mina umigtiagtatui ’ , tiuwai .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Tuja Apajuí Abragjai chichaman apaak , ashí uchi aishmag akiinuk pakaji ajapjitajum tiuwai , tibau asa Abraham Isaakan akiag ocho tsawan wetai , dutikauwai . Isaakshakam Jacopan akiash dutiksag dutikauwai , tuja Jacobshakam aikasag doce uchijí aajakajua nunash dutikauwai .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: “ Nunú Jacopan uchijí aidau iina muunji aajakajua duke ditá yachinak Josen wainak kajejuidau asag , Egipto jukitnume tusag sujukajui . Tujash Apajuí Josejai au asa ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: ashí ni waitiamujinak agkanmitkauwai , dutika yachamtikauwai . Nunikmatai Faraón Egipto apujiya dushakam wakejus Josenak diisuí , dutikau asa : ‘ Egiptunmag ame inamjata nuniakum ashí mina jegajuiyash amek diistá ’ , tusa apu emauwai .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: “ Nuniku ai Egipto , Canaán nugkanmash ashí yapajut tepeauwai , nunikmatai ii muunji aajakajua dushakam yumainji atsujuinam senchi waituidau .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Imaní batsatu , Egiptunum trigo sujamu awai tabaun Jacob antuk , ni uchijí aidaun ishiakui . Nunak nagkamchak wegashbaun wegajui .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Nunikaju ataktú sumaktatus jegamunum , José ni yachin wainak : ‘ Wika atumin yatsumitjai ’ , tusa ujakajui , nunikmatai Faraogshakam Josek Jacopa uchijimpapi tusa dekauwai .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Nunik José , apajin ashí niina patayí aidaujai kaunatnume timatai setenta y cinco aents Egipto jegawajui .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Nui Egipto jegaa pujus Jacopak jakauwai , nunisag ii muunji aajakajua dushakam nuwig jinawajui .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Nunikagmataish ditá iyashí aidaunak jukiag Siquem ejegawag , Abraham yaunchuk ukumatain Hamora uchijinun akikmak sumakua nui ukusajui .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: “ Apajuí duwik Abragkan anagkuauwa nu uminkattak wajau asamtai , Jacopa uchijí wegantu aidauk shiig kuashat wajasaju .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Imanikaju ai , yamajam apu Egiptunum ekeemiuwai Josen wainchau .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Nunú apu jutii muunji aajakajua nuna tsanujá suwimkan suwinak waitkaidau ; imatikainak uchi aishmag akiinkuig jutsuk ayatak maatajum , tusa inamjauwai .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Nunú tsawantin Moiseschakam akiinauwai , nunikmatai Apajuishkam aneas diisuí , tuja apají ditá jeen kampatum nantu uukag apusajui ;

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: dutikawag uumainchau wajasmatai , uchi egkemainun najatuawag egkeawag namaká inanakiuwai . Dutikamun Faraogka nawanji wainak juki ni tuke uchijima tsakapajui .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Dutikamu asa Moisesak Egiptunmaya unuimataijinak ashí unuimaju aajakuí . Iman asa , chichamesh antugtai ni takatjinish imanuk ajakuí .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: “ Cuarenta mijan ajamu ni patayí Israel wegantu batsatbaunum weuwai .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Nunikmá wainkauwai Egiptunmaya aents , ni patayí Israel aentsun suwimun . Dutiktai niishkam nuna ayamjak Egiptunmayan mauwai .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Moisés anentaimsag Apajuí mina yatsug Israel aents aina nunak , ni agkanmitkati tujuttata nunash dekagtuinawapi tau . Tujash ditak nunak duiyap aniawa tichajui .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Kashinia duwi Moisés niina patayí jimag ditak pempeentuniki maaninak tikichin suwimtatman wainkauwai ; nunik epegtuatatus : ‘ ¿ Wagka yatsumjaish pempeentunikjumesh maanish yujagme ? ’ tiu .

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Tama yachin suwima nu Moisesan shitakiu , dutika : ‘ ¿ Ya aminash apu chichaman epegkin atí tusash adaitamkame ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: ¿ Minash yau Egiptunmaya maamum dutiksamek mantuatasamek tujutam ? ’ tau .

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Nu tima Moisesak tupikaki Madián nugkanum jegauwai , nunik nui pujus jimag uchin akiauwai .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: “ Nui pujusá cuarenta mijan wegai , muja Sinaí tutain uwegshujin Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya , numi jagkigtin zarza tutai kegamunum wantintuku .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Nunittaman Moisés wainak puyatkau , nunik shiig wainkatatus adijtatman Apajuí untsuká :

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: ‘ Witjai , amina muunjum Abraham , Isaac , Jacob aajakajua nuna Apajuijinuk ’ , tiu . Nuna tutai Moisesak senchi ishamak kujau , diitnash diimainchau dekapeau .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Nunitai Apajuí chichajak : ‘ Sapatjum ukuimakta , ame wajam anka nugkak pegkegmai .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Dekaskenum mina aentsug Egipto batsamas waituina nuna wainkajai , nuigtush buutainak mina untsujuina nunash antugkajai , nunikan ditan agkanmitkatasan taajai . Nuaduí ame Egipto nugkanum wetá ’ , tiuwai .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: “ Israel aents aidau Moisesan dakituinak : ‘ ¿ Ya aminash apu chichaman epegkin atí tusash adaitamkame ? ’ tiajua nuna Apajuí apu ema , ame agkanmitkata tusa awemauwai . Nunak nayaimpinmaya aents Apajuí awemamu numi jagkigtin zarza tutainum Moisesan wantintukua duwi tiuwai .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Tibau asa Moisés ii muunji Egipto nugkanum batsamtatman jiijuí , aents dutikmainchaun Egiptunum iwainak , nayants kapantu tutainmash , nuigtú cuarenta mijadai uwegshunum awekasashkam dutiksag iwainakui .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: “ Nunú Moisesak Israel aents aidaun chichajak : ‘ Wiiya jumamtinun tikichin Apajuí atum wegantunmayan makichik aentsun , mina etsegtujin atí tusa etegjatnai ’ , tiuwai .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Nuigtushkam Israel aents aidaujai uwegshunum batsatbaunmash Moisesan muja Sinaí tutainum , Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya ausam , chicham pujutan sukagtina nuna jukiuwai , iina muunji aidau ujaktinun , dutikamun jutiinash ujapakajui .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: “ Dutikamu ainayatak iina muunji aidauk chicham umitan dakituinak ayatak Egipto waketjagtatus anentaimajakajui .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Nunidau asag Aarogkan ii apajuimatin najanata ni emjutpakti , Moisés Egipto batsatjin jiigmajamia duka dekagtsuji wajukants megkaeka , tiajui .

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Tusag toro tsakata nuninun najanawag , kuntinun maa apeenak dita najanamujin emematuidau , dutikainak shiig anentuidau .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Nudiagtai Apajuishkam ditanak idaisauwai etsan , nantun , yaya aina nuna ememattinme tusa . Nunak Apajuí etsegtin nuniktinai tusa agak : ‘ Israel aents aidauh , ¿ atum uwegshunum cuarenta mijadai yujasuitjum duwish kuntin maa apeakjumesh emematjiuk ainajum ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Duka dutijutsuk atum apajimatin Moloc , nuigtú yaya Renfán tutaiya nu najanajum emematkujum jegamkamu takusjum yujau asagmin , Babilonia nugkanum atushat emattajime , Apajuí tiuwai . ’

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: “ Iina muunji aajakajua nunú uwegshunum jegan jegamkajui , Apajuí Moisesan ame wainkaum imatiksamek jegamkata tibauwa nuna .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Nunú jega duka iina muunji jidiagtaish ditá uchijí aidaunu juwakui , nunikua nuna Josuejai tikich nugkanum aents batsatbaunum utsanainak itawajui , nunikag aents nui batsatunak Apajuí yayasam jiijajui , dutika itamuk David pujujakua duwishkam aajakuí .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Apu Davitak Apajuí wait anenjamu asa , Jacob wegantu Apajuijiya nudaun jegan jegamkatatus wakejukui .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Tujash Salomón jega Apajuí ememattainak jegamkauwai .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: Dekaskenmag Apajuik aents jega jegamkamunmag pujumaitsui . Juna pachis Apajuí etsegtin chichaak :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: ‘ Mina ekeemtaijuk nayaimpia auwai , untsu mina najamtaijua duka nugka nuuwai . ¿ Minash wají jegak jegagtuktagme ? ayamainjush atsugta juniaish , ¿ tu amainaita mina ayamtaijush ?

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: ¿ Atumek wi ju aina junak ashí najankauwaitag duka dekatsjumek ? Apajuí tawai ’ , ” tiuwai .

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: Nuna tusa Esteban : “ Atum aidautigmek tuke antakchauk aajakuitjume , antutaigminish , anentaiminchakam Apajuí anentaimtuchu aina nunú anentai ajutjamainawai . Atumek atumi muunjum aajakajua nujai betek asajum Wakaní Pegkejishkam kajejuinagme .
