text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Dutiksag Epafras Kristu Jisusan inakega nu , atumjai ijunajakua dushakam kumpamjamainawai , nuniak Apajuin shiig senchi aujtugmainawai , shiig imagnis emetmamag pujuinak , ashí Apajuí wakegamua nunak takagsatnume tujamaidau asag .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Wi niinak atumin puyatjutpaina nuna wainu asan tajai , aantsag Laodicea batsata nunashkam , tuja Hierápolis pujuina nunash uyumawai .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Aantsag aneetaig Lucas ampijatna dushakam , Demasjai kumpamjamainawai .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Tuja yatsug aidau , ubag aidau Laodicea batsata nunú , nuigtú Ninfas niina jeen Apajuin emematuinak ijunaina dushakam , Pablo kumpamjamjume tusajum ujatjuktajum .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Ju papiin awemag ju ausagmek , Jisusa nemajin Laodicea batsata dushakam awetitajum ditash ausatnume , tuja dita awetimun atumin awetugmainakuish aikasjumek ausatajum .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Arquiposhkam ujaktajum , niish betek umiktí Apu Kristu takat susamua nuna tujamui tusam .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Ju kumpamkagtamua junak wi mina uwejuí agatjime , Apajuí aujkugmesh wi achinkan pujag ju anenjatajum , Apajuí atumnash wait anenjamjatnume . Aatus atí .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Witjai Pabloitjai , Apajuí inakegaitjai , Jisukristu chicham etsegtugkata tusa etegka awemamuitjai . Apajuí etegjamu aina nuna ujaktí , ditash imá niinig kajinas anentaimainak dekaskea nu jintinkagtamua nunash dekaatnume ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: nuninak pujut tuke atin jukitnun Apajuí waitjuchua nunú yaunchuk nagkamas anagtamauwa nunash dakastinme ,

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: ni dutikatnuji tsawan jegau asamtai , Apajuí iina uwemtijamna nunú yamai , ame etsegkata tusa mina awetiuwai .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Nuaduí Titoh , amek wijai betek Apajuiyaig kajintsá anentaimu asam tuke mina uchijuitme , aminash iina Apají Apajuiya nunú , Apu Jisukristu uwemtikagtina nujai wait anenjamag shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastí .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Wi amina Creta ajuntaijin ukukbaijam nunak , utugchat iwagmain juwakmaya nu iwajam , Jisusa nemajin aidaun diin atinush , makí makichik yaaktauch aidaunmashkam wi tibaijam dutiksamek adaijam umiktá tibaijame .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Jisusa nemajuidaun diin aidauk , nuna nunikchama tusaish augmatchatai amainai , makichik nuwentin , uchijí aidaushkam Apajuí nemajin , chichaman intimkichaju , pegkegchaunum augmatchatai amain ainawai .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Wagki Jisusa nemajuidaun diin aidauk , Apajuinun kuitamjin asag pegkegchauji diigsá jiyashtai amainai , ememachu , kajemtin wajaknuchu , nampetan wekaetuchu , maanitnash wakeechau , takat pegkegchau aina nujai kuichkijinatatus wakejuchu ,

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: niina jeenish shiig aneas jukagtin , pegkeg aidau takatnak wakeyin , pegkejan anentaimkau , aents pegkeg , pegkejam , shiig kuitamamak pujú ,

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: chicham dekaskea nunú jintintuamua nuna shiig dekau asa , tikich aidau chichaman dekaskechua nunin chichajuidaunash , dekas pegkeja nuna shiig jintinmainai .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Mina pataag judío aina nuwiyag kuashat antumtikmainchau ainawai , nunin asag wait chichaman chichainak aentsun tsanú yujainawai .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Nunú aents aidauk dekas itatmitkaktajum , ditak kuichkin akigkatnume tabaunum , makichik jeganum batsatunak jintiimainchau aidaun jintintak , Kristui kajintsá anentaimtuinamujin datupainawai .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Ajuntai Cretanmayaya nuwiya makichik Apajuí etsegtin aajakua nu tiuwai : Cretanmaya aidauk tuke waitjin ainawai , kuntin ikamiajai betek , ayatak yu batsamin , daki ainawai , tusa .

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Nunak dekas tiuwai . Nuaduí nunú aidauk amek najam chichagkata , ditashkam duikmuun augmattan idayinak , dekas Jisukristunak kajinas anentaimtustinme .

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: Mina pataag judío aidau chicham dekaskea nu dekatan dakituinak , ditak anentaimas augmatuinak , ju umimainai tuina duka antugkaigpa .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Aents anentaimtaji pegkeg aina duka , ashí ni takaamujishkam pegkejak ainawai . Untsu aents pegkegchau Apajuiyaish kajinas anentaimchau aina duka , pegkeg anentaimtak atsujuinawai . Nunin asag anentaimtajinish pegkegchauk ainawai .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Nu chichainak Apajuinak nemagjai tuinawai , tujash dita takaamujin wainak tuina duka wainnawai . Ditak kajegkagtin , chichaman intimkiu yujasag , pegkeg aina nunash takamainchau ainayatak tu yujainawai .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Amek dekas chicham pegkeg unuimagbaugmia duke jintinkagtuata .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Aishmag muun aidauk , wake besemtin , ajantusa diitai , shiig anentaimkau , dekas Jisusaig kajinas anentaimkau , anejatbaujinish imanuk , ashí utugchatnumash Jisusaig kajinas anentaimin amainai .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Aantsag nuwa muun aidaushkam , Apajuí aneen , chichama wekaetuchu , nampechu , pegkeg takaamujinak iwainau amainai .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Nuninak jintintuatnume nuwa muntsujut yama nemaku aidau aishi aneetan , uchijí aidau aneetan ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: shiig anentaimkau atan , shiig kuitamamka pujutan , jeenia kuitamka pujutnash , nuwa pegkeg atan , aishinig sumitkau atan , Apajuí chichamen pegkegchau chichagkainum tau asá .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Aikasmek datsauch aidaushkam , shiig anentaimkau atajum tusam chichagkata , pegkegchau wakegamua nuna depetuk idaisatnume .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Tuja dekas ameshkam ame shiig pujamujum iwaintukta , amina waipainak ditashkam unuimajagtinme . Jintinkagtakmesh pegkeja duke puyatjusam jintinkagtuata .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Chichaakmesh pegkeg aina duke ame bakumamainchau chichatá , nuniamin kajegkagtuidaush datsajag jutiinash pegkegchaunak tujamchagtatui .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Dutiksamek inak aidaushkam : Atumí apujum inapamu ashí umigkatajum , wainka ai aimtau aigpajum , tusam chichagkata ,

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: kasamtsuk ashí wají aidaun ajantus diistinme . Nuniagtai tikich aidaushkam Apajuí ii uwemtijamna nuna chichamen wakejus diistinme .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Apajuí ni jutii wait anenkagtamujinak iwaintugmakui . Nunú ashí aents aina nunak uwemtikatatus wakejawai .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Apajuí wait anenjamak sujamsamua nunú , pegkegchau aidauk idaisatajum , ashí pegkegchau ju nugkanmaya anentaimtutai aina duka ; nuniakum dekas ju nugka juwish shiig imagnisam pegkegnum pujakum , Apajuiya duke ememattajum tusa tujamji .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Nunika pujuidau asaja , iina Apuji Jisukristu jutiin uwemtijamin , iina Apajuiji dakaku pujuinag nu wantintugmakui shiig aneastinaitji .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Nigka nigki mantamnatatus tsagkamankauwai , ashí pegkegchau aina nuanuí agkanmitkagmatatus . Dutika pegkemtijami niina aentsji etamak , ashí pegkeg aina nuwig takamtijamsata tau asa .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Jujú jintinkagtakum tikichish wakemitkakta , pegkegchau takainakuish najam chichagkam idaimitkata , makichik aentskesh imanchau diigmasainum .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Aneemtikjata Jisusa nemajin aidauk apu inamin aina nui sumimkau atinme , nuninak dita tabaunash umigkatnume , nuigtú ashí takat pegkeg aina nunak dutikatatus wakeetinme .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Makichik aentsnakesh pegkegchau chichagtsuk , maanitsuk batsamas dekas anejatin atinme , ashí tikich aidaujaish ditá kakagchaujin iwainaktinme .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Yaunchkek jutiishkam anentainkachu intimkiu asaja , megkaeja batsamsá , ayatak pegkegchau anentaimta nuna waitkatai , nuigtú ashí ii wakegamuk takainaku , pegkegchauk batsamtaku tikichdau pegkeg diigsá kajejuinaku , wainka kajegdayinaku pempé pempentunisaik kajegdayá batsamin aajakuitji .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Tujash Apajuí iina uwemtijamna nu ashí aents aneamujin iwaintugmak

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: uwemtijamjauwai , jutii pegkeg takagsashbauwaitak nigki wait anenjamu asa . Dutijama ni chichame tawa dutiksag tudaun tsagkugtamag pegkeg etamak Wakaní Pegkejin sujamsauwai . Dutikamu asaja yamajam pujut jukiu ainaji .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Jisukristu jutiin uwemtijamak mantamdau asamtai , Wakaní Pegkejinashkam sujamsauwai ,

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: ni wait anenjamag bakumamainchau etamkamunum , ditash pujut tuke atinun dakaina nuna jukitnume tujamu asa .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Juka dekaske , nuniau asamtai jujú pachisam ujaktá Apajuiyai kajinas anentaimaina duka pegkegnak takastinme . Jujú jintinkagtamua juka pegkeg asa ashí aentsnak yaimainai .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Tujash chicham imanchau aidaun , akiinka minimun pachisag kajegdayak jiyaninak , nuigtú chicham umiktajum tibaun jiyanituina duka amek jiyanitú wekayipa . Nunú aidauk wainak asag makichkish yaimpamaitsui .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Makichik aentskesh nuninun augmatuinak , makichik anentaiyaik ijunja takamainchau wajakuig chichagkata , tuja ataktú tamash antugtamchakuig jiiktajum .

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Dutikakjumek dekaatajum jujú aentsuk tunamajeapita nunin asamtaimpap niina tudaujiya duke suwimak jumainnum ejentattawa tusajum .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Artemasan , Tiquiconakesh awetittajame , dutikamtaig waamak Nicópolis taam waitkata , yumi tepeatta nunak nagkaemakti tusan nui pujuttajai .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Ayamkagtin Zenas Apolosjai , anuí taa nagkaemainakuig , ashí dita atsumainamuk susajum awematajum waittsainum .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Atum dutikamun tikich Apajuí nemajin aina dushakam wainkag , pegkeg aidaunak takainak tikich atsumamu yaitan unuimagtinme , nuninak tuke atsumtai atinme .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ashí wijai batsata dushakam kumpamjamainawai . Apajuiyaig kajintsá anentaibaunum yatsut anejatuidau anuí batsata dushakam kumpamjutuatajum . Atumnash Apajuí yaimpaktinme . Aatus atí .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Witjai Pabloitjai , Kristu Jisusa takaju asan achinkan pujajai . Anetaiju Filemogkah , ameshkam wi Apajuin takajag junismek takau asamin , yatsug Timoteojai pujusan kumpamjame .

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: Aikasnuk iina umayí Apian , nuigtú Arquipo Jisukristun takajak jutiijai betek waitna nunashkam kumpamkun , amina jeemin Jisusa nemajin aidau ijunin agma nunashkam kumpamainajai .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Iina Apají Apajuiya nu , Apu Jisukristujai wait anenjamu asag , atumnash shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan amastinme .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Mina Apajuijun aujkunuk amina pachisan tuke see tusanké ajai .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Wagki antugkamjame , amek Apu Jisus aneakum niinig kajintsam anentaimkum , ashí Jisusa nemajuidaushkam aneam nuna .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Duwi Apajuinak aujtajame , amesh jutiijai betekak Jisusai kajintsá anentaimu asamin , ashí pegkeg aidau ame dutikmainaitam nunak Kristu ame aneam duwi ni dekamtijamati tusan .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Shiig aneakun ichichmamjai ame anejatbaun antakun . Yatsujuh , Jisusa nemajin aina dushakam aminig anentain ichichmamkaje .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Filemogka , wika Kristu awemamu asan , ju aaja dutikata tumainaitjame .

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Tujash amina aneau asan ayatak segajame . Wika muun wajasuitkun Kristu chichamen etseju asan achigkagmatai egkemsan ,

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Onésimo mina uchijua imana nuna pachisan , wait aneasam ju jutikata tusan segajame . Achigkagmatai pujusan Kristu pachisan etsejai antuk niishkam sujumankabi .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Onesimok tikich tsawan aajakua duwik ame inagtasaik atsumainchau aajakuí . Tujash yamaik ameshkam , wishakam atsumtai wajasú asamtai ,

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: ataktú awagtukin awetajame mina aneetaijua nuna . Nunin asamtai mina itugtumainaitam dutiksamek jeeminish jukita .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Wika junak wijai pujustí tusan emetmainaitjai . Ame mina yamajam chicham etsegbaunum yainmainaitam dutiksag yainkati tusan .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Tujash wika ame dutika yaimpakti tusam tujuttsuminkik dutikmaitsujai , ame waketagminig dutikmainaitam nuna , wi segam dutikamua nunin ai tau asan .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Onesimok wajumak tsawantai kanakin pujusan , ataktú wakitkin tuke niinig pujustajai tiutskaitai .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Tujash inaku waitkataig achattawai , dekas inataiya nuna nagkaesau iina yachi aneemaina iman ajutjamtatui . Nunin asamtai amek Apu Jisus nemagbaunum yatsut anentsam aan nagkaemasam wakejusam diitá , wainak aents aina nunin diitsuk .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Dutikam ameshkam wi Jisusaig kajintsan anentaimag junismek anentaimu asam , mina itugtumainaitam dutiksamek jukita .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Amina pegkegchau takagtamsau akuish , nuniachkush diwimjamkuish mina idaitugsata .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Witjai Pabloitjai , junak wi mina uwejuí agatkun tajame : Wi akikmaktatjai , ameshkam wi chichagkagtamunum pujut jukiu asam minashkam diwimjam nuniaminig .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Yatsujuh , amesh ii Apuji aneau asamin segajame , ju jutikakum minash Kristu nemagbaunum yatsum anentaimjuttsam anentaijuish ichichtugta .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Junak kajintsan agatjame amek umin asamin , nuigtushkam dekajai wi segajam nu inagkeasmesh dutikattam nunak .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Wait aneasam wi kanumainchakam umigtukta . Wi anuí minitnunak atum Apajuí aujtugjum duwi , ni awetakui minittajai atumin wainkatasan .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Kumpamjamui Epafras niishkam Kristu Jisus nemagbaunum wijai betek achinak egketa nunú .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Dutiksag kumpamjamainawai Marcos , Aristarco , Demas , Lucas aatus mina yaintin aina nunú .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ii Apuji Jisukristu wait anenkagtamujiya nunú atumí wakanminish uyuntamsagtinme . Aatus atí .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Iina muunji yaunchuk batsamajakajua nunak , Apajuik niina etsegtin aina nui kuashta imania ujakajui .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Tujash yamaik , ju tsawan jutii batsatag ju tsawantaik niina Uchijin awetugma duwi aujtamui , ashí wají aidauk ni najankamu asamtai ashí niinuk atí tusa idaitusua nuna .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Niiyai Apajuí imanjiya nuna iwaina duka . Nigka Apajuí wajukuita niishkam imanke . Ni chichame senchigtina duwi ashí wají aidaunak emetuk awai . Nuigtú iina tudaujinash tsagkugtamag nayaimpinum Apajuí inamtaiji untsujin ekeemsauwai .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Niiyai nayaimpinmaya aents aina nuna wagagkauk , nigki dekas Apu wagaaku ashí nayaimpinmaya aents aina nuna nagkaesau eme anentsá adaitaiya dushakam .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Apajuik makichkish nayaimpinmaya aents aina nunakesh : “ Amek mina Uchijuitme , wi yamai aentsnum akiinati tima akiinau asam ” , tichauwai . Nuigtush nayaimpinmaya aents aidaunak : “ Wi niina apají atajai , ni mina uchig atí ” , tichauwai .

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Tikichnumshakam jutiksag , niina Uchijí makichkiuchia nuna pachis nugkanum awemak : “ Apajuí aentsji nayaimpinmaya aina duka ashí niinak ememattinme , tiuwai ” tawai .

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya aents aidaun pachisag : “ Apajuik niina aentsji nayaimpinmaya aidaunak tuke dasejai betekmamtin ainawai tawai , tuja mina takagtuinak tuke jii kegamujai betekmamtin weu ainawai ” , tawai .

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Tujash Apajuik niina Uchijin pachisag : “ Apajuiyah , amek ajumaish pegkeg aina duke takaakum tuke inamtinaitme .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Amek pegkeg aina nu aneakum , pegkegchau aina duka dakitjaume . Nuaduí Apajuí , amina Apajuigmea nu shiig aneemtijamsae kumpajum aina nuna nagkaesau ” , tiuwai .

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Junashkam Uchijin tiuwai : “ Apuh , amek yama nagkamtinish nugka najankum nayaimpishkam najankauwaitme .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Nunú najankamujum aina duka megkaejatnai jaanch mamujá megkagama numamtuk , tujash amek tuke pujutnaitme .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Jaanch ninutia numamtuk awajkattame . Yapajiakmeshkam jaanch yapagmamtayama numamtuk yapajiattame . Tujash amek imanismek atinaitme , amina pujutjumshakam nagkankashtinai . ”

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Apajuik makichkish nayaimpinmaya aents aina nunak : “ Ekeemsata mina untsujuí , nunikamin wi amina shiwajum aidaunak ashí depetuktajame , dutikan ikaunmamtai duwi ame diisminum ” , tichauwai .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Wagki , ashí nayaimpinmaya aents aina duka wakan Apajuin takajin ainawai , aents uwemjatin aina nuna yaigtí tusa ishimtai ditak ainawai .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Nuaduí Kristu chichame antukbauwa duka , puyatjusa shiig aneaku amainaitji , Kristu nemajut tupanjaig tuidau asaja .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Yaunchuk iina muunji aajakajua nuna , Apajuí niina aentsji nayaimpinmaya aina nui chicham umiktinun awetim susauwa duka senchigtin aajakuí . Nunin asamtai nuna umitsuk tudaun takaidauk dutiksaik suwimak suujakbauwai .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Nunin aish jutiish ¿ wajuk Apajuí suwimkajish uwemtumainaita , uwemat dekas imana nu pachitsuk idaikuish ? Nu uwemtan pachis dekatkauk Apu Jisus etsegkauwai . Jisus etsegbaun antukaju aina nunú jutiinashkam dekaske tusag ujapakajui .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Apajuí nuna shiig dekamtijamata tau asa , niina chichamen etsejuidaunash yaigkuí . Dutikam aents dutikmainchau aidaun iwainag takaajakajui . Dutiksag Wakaní Pegkejiya nunashkam , ni wakejamua dutiksag makí makichik jutiinak amasajui .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Nugka yamajam atak atin pachisa chichainag nunak , Apajuik nayaimpinmaya aents aina nunú diistí tusag idaituschauwai .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Jushakam aatus agagbauwai : “ ¿ Ju Aentsmaga Akiinauwa jusha ya asamtaiya imatikamesh emesh anentame ? Apajuiyah ¿ ya asamtaiya amesh jusha imá kuitamkatasamesh wakejame ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Ujumak tsawantaik nayaimpinmaya aents aina nuní imanchauch emaume , tujash ataktú imanuk emam eme anentsá diitai awajsaume . Dutikam ame najankamu aina duka ashí nigki idaitusume . ”

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Nunú ashí idaitusbau asa makichkish Kristu diyachbauk atsawai , tujash eke ashí ni diyakbau amaina nuninuk waintsuji .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Tujash Jisus ujumak tsawantai nayaimpinmaya aents aina nuní imanchauch emamuitak , ni waittsa jakamunum eme anentsá diitai wajasua duka wainji . Nunak Apajuí jutiin wait anenjamu asa , ashí aents aidaunum waitus jakati tima nunikui .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Ashí wají ni najankamu ayaa duka niinuk ainawai . Nigka wakegawai ashí niina uchijí aidauk nayaimpinum pujustinme tusa . Nuna dutikata tau asa Apajuí Jisukristunak waittsati tiuwai , ni nunikbaunum ashí niina uchijí aidaunak pegkeg emak uwemtikata tau asa .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Wagki ashí aents pegkeemtikamu aidauk , nuigtú pegkeemtikagtina dushakam ashí Apajuinuk ainawai . Nuaduí Jisus Apajuí Uchijiya duka , datsamatsui jutii aidautin pachipas , “ mina yatsug ainawai ” tujamtanmag .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Nuna pachis agagbaunum chichaak : “ Apawah , amina pachisan yatsug aidaun ujaktajai , dutikakun ditajai ijuntsan kantamkun ememattajame ” , tawai .

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Junashkam : “ Wika imá Apajuinak anentaimtittajai ” , ataktushkam : “ Wika juwig Apajuí uchijí aidaun sujusua nujai pujajai ” , tiuwai .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Jutii aents ainag nuninuk Jisuschakam wajasá akiina , jutiiní mantamdauwai iwanch dekas senchigtin iina mantamatatus wakejutpauwa nuna depetkatatus .

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Ni jakamunum agkanmitkakbauwai ashí aents iwanchin inake waig batsamas , jaamun ishamá batsatushkam .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Duka dekaske , nigka nayaimpinmaya aents aidaun ayamjuktatus minichui . Nigka Abraham Apajuiyaig kajinas anentaimajakua nunin aidaun ayamjuktatus miniuwai .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Jutii niina yachi aidautin yaimpakta tau asa jutiijai betek wajasuí . Nunik ni dekas Sumo Sacerdote wajasú asa Apajuin betek umijak , jutiinash wait anenjamas Apajuinash segatjamui , jutii waitmaina nuna ni waitus mantamdauwa duwi , Apajuí aentsú tudaujinash tsagkujati tujamu asa .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Niishkam iwanch pegkegchau takamtiksatasa dekapeam asau asa , iwanch dekapeam waituidaunak senchigtina ibau asa yaigtatui .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Nuaduí yatsug aidauh , ubag aidauwah , atum Apajuí mina aentsug atinme tusa etejamu aidautigmek , Kristu Jisus Apajuí awemamu , nuigtú nigki Sumo sacerdoteya duke puyatjusjum anentaimtitajum . See tajai jutiishkam niinig kajintsá anentaimu asaja ni pachisa etsegtuinag duwi .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Nigka jutiin yaimpakta tau asa , Apajuí takastá tibaunak imatiksag betek umikuí , Moisés aents aidaun yaigtatus Apajuí tibaunak betek takagsauwa dutiksag .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Nuaduí Moisesa nagkaesau eme anentsá diimaina duka Jisusai , jega jegamkamuk eme anentsá diitsuk , aents jegan jegamkauwa nu eme anentaiya nunisaik .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Ashí jega jegamkamu aina nunak aents jegamainawai , aantsag ashí wají aina dushakam Apajuí najankamu ainawai .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Moisesak dekaskenmag Apajuí aentsjin kuitamak , Apajuí jeen takamaina numamtuk shiig takagsauwai , Apajuí inake asa . Tuja ni takasua duka , Apajuí atak dutikatnujin iwaintamua nunin aajakuí .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Tujash Kristuk Apajuí Uchijiyai , nigka betek umina ibau asa , jutii Apajuí aentsji aidautik niina jeega numamtin ainag nui pujus yaimpaji . Jutii niiní dekaskeapi tiuwaitag duwi , uwemjatnapitja tusa wakeesa dakainag nuwi emetmamja pujau ainakuik , niina aentsjig ainaji .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Nuaduí puyatjusjum Apajuí tibauwa nu antugkatajum , Wakaní Pegkeji tibau Apajuí chichamen agagbaunum tawa ju : “ Yamai Apajuí tabau antakjumek ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: intimjukigpajum . Aents intimkiu aidau : ‘ Wajupa pegkegchau takaajinig Apajuish kajeawa ’ tusag uwegshunum dekapjusaju aina nunisjumek .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Atumi muunjum aajakajua nunú pegkegchaunum dekapjusajui , wi ditan cuarenta mijadai yaigkan iniibaun wainainayatak .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Nuninakui kajegkan : ‘ Ditak wainak anentaimainawai , nunidau asag wi taja nu dekatnash dakituinawai . ’

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Nunidau asagmatai ditan senchi kajegkan chicham yapajimainchauwai : ‘ Ditak wi nugkan anagkuauwaitag nuwi ayamsatajum tiuwaitag nuwig wayaachagtatui ’ , tijai . ”

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Yatsug aidauh , ubag aidauh kuitamamkatajum , atum ainajum anuiyatijum pegkegchau anentaimat , Apajuiyai dekaskeapi tuchata nu ajutjamsamtai , Apajuí tuke pujuwa nunú tupanjaijum .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Duka nunitsuk kashí kashinig makí makichik pempeentunikjum anentai ichichtunigtajum , “ Yamai ” , tibauwa nu tsawan eke au asamtai . Atum ainajum anuiya : Jutiik Apajuí intimjuinakuish shiig batsamtatji tusa anentaimaidaush ainawai . Tujash duka dekaskechui . Nu aaja nuninakuik Apajuí tupanku nunimainai .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Jutiishkam Kristujai ijuntsa takainautik , yama nagkamchaku niiní kajintsá anentaimajakuitag nunisaik jaakuish jamainaitji .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Duwik agagbauwa nui chichaak : “ Yamai Apajuí tabau antakjumek , intimjukigpajum duwik wajukawajua nunisjumek ” , tawai .

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: ¿ Ya Apajuí chichaamun antukaju ainayatkush intimjukiaju ainawa ? Duka ashí aents Egipto batsatun Moisés jiijá agkanmitkakua nunú nunikajui .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: ¿ Ya aidauna Apajuish cuarenta mijadaish kajegkash pujusuita ? Nunak aents tudau takasaju uwegshunum jinawajua nuna dutikawajui .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: ¿ Ya aidauna Apajuish chicham yapajimainchauwaish , wi ayamsatajum taja nuwig wayashtatjume tiuwaita ? Nunak aents chichaman intimkiajua nuna tiuwai .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Yamaik shiig dekainaji , ditak Apajuin dekaskeapi tuinachu asag , Apajuí ditan nugká anagkuauwa nuwig wayachajui .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Nuaduí , Apajuí ayamsatnume tusa anagtamamu eke ajutjama duwi , jutiik shiig kuitamamain ainaji , atum ainajum anuiyatigmekesh waimainchaunum juwakaig tabaunum .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Jutii aidautish yamajam chicham etsegbau antukuitji , dita antukajua nunisaik . Tujash ditak antuinakush wainkaya nunin diisajui , wagki Apajuiyai kajinas anentaimaidau chichaman umikajua nunikchaju asag .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Tujash jutii Apajuiyai kajintsá anentaimaidautik , Apajuí ayamsatajum tibauwa nui wayawagtinaitji . Nuna pachis Apajuí chichaak : “ Nunidau asamtai ditan kajegkan chicham yapajimainchauwai , ditak wi ayamsatajum tiuwaitag nuwig wayaachagtatui tijai ” , tiuwai . Tujash Apajuik nugkan najanauwa duwik ni takatjinak ashimkauwai .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Apajuí chichame agagbauwa nui , siete tsawanta nuna pachis : “ Apajuik ashí ni takamainjinak ashimak siete tsawanta juwi ayamjauwai ” , tawai .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Tuja agagbaunum awaksag chichaak : “ Ditak wi ayamsatajum tiuwaitag nuwig wayaachagtatui tijai ” , tawai .

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Tujash nunú ayamnagtina nui eke wayachush ainawai , yama nagkamchak chicham uwemta nu etsegbaun antuku aidauk , intimaidau asag wayachajui .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Nunikagmatai , Apajuí ataktú makichik tsawantan mamikiae , yamagman “ Yamai ” tsawanta juna , yaunchuk David papiinum agak tibauwa nunak awaksag chichaak : “ Yamai Apajuí tabau antakjumek , intimjukigpajum ” , tawa nuna .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Wagki Josué Israel aents aidaun , Apajuí ayamsatnume tiuwa nui utsau ataik , Apajuik tikich tsawannak mamikiachu amainai .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Nunin asamtai Apajuí aentsji aidautin , Apajuí ashí ni takamainjin ashimak siete tsawanta juwi ayamjauwa nunisjumek , atumesh ayamjatnaitjume tujabiuwa nunú eke dakaku pujuinaji .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Nuaduí jutii Apajuiyai ayamjatasa waidautik , ii takatjinish ayamjatnaitji , Apajuí ni takas ayamjauwa nunisajaik .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Duwi kakanmamainaitji dekas ayamtainum wayatasaja . Duwik iina muunji aidau dita chicham umishtaijin , Apajuí ditan nugkan anagkuauwa nui wayachajua nunikaig tuidau asaja .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Apajuí chichamega duka senchigtina imau asa pujut tuke atina nuna sukagtawai , nuigtush espada mai yantamejai etsakamua nuna nagkaesauwai . Espada iyashnum shiig wayaa tikima initak tsupiyama imatiksag , Apajuí chichamega duka wakannumash , tuja iina anentaimtajin pegkeg aunash , pegkegchau aunashkam dekamtijamji .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Apajuí najanamu aina nuwiyag niina uumjumainuk makichkish atsawai . Apajuí emtinig ashí wají aina duka shiig paan ainawai , nunin asamtai Apajuik ii takasbaujin diisá tujamtinai .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Jisus Apajuí Uchijiya nuuwai , jutii Sumo sacerdoteji dekas iman nayaimpinum wayauwa duka . Nuaduí niiní kajintsá anentaimaidautik emetmamjaja nunisaik pujumainaitji .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Wagki jutii Sumo sacerdotejiya nu , ii kakakchau wegajinish wait anenjamainai . Nigka jutiijai betek pegkegchau takamtiksatasa dekapeam asauwai , tujash nigka makichkish tudaunak takaschauwai .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Nuaduí Apajuí anempa duka ajantutsuk adijka ausagmi . Ni jutiinak wait anenjamag ashí ii atsumamunmash yaimpaktatui .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Ashí sumo sacerdote aidauk , aents aidau ditá tudaujin tsagkugnagtatus , kuntinun anentag itaagtai maa apeak Apajuin segattí tusa , aents aina nuwiya etegja adaikamu aajakú ainawai .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Tujash sumo sacerdotek nigkishkam pegkegchaun takamain asa , aents Apajuí umigtan shiig dekachu asag , wainak pegkegchaunum yujaidaunash wait anentus yaigtí ,

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: dutikakush niina tudaujiná tsagkugnagtatus kuntinun maa apeati , dutika duwi aents aidau tudaujin tsagkugnagti tusa kuntinun maa apeati tibau aajakuí .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Jujú takat ajantusa diimaina junak makichik aentskesh nigki nagkamig wi sumo sacerdote atajai tumamig takamaitsui . Junak Apajuí Aarogkan etegkauwa dutiksag etegkamu aina nu takamain ainawai .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Nunisag Kristushkam nigki wi sumo sacerdote atajai tusag naamkachui . Apajuí nu takata nunak dutikati tiu asa : “ Amek mina Uchijuitme , wi yamai Aentsmaga Akiinati tima akiinau asam ” , tiuwai .

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Nuigtushkam tikich agagbaunmashkam tawai : “ Ametme sacerdote dekas tuke atinmek , Melquisedec aajakua nujai betek ”

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Kristu ju nugka juwi pujusua nuaduik , shiig senchi untsumak buutak negá negajai Apajuin segauwai . Ni jamaina nunak Apajuí senchigtina ibau asa agkanmitkajuati tusa . Nunitai Apajuik ni umigbau asa ayatak antugkauwai .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Kristuk Apajuí Uchijiyaitak , waitiamunum Apajuí wakegamu umigtanak unuimajui .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Ni juna imajtikas umikú asa , ashí aents Apajuin umijuina nuna uwemtikin wajasuí , nuniku asa pujut tuke atina nuna suwawai .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Tuja Apajuí niinak sumo sacerdote atí tusa adaikauwai , Melquisedec aajakua nujai betek .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Jujú pachisa tumainuk kuashat ajutjamji , tujash juní tawai tusaik shiig tumaitsui , atumek waamak antumainchau asagmin .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Atumek Kristu nemagkajum dukap tsawan pujau asajum , jintinkagtin amainaitkujum , ataktú awagkijum Apajuinun shiig jintias dekas yupichuchin jintinjamatnume tusa atsumagme . Nuniau asajum uchi yamá akiintsau yutai katsugman yumainchau asa , muntsunak muntsuwama nunin ainajum duwi , pegkeg nuigtú pegkegchauwa dushakam akanjá dekamainchau dekapeagme .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Ashí uchi muntsun muntsuaku aina duka , chicham pegkeg aidaunak jintiag chichaakuk amaitsui , wagki uchi asa .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Tujash pegkeg takaamua nuna , pegkegchau takaamua nujai akanag dekatan unuimatjau aina nuuwai , muun yutai katsugman yuwina numamtin aidauk .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Nuaduí nagkamchaku Kristu pachisa jintiamu aajakua duka ukuaku , nuní nagkaemasa dekamain ainaji . Nunidau asaja pujut yapajita nu pachisa , tudau takaamu Apajuijai tuke kanatnum ejekagta nu idayat , Apajuiyai kajinmamsa anentaimta nu ataktú awagki dekaatasaik batsamtumaitsui .

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: Yamimat pachisa jintinkagtamu , Jisusa nemajuidau buuknum achiká Apajuí segatut , jakau aidau nantajagtin , nuigtú Apajuí ii takasbaujin diisá tujamtina nu pachisa dekaatasaishkam batsamtumaitsuji .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Ju pachisaishkam jintintuattajime Apajuish dutikati tujamkuig .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Wagki aents aidau Apajuí ni chichamen dekaskea nuna anenjauch sukagtusbauwa nuna , nuigtú Wakaní Pegkejinash tikich aidaujai betek jukiu aidau ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: nuigtushkam Apajuí chichame shiig pegkeja nunash wakejus antuku , tuja Apajuí niina senchijiin ju nugka juwi inamjatna nunash shiig dekauwaitak ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: Apajuí dekaskeapi tutan idayas , ataktú ni pegkegchau takaajakbaujinak waketjuki takaak , Kristu shiwagmaina duka , kakajus ataktú pujutinak yapajimaitsui . Wagki dita nuna nuninak , dita dekas Apajuí Uchijin achijagmatai , tikich aidau Kristun dushikis chichagmaina numamtuk wajaidau asagmatai .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Aents ajak ajakmamujiya nuna yumi yutak nugkan uchupjamtai ajak tsapai pegkejan nejekmatai , nuna ajakú juwaama numamtuk , aents chichaman antukua nu dutiksag pegkejan takagtaik Apajuishkam yaimainai .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Untsu aents aidau Kristu nemagtan idaisag jagki tsapaina numamtuk wajaidaunak , jagki jiinum apetiama numamtuk Apajuí suwimkan susatnai .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Tujash aneetaig yatsug aidauh , ubag aidauwah , atumek aents megkaemainai taji nuninuk ainatsjume . Wika atumnak shiig dekagjime , dekas pegkeg atum uwemjamujum ajutjamaina nunak .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Apajuik pegkeja nunak takauwa ibau asa , atum ni aneau asajum tikich yaigkuitjum nunak , nuigtú yamaikish yaimainajum nunak kajimatkishtinai .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Nuaduí atum wakesajum takaajum nunak , dutiksag ematnume tusa wakegaji . Nuniku asajum atum dakainajum duka imatiksagmek jukitin ainagme .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Duwi daki batsamtutsuk , Kristui kajinas anentaimaidau emamkemas pujuinak , Apajuí anagkagtuamua nuna jukitin aina nunisjumek pujustajum .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Apajuí Abragkan anagkuauwa nunak , niina nagkaesau adaisa tumain atsau asamtai , Apajuí nigki adaimamas , chichajak :

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: “ Dekaskenum kuashat yaigtatjame , dutikakun ame wegantu aidaunak shiig kuashat uyujkatnaitjai ” , tiuwai .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Tima Abragkak emamkemas dakasu asa , Apajuí niina anagkuauwa nunak imatiksag jukiuwai .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Aents ni dutikatnujin anagdayinakug , ditá nagkaesauwa nuna adaisag anagdayin ainawai . Nunú iman antamunum tiu asag dekaskenmap dutikattawa tusag ukú ainawai .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Nuaduí Apajuí anagkagtuamujin jukitin aina nuna shiig iwaintuktatus wakekauwai , ni anagkagtamua nunak makichkish yapajitsuk imatiksag umiktin asa , nigki adaimamas dekas umiktatjai tiuwa nuna .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Ni anagkagtak nigki adaimamas tiuwa nujaiyai jimag chicham yapajimainchauwai tiuwa nu . Nuaduí Apajuik waitjuchua ibau asamtai dekas dutikattawapi tau asaja , shiig senchi ichichmamainaji Apajuí ayamjutpasmatai kajinmasa ni anagkagtuamua nu jukittajiapi tusa dakaidau asaja .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Nunú dakamua nuuwai ii Apajuiyai kajinmasa anentaibaunum iina wakanin ichichtamuk , jiju ancla tutai lanchan buchitmainchau ema ebetama numamtuk . Nu kajinmasa anentaibauwa nunak Jisukristu sujamui , nigki Apajuí pujamunum wayauwa dushakam .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Jisus eemak wayauwa nunak , jutii wayatnun jintan ujatjamtatus nunikui . Nuniau asa niiyai sumo sacerdote tuke atin Melquisedecjai betekak .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Melquisedecak yaakat Salemnumia apu , Apajuí nayaimpinmayaya nuna sacerdoteji aajakuí . Nuniau asa Abraham apu aidaujai maania depetmak wakettatman , Melquisedec jiintuki igkug pegkegnum yumigsauwai .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Dutikam Abragshakam maania depetmak waketak , ashí ni wají yajuakbaujinian diezmon susauwai . Melquisedec tawa nunak : “ Apu pegkejan takau ” taku tawai , nuigtú yaakat Salema Apuji aajakuí tawa nunashkam : “ Shiig agkan anentaimsa pujutan apuji ” taku tawai .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Melquisedeca apajig , dukujish , ni weganbaujish , akiinamujish , jakamujishkam dekajuachbauwai , duka Apajuí Uchijí tuke sacerdotek pujutna numamtinuk aajakuí .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Anentaimtusjum diistajum , Melquisedecak Abragkan nagkaesau aajakuí . Iman asamtai Abragkak apu aidaujai maania depetmaka , wají yajuakbaujin diezmo susauwai .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Moisés chicham umiktajum tibauwa nuwig , sacerdote Leví wegantu aidaunak ditá patayí aina nunú diezmo susati tibau aajakuí , ditashkam Abraham wegantu ainayatak .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Tujash Melquisedecak Leví wegantuchuitak , Abraham Apajuí anagkuamun jukiuwa nunú , diezmo suwamash jukiuwai . Dutikam Melquisedecshakam pegkegnum yumigsauwai .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Juka ashí dekainaji , pegkegnum yumigkagtina duka , pegkegnum yumigsamua nuna nagkaesauwai .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Yamai jutii diezmo suwinag duka aents jinin aina nu suwinaji . Tujash Apajuí chichamen agagbauwa nuwig , Melquisedec eke iwaaku pujauwa nuninun etsegtawai .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Nunin asamtai Abraham Melquisedecan diezmon susauwa duwi , sacerdote , Leví wegantu aidaushkam diezmon ditashkam susajua nuninai .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Melquisedec Abragkan igkugtatus jiintukiuwa nuaduik Leví wegantu eke akiinachu ainayatkush , Abragkai akiinkagtin asag , ditashkam nuwig batsatua nunin aajakajui .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Moisés Israel aents aidau chicham umiktinun agatjauwai dutika susauwai Leví wegantu sacerdote aina nuna , aents aidaun chicham umitnum yaigtinme tusa . Tuja nunú sacerdote aidauk Apajuí emtin aents aidaunak pegkeja imanuk iwainamainchau aajakajui . Nuaduí atsumnajui tikich sacerdote Melquisedec aajakua ibauk , Aarón wegantua nuwiyachu .

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Wagki sacerdote takataijiya duka yapajiamu asamtai , chicham umiktinnum sacerdote aidauk nuní takastinme tibauwa dushakam yapajinauwai .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Tuja agagbaunum iina Apuji Jisukristun pachis tawa duka , tikich Israela uchijí aajakajua nuwiya aajakuí . Tuja nuwiya sacerdote atí tusaik makichkish tichamui .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Shiig dekanui , iina Apuji Jisusak Judá wegantunmaya aajakuí , Moisesak sacerdote aidau takastinjin tiuwa nunak Judá wegantunmaya takamainnak makichkish tichauwai .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Ju dekas imá paan dekamainai , yamajam sacerdote Melquisedecjai betek wantinkau asamtai .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Chicham umiktinnum Leví wegantu aina duke takastin atinme tibauwa nuwiyachui , nigka Sacerdote senchigtin pujut tuke aunum pujuwa nuwiyayai .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Niina pachis Apajuí : “ Ametme Sacerdote tuke pujutnumek , sacerdote Melquisedecjai betek ” , tiuwai .

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Nuaduí yaunchuk chicham umiktin aajakua duka nagkankauwai , aents aidaunak yaimainchau asa .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Moisés chicham umiktajum tibauwa duka makichik aentsnakesh pegkejak emachui , nunin asamtai Apajuí dekas tikich imá pegkejan amastí tusa dakaidau asaja Apajuiyaig jegainaji .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Apajuik ni dutikatjai tibauwa nunak chicham yapajimainchauwai tiuwai . Tikich sacerdote aidauk imatika chichagkaik adaikashbau ainawai .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Tujash Kristuk chicham yapajimainchauwai chichagká tibauwa nunú agagbaunum tawai : “ Apu Apajuí nigki adaimas , mina chichamjunak yapajiashtatjai , ametme Sacerdote tuke atinmek ” , tiuwai .

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Dutikamu asa Jisus dekas imá pegkeg dutikamua duka yaunchuk chicham apakbau aajakua nuna nagkaesauwai .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Sacerdote aidauk kuashat aajakajui tuke pujuchu asag .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Tujash Jisusak tuke jakashtin asa , tikichnakesh ni takaa nunak inagkeatkishtinai .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Nuaduí niiyai tuke atinun uwemtikagtumainuk , jutii niiní yunumka Apajuiyaish jegajinig . Nigka tuke pujuwa ibau asa Apajuin segatjamui .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Nunin asa dekas Sumo Sacerdote ii atsumajakuitag duka Jisusai . Nigka pegkegmai , pegkegchaunash antiakchau , tudaugtin aidaujaish ijutkachu , iman asamtai Apajuí niinak dekas nayaimpia nuna yakiin iwakuí .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Nigka tikich sacerdote aidau kashí kashinig kuntinun maa apeak , dekatkauk niina tudaujiná tsagkugnag , duwi tikich aents aidau tsagkugnagtinjin apejakua nuninchauwai . Jisusak makichkia mantamdauwai ajumaish tuke jakashtinun , nigki tsagkamankauwai .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nuwiyan diisag sumo sacerdote atinun adayajakajua duka , aents pegkegmachu aajakajui . Chicham umiktina nu nagkaemakiu ai , Apajuí chicham yapajimainchauwai , niina Uchijin Sumo Sacerdote atí , tusa adaikamua nuuwai dekas tuke pegkejak atinuk .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Wi dekas imanun titasan tajim duka juuwai : Jutii Sumo sacerdotejig , Jisus nayaimpinum Apajuí inamtaijin untsujin eketa nuuwai .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Awi nigka pujus sacerdotejai betek takaawai . Tujash nigka aents jegamkamunum wayaag takaatsui , Apajuiya nu umikbaunum wayaa takaawai .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Ashí sumo sacerdote aajakajua duka , Apajuinu anentag itaamun maa apeati tusa adaikamu ainawai . Nunisag Jisuschakam jutiin tudaujin mantamnak niina iyashinak Apajuin anentag susauwai .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Nigka ju nugka juwi pujakush sacerdotek amaitsui , juwig kuashat sacerdote ayau asamtai . Nunin asag Moisés Apajuí anentag susatajum tibauwa dutiksag takaidau asagmatai .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Tujash juwiya sacerdote aina duka , nayaimpinmaya wají aina nunú ayatak dakumká najanamunum wayaawag takainawai . Dakumkamu ainawai taji , wagki Apajuí Moisesan chichajak : “ Ame mujanum pujamin jega Apajuí ememattain iwaintukbaijam nuna niimejai betekuch najanata ” , tiuwai duwi .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Untsu jutii Sumo sacerdotejiya duka , juwiya sacerdote aidaun nagkaesau dekas pegkejan takasuí . Nunin asa ni chichaman apakua duwi , Apajuí jutii jukitnunak dekas pegkeja nuna anagtamui .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Nagkamchaku chicham apakbauwa nu pegkeg aajakú ataik , ataktú chicham apakmí tabauk atsusú amainai .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Tujash Apajuik nunú aents aidaunak pegkejak diischauwai , nuniku asa chichajak : “ Apu tawai : Tsawan jegatnai , Judea nugkanum , nuigtú Israel nugkanum batsataina nujai ataktú chichaman apaktinaitag nunú .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Duka wi ditá muunji aidaun Egipto batsatun jiijan , ditajai chichaman apakuitag nuna umikchagmatai idaisauwaitag nuninuk achattawai ” , tawai Apu Apajuí .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: “ Nunú nunikaju asamtai , yamaik juuwai yamajam chicham wi Israel aents aidaun taja nunú : Wi atumin chicham umiktajum tiuwaitjim nuna shiig dekamtikatnaitjim nunú tsawan jegatnai . Wi mina chichamjunak shiig machikish kajimatkishtinun aneemtijattajime . Atum imá minak shiig anentaimtujuinakjuminig , wishakam atumnak shiig kuitamkattajime .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Dutikamu asajum atum ijutkamukesh , yatsumkesh Apajuí dekaati tusagmek jintintuashtin ainagme . Wagki ashí piipich , ashí muun aidau nagkamas shiig dekajuawagtin ainawai .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Wika ditá pegkegchaujinak tsagkujan , tudauji aidaunash ajumaish adeagchatnun kajimatkitnaitjai ” , tawai .

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Apajuí yamajam chicham apakbaun pachis tawa nunak , nagkamku chicham apakbauwa duka muuntuch wajasú asamtai tawai , muuntuch wajasú asamtai atsumnatsu duka megkaekatin asa nuniawai .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Yamai dekaami , nagkamku chicham apakbau aajakua nuwig , ju nugka jui jega Apajuí ememattai jegamkamua nuwish , Apajuish wajuk emematmainaita nu pachisa tibau aajakuí .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Nunú jegak juní umikbau aajakuí : Dekatkau tesamua nunak “ Pegkejam ” tujakajui , nuanuig candelero jii ekemaja pekatai aajakuí , nuigtú pag Apajuí anagkuamu mesanum patagbau aajakuí .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Jaanch ejaamua nuna ukujin tesamu aajakua nunak , “ Shiig Pegkejam ” tujakajui .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Nuanuig altar ayatak orok najanamu kugkuin incienso patai apetai aajakuí , nuigtú kajun arca tutai ayatak orok epekbau aajakuí . Nunú arcaya nuna initken egkemajakuí Aarogka ushujutaiji jeekú aajakua nu , chicham umiktin kayanum agagbauwa dushakam , nuigtú makichik ichinka nunin ayatak orok najanamunum maná chimpiamu aajakua dushakam .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Nunú kajuna nuna awanken jimag aents nayaimpinmaya nanaptin dakumkamu , Apajuí nui pujamujiya nuna iwainajakajui . Nunú aidauk ditá nanapen kajun arca tutaiya nuna dukukag aajakajui . Tujash juna pachisnuk imatikanuk shiijak tichattajai .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Ashí ju imatika umikbaunum sacerdote aidauk , kashí kashinig dekatkau tesamu Pegkejam tutainum waijakajui , dita takastí tibauwa nuna umiktatus .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Tujash nuna ukujin tesamu Shiig Pegkejam tutaiya nuwig , imá sumo sacerdotek makichik mijantin makichkia waijakuí , kuntinun numpen takus . Nunik nunú numpa nuna Apajuin anagkuak , dekatkauk niina tudaujin tsagkugnagtatus segatmami , duwi tikich aentsú tudaujinash segatujakuí .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Nuna Wakaní Pegkeji shiig dekamtijamui . Dekatkau tesamunum sacerdote takainaigkish , tikich ukunum tesamu Shiig Pegkejam tujakbauwa nuwig , tikich aents wayati tusaik tichamu aajakuí .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Ashí nuna dutikajakajua nunak , yamai tsawanta juwi nuniktinun iwainak dutikawajui . Nuniau asag nunú jeganum batsamsag , kuntin Apajuí anentag anagkuamun maa apeenak Apajuin emematuinakush , dita bakumamainjinig tuke agkanmagak agkanmagauwa nuninuk anentaimajakchajui .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Nu jeganum batsamas chicham umiktajum tibaun umiinak , ayatak yutai aidau , umutai aina nuna , Apajuí ememattasag yumin ikigmajakajua nujai takasajui . Ashí nunú aidaunak Apajuí eke yapajiachu asamtai dutikajakajui .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Tujash Kristu juwi tauwa nuuwai yamaik Sumo Sacerdote , pegkeg aidau tuke atinun sukagtinuk . Ni sacerdotejai betekak jega Pegkegmanum wayaa takaa nuuwai dekas imá pegkejak . Duka aents aidau jegamkachbauwai , nunin asa ju nugka juwiyachui .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Kristuk jega tesamu Shiig Pegkejam nayaimpia nui wayauwai . Nigka chivo aidau , toro tsakat aina nuna numpen jukig wayaachui . Nigka aentsú tudauji tsagkugnagti tabaunum mantamdauwa duwi , niina numpen juki , Apajuí pujamunum makichkia wayauwai tuke atinun , nuniak jutiinash tudaunum bakumamaina nuna agkanmitkagbauwai .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Duwikik toro aidau , chivo aidau numpen jukiag , nuigtú baka tsakat apeamu yukujinashkam jukiag , aents pegkegchau waigkú aidaun yukujakú ainawai , Apajuí ememattasa uminbaunmag pegkeg atinme tusag .

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: Tujash Kristu achinag mantamdauwa duwi , jutiinak Apajuí emtinish bakumamainchau etabiuwai . Nigka makichkish pegkegchaujig atsugmaitak , Wakaní Pegkeji tuke pujuwa nunú yayasam , nigki tsagkamankauwai mantamnatatus , ni jaak numpeen ukajua duwi aents aidau tudaujish tsagkugnagtinme , dutikamu asag Apajuí tuke pujuwa nuna ememattinme tusa .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Nunin asa niiyai yamajam chichaman apakuk , ni mantamnak aents yaunchuk chicham apakbaunum batsamas tunamaku aidaunash agkanmitkak , Apajuí tuke atinun anagkagtuauwa nunash jukitnume tujabiuwai .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Aents jaakug niina wajiijinak , nu aents jukiti tusa papiinum agag shiig umiká ukú ainawai . Tujash aents nuna agajua nu eke iwaaku pujaigkik juchau ainawai .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Aaja chicham umikbau aig , nuna umikú iwaaku pujaigkik nu chichama duka wainkayai . Untsu papiinum agag umikua nu jakamtai , nu aents jukitin atí tibaujiya duka uminnai .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Nunisag Apajuí yamá nagkamchak chichaman Moisesjai apakua dusha , numpajaichuk dutikachbau aajakuí .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Dutika chicham umiktina nuna ashí aents aidaun Moisés ujaká , nuaduí toro tsakat maamu aidau numpeen , chivo numpe aidaun yumijai pachimag , uwijá uje kapantu emamun jukiag numi hisopo tutai kanawen jigkawag , numpanum uchupig , chicham umiktin agagbaun pegashmatug uchupik , aents aidaunashkam dutiksag dutikauwai .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Dutika chichajak : “ Jujuwai numpa atumjai chicham apamunum jutikag nu ” , tiuwai .

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Nuigtushkam Apajuí ememattai duwap apajá jegamajakbaunum , dekatkau tesaamu Pegkejam tutaiya nui takatai aidaunash numpan pegashmatujakuí .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Chicham umikbauwa nuwig : Numpajai dutika pegashmatjamu aina nuuwai Apajuinu atí tusa dutikamu aidauk tawai . Numpajaichuk tudau tsagkugnamainuk atsawai tibau aajakuí .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya wají aidau diisá dutiksaik dakumká najanamu aajakua duka , Apajuinu atí tusa dutikamui . Untsu nayaimpinmaya wají aina duka , kuntinu numpen dutikajakbauwa nuna nagkaesau dekas pegkejan atsumawai .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Kristuk jega tesaamu Shiig Pegkejam tabaun aents umikajua nuwig wayachui , duka nayaim awa nu dakumká najanamu aajakuí . Nigka dekas nayaimpinum wayauwai . Yamaik awi Apajuijai pujus , jutiin Apajuin aujtugmaji yaimpakti tusa .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Mija mijantin sumo sacerdotek jega tesamu Shiig Pegkejam tutainum wayakug , kuntinu numpen ditá numpechun takusag waijakú ainawai . Tujash Kristuk kuashta imaniag mantamnachui , aents aidau tudauji Apajuí emtin tsagkujamu agtinme tusag .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Nunin achataik niishkam yama nagkamchaku nugka najandauwa duwi nagkamnas , yamaishkam tuke mantamná pujumainai , tujash yamaik tsawan nagkanbau jegau asamtai Jisusak tauwai . Nunik tudaun depetkatatus ajumaish jakashtinun makichkia mantamdauwai .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Tuja nunisag aents aidaushkam makichkia jakatin ainawai , nunikmatai Apajuí ii takasbaujin diisá tujamtina nu atinai .

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: Nunisag Kristushkam kuashat aents aidau tudaujin utsankatatus makichkia jakauwai , tuja ataktú minitta duwik tudaunak pachikchattawai , niina dakak batsatun uwemtikatatus minau asa .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Moisés chicham umiktinun agajua nunak dekas nayaimpinum atina nuna iwainak dutikauwai . Nuaduí chicham umiktina nuna umiinak , mija mijantin kuntinun maawag apejakú aina duka , makichkish aentsnak pegkejak emachui .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Chicham umiktina nu umiamunum , tudau tsagkugnajag Apajuí emtin bakumamainchau dekapenakug , kuntin mautnak idaisau amain aajakajui .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Tujash nunú kuntin maamua duka ayatak , ashí mijantin ditá tudaujinak anemtikajakuí .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Wagki toro numpe , chivo numpe aina nujaig aentsuk tudaujinig tsagkugnamainchau asamtai .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Nuaduí Kristu nugká tatsuk Apajuin tiuwai : “ Kuntin maa apeamu , tuja anentag itamush dakitame . Nuniau asam minak aentsú iyashijai betek etiume , aents aidau tudaujin mantamnak agkanmitkati tusam .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Kuntin maa apeamu , nuigtú tudau tsagkugnagtasa anentag itaamu aidaushkam dakitame .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Nuniau asamin wi amina chichagkun : ‘ Apajuiyah , mina pachitus papiinum agajajua nuna , ame wakegam dutiksanuk umiktasan juwi pujajai ’ , tibaijame . ”

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Nuna nagkamas takug : “ Apajuik kuntin maamu , anentag itaamu , tudau tsagkugnagtasa kuntin maa apeamu aina nunak dakitawai , shiig awagmatsui tawai . Chicham umiktina nui dutikatajum tibauwa nunin aigkish . ”

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Ataktú takushkam : “ Wi ame wakegam nuna umiktasan minajai ” tiuwai . Nunak yaunchuk kuntin maajakbauwa duka emegkakum , yamagmauchia nu apusata taku tiuwai .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Jisukristuk Apajuí wakegamunak imatiksag umiju asa , jutii tudaujin makichkia mantamdauwai ajumaish jakashtinun .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Ashí sacerdote aidauk kuntin maa apeamua nunak kashí kashinig takajakú ainawai , tudaunash makichkish utsanjamainchau aig .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Tujash Jisukristuk ataktú mantamnashtinun makichkia mantamdauwai tudau aidaunum , nunik Apajuí inamtaijin untsujin ekeemsauwai .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Nui yamaik pujawai , “ ni shiwaji aidaunak ashí Apajuí depetuk ikaunmakti ” tusa dakak .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Nuna niina iyashin anentag Apajuin susauwa duwi , tuke atinun pegkemtijabiuwai , Apajuinu atinme tusa .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Dutiksag Wakaní Pegkejiya dushakam shiig dekamtijamji :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: “ Apu Apajuí yamagman anagkagtak : Wi atumin chicham umiktajum tiuwaitjim nuna shiig dekamtikatnaitjim nunú tsawan jegatnai . Wi mina chichamjunak shiig machikish kajimatkishtinun aneemtijattajime .

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ditá tudauji aidaunash ajumaish adeagchatnun kajimatkitnaitjai , tawai . ”

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Aatus asamtai tudau tsagkujamu aidautik , Apajuí tsagkugtugti tusa kuntin mautak atsumnatsui .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Nunin asamtai mina yatsug aidauh , ubag aidauh , Jisukristu mantamna numpeen ukajua duwi , jega tesamu Shiig Pegkejam tutainum sacerdote waijakajua nunisaik , Apajuí pujamunum waimainuk shiig agkan ajutjamsae .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
